Summary: This is a great small, boutique hotel to get a decent room and enjoy the ocean views, but these room are almost double the price they should be and many you wouldnt want to stay in because people can see right into your room.  They also charge you a resort fee!  Nobody would ever call this a resort.  Its saddens me to see a small hotel I've gone to for so many years price gouge its loyal customers.  Stay in your lane Capri, make your money on Volume, not price gouging.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: What a gem in Laguna Beach!
Summary: What a wonderful gem in Laguna Beach! Had an impromptu visit with my sister to see Pageant of the Masters and was treated to the lovely Capri Hotel which transported me back to Italy😊 The rooms are updated, clean and tastefully decorated and the pool was perfect! Plus there are many options to relax and enjoy the sound of  ocean, either down on the beach in the chairs from the hotel or different deck areas to choose from. I met the manager, Nick, who is warm & very charming, plus Morgan at the front desk could not have been sweeter! Such a great environment all around. It was the recharge I needed!

Summary: Capri Laguna on the Beach is outstanding.  I always go to Capri Lagune Hotel for my wife birthday and our wedding anniversary, and we always get an amazing room with a beautiful view. Summary: Most people have a sunny beach time review, but due to the storms, ours was mostly rainy and cold. But we did get spells of rainlessness, and man, did we love this place. It must be something even more special in good weather! I can't comment on the air conditioning (it was around 40degrees F already) but am very happy to report the heating worked very well.  The bathroom was updated and modern, with a slow start to the hot water (possibly due to weather) but once it got hot, it stayed that way for a very long time. My only criticism is that it's an older built hotel, so accessibility might be an issue if you don't have a ground level room. It didn't bother us too much, but should definitely be asked about if that's a necessity for your group.  Love this quiet little pocket of
Room tip:
- If you're staying in high season, make reservations for the busier restaurants.

Summary: Great property right next door to Surf & Sand resort and across the street from Sapphires.  Lots of nooks to enjoy the sun and sunset.  Didn’t get a chance to try the pool but looked clean. 24 hr coffee machine in the lobby was nice. Great service and help from Bachir.  I’d definitely stay here again.
Room tip: Beachfront rooms are the best, ocean front probably next best.  Basic Breakfast included as well...

Summary: Just got home from yet another wonderful stay at Capri Laguna! I love it there! Bachir and Nick are so nice and welcoming, the property very clean, is in a great location, and the views from our room, the deck and from the beach are absolutely gorgeous! I would highly recommend staying there, and I will definitely choose to stay there again and again!

Summary: When I booked the room with an ocean view I expected to be able to see the ocean. Then when my mom asked at check in the lady was extremely professional and as nicely as possible explained that the ocean view isn’t really an ocean view we had to pay an extra 300 usd per night for the beach view room. Staff is professional and courteous management needs to be more clear in communicating what you are getting when booking here
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at the Capri Laguna!
Summary: I love this hotel. The manager, Nick, is very friendly and helpful as are his staff.  They have ocean front view rooms which are great, but you don't need an ocean front room to enjoy the view because they have 3 decks with tables and chairs outside so you can spend all day looking at the ocean from there. They also have chairs and umbrellas on the beach in the summer that you can enjoy. The view from this hotel is stunning. The rooms have been redone and are very comfortable and user friendly. The location lends itself to walking to shops and restaurants and the trolley picks up right outside the hotel. They have parking onsite which is also a huge plus. They also have a wine and cheese reception on Friday nights. I LOVE THIS PLACE!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nick, Bachir, Morgan and Paige are the best! I stay here repeatedly when I have business in Irvine, and it never disappoints. From the overview deck to the lower beach deck, the views are spectacular, especially when Bachir upgraded my room! Reasonable prices for right on the beach! Free breakfast and winr and cheese on Friday nights. Will definitely continue staying here!
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you're looking to escape to the water's edge, this is the place. A private deck with an ocean view and the kindest staff you can find anywhere. Much thanks to Bachir, Nick and the entire staff for treating us not just as guests, but as friends. We'll be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just returned from a fabulous vacation in Laguna Beach! We loved our hotel! The room was spotless, the view was spectacular and the sounds of the waves was incredible. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Oh Capri, how I have missed you
Summary: Always magical, always just what is needed for the soul, and always hard to leave. There simply is no other place that I have found in Southern California at this price range with these views.  As my car gets within 20 minutes, I am like a kid at Disneyland, I just can't wait to get into my room, onto the lounge chair on the private balcony, sip my beverage, and forget about everything.  We always feel like we should get out and enjoy more of Laguna but it is so hard to leave that chair.  The view changes by the hour.  Sunset is amazing, but getting your breakfast and eating out on the deck is also a favorite time as we always see dolphins from our balcony.  I also love places that have little sections of seating that differ from place to place.  Lots of little nooks, chairs,

Summary Heading: It doesn't get any better than The Capri Laguna on the Beach!

I would thoroughly recommend The Capri to all visitors to Laguna Beach: well appointed rooms and suites, elegant courtyards and sturdy decks, and in a convenient location, close to cafes, restaurants and shops. Summary Heading: I hidden treasure, you will love it!
Summary: Truly an amazing hotel and a hidden treasure. It's right on the beach, most rooms have a view of the pool or ocean. There is also a gigantic deck that overlooks the ocean and some palm trees, a great place to unwind after the day, or for morning coffee. The hotel is walking distance to several close by restaurants and shopping, and a short 18 minute walk to downtown Laguna.   The rooms are extremely comfortable and clean. The employees are extremely courteous and helpful. Front desk personnel Morgan and Mechere rocked and really helped make the stay easy. We look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments.

Summary: Great oceanfront hotel, with great rooms, very friendly staff, and excellent continental breakfast. The hotel also has an EV plug-in (chargepoint) at very reasonable cost. We certainly would stay here again. Keep up the great work!

Summary Heading: Beautiful and relaxing late season visit
Summary: We had a perfect vacation.  The beach access and common areas overlooking the ocean are great, and the beach itself is especially nice at lower tides.   This hotel is built into the cliff along the ocean and has several stairs, so that could be an issue for some.  We loved our updated room (comfy bed, microwave, fridge and safe) and balcony with an ocean view.  Bashir was especially kind and helpful to us which we appreciated.  Everyone was very friendly.  I was a little concerned about parking ahead of our stay, and we did end up in the over-flow lot on occasion, but the lot is so close that it was not an inconvenience at all.  The hotel is about a mile from Laguna Main Beach/downtown and you can walk, drive or ride the trolley there. There are several restaurants and bars that

Summary: PROS Beach Access: Step out of your room, walk down some stairs, and you're on the beach.  Beach: Not crowded, and Capri Laguna puts out chairs and umbrellas.  Whales and Dolphins: Get up early and sit out on your balcony, or step down a few stairs one of the hotel's overlooks. I saw two pods of Killer Whales about 200 yards out, travelling north. (Tip: The rocks and seaweed are not whales.) :)   Restaurants: Within walking distance are a few good eateries and coffee shops.  Cost: While not cheap, Capri Laguna is considerably cheaper than the surrounding hotels.  CONS Old: Capri Laguna is old, and it shows. Do not read "quaint" into that. It's not. It's just old.  Maintenance: The maintenance on Capri Laguna is lacking and poorly executed. They could find some stones, surfer

Summary: This hotel's selling point is location alone- that's it. However it is not enough to justify the prices. It is too too expensive for very limited and tight parking, an old worn out appearance, lack of very basic room features like adequate power outlets, paper thin walls, and tons of outdoor light pollution at night. The place is in need of general upkeep and basic maintenance such as picking up visible garbage (beer cans, water bottles and old deck furniture visible in dirty outdoor storage area directly under main ocean viewing deck) and sweeping/cleaning walkways. There were sticky stains on the concrete walkways everywhere. Sweep and mop- basic.

I'm not sure this can be remedied with the setup they have (portable a/c vented externally); they need to invest in mini splits for the rooms. Around the property there are several sitting areas, and wooden tables with umbrellas, all with beautiful ocean views. Like a lot of Laguna, parking is scarce, but included in the price of your room. Summary: We stayed in the beach view room and it was amazing. The sound of the waves lull you to sleep (sorry Alexis your sounds don't compare). The beach view is a wow! I saw dolphins in the ocean. The room and staff make it the best place to stay in Laguna Beach. Can't wait to return!

However it's the staff that treats you like family is what makes it special!

Summary: Had such a great time. The pool was so warm, staff was so friendly, view was amazing, very comfortable bed.   Nick Bachir was super friendly and went above and beyond.   Our room was right on the ocean, such great views and so fun to be right on the beach.

Summary: The location is great if you want an on the beach view experience, has rocks, no sandy area, hotel rooms are somewhat dated as far as carpets, nightstands, I had one drawer that kept opening up by itself, coffee maker is very dated and no variety of coffee or teas, could use freshness throughout, very pricey if you stay in a room with a view, you're basically paying so high for that.  For as much as they charge over $650 in the middle of the week, they could by now have done more upgrades, you would expect much better, but you're paying for the view, it is right on top of the ocean

Summary Heading: Love, love love this amazing hotel and its staff!
Summary: I took my mom who is here from Sweden back to beautiful Laguna Beach which is her favorite place for 2 nights. I researched online and came across Capri Laguna Beach. I knew we had made the right choice as we were greeted by Bachir who was so pleasant and helpful when we checked in. Morgan was working the counter in the morning and was wonderful as well. The General Manager Nicholaos came to greet us as well and couldn’t have been nicer. Everyone working here made us feel like we were part of the family. The room was outstanding and we could hear the waves at night. We got there in time to just walk the stairs down to watch a spectacular sunset. The location of this quaint hotel is amazing and we loved our stay here. But it’s the staff that made us feel so very welcome and at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach hotel. Summary: We booked this hotel based on recent reviews and last minute availability.   What we liked: oceanfront view is spectacular, not as busy as more central locations, friendly staff, beach access only at low tide, close to public transportation, great decks to lounge on, there were no rooms above us.   What needs improvement: it is old and out dated, the grounds are not well maintained, the continental breakfast is  prepackaged items in a refrigerator, it is very expensive without any extras, you can hear your neighbors, the towels, bedding, and furniture are frayed and threadbare.   If you don’t mind eating out or buying food from the Ralph’s grocery store down the street, this is a good option. If you are looking for a resort or a luxury hotel feel, this is not your hotel. The

I plan to bring my mom here next time in California and other friends / family. THANK YOU CAPRI !!

Summary: Bachir and Nick were really helpful at the front desk. We were able to check in early and enjoy the amazing view from our room. It’s less than a mile walk to any place you want to get to in Laguna Beach and the staff recommendations were spot on.

Summary Heading: Perfect spot to unwind after a busy day!
Summary: Was travelling on business with a colleague and wanted a place to unwind after a long day walking the first tradeshow we attended in over 2 years.  Although 35 minutes from Anaheim where the tradeshow was held, am happy we stayed in Laguna.  Capri Laguna is a quaint European feel hotel and the staff is very friendly and helpful. Especially the General Manager, Nick.  He was an exceptional host and went out of his way to make us feel comfortable. There are many restaurants close by to choose from (all walking distance). When you book, make sure to ask for a room with an ocean view!  Thank you Nick for everything!  I already miss Laguna!

Summary: Property is on the beach. Lots of steps to climb. Room was split level with 2 balconies. Wife loved this place. Walking distance or trolly ( free) from one end of town to the other. Beach exploring kept our 7 yr old Granddaughter busy.

Summary Heading: Closest thing to actually being in Capri
Summary: Charming boutique hotel on prime Laguna real estate with stunning ocean and island views.  Listen to the surf crash the shoreline as you fall into a cathartic sleep. It is the ultimate in walkability along the historic 101 or along the sand to main beach and back.  There's no shortage of night life, shopping, and restaurants all within a very short trek by foot.

Summary: This was our first to Laguna and the Capri was the best choice to stay! Had an ocean front room and the view was amasing! Rooms very clean and excellent customer service: Bachir, Morgan and Nick are the best.

Summary: We chose the no waterfront view. It was a stair walk to the beach. They have several beautiful decks. They have thought out great cleaning functions. Great beach. All new inside the room however it’s very bland. But we don’t intend to be in room much so it didn’t matter much. The lobby is very nice, the breakfast is simply stuff from Sams or Costco nothing special. They have a Starbucks machine. The pool is cute but rooms over look it and it’s essentially in the middle of the parking lot. But if you know laguna it has to be. I love how close to the beach it is and it’s cute for a couple getaway. It is not a resort so keep that in mind. Great anniversary spot which is what we were celebrating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. Summary: Went there for my anniversary and couldn't be happier. This place is RIGHT on the beach and in the middle of foot-friendly Laguna Beach - everything you might want is within walking distance. This is an old-school non-corporate family owned and operated hotel with a personable, friendly and helpful staff, a very serviceable Continental breakfast and a stretch of beach just steps down from the hotel's ample verandas. Special mention should be made of Nick the Manager, a Greek gentleman who manages his role as your temporary host with affable and attentive elegance.  Looking for glossy decor, glib disinterest and inch-deep personal interaction? Go elsewhere.  But if you'd feel at home in an environment of warmth and genuine hospitality you'll find yourself entirely pleased with
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel  for your anniversary and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. Summary Heading: Delightful Hotel - Friendly Staff - On the Beach!
Summary: The Capri Laguna was a great location for our winter getaway. Well winter, is not necessarily significant in Southern California, but short getaways are always awesome. We stayed two nights at the Capri in early February. Daytime temps were in the 70s. We were upgraded to a partial ocean view room when we checked in. A large deck was just outside our room with lots and tables and chairs. We enjoyed the provided breakfast and sunset views from the deck. We were delighted with the surprise bouquet of roses from the general manager! The room was very nice and furnishings were up to date. It’s walking distance to shops, galleries, groceries, and restaurants. Go to the Starfish for happy hour, 3-6!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel  for your sort sunny  getaway .  We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a delighted and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel.

Summary: When you are trying to find a place to stay you never really know what you are in for til you get there and Capri Laguna exceeded our expectations. Can’t wait to go back and hope to stay longer next time.

Selanne is across the street, but we did not like it as much as we did Mozambique.  Easy walk into town.  Lots of cute little shops and restaurants everywhere.

Summary: Having planned what I thought was the perfect trip for my large  family 6 months in advance ,the hotel pulled a bait and switch when we arrived.  The rooms were disgusting and in  no way resembled the reservation I was assured we would have.  We called Capri Laguna just down the road and they couldn't have been more accommodating.   The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean, the beds are very comfortable the view from most rooms is gorgeous!  The Location is perfect!  Breakfast is included.  Thank you Nick and staff for a great week!

Summary Heading: Amazing experience check in to check out!
Summary: This hotel is absolutely amazing!!! The rooms are clean, quiet, inviting and have just what you need as far as amenities. The staff are welcoming and friendly with a very nice lobby and plenty of information to share. There is ample parking and the hotel is within walking distance of great shopping/dining so no need to worry about parking around town. And the location - MY GOODNESS!!! Literally right on the water with a beautiful observation deck with tables, chairs and loungers to take in the incredible views. I will DEFINITELY be back, thank you Capri Laguna for a wonderful trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. Summary: We love Capri Laguna.  We've stayed there twice.  Rooms were great.  Very clean with lovely views.  The hotel grounds feature multiple decks and patios where you can look out over the ocean and beach.  The place reminds us of Mikonos, Greece.  Just lovely!

Summary: We originally booked for 1 night but loved it so much, we added an additional night. It has its own semi-private beach, beautiful views of the sunrise & sunset, private patios, and great customer service. There’s also a great shared private rooftop! Really felt like we were on vacation somewhere far away. The GM, Nick, was a pleasure so meet and even surprised us with a gift to our room! Will definitely be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon and create more amazing gateway for you.

Summary: I planned a surprise getaway for my mother in laws birthday. This was our first time staying at this hotel, and I had no idea what to expect… the manager was incredible! So welcoming… we had the best ocean front views… my mother in law received a personal happy birthday message with a beautiful bouquet of roses! My family had a great time! Best location, unlimited Starbucks coffee machine brews by cup… heated 85 degree pool… views to die for! We are coming back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Very dated property, some rooms you have to climb 25 stairs with no elevator.  Floors in room uneven,  bathroom faucet you could turn in circles, parking is insufficient.  View is extraordinary, breakfast is scant.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best Hotel in Laguna We had a beachfront room and the sound of the ocean and the Amazing colors of the sunset made as feel like we were in heaven. Great customer service! Thank you Nick, vagelis and Morgan for the great experience. My pretty woman asked me to come back soon! We will see you soon !
Manager Response: Thank for taking the time and sharing this beautiful review. We are pleased to learn that you had a very relaxing time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The Capri Laguna on the Beach looking forward to see you soon.

Summary: What an amazing find in Laguna Beach! We loved this boutique hotel with it's ocean side location and quiet tables with umbrella and chairs overlooking the ocean. Bashir checked us in and made us feel so welcome and helped acquaint us with Laguna Beach. I'll stay here for my next trip to Laguna as it's great value for money and a beautiful and relaxing place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for (3 stars is generous)
Summary: LONG review summarized: - GREAT proximity to the water for a low price - In exchange for the low price you get low quality, but a very friendly staff doing their best - We didn't stay in the room they set aside for us the first night, but we got moved into it the second night. We brought pizza back that we left out (which we have done at least a dozen times before at other local hotels without issue) and it was swarmed by ants the next day which leads us to wonder what was wrong with the room when we arrived?  GREAT proximity to the water at a low price, but remember -- YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.

Summary Heading: Memorable vacation at Capri Hotel in Laguna beach
Summary: We had a memorable vacation at Capri Laguna beach. This boutique hotel has the best deck view in Laguna overlooking the Ocean.  The staff were quite helpful.  The manager Nick was amazing , Bachir welcomed us warmly and Morgan was upbeat.  What a hospitable crew. The room was spacious, clean  and comfortable.   The hotel has a secluded beach access.   You literally have the ocean to yourself.  I can’t wait to go back. The hotel location is superb.  It has parking.  Their coffee is the best and the breakfast is fresh and plentiful.  We highly recommend Capri Hotel in Laguna beach. .

Summary Heading: Quaint Hotel Right on Laguna Beach
Summary: What a gem of a hotel! The rooms are quaint and well decorated and supplied. The housekeeping staff was fantastic, and we enjoyed meeting the owner and hearing the history of the hotel. We liked that we could walk to excellent restaurants and shops. The free parking is one of the features that drew us to this hotel. It's a short drive to Dana Point, San Clemente, and only 40 minutes from Orange County/John Wayne airport. We'll be back!

Summary Heading: I would not recommend Capri Laguna.
Summary: Capri Laguna hotel was very expensive and the quality was very poor.  The room was small and very outdated. Furnishings need to be replaced. Drapes were hanging off the rod in places and in bad condition . Outdoor furniture uncomfortable. The air conditioner was portable and took up floor space in the small room. No elevator.  We were on the 2nd floor and no one offered to help with our luggage.  Limited parking or you had to park offsite. Compared to other hotels along the coast we stayed, this hotel was terrible!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great little hotel, with a wonderful location & friendly staff.

Shout out to Baschir ( I hope I spelled this right =)  Walking distance to restaurants, bars & grocery store.   FYI They even have an electric charging station at the secondary parking location.   The hotel is on the sand, so it's a simple walk down some stairs to the beach... what else do you need?

The rooms are clean, the views are spectacular, and the location is top-notch for walker and explorers of Laguna Beach. Typing this brings back awesome memories — my wife and I are already talking about making this an annual trip now! If you’re up-in-the-air between the Capri and someplace else, book this spot — it’s awesome and you won’t regret it!

Summary: I travel for work and for pleasure and I loved this boutique hotel - the rooms are clean, the beds are super comfortable, literally every room you can hear the waves from the ocean because it is on the beach, there is a pool, a deck to sit on and see the ocean and many places to eat and drink within walking distance. I would highly recommend this hotel and the staff, especially Bashir, was incredibly friendly, professional and accommodating. I am in the hospitality business too and I can say that Bashir was also very genuine and his care for the guests is real. I will be back!

Yes the Surf and Sand is just a few doors down but who can afford their prices?  You can have an oceanfront experience at half the cost here. This is not an isolated situation since we have had the same issues each time we have stayed here. We love Capri Laguna, but they really need to deep clean the rooms more often and make updates and repairs that are needed. Especially when they are charging what they do for the beach front rooms.

Bachir put coins in our meter at 8am to ensure we did not get a ticket. The hotel essentially has its own private beach with umbrellas and chairs. There is nothing better than falling asleep to the sound of waves so pay extra to get beachfront.

Summary: Upon entry, you will see that the lobby is very small. It reminded me of some hotels in Europe. We still had a view of the ocean but one of the hotel buildings was blocking our view of the sand and waves.  Our room was a little musty inside upon entry but there are A/C units in each room. With exception of the newly renovated bathroom, the rest of the room looked a little dated. Our room came with a separate living room area, private balcony, kitchenette with microwave, fridge, coffee maker, private bedroom, and newly renovated bathroom. We really enjoyed our stay here at this charming, boutique hotel.

Summary Heading: Excellent beach front, lovely hotel staff
Summary: We stayed at Capri Laguna as a last-minute get-away, and while expensive for a last-minute beach-front room, we loved it. The crashing waves from the deck meant we slept with the window open and slept very well.   Our first time at Laguna Beach, we were pleased to learn that we prefer this southern beach location in comparison to the crowded northern beach and the core downtown area. However, going there for a day-visit was easy thanks to the trolley.  Bachir at the front desk was great, as was the main service-guy (sorry, I never got his name but he was helpful and a hard worker), also the initial woman who checked us in was cheery, plus the cleaning staff were all friendly and helpful. Solid friendly service made the visit feel warm and not cold like so many other hotels (even
Manager Response: Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. Summary: We prefer quaint hotels and this one has plenty of charm!  This hotel was build in 1958.  Our room was small by today's standards, but it was clean with a nice, renovated bathroom.  We have our own patio with an ocean view.  With the windows open at night, we could sleep hearing the waves.  Very peaceful. Since the hotel has several layers of rooms with patios, there are many steps down to the beach.  There are also rooms which surround the pool with only one flight of stairs and a large patio that overlooks the ocean.   The staff were very helpful and friendly. This hotel felt down-to-earth, not so commercialized.  I would definitely come back!

Summary: We came down to Laguna last week with a few other couples to hang out for a few days and attend the Pageant of the Masters. Bashir and his team do a wonderful job of making us feel at home and every detail is addressed.  As are most oceanside properties in town, the Capri is an older property.  That said, it's very comfortable, relaxing and updated with all of the amenities you'd expect from a high-end, beach-side hotel.  The ocean views from the rooms and deck are fantastic, the wonderful beach below is easily

Summary: If you're looking for a luxe stay this isn't it. But the rooms were very clean, the shower was modern, the beds were comfy, and it has direct beach access. Both the front desk staff and the cleaning staff were lovely.   The pool is very small and was overtaken by kids (this may be fine for family travelers) and there is no hot tub. The hotel has direct beach access but no amenities (chairs, drink service...) If you're watching your dollars and aren't centering your vacation around the hotel, this is a reasonable option. If you want a bit more of a posh experience you may want to look elsewhere.

Summary: I booked a night at Capri Laguna on the Beach using credit card points for when my niece came to LA for a visit. I booked an ocean view room with a king size bed, because there were no options available for two doubles with an ocean view. When we got to our room, we received a phone call letting us know we had been upgraded to another room, closer to the beach with two beds. Both rooms were really cute. We went down to the beach for a while and when we came back to our room, we had a lovely surprise. The manager left us some beautiful roses on our dining room table. We had a lovely time and I will definitely go back.

Umbrellas and beach chairs are provided with your stay.  The beach is beautiful - however, access requires walking up and down at least 60 steps.  There is a landing every 13-14 steps.  Walking back up from the beach is the hard part.  Make sure you're in shape before staying here.  The excellent location is near good restaurants and the free shuttle takes you to and from the main beach and the downtown area, and it runs until 11:30 pm.  Good value!

It boggles my mind how California thinks it is all that. Nice weather, but worth the cost? Absolutely not. I paid more for this tiny, tired room than I paid a month ago at a top-notch all inclusive resort in the beautiful tropical jungles of Puerto Vallarta. Laguna? Summary: The sofa bed was full of springs, the extra bed too. Impossible to sleep there. Kitchinette with no plates cutlery etc. The manager was very nice and tried to improve things but the hotel is outdated and expensive

Summary: Capri Laguna on the beach is always so welcoming and the staff is wonderful. We arrived early and our room was ready! We had food delivered to our room, but restaurant didn't send any spoons or forks. Bachie, at the front dest helped us out. Everyone is so helpful.  The sounds and sight of the ocean just melt all your cares away. A huge thank you to Nick, Morgan, and Bachie for making our stay so special, all the time with the extras they provide (flowers, wine, ect to help us celebrate anniversaries, birthdays and more). Cant wait to return. Heavenly!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.

Summary: Came here with the kids for my Mother’s Day trip and everything exceeded our expectations. The location was perfect and within walking distance to everything you could possibly need, Nick was amazing! Definitely planning a visit back to our favorite beach in California.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Capri Laguna on The Beach is beautifully located 77 steps from the beach. The parking is a little tight, but hey it's a beach town, what do you expect. Upon our arrival at the front desk, we were immediately greeted by the clerk. She proceeded to check us in and I asked her if we could upgrade to 2 queens. She checked and upgraded us for FREE! Ok, yes, I was excited as this doesn't happen hardly at all. That pretty much set the tone for the rest of the trip. EVERYONE at this boutique hotel as so friendly and were were always asked if we needed anything at all. I'm giving this hotel a 5 star in hospitality service. They really know how to treat their guests. The rooms weren't exactly 5 star, but were very clean and bed was very comfortable, got a very good night sleep and you
Manager Response: We are excited  to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. We try to do the right thing, all time. Sincerely yours,

Summary: Right on the beach, free parking, very friendly staff that gave us a free room upgrade since we were newlyweds.  Short walk to a bunch of stops in town, all around excellent value, would go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  Congratulations on your wedding .

Summary: The location can’t be beat and the beach is excellent. Parking can be a little challenging, but manageable and you can hear people moving around in nearby rooms (it’s an older building). The staff are extremely courteous and professional. The room was the perfect size for us and clean, until we tracked a bunch of sand into it from our time at the AMAZING beach. We will definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention! We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: You don't need to travel to Greece because you may find Capri Laguna On The Beach which have the similar buildings which hold a Greek friendly atmosphere especially when you meet ever smiling Nick and Nick and  Bashir greeting you in Greek language, Opa! You are in the proximity of the ocean day and night helping you to forget everything negative. Don't bring your home with you, the comfort and settings because you are in Greece.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: If you enjoy sleeping while listening to the sounds of the waves on your private beach  then this is the place for you. The rooms are comfortable with private balconies overlooking the beautiful Pacific Ocean. A trolley picks you up across the street for a free, easy ride to downtown Laguna. Good restaurants within close walking distance to hotel.  The staff ensure all your needs are met. This customer service, overseen by Nick & Bashir, is top notch ! Their warm hospitality ensures I will return again and again. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City.  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Winning combination! Beautiful room/balcony, exceptional view, friendly, professional, responsive staff -made our stay a delight. We appreciated extra care from Chris (made sure to help no matter what we needed during the day), Desiree (made sure we had the best room along with her co-worker oops, didn't get her name) , Bachhir (made sure we had everything we needed in the evening) , Nick (great smile, made sure we had a corkscrew and wine glass) and Luis (smiling professional, extra lotions we needed and friend sharing a great song).What a magnificent boost to our memories and vacation experience. As a first post-pandemic trip, this was very important to us, and this wonderful place on the sea, and great staff really helped us get past the tough times last year. Thank you,
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests .  We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback.  We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Capri Laguna is a fabulous get-away for us, which we've enjoyed year after year.  There's direct access to the ocean, Nick & Bashir (mgrs) are amazing, and rest of staff very accommodating as well.  Loved 2 days of listening, watching, enjoying the ocean..  Look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention! We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: Nick and his entire staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We have stayed at this location 3 times already and will be back again. The entire staff is very friendly, kind, and helpful. Customer service is 5 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and for making the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel your destination and your first choice.  We are very pleased to read your review and to know that we made a great holiday and memorable stay for you.  Thank you once more for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor.  We most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon and create many more beautiful memories for you. Sincerely,

Summary: Visited one night amd loved the location as it was right on the beach!   They have chairs and  umbrellas on the beach for guests as well.  The people were so nice!  Nick (manager) upgraded me to a room where we could hear waves crashing all night!   So nice after leaving g our desert home of 120 degrees!  The staff- Nick,  Bouchiz, Luis and front desk gal were all so nice snd they even brought me roses.  They knew I had a challenging day..  I will most definitely be back as this hotel had everything I look for.  I also love the historic places- which this is.    Lisa and Mark
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor.  We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.

Summary: We love this hotel!  We recently had our second stay at Capri Laguna and it was awesome.  A modest hotel with everything you need and right ON the beach.  Mini fridges and microwaves in the rooms, free parking, grab and go breakfast with self serve Starbucks, complimentary beach umbrella and chair set ups-- I could go on and on about all the perks, especially for those of us traveling with kids.  Managers Bachir and Nick are both incredibly service-oriented and thoughtful.  Nick even sent roses to our room!  So sweet!  We invited some friends to join us on this last trip and they loved their room and the hotel too!  Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and for making the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel your destination and your first choice.  We are very pleased to read your review and to know that we made a great holiday and memorable stay for you. Thank you once more for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. We most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon and create many more beautiful memories for you. Sincerely,

Summary: This place is not truly one star (prob 2-3), but there are some very important points that could seriously disappoint some people.   If you are any kind of discerning vacationer, be prepared that this is a hotel serving people who use groupon to eat at Chinese buffets.  Pot smoking is a serious problem here (now legal in Calif) and if you have your balcony door open to enjoy the ocean, you will smell a lot of pot. This is extremely annoying. If you read reviews for other hotels, this is becoming a problem everywhere. We had the floor above us dump their cooler of dirty water over the balcony and onto our deck. Fortunately we were not sitting out there at the time. They also allow pets, so your room could have been a pet place before you. They do not do a great job of cleaning.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for choosing Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for your stay and please allow this opportunity to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay.  Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback which is absolutely valuable for us. It ensures that we  not only become aware but we are always being proactive in addressing our guests concerns.  I wish you had expressed your honest remarks during your stay so we could address them immediately as always we do.  The hotel’s team tries the best to make sure that we meet all demands with respect to each individual privacy, health and safety.  We would like to reassure you that we have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and we have already communicated with the appropriate departments so as to improve the quality of our service and facilities and avoid similar incidents in the future.  We value your trust.

Summary Heading: Staff, view, location make for perfect beach getaway
Summary: After a year of hunkering in the desert during the pandemic, my husband and I needed an ocean escape. Our wish list: beachfront room, private outdoor space, comfy surroundings, easy access to the basics. The Capri Laguna delivered all of that and more. From Morgan who made booking the room super easy, Desiree's warm and informative greeting at check-in, the friendly gentlemen who set up the chairs and umbrellas on the beach, the manager (who remembered my name and room number in passing) to the crew that cleaned our room daily, and the rest of the front desk staff (Jessica!) -- we felt welcome and cared for during our entire stay.  The beachfront king room with sofa bed had a large balcony furnished with one beach lounger, small table with two chairs—kitchenette with dining
Manager Response: Dear Ray, Thank you for your loyalty and for making the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel your destination and your first choice. We are very pleased to read your review and to know that we made a great holiday and memorable stay for you.  Thank you once more for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. We most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon and create many more beautiful memories for you .

Summary: We had the best time. The beach was beautiful and right in front of us.  Walking distance to shops and cafes. We parked the Jeep and didn’t move it til the morning we left.  Local people could be a little nicer. The staff was amazing. Best beach vacation so far. I love Laguna beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach hotel. We are delighted to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay and our services were meeting your expectations. Your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. We look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary Heading: Perfect Little Hotel near the Beach
Summary: We had a very relaxing and enjoying stay at Capri Laguna. All of the staff are very helpful, friendly, and accommodating, especially Nick and Morgan. The hotel provides beach towels, chairs and umbrellas on the beach, and free coffee and hot chocolate in the lobby. Highly recommended. We will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon and create more great romantic gateway for you.

Summary Heading: Lovely place with beach access and at a good price
Summary: We stayed for three nights and loved falling asleep to the sound of the ocean. We spent a lot of time sitting at the table outside of our room listening to the waves and enjoying the view. We  loved having both a pool and easy beach access. Breakfast was simple but enough to send us off each morning satisfied (bagels, English muffins, fruit, yogurt, cereal, coffee, tea). We visit Laguna Beach regularly and this is our top pick for places to stay.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon at our hotel.

Summary: I really had a great time staying at Capri Laguna. Everything is so amazing. The rooms and amenities are super clean. All Staff members are so friendly. Nick welcomed us very warmly and Bashir helped us to get the room we wanted in no time. The views are also so beautiful. The location of the hotel is also convenient. I overall had great time staying at Capri, and definitely will go back. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Capri Laguna is a wonderful oceanfront hotel. The room was clean and comfortable with a nice balcony overlooking the beach. The front desk staff we encountered, Nick, Morgan and Bachir, were so very friendly and accommodating. That's what we appreciate most when we travel. I don't hesitate to give this hotel and the staff 5 stars!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is one of our favorite places to visit. We have been here several times. Bachir, Morgan and the GM Nick are all so nice and very accommodating. I’ve been to a couple other hotels there on the beach, but the Capri Laguna hotel is less crowded and more intimate. We always stay beach front and the views are absolutely breathtaking! I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a great getaway!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: There's no other place in Laguna Beach that has such incredible views (from almost every room) that does not also cost an arm and a leg. You couldn't get closer to the beach without actually being in the water. And from the balcony of the beachfront room we had, we felt as though we were IN the water most mornings. As beach lovers this was another fantastic getaway with the most relaxing sights and sounds. Some parts of the hotel and rooms show a little wear but that is to be expected with any buildings located that close to the ocean. I'm a very picky person and I found the room to be clean and comfortable.  There's free Starbucks coffee in the lobby, which was a godsend to wake up to every morning. The large balconies overlooking the beach are perfect for enjoying a glass of
Manager Response: Dear Stacey, Thank you for your loyalty and for making the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel your destination and your first choice. We are very pleased to read your review and to know that we made a great holiday and memorable stay for you. Thank you once more for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. We most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon and create many more beautiful memories for you.

Summary: The Capri Laguna was the awesome!! We spent our anniversary there and the room was clean and awesome.  Nick made sure we had everything we needed and when we arrived the room had fresh roses.  The grounds of the hotel were super clean and the attendants were all very friendly.  I would recommend the Capri to anyone looking at staying in the  Laguna Beach area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon and create more great romantic gateway for you.

Summary: The staff is great, and having a beachfront room at Capri Laguna is a little piece of heaven! Easy access to the beach with breathtaking balcony view (with beachfront room). Rooms aren't fancy, but they are clean! It's all about the location!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My wife and I only had one night to stay in Laguna Beach and we were very happy that we stayed at the Capri Laguna. The hotel was a nice surprise. We loved the unique layout of the hotel and easy beach access. It felt as if we were in the Mediterranean. I would highly recommend to anyone that it's worth it to stay at this hotel.   Tips, one might find the parking to be difficult. Bring your own snacks, no vending machines. Aside from these two tips, staying at the Capri was a unique experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.

Summary Heading: Over priced for old room with no house cleaning
Summary: Disappointed as there is NO house keeping for 2 nights stay after I’ve called the front desk to remind them at 4 pm.  The room is outdated as equipment are rusted.  Bed and pillows are lumpy.  Paid over $1,200 for 2 nights of no service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: As a local in Laguna - it was fun to stay at this lovely boutique hotel on the beach for a night while I was having work done on my house. The GM Nick and front desk staff  (Desiree) were warm and welcoming. I had a beautiful ocean view room that was clean and well put together. The roof top views and tables were lovely, in addition to other tables and chairs with ocean views that were around the property. Straight down to the beach where chairs and umbrellas were all set up. It was a lovely stay and I’ll be back again if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing Capri Laguna on the Beach ! We will maintain the highest standard of conduct in all of our actions.

Summary Heading: So gross! Sand in the bedsheets
Summary: Our room was awful. There was sand in our bed. We hadn’t gone to the beach yet, and there was sand in our bed when we had arrived.   The placement of furniture made no sense (like a chair sandwiched between a table and the door, rendering it unusable). The bed was about to collapse if you moved on it at all. The shower had no sills or place to put anything.  The tv was crooked. And there was a large tiled beam running through the center of the room that was quite low and strange (this was less obnoxious than the other issues, but still contributed to a sense of disappointment from what was supposed to be a nice place to stay). Everything was janky and made us feel like we were crashing in what was originally a storage room or something.   This stay was supposed to be my birthday
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved this place! Thanks to Morgan and the whole staff for making our stay a special one. Hospitality abounded and Nick the Manager made it even more enjoyable. Loved falling asleep at night to the sounds of the surf. Our room had a great view of the pristine shoreline. Hope to return soon! Thank You!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. .

Summary: We love the Capri Laguna, have stayed several times before and will definitely return. The views and beach access are amazing. Special thanks to the friendly and professional staff - Nick, Bashir, Jessica and more. Always a wonderful and rejuvenating retreat!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The staff at Capri Laguna were all so friendly and helpful. Manager Nick went above and beyond to make sure our stay was enjoyable. The location is ideal. Beautiful beach, great views and walking distance to restaurants  and shops made this the perfect getaway spot. We will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was perfect!  Location and amenities were ideal.  The breathtaking view from our room and proximity to the beach made us feel like we had our own private slice of heaven.   Thank you to the staff for making our mother/daughter get away weekend extra special.  Morgan was so  warm, thoughtful, and helpful throughout our stay.  Thank you Nick for the beautiful gesture sent to our room.   This trip was exactly what we needed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at Capri twice now and have had the best experience! The view can’t be beat anywhere and the staff is amazing! One of the best parts is you can walk everywhere and anywhere. Me and my friend enjoyed walking down the steps from the hotel right to the beach, as well as every meal being able to walk to whatever we wanted! Nick ,Vagelis ,Morgan — thank you for making our stay perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you Amber for your review. We try to  provide exceptional hospitality services and unique lodging products to our valued guests. See you soon.

Summary: Had a wonderful time. Room was large enough for my family and just as comfortable as well. In a location like Laguna it was great they accommodated parking for free. All staff members were extremely polite.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We LOVE LOVE LOVE this hotel.  The location is amazing.  Right on the beach. The staff is the best! They go out of their way to say hello or good morning.  They make you feel like you are the most important guest they have. We have stayed here twice now and can't wait to go back. Thank you Nick, Bashir and Morgan for everything you do to make it a great experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nick the general manager and Bashir are the absolute best. You feel so welcome and they will help you in any way to make your stay better. This is the place to take your family. It is perfect if you have kids. I have stayed 2 years in a row and will not go anywhere else. I absolutely love capri laguna perfect beach front rooms amazing cleaning ladies I absolutely adore them, they always greet you with a smile and make your room so beautiful. The guys were out everyday to set up our chairs and umbrellas for us. They have a great selection of breakfast and coffee as well as hot chocolate! You won't find any place that will treat you they way they do. I can't wait to come back! Thank you Nick and Basir.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an amazing stay at Capri Laguna! It is in a perfect location, right on the beach and an easy walk to many of Laguna’s shops. Capri Laguna also has a little parking deck. Our balcony had spectacular views! The room was very clean and seemed to be recently updated! It was a perfect size for our stay and included everything we needed. The assistant general manager, Bachir, was amazing!! He was a delight to talk to and so very helpful. He told us about great places to go sight seeing and recommended great restaurants! We will definitely be staying here again on our next trip!   I’ve attached pictures of our view from the balcony.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A beach view room would have made a difference.
Summary: We used a TravelZoo deal & had a poolside room. These rooms are very noisy, although a decent size. Staff is great and the rooms were clean. Beds comfortable, we had neighbors with 3 kids in the room next to us and it was very noisy 2 out of 4 nights. The big advantage is the access to the beach and they have parking. I would definitely recommend the upgrade to a beachside room, just not on the endless flights of steps going to the beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are not many places where you can stay right by the ocean, seeing and listening to the waves from your room, but Capri Laguna is one of them!  The location and staff make this a wonderful hotel and we will be back.  There are steps leading to the top level with tables for a wonderful view of the ocean, and steps leading down to the beach, with a few other places to lounge and relax.    We enjoyed our stay and look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Capri Laguna offers a wonderful European-type experience with plenty of stairs situated right on the ocean shore. If you're looking for hotel elevators and instant hot water, try a Marriott. This property is perfect in its unique and welcoming atmosphere overseen by the best manager, anywhere, Nick Politis, as well as front-desk pros Morgan and Bashear. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Not only is this an incredible getaway boutique hotel right on the water, but the customer service here is OUTSTANDING and consistent. The general manager, Nick Politis, goes over and above to ensure my kids and I are taken care of and comfortable every time we stay here – and their staff is an extension of Nick’s warmth and hospitality, namely Dylan and Bachir. I travel often so I’ve experienced my fair share of good and bad customer service. Capri Laguna has become our go-to place to stay when vacationing in southern California. I HIGHLY recommend it – you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica    Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention! We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary Heading: Nice property and location, but difficult beach access.
Summary: Nice property and location, but difficult hotel beach access and many steps to climb.  Staff was excellent, facility was nice.  Parking is very limited but it worked out for us and there is off-site parking available.  Some nice patio locations to enjoy the view.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay in Capri Laguna was great. I agree with all of the other reviews that say it is a hidden gem in Laguna Beach, and is much better than a 2-star hotel. You feel like you are in a coastal Italian town, with the waves crashing right outside of your windows. If you are looking for this type of room, you MUST book an OCEAN FRONT. Ocean views do not always boast the same type of experience. It has a very rustic feel when walking down the steps to the beach. There are multiple patios and verandas with table and chairs, and sun bathing loungers. In the morning the staff sets up plastic Adirondack chairs on the beach, with umbrellas, that are labeled for Capri guests. By early afternoon all the chairs were taken by guests, but in the morning many were free for grabs.   The rooms
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This hotel look really good but inside rooms really old style it’s look like you staying in super cheap motel
Summary: For the price what we paid the bed should to be more comfortable ...... we never will be back our experience was really bad the room look really old everything look super old for the price what we paid it’s not wou
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our very favorite weekend beach getaway. Right on the beach.  Best location ever. Bashir and staff never disappoint. They take good care of us and make sure every stay is memorable. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a great getaway .
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon at our hotel.

Summary: This is a perfect location for a beach get-a-way.  The staff is professional and friendly; the General Mgr. Nick is personable and keeps everything running like clockwork.  We were celebrating a delayed milestone birthday (due to the pandemic), when Nick learned of this he sent a beautiful bouquet of flowers and a nice note - truly going above & beyond.  Although we live in the area now we return occasionally for special occasions-that's how wonderful this property is.  We highly recommend the Capri Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests . We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: All the staff are great and attentive with travelers!  Great location,!they provide chairs and umbrellas, makes beach trips easier if traveling with little ones. and the view was amazing, my kids really enjoyed their trip.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention! We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: We loved everything about our stay.  The room was spacious, clean and comfortable.  The ocean view was amazing.  The staff was super friendly and helpful.  Location was excellent.  Just steps to the beach. The hotel provides the towels, chairs and umbrellas.  They will even set it up for you.  We walk everywhere... Breakfast, lunch and dinner.  Great places to eat and shop nearby.  We will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Liza, Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here on a girl's trip. The location is amazing and the price is so very reasonable. We were able to walk to a sunset rooftop dinner. The pool is heated! Ocean views from our little deck were gorgeous. We could hear the sounds of the waves all night. This is an older hotel on a cliff side. The stairs to the ocean are a great workout but not for someone with any physical aliments. The attention to detail with the grounds keeping and the morning continental breakfast area could use some improvement but overall  I would highly recommend based on location and very friendly staff. There are many charming shops , bars, and restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: What you’re paying for here are the ocean views. The hotel literally sits on the beach, and has direct beach access. The parking is a bit tricky (the overflow parking is down the street, next to a “recovery home” space), but it’s what’s to be expected with the location.   Location-wise, it’s not in the heart of the beach area, but it’s very walkable and felt safe.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great view, amazing beach, and awesome staff!
Summary: This is our new sneaky getaway spot!  Nick, Bachic, and Morgan were amazing to make our stay memorable.  The views and the beach are awesome!  And the sunsets are beautiful!  Also, the is never crowded (at least when we stay here)!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: little Gem hotel right on the beach
Summary: Came with girls  for a birthday getaway.  I cannot say enough good things about this little gem of a hotel!  Bashir at the front desk was amazing!! From making my reservation, checking us in quickly and making sure we were enjoying our time at the hotel.  He is an asset to the company and is a pleasure to talk to! Thank you Bashir! We are already planning our next trip! Excellent location with a beautiful view of the beach first thing in the morning especially with the fresh hot Starbucks coffee offered complimentary 24/7 in the lobby.  Our room was perfect with a little kitchen and cute balcony.  Parking was ample with an extra lot a block away.  The fireplace in the lobby along with the decor throughout the hotel made you feel like you were on a Greek island.  It was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor.  We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel.  We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon at our hotel. Wishing you Happy Birthday again !

Summary: My fiance and I frequent this beautiful beachfront hotel 2 or 3 times a year. We've sampled several of the rooms, although I am always partial to getting one with an ocean view so there are about 3 that we prefer, depending on how much we want to spend. There is ample parking and even an extra lot about a block down which probably is useful during the Summer months. In wintertime, the sand level washes low exposing rock formations on the beach. I believe come May the sand comes back and mostly covers the rocks at the base of the hotel. An interesting natural event to say the least. The first time we came I had to ask "where did the sand go"?! The manager Nick is top notch, extremely friendly and one time even brought us roses. The continental breakfast is a bit slimmer than
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. Summary: the location is very convenient. The room furnishing is average, the view is awesome. The staff from Nick to Bashir to Morgan are so friendly, attentive, helpful and welcoming that we definitely will be coming back. We had the best time.

Summary: Celebrated my birthday with my family and best friend at the Capri, Although only about an hour away from my home in west LA, I felt I was on a real hiliday, thousands of miles away on a Greek isle! The staff, Nick , Bashir and Morgan are the best. You just don't find this kind of energy anywhere any more. We will go back often!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor.  We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Capri Laguna is a perfectly located hotel right on the beach in Laguna.  We spent two nights there recently and enjoyed it thoroughly.  The building is a bit old but the general manager Nick told us that he is upgrading the place a little bit at a time every off-season.  The staff including Nick, Bachir and Morgan are all super nice and will go out of their way to help.  The property is a short but pleasant walk from city center and has its own private exit directly on the sand on the beach.  We stayed in an ocean front queen with a balcony and it was great being able to sleep to the sound of the waves at night and having breakfast in the morning on the balcony.  Breakfast is spartan  (bagels, yogurt, cereal and fruit) but you could be eating cardboard on that balcony facing the

Summary: As a Creative Director, I travel frequently and have stayed at places like The Ritz in Paris and the Capri Palace on Capri. I rarely write reviews but this PLACE is magic. I came for a Birthday Weekend; it has been 10 Days or more (I'm so relaxed) and this ENTIRE team, is wonderful and I've been fortunate to personally meet most of them.  Nic and Bashir are exceptional managers and people; I cannot give them enough praise for going beyond the call of duty, to make my stay (I can be difficult) here so wonderful. Everyone on their team, Stephanie, Jesus, Fernando, etc. all share the same caring and fun spirit. That is what makes the difference in a travel experience.   Yes....the views, sunsets and beaches are amazing, and with so many options available, you could stay ANYWHERE.

Summary: Me And my husband  Decided to take off for few days after crazy strange year  We checked couples hotel in laguna  From some reason we chose Capri laguna  It is seriously 5 star or 6 star hotel  The best location ever  We stayed at the front ocean view  And we felt like we are in a boat 🚢  almost  The front receptionists , Bashir and Nick  Are so professional and kind  We felt like  We made the right decision  We can't wait for our next ocean gate away  Thank you Bashir and Nick  I am attaching some balcony images

Summary Heading: GREAT COZY PLACE WITH FANTASTIC VIEW
Summary: Great cozy and classy place, near everything and yet reserved. Nice amenities , beautiful well located lounge deck, overlooking the Bay. Great morning coffee, smart staff and Home style rooms. I really like this place

Summary: Fantastic location with unobstructed 180 degree views of the ocean from living and bedroom. Very comfortable bed and couch with easy chairs. Very large balcony. Walking distance to a number of very good restaurants. Easy access to the beach directly down their stairs.  Had a wonderful weekend for my wife's birthday!! Had been before and will be back every chance we get! GSP

Summary: My family and I absolutely loved Capri Laguna. Located right on the beach, we took beach walks, watched the sunset from the various decks, and walked to many great restaurants (some with amazing views). The rooms were nice and comfortable. The icing on the cake was the super friendly and accommodating staff especially Bashir,  Nick and Morgan.  We will definitely be coming back here!!!

Summary: Our favorite So Cal getaway! Very unique and plenty of charm. It’s nestled right on the beach and close to many great places to eat. So kind of you both! Howard

Summary: We are repeat customers and love staying at this full ocean beach front boutique hotel. It reminds us of Greece directly on the water with great, friendly and welcoming service. The room was very nice directly on the water listening to the waves crash all night long with a full sunset view from the balcony. Just park at the hotel and walk into town with all the great restaurants and shops. We love staying here. Enjoy!

Summary: We paid extra for an ocean view room with a balcony— however we had to share our balcony with 3 other rooms. Awkward. The room itself was not up to date and the bed creaked, pillows were smooshed and the fridge was pulled out from the wall a bit. The bathroom was also awkward. No door, just a glass door that banged loud when you opened it. Cold tile and no door on the shower. So weird. The overall property was gorgeous right on the beach. But just wish the rooms were better for what you’re paying a night.

Summary: Bashir and nick were beyond accommodating and by far the best customer service we have had. My Fiance and I absolutely love the room we stay in for the view and ocean sound. The only downfall with this place is its in serious need of renovation and updating. This place has so much potential. For what the rooms cost, this place should be visually appealing too in my opinion.   The bed is uncomfortable and comforter had 2 holes in it so the down feathers were coming out. The shower does not get hot enough and the sliding door and screen door were extremely hard to open and close. Most likely due to sea salt.   If this place was renovated, I'm sure the ratings would drastically come up. The office Staff is beyond friendly and courteous and another part of why we come back.   So if

Summary Heading: A Healing, Re-energizing, and Romantic Staycation
Summary: Feeling itchy for an incredible staycation with sweeping ocean views and quiet solitude? This is your spot. While checking in, I met the manager, Nick Politis, who was so cordial and personally welcomed me so warmly. He has an amazing personality and made me feel so at home. Truly, Mr. Politis provides world-class customer service. It was my first time staying, but I am already planning my return! Summary: I could hardly wait for a return trip to Capri Laguna.  The views from the ocean view rooms are so amazing.  I immediately go right to the balcony and watch the waves crashing for hours.  The sound is so soothing. We sleep with our door open as we can never get enough of that sound.  As I write this, we are feeling so grateful having just watched the sunset and looking forward to an early morning coffee and beach stroll.  Bashir and Nick are some of the most amazing people and always so kind.  I rarely like to visit the same place twice, however after discovering Capri, I don’t want to go anywhere else.

Summary: My wife found this charming hotel early last year and it has became a favorite “go to” for us as we have stayed there a few times now in the past year. We love leaving the sliding door open during the night to hear the waves crashing and then sitting on the balcony enjoying the ocean view throughout our stays. Nick, Morgan, and Bachir always go the extra mile to make sure we are not lacking for anything. They are very gracious hosts, the rooms are always clean, and the location is perfect! We just returned home from our most recent stay and we will definitely be back again!!

Summary: What a wonderful place to stay.  We were so surprised.  Nick the General Manager was a terrific host.  He brought us a nice bottle of wine and fresh fruit.  Morgan and the other nice lady asked all the time if there was anything they could do or get for us.  We are planning a trip there this summer for our families. Would come here again and I highly would recommend this hotel for a stay as the views were fantastic.

Summary: I wanted to stay "on the water" to celebrate my wife's birthday. Mission accomplished. Our room couldn't have been any closer to the ocean, without becoming wet. :)  Boutique hotel is cute and cozy. It costs a bit, but well worth it for a great memory.

Summary: I loved every minute of it. Being right on the beach was such a relaxing experience and the room was so clean it made the experience so much better. Definitely going to come back here especially since there are stairs that lead right down to the beach.

Summary: I stayed here for New Year’s Eve and it was absolutely beautiful to be that close to the beach and to open the doors and hear the sound of the waves brought so much peace. The hotel is adorable and I loved how the pool changes colors. It has this old Hollywood vibe. Well for me it did.  The entire staff is friendly and Nick goes above the normal guest service. You can get a sense that he truly cares about the hotel and guest. I will definitely be back. Thank you everyone at Capri.

Summary: Stayed here for New Year’s Eve.  What a find.  Excellent location, friendly staff, perfect ocean views.   Well worth the price. Small cafes and coffee shops in walking distance. Would stay here again and recommend to others.
