Summary: I live locally but needed a change of scenery during the lockdown. Why not quarantine in a hotel room with the most amazing view? We stayed in an oceanfront room, rooms are small but perfect for a couple. They have a fridge and microwave which is very convenient when only doing takeout. Each morning they have complimentary continental breakfast in the lobby.   The oceanfront rooms also have balcony with seating so you can enjoy the most incredible view!   The staff here is amazing!!! So accommodating and nice. The general managers Bachie and Nick make you feel so welcomed. They go out of their way to ensure you are enjoying your stay. Though housekeeping is not allowed during this time the housekeepers still checkin to make sure you have everything you need.   I highly recommend

Summary: I had the most amazing experience here. The hotel is beautiful, has incredible views and the sound of the ocean is relaxing. The service was great and Bachir did an amazing job making us feel so welcome. 10 out of ten recommend!!

Summary: Best part about traveling, for me, are those unexpected moments and serendipitous finds and the Capri offered me just that. It’s truly a little gem on the California Coast and neatened among quaint shops and eateries. Having traveled a few different continents, I can say these bungalow style rooms and views made me feel like I was in the Mediterranean. If I’m not coming back for for the ambiance, I’m coming back to be taken care of the GM Niko “Nick” Politis and his warm staff. Thank you for everything and I look forward to our next stay.

Summary: Views were beautiful  however that was the ONLY redeeming quality of this property !! The hotel needs major updating/overall room was very uncomfortable bed hard as a rock,  poor quality linens and stained, heater broke and toilet broken. Maintenance staff did not wear mask appropriately I had to ask several times for him to pull it up above his nose while in my room very upsetting that some staff don’t  take the pandemic seriously and put guests at risk!! I would not recommend staying here!!

Summary: I can't say enough about our fabulous trip to Laguna Beach, and I'm so happy that we chose to stay at Capri Laguna On The Beach! Our room was clean and comfortable, and our view from our windows and deck were gorgeous! I booked directly with Bachir, a manager at the property. So glad I did! Great guy!! Members of his staff, Sara and Morgan, were so nice and accommodating, and General Manager, Nick, surprised us by sending a bottle of wine to our room, too! Sat on the beach and watched the sunset every evening, and enjoyed watching the waves, a seal, dolphins, and the surfers during breakfast out on a lower deck. Awesome!! We will definitely choose this hotel when we visit next!

Summary Heading: I am so glad that I chose this Hotel!
Summary: I enjoyed one of the most peaceful 2 nights. As soon as I walked into the hotel (check-in), I was welcomed by the friendliest hotel staffs (thank you!!!). They were so warm and wonderful, many many thank yous. Hotel itself is a bit older but the room was very nice with mini refrigerator and microwave, couch, and comfy bed. No bathtub. Shower door (glass door) only covers half of the shower areas and I was looking for the other half, but I guess this is the way the shower is set up. Hotel is right off the ocean. Even with closed window, I could still hear the sound of waves crashing…..that was unbelievably wonderful. The beach area was not crowded at all (maybe because it was Christmas time???), but it was so peaceful. Anywhere you stand, or sit, you can get absolutely stunning

Summary: This place is great.  Every time I come both Nick and Bachir treat me like and old friend.  All the rooms I have stayed are literally a couple minutes walk down to the beach, it is like having a room right on the water.   This one of the few places that allow dogs and have a lawn area to take them to to do their business.  The front desk has 24-7 Starbucks coffee on demand along with hot chocolate.  The also have a continental breakfast post Covid (usually have eggs and waffles) with orange juice.  The rooms have a couch, mini kitchen with microwave, small refrigerator, and I dining table, all with a fabulous view.   All have very comfortable bedding.  This place has multiple lounging areas, either right on the beach (they provide chairs and umbrellas) or multiple levels.

Summary Heading: My Go To Spot In Laguna
Summary: The Capri is such an incredible unique place to stay. It is right on the water the rooms are clean and rustic . It actually does give you the sense that you are in Italy. This is my go to place to celebrate my birthday. The staff is incredibly kind always helpful.  At check in Bashir was very welcoming and accommodating. Morgan was very attentive to my needs at check out.  Nick the Manager is very professional, welcoming ,kind and offers first class service at the Capri Laguna. Nick  was so thoughtful and brought me a bottle of champagne on ice the day of my birthday… I am truly grateful for the staff at the Capri Laguna
Manager Response: Dear AJCE2GIRLS,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean . We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will wish you happy birthday and we look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had a great stay at the Capri Laguna! Bachir and Nich were extremely welcoming and funny during our check in process. They instantly made the environment feel like a friendly one and handled any questions we had. The hotel itself is a cute beach hotel! Perfect distance to walk to restaurants and steps from a private beach!
Manager Response: Dear Katief.  We are pleased to hear that you  enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Staying here reminded us of our time on the coast of Italy. Our ocean view was exceptional and  even better than being in Hawaii and we didn’t have to quarantine!!! We loved our private deck where we enjoyed our morning coffee, hot chocolate and goodies provided by the hotel. The staff Nick, Morgan and Bachir were very welcoming, accommodation and helpful. Make sure when you book, you request an ocean view.
Manager Response: Dear Dvnone,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Let me begin with the amazing hospitality of the managers, Nick, and Bashir. They greeted us upon arrival. We weren't there 30 minutes before Bashir came to find us to let us know our room was ready, not to mention we arrived early. Then we got to our room which was amazing and perfect for my family of 4. Everything was nice and clean. You get free breakfast every morning as well as coffee or hot chocolate. The pool was clean and heated everyday. Another important aspect for me was the cleaning service they are absolutely on it. They work so hard to keep everything beautiful and Clean you never want for anything because the entire staff is willing to help you in any way they can. It was my best trip in 30 years of coming to laguna. I couldn't be happier with my stay. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Marlynmonroe16,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: My husband, 2 year-old and I decided to take a little weekend trip from San Diego to Laguna for a change of scenery and needed some place close but didn't want to do a staycation. Capri Laguna was the perfect boutique hotel for us! It was quick drive and when we arrived, the Bachir at the front desk who greeted me was personable and very helpful. The check in was quick. There is a light breakfast available in the lobby with foods such as bread and bagels individuall wrapped, as well as fruits and cereal boxes. There is also coffee that you can grab in the morning if you dont want the room coffee. We stayed in the oceanview suite, king bed with a living room. It was so nice to have the separation! The room was absolutely amazing and the views of the ocean, the sounds of the waves
Manager Response: Dear marydmal,  Thank you for taking the time to share your  detailed review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best Regards,

Summary: We absolutely love Laguna beach! This was our 2nd time staying at Capri Laguna and we really enjoyed it both times. The front desk employees are always friendly and helpful. Love the Starbucks coffee and my 7 year old loves the hot cocoa. We’ll be back again, hopefully before too long!
Manager Response: Dear 123Beach-Goer,   Thank you for your loyalty and for taking the time to share your review Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best Regards,

Summary: We went for a second trip to the Carpi Laguna on the Beach to celebrate our 2 year wedding anniversary.  Our first time there was the first night of our honeymoon.  This trip was even better!  We were welcomed back like family.  The staff was exceptional.  Bachir really helped us when we checked in and gave us amazing service throughout our stay.  Nick went out of his way to welcome us back.  Morgan made the check out process easy.  I've traveled to many countries and I have stayed in some fabulous hotels.  Capri Laguna on the Beach ranks among the top!  Thank you
Manager Response: Dear bdub19502020,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for your loyalty and for the review. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience. Happy Anniversary!  Kind regards,

Summary: The walls are paper thin and we were very disturbed by how loud it was outside our room even past 11PM. The rooms are also very tiny and dated and layout is not very pleasant.  The location is of course great and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear payalnag,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Came for a quickly couples getaway. Spectacular location on a bluff above the pacific, and great staff.  Our visit wasn't without issues - we actually had a very loud party next to us that highlighted that the walls are perhaps not as thick as would be most desirable, but to their credit, the front desk was very responsive in quieting it down. We also felt like the rooms - especially the ocean view with fireplace room we stayed in - could use a little TLC.  However, we were so impressed by the location and the attentiveness of the staff (especially in dealing with some of the issues we had!) that I can confidently recommend giving it a shot.
Manager Response: Dear jgirard01,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Sincerely yours,

Summary Heading: Best birthday on the beachfront hotel
Summary: It was a wonderful trip for us and for my wife’s birthday they made it such a special day for her and accommodate our kids to come and visit and stay over and provide us a discount on the second room. Special thanks to NICK Politis and Bachir Atallah
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor.  We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.

Summary: This property is a gem, perfectly located in the heart of Laguna Beach. You literally walk down the steps of the hotel and you're on the beach. You can hear the ocean waves crashing out on the lounge chair deck, or up above on the patio overlooking the Pacific. The service of the dedicated and enthusiastic staff members is what sets this property apart. The AGM Bachir is extremely friendly and service-oriented, making sure every guest need is taken care of with a smile. The GM Nick is just as friendly, and even had roses and champagne sent up to our room as anniversary gifts!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service  . We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Hospitality is our passion. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience  Best Regards,

Summary: Needless to say, 2020 has been just a ridiculous year.  I only live about 90 minutes from Laguna Beach and was looking for a 3-day getaway to just unwind and breathe different air for a bit.  I happened upon the Capril Laguna and I am so glad I did.  The entire team throughout the property was very accommodating and welcoming.  I was able to upgrade my room to an ocean front (highly recommend by the way) and everything was just a quick walk away.  Whether I was headed to the light breakfast bar or down to the beach, everything was just so convenient.  Local shops and restaurants are also just a short walk away.  Check out The Rooftop Lounge - La Casa Del Camino...you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Tripadvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind Regards,

Summary: We had a great stay at the Capri. Nick and Morgan were quite pleasant and attentive- making sure we had everything we needed. All of the staff were very friendly. We had a beachfront room with amazing views. Water was crystal clear and temperature perfect. The weekend was completely full but didn’t feel like it- tons of common areas to relax including chairs on the beach, 2 beachfront patios with plenty of tables and chairs to bring your lunch or dinner, and a great rooftop lounge with tables and lounge sofas and more for cocktails with friends. Came back to the room one day and found a bouquet of roses for my wife and daughter - thank you Nick!
Manager Response: Dear Anthony,   We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and strive to provide a comfortable and relaxing atmosphere. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback.  Sincerely yours,

Summary: Capri Laguna was our wonderful getaway. The room was clean and  comfortable, nicely decorated and couldn't beat the view. Loved the beach access in front of the hotel and especially loved that there were different levels with tables and chairs to enjoy a take out meal on. THe one king beach front had a little alcove with two comfortable chairs and footrest to enjoy the view and keep cooler than on the balcony- just perfect! And very comfy bed! Thank you to Nick for helping us out !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor.  We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerely yours,

Summary Heading: You will like you are in Greece!
Summary: This hotel is truly a hidden gem in Laguna Beach, CA. You feel like you are on a beautiful Greek island with amazing ocean views! The hotel offers my favorite amenity, beach front access! But also has a pool and deck to lounge just above the beach as well. This boutique hotel is clean and the staff is extremely friendly and knowledge. Nick and Robert were so helpful and took excellent care of me. I can not say enough good things about the hospitality from all of the staff, it felt like family. Capri is also in a perfect location. Close to shops, great restaurants and bars. I will definitely be back and would recommend this hotel to anyone who is planning a trip to Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  Thank you  for choosing us, liked the location and felt like family .  Looking forward to welcoming you back .

Summary: Friendly check-in staff, great location, beautiful views and right on the beach - but time basically stopped in 1974 for this property. It needs a complete remodel not lipstick on a pig - stat. I can’t understand TA overly positive ratings especially from a ‘value’ perspective - if photos listed on TA’s site were accurate and rate was $200-300 ok maybe - but it’s not reality.    Things like the welcome mat to room looks like a dog chewed it, lamp shade next to bed is broke as was door latch, everything looked beat up and long past it’s prime. I think the place was clean but hard to tell to be blunt. If you drop $400-500+ per night 2 star is not really acceptable.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guest.

Summary: Truly a hidden gem. I booked a last minute getaway and decided to upgrade to an ocean view room if possible. I called and spoke with Morgan and she made it happen. She had to pull a few strings and involve her managers Nick and they got it done. We were able to get an ocean front room with a balcony.  It was just what we needed. The hotel is very quaint, clean and only steps from the beach which is well kept and fairly private. They offer chairs and umbrellas to the guests. The staff is amazing.  Very friendly and willing to help with anything you might need. This is our new favorite getaway! We cant wait to go back!!! Thanks again Morgan and Nick!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and Capri is your new favorite  getaway.  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: My husband I were in a much needed getaway from the Palm Springs heat.  Booked a beachside room which was exactly as described.  Room was clean and spacious.  We were surprised at the amount of stairs required to get everywhere  to the property. Not for the faint of heart. Certainly adds to the Greek Island feel.  Nick, Bachir and Morgan were all very friendly and helpful with restaurant recommendations.  Having comfortable chairs and an umbrella set up on the beach was a bonus for us.  The bed  very was comfortable.  My only disappointment was some areas needed a little more TLC. Room's carpet had a tear, cracked granite entry, stains on the sofa.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback which although not necessarily pleasant for us is absolutely valuable ,as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns.

Summary Heading: Felt like we were on a Greek Island
Summary: This is a hidden jewel which transports you away from the stress and business of life to a beautiful calm state of mind . Many of the rooms overlook the ocean which is right there at the bottom of a few steps. The staff is wonderful and really lives up to customer first . This is a clean, well run hotel which is family run and each member of the staff is kinder than the one you just met! Nick, Bashir, and Morgan all took excellent care of us for my birthday weekend and my family will definitely be back many times .  We have already personally recommended to family and friends. This is THE place to come in Laguna beach. Everything is a walkable distance and the City of Laguna Beach really impressed us for the quality restaurants and lovely shops. If you need a get away- come
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I booked this awesome hotel for my husbands birthday. We had stayed here once before and had a wonderful experience. The staff here are so friendly and welcoming. Our room was clean and very comfortable. I had booked a standard room and the manager upgraded us to a beautiful ocean view room which was greatly appreciated. The view was spectacular! The pool was warm and clean. We had a fantastic and relaxing time. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind review following your stay with us. We are happy to know that we have achieved an exceptional and memorable environment for you and your husband. We thank you for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Pros:   On the beach location. Walking distance to some great food. Attentive and helpful staff. Facilities in and out are clean and well kept.   Issues and concerns: Subjective "average" ratings by comparisons to past beach hotels with similar prices. During the Covid-19 event note that certain services at hotels are suspended. Beach access by stairs, depending on your room location and physical health condition can be strenuous.  For example, from our room to the beach involved approximately 96 stair steps. The stairs issue is common to nearly if not all beach access point in Laguna.   Recommendations:   As with anything, shop around and take into account the taxes and fees. Room descriptions should be verified by contacting the property prior to placing reservations.
Manager Response: We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guest.

Summary: Great hotel so close to the water. Rooms were spacious and comfortable. Our oceanfront room had an amazing view and we were steps away from the beach. On the beach they set up umbrellas, lounge chairs, and provided towels at your request. Beach itself is secluded so no big crowd and the water was pristine. The front desk, housekeeping, and bell desk staff were all great.  Nick - The GM - catered to every request and concern.  Will definitely be back again.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary Heading: Great place for beach vacation (though needs some updating)
Summary: Pros: Great location, great ocean views from the balcony, spacious room with king bed and sofa, kitchenet with convenient dining area, small refrigerator and microwave.  Cons: The room definitely requires updating. The bathroom equipment had signs of rust and water damage (totally understandable for beachfront property but requires more attention). The balcony door lock did not work, the room front door bolt lock did not work either. Surprisingly, the alarm clock in was missing (not big deal though). The door tag "Do not disturb/Service needed" was missing. We stayed for 6 nights and needed some privacy. We informed front desk about it. The next day we asked the housekeeper to bring over but it's never been addressed.   Suggestions: It would be nice to have extra hooks and towel
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great location!! Great View !! Great Staff
Summary: Our room was front facing to the beach with adequate space - Sofa and a small kitchen and eating area -  We absolutely loved it.  Complimentary beach umbrellas chairs and towels were a neat perk too.  The staff did all they could to make us comfortable - Talk to Nick Moyarn
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really liked the location. My room was only steps from the beach. The hotel is only a mile from downtown. There are restaurants closed to the hotel. The only inconvenient is that the first night I could not sleep very well because the sound of the waves were really strong, but I get used of that. I will love to come back and stay in the same room. I felt so comfortable.
Manager Response: We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests.  We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback.  We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I have been coming to the Capri for over 50 years and of course have seen it under many different managements , the crew they have at the Helm now are outstanding. Nick , the Manger, is such a gracious man and really runs a family hotel with such outstanding amenities. The gals behind the desk, Morgan and Desiree are so pleasant and ever so helpful. The rooms are comfortable and clean and upgraded very nicely. It is a truly wonderful hotel and the beach is splendid and what makes it home are the people that run this hotel. Cheers to you guys, see you again soon, Maria ( Tina ) Rojas
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay.  On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon and  provide more  exceptional hospitality services and unique experiences. Sincerely Yours,

Summary: Excellent all round. The view and location are beautiful, rooms are comfortable, the beach is cute and there are many terraces to look out to sea from. It feels like you are in Capri or just in another world. I spent my birthday here and it was the best choice I could have made.  The attentive staff went out of their way to make it a lovely experience for us, thank you Bachir, Nick and Morgan!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean. We are extremely proud of our team members for their passion and commitment to Hospitality   The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.  Sincerely Yours,

Summary: I researched hotels in Laguna for hours.  My heart was yearning for oceanfront with the sound of ocean without having to mortgage the house like so many hotels in this area.  We had the room with partial view and so worth it.  What I love about this hotel is there are several places to pull up a chair right at the ocean’s break.  We sat at the ocean until 8:30 at night with the lights they turn on toward the ocean.   From our room we could hear the ocean while we slept. Room 751.  Bashir was a wonderful host and we sat and talked about his family and his six years here.  He is so gracious and made our experience wonderful.  We considered a luxury hotel, however so glad we stayed here. The rooms are smaller, yet clean and regardless of room all guests can enjoy direct access to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. Summary: just pulled in liked the look of the place the stairways to beach chairs and umbrellas beds so soft felt like a cloud everything in walking distance overall felt like a king with my queen the pool was great under the stars
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.

Summary: the location is prime and the room was really big and great views. Plus the staff are extremely helpful and friendly especially Bachir and Mich that were willing to go out of his way to provide exceptional customer service. Will surely visit again in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcome  you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights over Labor Day and I can’t say enough nice things about this place. The check-in was easy and quick. They have parking on-site and an overflow lot a few blocks away. They offer a grab and go breakfast in the morning with cereal, muffins, bagels and drinks.   If you can afford it, I definitely recommend getting a beachfront room. You can hear the waves crashing all day long, and while you sleep, and it’s amazing. The balcony has a chaise lounge for getting sun and a table with two chairs. The room also had a nice updated bathroom, a mini fridge, table and chairs inside and a wet bar area.   The highlight of our stay had to be the General Manager, Nick Politis. He went above and beyond to make our weekend trip unforgettable and he’s an amazing asset to
Manager Response: Dear Kali,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean . Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable  experience.  Sincerely yours,

Summary: To begin with all of the staff are extremely helpful and friendly especially ROBERT that was willing to go out of his way to provide exceptional customer service. Will surely visit again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: my beautiful Capri Laguna Beach Hotel
Summary: awesome hotel on an awesome stretch of beach, our room #102 beachfront was fab! comfy king bed, daily housekeeping, clean, quiet, almost like you're in Greece or somewhere else.  the sound of the waves, the sunsets, the beach right below. beautiful blue water. the hotel is minutes from downtown Laguna and plenty of shops, restaurants, Ralphs near by. This is the place for a get a way at the beach, price for the value is amazing.  Stay here and let Nick, Bashir, Morgan, Robert and all of the Capri team take care of you.  You won't be sorry.  Can't wait to get back to my beautiful Capri Laguna Hotel, my spot on the magnificient So California Riviera.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service .  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: The Capri Laguna is set like a Greek villa, with various levels and viewpoints.  We had the Beachfront King room, with a fantastic view of the beach and extra large balcony.   Price wise, it was competitive with other beachfront  hotels in the area.   On the beach, service was great with the attendant setting up an umbrella and chairs for no extra cost.  The beach is superb, although the large waves make it difficult for swimming.  The staff went out of their way to ensure we were happy with our accommodations and gave it more of personal touch than normal large hotels.  I plan on coming back next year for a milestone birthday.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean .    Looking  forward to welcome  you back  offering  an  exceptional   service experience

Summary: My husband and I visited for our anniversary and it was wonderful. The hotel manager, Bachir and Nick were so accommodating. They made us feel safe and welcomed. Their hospitality cannot be matched.   The rooms were very clean and the view from our room was beautiful.   Would recommend to anyone looking for a weekend getaway!  -Vick
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. Happy anniversary!

Summary: The perfect staycation getaway. Stayed in an oceanfront room with absolutely gorgeous views. The property has a small beach area accessible to guests and provides chairs and umbrellas. General Manager Nick  went out of his way to make sure our stay was amazing with the help of Bashir and Morgan. Great place to just float in the ocean. If you get tired of that then watch the sunset from the patio on the roof. Close to down town Laguna with on site parking. Great get away for couples or the family.
Manager Response: Thank so much for your review.  We are extremely proud of our team members for their passion and commitment to the hospitality industry.  we provide  guests with a stellar experience and are thrilled to be able to welcome you back to your favorite home away from home. See you soon.

Summary: Well...never wrote a review before on TripAdvisor...so this is a first.  Capri recently renovated this place and have been there now three times in the past 10 years.  This time, with it's new look, new rooms, incredible views right on the water ..gotta say that its an amazing deal.  The staff is family friendly, even the the people helping out with placing their umbrella and chairs are great.  Might be good to update the breakfast a bit ...but otherwise...amazing place and right next to the Surf n Sand which in my opinion is overpriced for what you get.  Will go every year now with their renovations!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest , Thank you for taking the time to review us. We provide exceptional hospitality services  to our valued guests.following  our core values: Integrity,Teamwork,Individual Worth,Consistent Standard of Excellence and Personalized Guest Service We  meet the specific need of each guest with a professional, friendly, prompt, courteous and enthusiastic manner. See you soon , Sincerely yours,

Summary: My wife and I have officially found our quick getaway from the Arizona desert. Some of the staff, Baschir, Desiree, and Nick welcomed us in with open arms during the cover pandemic, yet felt safe and at home. This place is the epitome of friendship, relaxation, and amazing Mother Nature just a few steps down to the ocean beach front. We cannot wait to be back soon!
Manager Response: We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  Thank you so much for your nice perception of quality of life. Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Treated Like Family & Gorgeous Clean Beach
Summary: I’d give this hotel 6 stars if I could. The service here is so far beyond my expectations. Morgan, Desiree, and Nick are warm and professional all at once. If there is anything they can do to make your stay more excellent they do their best to make it happen. This was my first time at The Capri Laguna and I’m coming back next year and the next. The location is prime with a pristine beach and caves to explore. The bathrooms are newly remodeled and modern. The decks are amazing night and day. Perfect for couples, singles, family, and groups of friends. The pool has a lovely feel that is very Mediterranean. The hotel itself reminds me of Greece.
Manager Response: Dear Thai,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride our professional  team in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The  Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience again.  Best Regards,

Summary: The place was dirty the tv did not even work no parking needs floors look the place was going to fall apart my family was up all night Becouse of the floor and it was hot the a.c. did not work we called for room and nobody ever came up
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Grand week on the beach in Laguna
Summary: A grand family stay during the less crowded week days at this establishment which is a boutique, quaint  euro feel beach front resort. Close to several top notch resturants including the Sapphire, Selanne's, Mozambique, Surf and Sand Splashes and roof top resturant at a near by vintage hotel
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views  of the relaxing Ocean ,the best Restaurants walking distance and our beautiful City.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you so much ,

Summary: I asked my coworker to find a nice place in Laguna Beach. She found three (including the Ritz Carlton). I stopped by all three and the Capri was by far the best! It was so nice to be able to de- stress near the ocean.  Service was amazing! Morgan, Nick and Robert were all great.   Super stoked I found this place - cant wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your  feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely

Summary Heading: Superior view but sadly run down
Summary: The view is spectacular, but the property is run down. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  For the price, the condition was poor. Bathroom light fixture covered in rust, most all umbrellas badly stained, end caps on deck post missing, screen on ac vent missing, wheel on deck lounger broken, window shade stained....etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a small family gathering here for 4th of July weekend. Amazing property!  The property is right on the beach with beach access. They put out chairs and umbrellas in the morning for their guests. We spent the days on the beach then took advantage of their multiple decks in the evening to enjoy the sunsets and continues enjoying the beach. Lots of restaurants within walking distance with a cool Laguna Beach vibe. Bachir and his staff were also amazing. Would highly recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear gw1527,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A Much Needed Break in a Time of COVID
Summary: We booked Capri Laguna when we realized that other trips we had planned would not pan out, due to the COVID-19 epidemic. Laguna Beach is an easy 2-hour drive away, so we felt confident we could do a reasonably safe socially-distanced vacation there. We booked the Oceanfront Double King Room with a Full Kitchen for us and our two growing teenage boys - and it was worth every single penny. The room (731) is on a corner, and so we had a balcony that looked both to the south and to the west (the coast points south in this region) - evening views of the sunset over the Pacific and Catalina Island in the distance were stunning. The room was tidy and recently redone with ocean blue hues and clean, white sheets covering the duvets. Was it COVID clean? Honestly, I think it will be awhile
Manager Response: BrittanyB883,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind detailed feedback. We do take on consideration all of your remarks and we look forward welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Great location sits right on the beach.  Clean room.  Friendly staff, everyone was helpful and welcoming. There are a lot of stairs but it is worth each one.  The beach is well lit at night.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.

Summary Heading: Not worth The price!!! But views and location were Good
Summary: Stay Somewhere else. For the price they are charging, the quality of rooms and Amenities are outdated and dirty... Oh forgot our bed sheets smelled dirty too. Only reason I booked here was price and reviews were good. Boy those we're lies.
Manager Response: Please allow us  this opportunity to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced . Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback which is absolutely valuable for us, it ensures that we are  not only become aware but we are always being proactive and addressing our guests concerns immediately as soon as they arise. The hotel’s team tries the best to make sure that we meet all demands with respect to each individual cleanliness ,privacy, health and safety.   High standards of cleanliness is our priority. Stringent cleaning and sanitizing protocols are used to clean rooms and public areas including heightened focus on rooms and higher touch areas.  We would like to reassure you that we have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and we have already communicated with the appropriate departments so as to improve the quality of our service and facilities and avoid similar incidents in the future.  We apologize again and we  value your trust.  Sincerely yours,

Summary: Stayed at Capri in Laguna for our couples extended weekend trip! Beautiful ocean view rooms, walking distance to shops, restaurants, and good coffee! Nick at the front desk was very welcoming and helpful. All around a nice place to stay. Can’t wait to come back with our kids!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Look no further... great hospitality, even though we went late night, they accommodate us without an attitude and given the best room with the view that we asked. We definitely going there again, the location, the superb view... oh and we loved the manager Nick Politis!!!  George Anastasopoulos &  Christina Concetta
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.   We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I took our kids to stay at the Capri Laguna for a few nights and had the best time. We booked a beachfront room and the view was incredible. The room was clean, updated and had everything we needed including a small fridge, table, microwave, sink & coffee maker. The balcony was large with a small table, chairs and cusioned lounge chair. We left the balcony door open all night to hear the sound of the waves. All staff was very friendly and helpful especially Nick Politis and Morgan! Nick was so kind and left us a bottle of wine with two wine glasses to enjoy with the sunset. Morgan was very friendly and helped us with anything we needed. They have a continental breakfast with muffins, yogurt and fruit. A wonderful starbucks machine for fresh coffee and hot
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary Heading: Awesome getaway! But Shhh. Don't tell anyone!
Summary: Love this getaway!  Took my wife here for her Birthday celebration - great room, amazing views, friendly staff and comfy bed!  The beach is perfect (don't pay attention to google maps satellite view that shows it's a rocky beach - it's not - see my photo).  To top it off, Nick, the GM brought us a bottle of wine!  We will be back!

Our experience will drive us back soon.

A private beach/cove, gorgeous views, dolphin pods frolicking, within walking distance of downtown, Main Beach, shops and dining.  A great place for your vacation, staycation, or simply a romantic getaway.  We come back here again... and again. 👍👍

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel  that I've ever stayed!!!!!
Summary: I stayed last weekend in Capri Laguna and I recommend this place 100%!! It's in an amazing location, few steps and you can enjoy the waves and the beach or you can relax on the balcony watching the sunset!! Nick and Bachir provided us with excellent customer service, always polite and willing to assist us and make our stay comfortable and memorable!! Definitely I am going back!!
Manager Response: We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay at Capri Laguna on the Beach. Thank you for the compliments of our customer  service. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future. Best Regards

Summary: Capri Laguna is a beautiful beach front hotel. You can relax at the balcony and enjoy the amazing view of beach/ocean. Just a few steps down, you can sit on the warm sand. Bachir is very helpful and super nice Manager that will take care of you as family. We celebrated our anniversary at our latest stay & Bachir delivered a bottle of wine! We've been enjoying our little getaway at this hotel for many years.  Thank you, Bachir & Nick! Robert and Esmeralda 🍾
Manager Response: Dear Esmeralda,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean . Summary: Well, this is definitely the place to stay! This is a true "beachfront" hotel. The view is spectacular and you are right on the ocean. This is the place to unwind and relax.  The staff and service is superb with the guest feeling like their needs are important.   We have stayed here over 3 times, BACHIR at the front desk is alway awesome, he makes our experience even better!  He assisted us all the time we needed. We appreciate his knowledge and professionalism.   Rooms are spacious, well appointed, and very clean.  They have a nice Terrance balcony you can also enjoy overlooking ocean, some of the rooms have their own private terrace. Definitely it's a fabulous place for a romantic and relaxing getaway. Will be recommending this resort to all my friends and family.

Summary: We loved it and are looking forward to coming back. The Manager and staff were very friendly and accommodating. The location was prime, right on the beach with tons of places to layout and the views were gorgeous.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous views. Could use some TLC...
Summary: The room was nice and clean but unfortunately the state of the air conditioner did not leave a good impression.   When we got there, the part that connects the AC to the wall was broken off so we asked the cleaning lady about it. She said no maintenance guy was on site and would have to wait until the next day to fix but in the meantime she connected it the best she could. It looked like some aluminum had been holding it together and that was the hotel’s “fix” for it. The AC never cooled the room down enough. We set it to 64 degrees but it would automatically shut off when it was still hot in the room.   We slept uncomfortably through the hot night and ended up leaving a day early to sleep more comfortably at home.
Manager Response: Dear Araceli G,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: I should have posted much sooner, we no sooner returned from our absolutely FABULOUS stay at the Capri Laguna and we had to pack quickly to head back to Canada due to Corona Virus. I have lost track of time since then.   Every night I dream of the day when safe travel can resume, and we can return to Capri Laguna.  We felt so welcomed and attended to by ALL the staff.  We were invited for cake at a client birthday celebration; the staff came down to the beach to put out chairs and umbrella for us, and when we first arrived the front desk asked if we wanted to check out a few available rooms so we could decide if we wanted to upgrade (and we did, there are so many choices).   We got a great room next to the huge sun deck where you have a fantastic view of the ocean and sunset.

The hotel staff is phenomenal. Nick is always there to welcome you and ready to help you. Fresh Starbucks coffee 24/7 is plus. I love coffee! I also made sure not to miss the beautiful sunsets. Close to a bunch of good restaurants.  Thank you, Capri Laguna.  I will be back.

Summary Heading: Sleep on Clouds with Breathtaking views
Summary: We had such an amazing stay at Capri!   First, the view from the hotel is breathtaking and takes all your worries away.   Second, the staff is so helpful, friendly and overall amazing. Nick, Morgan and Bachiz made sure we had everything we needed for our stay. They took such great care of us and made us feel like home.   The highlight of our stay was the waves crashing that we could hear from our room and the waffle and pancake maker at the breakfast bar 😍  Also, the bed... sleeping on clouds ⛅️   Thank you Capri Laguna and Nick for the hospitality. We will be back.

Summary Heading: Sleeping to the sound of waves
Summary: My recent visit to Laguna beach was complimented by a gorgeous stay at Capri hotel. The staff, Nick, Morgan, and Bachir, was all so welcoming and helpful. I highly recommend staying here when you visit Laguna beach. Prime location, great service, and what better way to rest and relax than to have the waves crashing beneath you while you sleep. This hotel is easily accessible from the beach and the pacific coast highway. Hands down, best experience in a hotel in Laguna Beach California.

Summary Heading: A day in paradise at Capri Laguna
Summary: We spontaneously decided to go to Laguna Beach as the COVID19 pandemic started getting worse. We thought we would end our California trip a little south of LA to potentially get some sun and social distance on a beach.  We happened upon the Capri Laguna and encountered Nic (manager), Morgan and Bashir.  They gave us a good rate for the room for our family of 4.  They were so kind and accommodating.  The service here was truly exceptional. The included breakfast is really good, the pool is heated and the beach front property is absolutely beautiful.  We thoroughly enjoyed our short stay and highly recommend that when the stay-at-home orders are over, you try this wonderful Mediterranean-style hotel.  You won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Summary: clean rooms, sound of the beach is amazing, greenness all around ,great services..I recommend that every body visits,  i will visit this hotel every time i go to Californiaaaaa . Thank you Bachir  and Nick for the wonderful services and we will definitely meet again

Summary Heading: nice beach view& excellent front desk service
Summary: I checked in at night around 11pm. Actually quite disappointed at first. The room was a bit small than I expected. However the view was really good in the morning and the breakfast were so delicious. Refreshed me with the starbucks coffee! The receptionist -- Morgan is very polite, she provided a lot help for us. Thank you for your wonderful services!💖
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you so much  for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay.  On behalf of all our Capri Laguna  team, we would like to thank you for your  comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon and create more wonderful moments  for you.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in February for 8 days, for a family vacation. We had a room with beach front balcony and a million dollar view of the beach and Pacific Ocean. The hotel is wonderful, clean and the view and beach are amazing.Free breakfast was great every morning , and quick walk on the beach as the sun was rising was breathtaking and refreshing. Everyone was very nice, friendly . The room was nice, clean and very comfortable. There is small laundry room which is a plus when you are travelling with kids. There are no elevators, but it didn't bother us at all. We loved the hotel and hope to say there again in the future. thank you Capri Laguna
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back  soon and create more great wonderful gateway for you.

Summary: My sister and I had the pleasure of staying at this boutique hotel for four nights earlier this week. We felt like we had discovered a little hidden treasure! The hotel sits right on the beach, terraced-like. It kind of feels like you're in a different country. In fact, my sister, who traveled to Greece last summer, remarked that it reminded her of being back in Greece.  The staff is super friendly-- General Manager Nick, as well as Constantine, Morgan, and Bachir. They are masters of hospitality to their guests!  We had the Ocean Front King room with fireplace, and we loved our view from the little balcony. It was so soothing to hear the ocean waves as I drifted off to sleep. We mostly walked along the main highway to the central part of town, since it was only about a mile.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are excited to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the beautiful views of the relaxing Ocean and our artistic  City.  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience again . Warm Regards,

Summary: This place is a gem! The oceanfront rooms are reasonably priced and totally worth every penny! The view is spectacular and our room had a little balcony with a bistro table and chair set to sit, people watch and listen to the waves. The room wasn't huge, but it was perfect for the two of us and our pup.  Capri Laguna is very dog friendly, we paid $50 extra for the stay. There was a stretch of grass right outside our room so our furbaby could potty at night.   The beach is steps away, literally a few steps down! We had a great time walking up and down the beach.   Staff were great! Room comes with continental breakfast (waffles, coffee, tea, oj, boiled eggs, pastries, cereal, etc) and parking.   We will be back! Loved this place so much!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach

Summary: This is a hidden blessing along Hwy 1...great staff, room, views and amenities.  Very close to all of Laguna's cool shops and restaurants, but the ocean constantly calls you to go and relax on the beach or the balcony view...I would definitely stay again!

The manager Nick was very helpful with any question or request that we had. We loved the welcome flowers!!!Bachir and Konstantine  were always willing to help us with instructions and suggestions for places to visit and have fun. They were very polite, creating a happily atmosphere!! For sure we recommend it!!

Summary: We got to the hotel a little early. Nick and Morgan were so great to get us into our room early. The room's view was breath taking! Ocean view like I can't believe. The room was large, so comfortable, and with all windows/slider to look at that view.  We loved the large balcony. This hotel has beautiful statues, relaxing decks, and winding stairs. It feels like you are in Greece.  The sound of the waves crashing is something I will miss. We can't wait go back for the most relaxing stay ever.

Summary Heading: A fabulous first time in Laguna Beach at Capri
Summary: The service was excellent from the start with Robert checking us in and Bashir and Morgan assisting us throughout our stay.  Rooms were clean and bright with beach views and location was perfect, centrally located within walking distance of downtown, with shops, restaurants, and galleries all around us.  Nick made our stay extra special by accommodating a second night for us in a wonderful room, also on the beach with fabulous sunset views. We highly recommend this hotel and can't wait to return. Alicia and Dave B

Summary Heading: The Amalfi Coast in Southern California
Summary: My wife and I had a wonderful Valentines week vacation at The Capri Laguna on the Beach. Like its name, the property brings back fond memories of the inns you will find along the Amalfi Coast that are family run and owned.  The Capri is located on the beach with access to sand, the Pacific Ocean, and an unobstructed view of the most beautiful sunsets.   As for the staff, they were friendly, warm and helpful with local dining recommendations. This comes from the Capri’s owner, Nick, being on site daily as the consummate host.
Manager Response: Dear VineyardFred,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views and our facilities. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Very nicely located right on the edge of the beach, and with less than a 20 minute walk to the center of Laguna Beach (with lots of stores and restaurants on the way and close to the hotel). We spent one night here, in two fairly sized rooms with a small kitchenette and a small bathroom. OK rooms with a "beach-feel" to them, but nothing special. However, the service at the reception at check-in and check-out was exceptionally friendly.  The small heated pool was a treat, while the small breakfastbuffet, shouldn't be the reason for you coming to the Capri. All in all the Capri is an OK value for money at a great location.
Manager Response: Dear Batravn,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel ! Thank you for choosing us and your detailed feedback. Summary Heading: Great for visiting with friends or family in the area.
Summary: Rooftop was fabulous.  Even my 97 year old Aunt walked up the stairs (as there is no ramp or elevator to the roof) and loved it.  Walk out to the beach.  Coffee and hot chocolate available 24/7.  Decent continental breakfast.  But the best thing was that you could stay parked for free (careful where you park though there are quite a few walls that are short and difficult to see and there isn't a lot of parking) there the whole time and walk to where ever.  Restaurants Galleries, shops, etc.  Parking otherwise is very expensive in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Looking forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: My husband and I came here for a "Mini moon" for a few days and it was ABSOLUTELY PERFECT. Such a quaint and charming hotel right on the edge of the sand. It has incredible decks scattered throughout for your ocean viewing,  sunbathing, and sun set/rise pleasures! The manager, Nick, treated us with the greatest customer service and warmth. You get free breakfast (waffles, pancakes, fruit, hard boiled eggs, pastries and coffee/tea 24/7) It was so peaceful and relaxing. The king bed was a plus as well as the 'HawaiianTropic' products. We would defo recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Jessbefree, We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. Warms Regards,

Summary: We had had a tragedy in the family and just needed to get away for one night. go anywhere just to get away.  It was just what we needed.  We got a complimentary upgrade, the room was great, the view was great, service was great, and the continental breakfast was more than I make myself at home.  I want to thank the staff for the perfect solution for a tragic week.  Thank You
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Furniture slightly outdated but bed was comfortable and everything else was good. Service was great and beautiful views with good location. Nice little complimentary breakfast included. Good space for family of 4 and loved the patio.
Manager Response: We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Nice view but old. The hotel needs to be updated. The staff was friendly but average.  Our room had a fireplace but I’m sure it has a leak as we used it. You could only smell it upon entering the room. Parking was definitely for smaller cars. The view was nice and wonderful to wake up to the sound of waves crashing on the beach.
Manager Response: Dear melpace2020,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards

Summary: I was unsure of where to stay on our vacation.  I am so glad I picked here.  The room was ready and clean, across from a restaurant that had the BEST steak I've ever eaten, a block away from another hotel that had a great bar that sat on the ocean. Took a short drive to the pier and went to Catalina for a day.  The host, Nick and Hostess, Morgan (what a doll) were so friendly and helpful I couldn't ask for more.  For those that complained about noise...I dont get it;  for those that said it smelled damp, I dont get that either.  My room was very comfy and any smell was fresh ocean air (not damp, lol).  To end, I would so stay here again and recommend this place to anyone that asked.  Hope to see you guys again.
Manager Response: Dear J4767TZbrianw,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your stay with us on TripAdvisor. Kind regards,

Summary: From the moment we walked in we felt like we were home. The staff is incredibly friendly and they all make you feel at home, especially NICK he was an absolutely amazing host.  It was me my husband and 15 month old baby.  Anything we needed he was there, so kind and so generous. can't thank him enough for creating the best atmosphere for our family vacation.  Also, Ive been to Capri Italy, and I had the same feel. The place is right on the ocean with a deck to watch sunrise and sunset. Location cannot be beat! it is lose to everything!

Summary: It's too bad that they have to resort to having a resort fee and can't just figure it into the room price. Since a review must have two hundred characters I needed to add this sentence plus a bit more to get there.

Summary Heading: European Charm on the beach in Southern California
Summary: We have now stayed at Capri Laguna twice, in October and November of 2019, and LOVED it both times! The location, right on the beach is fantastic. It truly allows for the "get away" experience. The rooms are comfortable - we appreciated the kitchenette and the awesome shower - but mostly loved the balcony overlooking the beach, and the European charm of the property. We were well taken care of by Bachir, Nick and Constantine... an awesome team. We hope to return soon and often!
Manager Response: Dear CoronadoGirl,  Thank you so much for sharing you feedback on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area. Happy new year.  Kind regards,

Summary: 2nd time we've stayed here and we will be back. The place is right on the ocean with an incredible deck to watch sunrise and sunset. Staff is incredibly friendly and makes you feel at home. Location cannot be beat!

Summary: Great hotel! Feet in the sand. Clean and modern. We felt at home. Bachir and Nick were very friendly and professional. They serve breakfast included in the price. Waffles, hot cakes, chocolate croissants, fruits and also coffee and hot chocolate. They were very accommodating.  Parking at the hotel. Close to everything. Easy to book, we payed at the hotel.

Summary Heading: Great location, not fancy,  fun for kids
Summary: This was a really fun place to stay for New Year’s. The location is wonderful, and walking distance to the town and right on the beach! Nice heated pool for the kids to play in. The rooms are not fancy and it is not a hotel -meaning, there’s certain amenities that are missing or lacking such as a decent fitness center, room service, and a tasty breakfast. That being said, it was really great for our family to stay at the beach for a few days. A couple of the guest complained about the noise level of the kids playing in the pool, and housekeeping knocks on the doors way too early!! Those were the two main complaints!

Summary: Got a great deal on travelzoo for an ocean front room.  Fab staff,very friendly and accommodating.  Will definitely stay here again.  Great continental breakfast included with stay.  Hotel is walking distance to everything in laguna.  Hotel has a great beach.

Summary: We had 2 rooms at Capri over winter break. The larger room (605) was oceanfront with 2 Kings, a sleeper sofa, a dining area and an awesome fireplace! We loved it!!!! It was also conveniently close to the parking and lobby (many rooms are staggered down lots of stairs)  From the moment we arrived Nic and Bashir welcomed us so warmly. From a wine and cheese reception Friday evening to a cute breakfast (the pancake machine is awesome and so is the Starbucks coffee machine), be sure to take your breakfast and sit on the gorgeous upper terrace! We spent a lot of time there just drinking in the gorgeous view, playing backgammon and drinking wine.  The location could not be better! Walkable everywhere! We didn't move our car till we left.   Being on the beach couldn't really be taken

Summary: Helpful, friendly staff.   Luis helped Park our car and unload it.  We stayed oceanfront.  FABULOUS.  Nice walking beach, great sunsets, view of Catalina Island, and lots of birds.  Nearby restaurants and galleries within walking distance. Pool extremely small, not a lap pool and no jacuzzi.  A great weekend getaway.

Summary: I was welcomed from the time a checked in and had a great room.  Nick,Bachiz and Morgan were wonderful and I will return to this beautiful hotel.  The location is wonderful being right on the beach. The room was really nice with comfortable bed and could crack the window and hear the ocean wave every night.  I would definitely recommend to all my friends to take a staycation like I did. I left relaxed and refreshed which was my goal.  Thank you for great hospitality, professional and friendly service.

Summary: We recharged at one of the world's most blissful settings as we relaxed among the sound of the crashing ocean waves. We enjoyed top-tier facilities and amenities and we had a memorable experience in this coveted beachside location.We enjoyed a peaceful beach side stroll,magnificent sunsets  and we walked a lot  to the area's finest art galleries-museum, boutique shops, restaurants and entertainment venues.  Thank you Nick for going above and beyond ,creating an unforgettable experience .

I know both of their names because they were so incredibly friendly and helpful while providing over the top service.  This was my first visit but we are already planning on a return trip soon.  Thank you Thank you Thank you.

Summary Heading: Wonderfully relaxing ocean front bargain in a great location!
Summary: we went there for a birthday and had a wonderful experience. The staff was awesome, especially Morgan and Nick. The hotel is RIGHT on the beach - my girlfriend said it felt like she was back in Positano Italy!  Our room, 752, was charming, with a private deck and ocean view. Would definitely go back!!. Loved the little kitchen in the lobby-made fresh waffles everyday! Negatives: bed comfort was just "okay", and the box springs squeaked at the slightest movement. No towel bars in bathroom - weird. Tiny tiny soap bars. Otherwise we loved it!

Summary: Second time staying at this lovely hotel on the beach, and I look forward to another visit soon again! The owners and staff are so friendly and over-and-above accommodating, the location is perfection, and the rooms are comfortable, clean, and quiet - exactly what I hope for on a respite from the city. In addition to a great boutique hotel experience, I was thrilled to get to watch - from the balcony - dolphins playing in the gorgeous sunset!
Manager Response: Dear Quest790755,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel for your stay. It is our pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay and we met your expectations. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel had 4 star reviews on different sites, which surprised me since this hotel is barely a 3 star in my opinion.  Rooms are very outdated & the bed was extremely uncomfortable which made for sleepless nights. The hotel site says rooms have AC, but this consisted of a small portable AC unit in the corner of the room. The room had a window, which could be opened to hear the ocean, but the heavy curtains were only able to retract one way which kept the window blocked. The bathroom looked to have been remodeled & was just ok.   Overall I would not stay here again as the price is too high for the rooms to be so uncomfortable.

Summary: Jessy Silvio gave my wife and I great service very professional was able to  Answer all of my questions with a smile on his face Very helpful will definitely be coming back because of him the view is amazing from the room
Manager Response: Dear Mattman134,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel for your stay. It is our pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay and we met your expectations. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri Laguna is one of SoCal's best-kept secrets! Located right on the bluff, most (if not all) of the rooms have amazing views. We stayed in a lovely room right on the water, with easy access to the beach.  The beach and commerce section of Laguna is relatively small, so we could either walk or take the trolley (summertime) pretty much wherever we needed to go. We loved talking walks on the beach and entering the neighboring restaurants from the sand.   Bachir, Hamilton and Nick were amazing hosts during our weekday stay, and were always willing to help with anything and everything we needed.   If you're looking for a modestly-priced beachfront hotel without all the unnecessary frills, I can't recommend the Capri Laguna highly enough.

Summary: This is a great boutique hotel on the beach.  Great restaurants and shops within walking distance.  I would have stayed another week if I could. Amazing sunset views from the back patio.  Bachir and Nicu were extremely friendly and helpful along with the rest of the staff!

Summary: The staff, grounds, room were excellent. Parking was tight but that is normal for area. Centrally located in Laguna. Great views. Our view of the Ocean was not what I wanted so I asked the staff to if another room was available with a better view. They immediately showed me another room with that was actually an upgraded price. I asked what the price difference was and they said do not worry about the price difference.

Summary: Capri Laguna exceeded our expectations! Upon our arrival, my daughter and I were greeted and taken care of throughout our stay by the professional, amiable, and attentive Bashir. We have been visiting Laguna Beach (from the Northeast), for the past 6 years, staying at a high end beach front property that changed with new management policies dissuading us from returning there. How fortunate because this was the impetus that led us to discovering this glorious beachfront inn with its European-like panache & tiers of balconies/steps all leading to its front sand beach. Our first night, happened to be a wonderful wine & cheese happy hour at sunset time. No need to utilize our rental car since all the eateries, live music, art galleries, etc., walkable. The Capri checked off the

Summary: I spent the last week of October on Hotel Laguna on the Beach and I have to say that I enjoyed every second!! The view is stunning and the my room so luxurious and warm!! The service was absolutely amazing, Bachir, Constantin and the Nick, the manager of the hotel, were there to help me with anything that I wanted, suggesting me restaurants and places for shopping, the most hot spots and funny activities to spend my vacations.  I found a bouquet of red flowers in my room on my arrival and a welcome notice....the warmest welcome ever!! I suggest this hotel for your vacations doubtless!

Summary: We booked on Expedia with a low rate and it was a room without an ocean view, but still had access to the pool, view decks/terraces as well as the beach. We talked to Nick at the front desk and paid to upgrade to room 501, and oceanfront room on the top level with a private deck and breathtaking ocean view. The room was comfortable, with a table and chairs on the deck, plus a kitchenette and a big shower in the bathroom. Free parking was a bonus. Breakfast is serviceable but nothing special. What IS special is the property itself. It’s our new favorite in the area. We cannot wait to return.

Summary: Lovely hotel right on the beach although could do with further refurbishment as a little tired.  Basic breakfast but adequate. Lots of steps to some rooms so could be a struggle with big luggage. Wonderful staff who really look after their guests - a special mention to Bachir. Beach is a little dangerous with rocks and crashing surf but it was pleasant getting a bit of sun on the lounge chairs provided for guests.

Summary: We spent the weekend at the Capri to celebrate my wife's birthday and although I rarely write reviews, our experience was so memorable that I wanted to share it.  In a world where many luxury hotels feel sterile and bland, the Capri Laguna stands out as personalized and cozy.  The rooms have private access to the beach, there are a number of quaint areas on the hotel grounds to gather with friends/family, and a complimentary wine and cheese reception takes place in the early evening.  The views are phenomenal!  The staff are truly hospitable and attentive, and the general manager Nick helped us make dinner reservations and clued us in on some local happenings that really made our weekend.  Capri Laguna is THE hotel to stay at when visiting Laguna Beach.
