Summary Heading: Fantastic choice to stay in Laguna!
Summary: My wife and I bring a large group down to Laguna every summer to attend the Pageant of the Masters and hang out with good friends.  This past July, we had the opportunity to stay at the Capri Laguna and it did not disappoint.  Our group of five couples all agreed that the Capri has now become our favorite hotel in Laguna.  The manager, Bashir and his staff took amazing care of our group from check-in with warm cookies to check-out with his thanks. He not only recommended fantastic local restaurants, but he would call on our behalf to help secure a table for 10 for us.  The view from our room was amazing and we took full advantage of the open deck on the top level to hang out with our group for breakfast, throughout the day and prior to heading out for dinner.  The location is

Summary Heading: If I could’ve left, I would
Summary: this hotel was booked for a conference as an overflow hotel from the surf and sand next-door. I don’t know where to begin, is it the hair that’s left on the bathroom floor, the walls that look like someone got beat up in the room, the rust and dirt all over the baseboards, I even called down to ask for a toothbrush because I left mine at my last hotel and sure enough the answer was no. I’m actually afraid to sleep here tonight but I don’t really have a choice so I put on every item of clothing I had and trying not to touch anything. Please don’t fall for the view, it’s quite pretty but I don’t think my college apartment was this disgusting.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay at the Capri Laguna was perfect. The staff was very friendly and accommodating (23 in our group!). The location couldn't be any more pleasant, right on the beach with several tiered places for sunbathing and gathering. The rooms were clean and nice, but lacked some amenities that would have been helpful: They had microwaves but no plates for use or eating, consequently no utensils either. All in all, I would recommend the Capri Laguna but revisit with a picnic basket of nessecities the next time.
Manager Response: Dear Claris52015,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views and the location. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too and remarks. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Excellent property located right on the beach.  Super friendly staff and afternoon cookies!  The included breakfast is so convenient and what a cost savings. Manager Nick goes out of his way to make guests feel welcome and appreciated.  Can't say enough about this special spot.
Manager Response: Dear fishern222,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Kind and caring staff, clean rooms with fridge and coffeemaker - I took my mom for an overnight stay. She has a difficult time walking and Bashir gave her his hand and insisted on walking her to our room. I had called ahead of time to inform him that I would need a room close to the parking area and he had the perfect room with an ocean view for us. Once in the room, he showed my mom how to step over to get onto the balcony. The respect he showed her without being condescending was so appreciated and kind. Parking is tight at the Capri Laguna and Bashir came to the rescue again by carefully guiding me as I parked my large SUV. When Bashir went home for the night, Silviu did an excellent job helping us and answering all of my questions about breakfast, beach towels, and even tea!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received excellent service. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Came into town for Ohana music festival .  Staff was most accommodating by holding our luggage before our check in and being flexible with our late night check in .   Room was very clean and large bathroom was a huge plus.   The ocean view and layout of property made you feel like you were staying at a mediterranean location .   Hotel manager Nick and front desk agent Morgan were more than accommodating during checkout .   Will return next year!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City.  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Capri is a good place to stay at when you want beach access with towel service. Capri does a great job at this. I was hoping to get into my room sooner, because I had a baby with me. I checked on the room status 3 times. I was really hoping the room would be ready sooner I have stayed 4 times at Capri. However this time I really wanted to accommodate my baby to sleep on a bed with a/c was not possible. It would have been nice if gentleman at the front had said I will do my best to get you in á room as soon as possible. He only said I cannot guarantee the room until 3. Other than the ac not working in one of the rooms it was a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: We had an excellent experience with friendly helpful staff from the first phone call through the check in to check out. Bachir and Nick were very helpful and friendly and extremely accommodating, Bachir went out of his way to make sure we are comfortable and happy with our stay!!   Our rooms were very clean and very accommodating beautiful oceanfront breathtaking hotel I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely  be staying there again and again!  Bachir and Nick thank you for being amazing and for making our short stay at this hotel wonderful
Manager Response: Dear carolbejjani,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: If it was $150/night, my review would be different.
Summary: We had what was called a Beachfront room, which I guess is accurate because it it did face the beach but was a couple of sets of stairs and a walk across a patio area to get to the beach, but for in excess of $500/night Canadian including taxes and resort fees (no idea what they offer that justifies a $35US/day resort fee) that we paid, it was a significant disappointment.  The view was great, but the room (#711) was dated, paint and wall paper was pealing, there were gaps between the carpet and the wall and the patio door did not lock; the incredibly rusted out lock mechanism didn't even connect with the hasp part of the lock.  The room has 2 safes, but the one was too small to fit my laptop and the other didn't work.  On the positive side, wifi was strong, there was a small
Manager Response: Dear alhan10  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.

Summary: I love this little retreat - Highly recommend Beachfront rooms - everything is within walking distance .  only downside is parking availibility is limited. We drove from Las Vegas as our weekend getaway * 3rd time staying here within last few years
Manager Response: Dear Carmiallen,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for your loyalty and the Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great boutique hotel right on the beach
Summary: My finace and I stayed here for two nights. Bachir was amazing right from the start: so friendly and helpful. He even upgraded us to a beautiful room with ocean views. The hotel had direct access to the beach, with complimentary beach chairs and umbrellas. Falling asleep to the gentle sounds of the ocean was more than relaxing. Great Hawaiian Tropic toiletries were provided in the bathroom! We were even lucky enough to catch the complimentary evening reception held every Friday.  Absolutely great location in the heart of Laguna Beach, surrounded by many shops and restaurants. Free parking and breakfast was super convenient, too.  If we ever find ourselves in Laguna Beach, we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear TyttiTee,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Me and my wife always wanted to visit the West Coast. Finally this September we went to Laguna Beach and we stayed for 11 days at the Capri Laguna. Amazing hotel right on the beach. I give it 5 stars. Very clean and friendly environment. Nick the manager of the hotel was great. I would definitely go there again and I would recommend it to everyone I know. (Antonios & Maria)
Manager Response: Dear Tony A,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Like trying to sleep with baseball stadium lights!
Summary: Sad but the entire property has intense lighting 24/7. Including the balconies in front of your windows. Yes you can use the heavy breeze blocking drapes. The rooms are very clean, reasonably updated and the staff is lovely. Our view  from 1br ocean view suite was disappointing. More roof below than ocean. The better,closer, beach views are all just single rooms. Oh well. We’re here right now.
Manager Response: Dear Luvtostay,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Capri Laguna in one of the best places in town. If you are wandering where to stay in Laguna, Capri is the answer. My wife and I were very pleased with the staff and owner, not to forget the magical view of Capri. The latter has free breakfast which includes a variety of great choices. I will definitely comeback . Capri is one of the only option to choose, you will not regret.
Manager Response: Dear Abdel1973,  Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed review following your stay with us on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Felt like I was at the Mediterranean Sea! Loved it! Being able to fall asleep to the crashing waves was food for the soul - amazing. I hope to return and stay there again very soon. Enjoyed good food within walking distance. Parking was easy.
Manager Response: Dear RitaF1382,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor for your recent stay at our Hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our services. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful Laguna Beach Ocean front Hotel
Summary: Stayed at Capri Laguna for our anniversary. Nick, General Manager, is a great host and service oriented. The entire staff works hard for guests. We were able to park at the hotel throughout our five day visit, but the hotel has a supplemental parking lot one block away. We love the sight and sound of the Pacific Ocean and enjoyed both from our room and deck. The hotel staff provides chairs,umbrellas, and towels on the beach. After staying all day at the beach we stopped by the pool. Breakfast is provided until after 10am and is includes pastry, pancakes, waffles, fruit, cereal, yogurt, orange juice, hard-boiled eggs, and coffee. Lastly, the rooms are clean and neat with refrigerator and microwave. Yes, the carpet and furniture are older/worn but their condition did not adversely
Manager Response: Dear BJB1988O,  Thank you so much for your feedback of our hotel. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay with us. It is a pleasure to receive such positive feedback. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel right on the water in Laguna Beach
Summary: Great hotel right on the beach and a quick drive to downtown Laguna Beach.  We could hear the sound of the surf and had peaks of the ocean from our room which was so nice.  Everyone from the folks at the front desk to the grounds keepers were friendly and welcoming - they all had big smiles on their faces.  Better yet, they welcomed our little dog and were interested in her which made us feel good.  If you have trouble with stairs you may not want to stay in the lower level floors as there aren't any elevators.  The bed linens were very nice quality and the room was nicely furnished. The complementary continental breakfast was plenty to hold us until lunch.  There is at least one large desk with lounge chairs and round tables with umbrellas where the guests can sun themselves
Manager Response: Dear BusylnTorrance,  Thank you so much for your detailed feedback of our hotel. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay with us. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary: cozy, cute and on the beach. staff was accommodating and very helpful especially Bachir and Nick- thank you!! There's only one parking space per room but plenty of parking in the neighborhood. Small breakfast in the morning and coffee and water available all day in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear wanderluvv,  It is our pleasure to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and we will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The location was great, but that's the only good thing about this place.  The whole thing just has a run down feel.  The bathrooms were nice, but the rest of the room could use a major update.  The internet speed in the room was unacceptable for today's standards.  The entire stay felt like I was stepping back in time 20 years.
Manager Response: Dear brodster77,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Laguna Beach is one of our favourite weekend getaways and since we discovered Capri we don’t even bother to shop around for hotels -- if it’s available, we book it. Yes, you can find hotels that are more chic or more luxurious (but you’ll either pay the premium for that or you won’t be oceanfront).   Capri is the epitome of breezy beachy comfort, it’s like staying a friend’s beach home right. On. The. Beach. Rooms look just like the pictures, they are clean and well cared for with awesome showers (honestly I don’t know how they manage to get all the sand out between clients), bedding is super comfy and the oceanfront room balconies are to die for. If you splurge for oceanfront, it’s like your friend has a $2 million condo.  We love that Capri is on a smaller beach away from the
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service and maximum satisfaction to our  guests.  The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary Heading: Awesome deal for the multi-million dollar views!
Summary: Awesome deal for the multi-million dollar views and proximity to the beach! Lots of stairs but “when in Capri”... it made the sunset even more picturesque 😍 The friendly staff from the front desk, house-keeping to gardeners made us feel at home. Nothing says vacation like rolling out of bed into the beach. It was that close and felt so private this time of year the last week of Aug. The DeCastros will certain come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing us. See you soon !

Summary: After a lovely and relaxing week stay at Capri Laguna we can highly recommend it to anyone and we will definitely come back to this superb hotel.A really peaceful and relaxing hideaway if you want to escape from the city and the everyday life. The room is exactly  as described in the pictures with a marvelous view to the ocean and the cleanliness and facilities were amazing. The location also was perfect.And the most important the people who work there was always there for us. they provide us any kind of information we could possible need, suggestions and advises what to do in the area and and gave us all the attention to have unforgettable summer memories. Best holiday ever.Thank you Nick, Konstantin and Bashir for your excellent welcoming
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. Yours at Hospitality,

Summary: Rooms were shopworn and generally not in the condition that I expected for a Laguna beach location.  Location excellent, right on the beach, room condition marginal.  I woud not stay there again at the price we paid.
Manager Response: We will address it immediately Thank you so much,

Summary: Great deal and a BEAUTIFUL view! Beach was GORGEOUS, and our room was amazing. I was blown away with everything about our stay. The staff was awesome and very nice, but I owe it all to Bashir. He really went above and beyond which helped make my husband’s birthday really special. We will definitely come back!!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the tripadvisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon at our hotel.

Summary Heading: Awesome gem but unaccommodating front desk.
Summary: We got married on the beach and stayed here the same night. The room was understated awesomeness! You could not be any closer to the water without being in it. The sound of the ocean crashing in front of our room was worth the amount we paid.  I would have given 5 stars but my only complaint is about the night manager. I found out after checkout that my sister tried to have a bottle of champagne delivered to our room after we arrived and was told they couldn’t accommodate that request. This was our wedding night and not an unreasonable request.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Background view from our balcony! 💙  All the people from frontdesk team are amazing. Super helpful and friendly. We felt welcome right away, there’s 5 guys out there Nick, Silvio, bachair and the other two. We stayed for a week, our housekeeper Olga did a great job cleaning our room and even organizing our stuff, there’s a lot of stairs to go to the beach but when you go to the beach u can call them and the guy will come meet u wherever/whenever to set up some chairs and umbrella. Guest service is definitely 5 star!!! Were def coming back! 💖
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you have received an excellent Guest  service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary Heading: Old property. Nice location. New bathrooms and beds but furnishings very old. Portable air conditioning units did ok job
Summary: Old property. Nice location. Updated bathroom and beds but old tired furnishings. Portable air conditioning units did its job but they were very noisy. Free breakfast was pitiful. Suitable for a motel 6 but feeble for a hotel with the rate structure they have
Manager Response: Thank you so much  .

Summary: Parking for one car allowed may be off site by several blocks. LOTS of steps up and down--this hotel is not for a handicapped person. Room was tired--thin towels, average furniture, broken coffee maker. We had a King Suite, ocean front. Balcony was nice with partial ocean view. Pool was similar to mine at home. Hotel needs an upgrade.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.

Summary: My family spent three nights here on a little staycation (we live in Southern California). I had never stayed at this hotel before, but I loved it! Yes, it's on the older side, but so are a lot of hotels on the beach. However, they hotel has obviously been kept up and reflects the relaxed, easy design and decor of Laguna Beach. The rooms were bright and airy, and the ocean view was gorgeous! The staff were all helpful and pleasant, I can't think of one need that went unmet while we were there. The beds were so comfortable, I slept like a baby to the sound of the ocean at night. The swimming pool was nice and clean, and I loved the availability of sand and pool toys for the kids. My boys loved the easy beach access, and the fresh baked cookies in the afternoon. I cannot wait to

We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your detailed review. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Had a very enjoyable stay here in July. Staff was welcoming, accommodating and helpful. Location is right on the beach, easy walk down from the rooms. Room was comfortable. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Vegas3117,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Our room overlooked the water. What a gorgeous view! Everyone on staff went out of their way to be helpful. It's a little older than some of the nearby accommodations, but we didn't mind that, especially since it was lower-priced than most in the area.
Manager Response: Dear DMarie,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the gorgeous view. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Sacrificing a lot for a nice location
Summary: We had such a lovely check-in experience with a woman at the front desk. She went out of her way to make us quite comfortable while we waited for our room to be available. But, after that, things took a quick turn south. The room has an external air conditioner which is quite loud, and has a very bright LED interface that kept me up at night. The bathroom also lets in a lot of light at night, and the window can't be covered either. So, I needed a sleepmask and ear plugs to get through the night, which I nearly never need on the road, and I travel a ton. At the pool and the beach, there were no towels and nobody to help install the umbrellas and chair. It was DIY. Thank goodness there was a mallet around and we had brought our own towels from home. Other hotels nearby had people
Manager Response: Dear chrispie981,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Summary Heading: Great spot on the beach in Laguna
Summary: My partner and I stayed one Saturday night at Capri Laguna an it was great. We had an early check in and late check out so that we could enjoy the beach Sat. afternoon and Sunday morning. Constantine helped us with chair and umbrella set up on the beach. Very nice boutique hotel within walking distance to lots of great amenities and restaurants, bars, and coffee shops.
Manager Response: Dear JodyH495,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too,which we will be sure to share with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: All staff we encountered was very helpful and friendly. The beach accommodations were amazing. Loved having towels, chairs and beach umbrellas available to us all day. Really great to be able to go from the beach to our room throughout the day. Very comfortable room Walking distance to all he great Laguna shopping and restaurants. Very safe environment.
Manager Response: Dear Amy F,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay with us at Capri Laguna Beach. We are delighted to hear that you had memorable experiences . Oh behalf of our entire team, we look forward to welcome back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: To expensive for what you get
Summary: This hotel had great reviews - We had an ocean view which was beautiful, but the room itself was a little tired - curtains torn, cleaning in room was not up to par and found we only had one towel and had to go back and get another. The parking is terrible and once you get a space I recommend not moving your car! For the cost I could have gotten something a whole lot nicer
Manager Response: Dear LeucadiaJane,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.   Kind regards,

Summary: This was our first trip to California we had a overnight stay in Laguna. The front desk staff were very accommodating and friendly. Our room had a small balcony overlooking the beach, watching the sunset from there was pretty amazing. The room was small but clean and the bathroom was completely renovated. If your thinking of a vacation away, I would definitely recommend this spot .
Manager Response: Dear Pcraft,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts.We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room and views. We appreciate your business and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: My sister and I stayed here for the weekend. What a perfect location. It's a little walk to the main shopping and restaurants but it's a good workout.   Our room faced the beach what a great view, worth every penny we spent. Well big bucks, but well worth it. We had 2 queen beds, also comes with a little kitchen area, mico, fridge, sink. It was perfect.   The general Manager (forgot his name, sorry dude) went out of his way to make sure our stay was awesome. Constantine was very helpful with our luggage and set us up on the beach one day with chairs and umbrella.  He also serves wine on Friday's happy hour located on the back patio. He's such a gentleman.
Manager Response: Dear mustanggirl57,  It is our pleasure to hear that you have enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too,which we will be sure to share with our team. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Room not as booked.  Beware when you check in.
Summary: Stayed here so we could enjoy overlooking the ocean and not have to cross the hightway to reach the beach.  Booked oceanfront room which was supposed to be on upper floor, overlooking the beach and ocean.  Instead we were back in an alleyway and had to look over our neighbor's patio to see the ocean.  Still could only see a narrow portion of it.  Very obstructed view.  Beware when you check in and look at your room before commiting.  Staff was friendly.  Exterior buildings need major maintenance.  Peeling paint.  Room had moldy carpeting.  Very modest furnishing and bath.  Not what you'd expect for $500 per night, even in expensive Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Marilyn V,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.   Kind regards,

Summary: I stayed at Capri Laguna for 2 nights for 2 years in a row – July 2019 and May 2018.  Advertised as a small boutique hotel, they live up to their name.  It had everything I needed include access to the beach, a heated pool, and a patio with lounge chairs overlooking the Pacific.  The hotel staff is amazing and extremely accommodating. I was upgraded to a better room on both occasions. Obviously I loved it – I returned for a second visit!
Manager Response: Dear MaxMyra1951,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor for your recent stay at our Hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our services. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great location. Run well. Older. Great location.
Summary: Like a lot of the hotels in Laguna, older. If it was new, it would probably cost 3 times what it does. Staff was professional and courteous. Rooms did the trick but far from memorable. Little pool, nice to hop into after rinsing off from the beach.   Beach access. Simple but adequate breakfast spread in lobby. Parking limited right on the property, but they had overflow parking a short walk away. We got parking most of the time right there and we we didn't, it was easy once you knew where it was. If you don't have an oceanfront room they had a nice common deck area with tables, seating and views.   If your trip is mostly hanging out the hotel and room and beach lounging, probably wouldn't stay there. But if its just a smaller portion of your itinerary, it makes for a solid base
Manager Response: Dear david7-27-3,  Thank you for taking your time to review our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your honest feedback, and will take on consideration all of your remarks. Thank you once again for choosing us and we  hope we'll be able to welcome you back again in the future. Thank you!   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: We always return back to the Capri!
Summary: Our family was well taken care of with towels, chairs, umbrellas, and a peaceful integration with the Surf and Sand chair guy so our vacation was a slice of magic. Our Capri guy was an amazing spirit! Thank you!! The Leahy family
Manager Response: Dear Kathy J,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. Our Team is here to serve all of our guests and it is nice to receive such positive feedback that we can share with them. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary: Wonderful hotel for the location and price. We splurged for the ocean room and are no disappointed.  Sure, it's not the ritz but, really people, what is to complain about.  Go to Ralph's across the road for some wine and cheese to take back to the beach and watch the sunset. All of the staff are so friendly specially Josy and Mafry.  Restaurants and shopping are in walking distance and there are plenty of boutiques nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Sarahtomatoe,  Thank you so much for your feedback of our hotel. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay with us. Our Team is here to serve all of our guests and it is nice to receive such positive feedback. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had a great 3 night stay here!  Nick greeted us as we arrived, and we enjoyed our ocean view room.  The bed was very comfortable and the room had all the amenities we needed.  The beach was beautiful!  There were lots of steps, but the views from all the open spaces made the climb worth it.  This hotel was a great find, and we'd defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear jjegj5k,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. Our Team is here to serve all of our guests and it is nice to receive such positive feedback that we can share with them. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary: Bachir was very helpful, professional and friendly. He went out of the way to make sure our weekend  was the best. The room had an awesome view, very clean and nice beach area. Close to great restaurants and easy access to the free shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear nancyks331,  Thank you for your feedback of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.   Kind regards,

Summary: Very European/Mediterranean feeling.  Although it may put off those who expect ultra modern, uniform, or more luxurious accommodations, we loved the older, quirky rooms, the narrow winding steps to the beach and the many sitting areas. Didn't have any problems to address to really test the service, but everyone was friendly and nice.
Manager Response: Dear Morgan L,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.   Kind regards,

Summary: We had a lovely time here and got terrific service.  I wanted to upgrade our room and had no problem doing so.  Plus when I left a travel neck pillow in our room after check out, I got a call and was able to retrieve it before we left.  The rooms are a little more tired looking than on the website which is why it's not a five star review.  But the bed was very comfortable and the view stellar.  Altogether, we had a lovely time.
Manager Response: Dear Extraordinary801774,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too, we took on consideration all of your remarks. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: really bad room quality. Beds are really old and super uncomfortable. The towels in the bathroom should be washed before given to the guest all the fuss in the towels came off when used. There was a really funky smell in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Road21319587967,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.   Kind regards,

Summary: We rented a house through Airbnb in Newport Beach for my daughter's Bachelorette Party .  The house was filthy.  We called around to find other accommodations and was able to book three rooms with two queen beds in each.  They gave us a great rate!!!  Nick Constantine (the Manager) was so gracious.  He sent over as a gift, bottles of wine and a charcuterie board.  Also, when we were leaving he gave us all "Capri / Laguna" bathrobes.  What started out so horribly turned in to a FANTASTIC  and memorable time!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear LovestoTravel032355,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Three of us stayed in a double queen pool view room for one night. I would recommend the Capri based on the friendliness of the staff, the cleanliness of the room, and the value based on other beach properties.
Manager Response: Dear 3boysnme,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: The place is right on the beach with amazing views.  Just a 10 minute walk to all the shops and restaurants.  The staff Bachir, Mandy, and Nick were great and willing to help with anything we asked for.  We had a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Grameni,  It is our pleasure to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and we will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: True beachfront - almost like you are in Capri!
Summary: We had a room overlooking the beach! We listened to the waves at night and were about 50 steps to the sand!  Nick, Bashir,  Constantine and Mafry went over and above to make our stay enjoyable! The room was small but we did not need more being so close to the beach. They have all day coffee and breakfast everyday! We will definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Robynrosenthal,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: The best place to stay in Laguna!!
Summary: This place is right on the beach! Amazing views and the beach is beautiful. The breakfast is great with fresh chocolate croissants and a bunch of other options. The staff; Nick, Constantine, Bachir and Mafry were so helpful and kind! Would definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Samara1221,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Nice location, but not the best.
Summary: The location of the Capri Laguna is absolutely gorgeous because it is right on the ocean front and it is conveniently located close to local stores and restaurants. Unfortunately everything else was not the best. The customer service of the employees was horrible because every time I called the front desk to ask a question, they talked incredibly fast to the point where you couldn't understand them, and had a very rude and "hurry up" attitude. The parking is also horrible because you have to park down the street and then walk back to the hotel. The rooms are a little outdated with old air conditioning units that went on and off throughout the night so it was hard to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear kamikurisu120,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.   Kind regards,

Summary: Nick, Constantine and Bashir provided the nicest and most accommodating service I have ever received in Laguna. They have a fine establishment and work their buns off to make sure everything is perfect for their guests. My family and I had a wonderful time. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!! :))
Manager Response: Dear zarsteps,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel ! Thank you for choosing us and mentioned our team members name. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience.   Kind regards,

Summary: Wonderful service from Nick the manager. Always ready to help with any reasonable request. Warm and welcoming, made it a point to learn our names and greet us each time we passed through the lobby. Every aspect of our stay was well attended to and wonderfully relaxing. Beach access is amazing, chairs, towels, decks and patios all overlooking the beach, and a great heated pool to enjoy for a more peaceful swim. Five star customer service, beautiful views, and very walkable - both beach and town.
Manager Response: Dear dagnythegreat,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience and great views.   Kind regards,

Summary: Great location right on the beach!  Parking on site included. Manager/owner very welcoming and very accommodating to different kinds of requests. Comfy & very clean rooms.  Spent spring break with 3 teenage girls who all wanted to return the following year which we did. Just as wonderful as last year. Will return any time we get a chance!
Manager Response: Dear nanhartford,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: If you don't mind a vintage place that's a bit quirky, Capri Laguna's location could not be better--right on the sand in a more quiet part of town. The pool is small and it probably better during the week--weekends it is too small for both adults and children. But our 1 bedroom suite had a patio that ran the length of the bedroom and sitting area with a perfect view of the ocean and close enough to hear the waves. That and two loungers were all we really needed. But the rooms have been tastefully updated with a beachy look. The staff were very nice and the breakfast that is part of the room rate was fine not fancy--cereals, yogurt, make your own waffles, juice, pastries. etc. Good coffee available 24 hrs.
Manager Response: Dear Lindee L,  Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed review following your stay with us on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The best ocean view in the all coast  Nick politis and Bashir are very nice and professional  The rooms are real clean and comfortable  I will definitely will visit again Thank you  I staid in room ocean front as you can see in the pics  We saw dolphins in the early morning  And also sealion  That was wonderful sight  We will miss it
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you and your family have received an excellent service.. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Such a great place to stay! Everyone was very helpful and kind especially Mafri, Costentine, Nick, Silvio... The ocean views were amazing! The incredible beach is just steps away.The rooms were lovely and clean. Can’t wait to come back.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean-Beach  . We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  We look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary Heading: Very poor standard of accomodation at rip off prices
Summary: We had booked this place for a one night stay based on good reviews on trip advisor. Either the good reviews were from friends, family or those who are very easily pleased or perhaps we were given a room which had been forgotten about for the last 50 years. We had asked for and paid for a sea view room. We were given room 751, and although it was sea view, you had to ignore the initial view of a lower room's roof - not the biggest disaster. What was unforgivable however was the tiny accommodation space which was decorated like your Aunt Maude's clapped out  B & B in Blackpool, the damp and dirty bed linen and worst of all a badly broken light switch inside the bathroom which had exposed wiring. Had this hotel been in the UK it would have been shut down - no question. We did
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your experience. We followed up with both our Front Office Director and Director of Rooms ,let us know that you spoke to them  regarding this  and they addressed  it immediately. We apologize and we would like to reassure you that we have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay and we also understand the importance of feeling comfortable in the room.  Best Regards,

Summary: Loved the views from our room.  Pool was nice and warm if you don't like to swim in the ocean.  Staff was nice and helpful.  Would of loved more options for breakfast.  Walking distance to many shops and food.  We enjoyed our stay and would love to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear deniselopez2211,    We are pleased to hear that you you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Vintage Stay Directly on the Beach
Summary: Its all about location here.That's one of the only ways to justify the price per room. The staff is also extremely nice and helpful. We appreciated the cheese and wine on the deck in the evening, it helped fuel a walk on the beach down below.  A pro and con is also the location directly on PCH. Pro - great for walking to restaurants and shops (don't forget the free trolley). Con - it can be noisy at night if your room is on the road side which ours was. We were serenaded at night by a Karaoke bar when trying to sleep. No fault of the hotel, but falling asleep to Cabaret and Sinatra's New York is pretty difficult.  Room was comfortable...yes dated, but you can tell the staff really try to keep them clean and as up to date as possible. I'm not sure when the property was built, yet
Manager Response: Dear LMicheleS,  We are pleased to hear that you you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too.  We took on consideration all of your remarks. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Capri Laguna is a a great beachy getaway. It is an older property so it's got that that vintage vibe to it. If you don't need ultra modern perfection, then you would be very comfortable here. Our patio and view and the sound of the waves was SO relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear Cruiser21317457182,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.  Kind regards,

Summary: 2nd time staying here in the past two years and will try to make it a yearly thing! The location is awesome and they remember me by last name even after only a couple stays. Only 30 minutes away from airport and in a perfect location!!
Manager Response: Dear Seaside55116495290,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.   Kind regards,

Summary: Let me start off by saying the customer service is impeccable! There are few places that just 'get it right' and Capri Laguna is one of them. I hope I don't butcher the names too much but,Bachir and I think his name was Nich, were spectacular. I wish I would have gotten the name of the sweet female staff member that also helped me. They made it a perfect home away from home. Now,the views from the deck speak for themselves. Capri Laguna has become my own piece of paradise, complete with delicious coffee served in the lobby. I look forward to going back. Do yourself a favor and book a room asap!
Manager Response: Dear 12toriag,  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to see that you had such an enjoyable stay. We appreciate your business very much and look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the next time you are in the Laguna Beach area.   Kind regards,

Summary: Hubby and I went here for a quick get away. The check in process was easy and the staff very friendly. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable.  Sleeping with the sound of the ocean waves was the best.  The hotel is close to food and shopping too.
Manager Response: Dear Passenger01979917213,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean . We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your review. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Best part of this place is the location
Summary: Listening to the waves all night was worth the price.  This is a motel that has been upgraded with a very nice bathroom.  The bedroom is adequate. The people at the front desk were great.  When our TV wasn't working, they were very responsive on getting someone there.  Note that there are no phones in the rooms so if you want to call the front desk, you will need your cell.  We were there in perfect weather but if you needed AC, they would have had to connect it.  Parking is tight and they have another offsite option.  We didn't eat breakfast here but we saw people enjoying it.  Looked like it was pretty standard fare.
Manager Response: Dear shelleys88,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing waves. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your review. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A taste of Greece at Laguna Beach
Summary: An absolutely lovely stay in Room 501. This was the highest floor, one flight up from ground level with an ocean front room. We had a private balcony and just outside our door was a rooftop balcony for all guests to enjoy complete with the best view of the pool and the hills of Laguna in the background. The hotel surprised the guests with a wine and cheese reception and the owner surprised me with a vase of fresh cut flowers. With the white stucco walls leading down to the beach - 95 steps to be exact. I truly felt like I was in Greece. Every room requires several steps to beach access but they are private to the hotel. The parking seems secure unless you arrive late and have to park in one of their overflow lots a couple blocks away. Gina’s pizza is a few doors down and
Manager Response: Dear Sharon,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too,which I will be sure to share with our team.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: I travel frequently, mainly for business, so I’ve had a myriad of hotel experiences over the years. This summer I took my two boys (ages 8 and 12), my older mother (age 67), and my fiancé to stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. I never heard of the hotel previously, so I wasn’t sure what to expect. The minute we walked in the door to check-in Bachir, the front desk clerk, greeted us with a smile and an incredibly warm personality. He took time to search rooms that would be perfect for my family (we had two rooms) and really went over and above to make sure we were happy and comfortable. We stayed in the hotel for a week and experienced the same customer service and pleasantry from EVERY employee. In addition to Bachir, I’d like to mention Mafry, Maddi, Constantine, and
Manager Response: We are delighted  to hear that you and your family have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Summary Heading: Good stay at Capri Laguna on The Beach
Summary: Great stay, friendly staff and awesome location. Room is well furnished, spacious. A good place for families as well. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend this place. Special thanks to Nick and Madeline and all staff members.
Manager Response: Dear Kareem_Morris,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your review. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Overall excellent location and friendly staff.  I would recommend a more expensive "beach view" room.  Hotel could use some updating but the location is great and staff is accommodating and friendly.   My wife and I walked everywhere but it's about 1.5 miles round trip to downtown - then whatever else you walk to.
Manager Response: Dear GrandTour535851  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach . Summary: First time I been in Capri Laguna. I 100% enjoyed my time in there. Receptionist was so attentive and polite. She helped us to show our room. Room was clean and comfortable. Balcony was amazing, with ocean view   I had a feeling that I was in Italy, Capri Island.

Summary: My fiance and I had a wonderful 6 night stay this week. The room exceeded our expectations! The view was fantastic and the service was impeccable. Thanks so much to Bachir for making us feel welcome and attending to all our needs. He is a consummate pro!
Manager Response: Dear TimO1155,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us.
