Summary: The Capri Laguna had everything we wanted for our vacation stay. It started with a complimentary wine and cheese reception that is held on Friday nights. Mornings start with an extended continental breakfast—something for everyone. The chocolate croissants were a nice surprise. Our room was one of the ocean view rooms, but there are many rooms that offer peekaboo views. The manager as well as the entire staff were amazing and extremely helpful. Free parking in Laguna is always a bonus. This will be my choice for my annual Laguna vacation.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. Thank you so much, Yours in Hospitality

Summary: The service was great and so was the location. We plan to return next year. The view was fabulous and the room was attractive and comfortable. I recommend a room with a private balcony and ocean view.
Manager Response: Dear Coastal66613879598,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great Location!  Rooms Need an Update, but great value overall
Summary: This hotel has the most welcoming staff and the location is right on the water/sand side of the street.  The rooms are very clean, they just are a little bit dated, but the bedding is clean and comfortable.   The pool is heated year round and is a pleasure to enjoy.  You're steps to the ocean/sand and conveniently located close enough to town that you can walk to your destinations or use the free trolly bus on weekends--no DUI worries!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: From the moment my son and I walked in we were greeted by Constantine and Nick. Such a wonderful welcome they provided. Mafry was so helpful and went above and beyond to make sure we had umbrellas and chairs out on the beautiful beach side. This is hidden gem and I will always make sure to make my visits here. The hospitality and location cannot be matched.
Manager Response: Dear L8kerzgrl,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing ocean and our beautiful city. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: If you try to cancel a night even within a grace period of fee cancellation they will not honor it.  They want to to cancel entire reservation and rebook so they can charge you more.   I canceled my entire stay with them.  Beware if you use third party booking. They treat you bad.
Manager Response: Dear Dindi,   Thank you for providing us with your feedback. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Outdated hotel with great location + ocean views
Summary: Stayed at Capri with my partner for our anniversary during Memorial Day Weekend (sat - mon). First of all, the views and location were amazing. Loved the different patios/decks to hang out and look over the beach. Even if you don't book a room with an ocean view, there are plenty of spaces to enjoy the ocean view outside. The beach below is lovely (not too crowded) and super easy to access from the hotel. Considering the busy weekend, the hotel was always a quiet respite from busy downtown. It felt very private and isolated (never loud or hectic), which we loved. he free parking and breakfast were a major plus. Pretty good assortment of breakfast foods (you can make your own waffles, pancakes). Great location, easy to walk to the shops/restaurants downtown or take the free
Manager Response: Dear alexdesanto,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your detailed review and your suggestions, we took on consideration all of your remarks. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back again.  Kind regards,

Summary: A wonderfully located boutique hotel with top notch service.   The entire staff and management made our stay especially enjoyable.   If I am lucky enough to be back in the Laguna beach area.....I will definitely be staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Panos, We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you stay was specially enjoyable.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: This hotel was amazing! I thoroughly enjoyed staying here. I will be back and will stay here. The staff were very kind. The managers, Nick and Bachir were very friendly and helpful. Two very wonderful managers. The room was extremely clean. It was a big enough room for me. The views were amazing! You cannot beat the price for a hotel that is right on the beach. I was able to sit on their deck and watch the sunset. I enjoyed being able to walk down right to the beach. It is in walking distance of many shops and dining. I walked everywhere for my entire stay. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share such a wonderful review about your stay with us at Capri Laguna Beach. I am delighted to hear that you had memorable experiences . Oh behalf of our entire team, we look forward to giving you a warm welcome back on your next visit! Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Steps from a great beach with a fireplace.
Summary: One night trip felt like a long vacation. Had a swim in the ocean before the wine and cheese offering on the patio. Went out to dinner at Mozambique. Walked. Then went dancing at the bar across the street. Had a great time. Loved the fireplace and the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing us a review. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room,fireplace, wine and cheese and views. I appreciate your feedback about other aspects of your visit and will be sure to share your review with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Sincerely,

Summary Heading: True ocean front steps to the sand
Summary: Our friends stay here 2-3 times a year with their family and love it so we had to come see for ourselves. Have went thru countless reviews on all the most popular travel websites and read more positive reviews about this place than any other hotel on the California coast. Let me start with the size of the rooms and the location. Well OCEAN FRONT like really truly ocean front 2 min.  down the stairs and your feet will be in the sand. Would you like an umbrella with chairs....not a problem Counstatine will be more than happy to bring you some down to the beach. Our room has huge windows and a balcony all you see is ocean everywhere. Rooms are lovely plenty of room and full kitchen, table and chairs inside as well as outside. I didn’t notice any smell at all in our room read some
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you and your family have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too,which I will be sure to share with our team. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: We had the most amazing time at Capri Laguna. This was our second visit to the Capri. We love staying here not only for the oceanfront but also for the friendly staff and the walking distance to some really good restaurants and shops. Originally it was going to be just my husband and I and our kids but we invited my sister in law last minute so we went and talked with Nick at the front desk to see if there was any availability. He was so kind and courteous and gave us a really great rate for the rest of our family. We stayed in room 104 which is literally just steps away from the beach. The beach is gorgeous and there are chairs, towels, umbrellas & boogie boards available for no extra cost. The awesome beach servicemen are always asking if there is anything else they could get
Manager Response: Ms Brittany,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review(which I will be sure to share with our team)following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Nice rooms, nice location, excellent service. I will comeback and I highly recommended! very friendly staff. this is the second time I go there, and if I have to comeback, i will do it again. I would like to thanks to Mr. Politis for his help and excellent service.
Manager Response: Dear  Sheikh, Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon at our hotel.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: Beautiful location right on the beach. Couldn't have asked for a better location to spend a relaxing birthday vacation! Walking distance from the main area downtown with all of the restaurants. The staff were very helpful and kind, and the breakfast was nice! I would definitely stay here again, the next time I'm in Laguna!
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.   Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: What a hidden gem off busy PCH in Laguna. This little hotel is nestled right up to the surf and the sound of the waves sing you to sleep. We loved our stay here-the rooms have been nicely updated. The service is impeccable, Bashir was a wonderful and gracious host and made us feel special from the minute we checked in! This isn’t a place with a lot of pretense-it’s like your own little beach house, comfy and welcoming-definitely stay here to decompress and enjoy a casual, cozy SoCal get-away!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer, We are glad to hear that our  service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guest.We look forward welcoming you back soon. Sincerely,

Summary: Beautiful hotel to stay at! Extremely accommodating gave us an on the water room steps away from ocean.  Bashir at the desk was very helpful! Have heated pool and beautiful showers in the rooms.  Steps going down to beach and very comfortable beds
Manager Response: Dear Scarlett, We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon. Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: I found this hotel while looking for somewhere to stay while driving from San Diego to LA. The location is perfect- it is right on the beach and has a big deck you can sit on to watch the sunset. The staff members I met Bashier and Nick were very kind. The hotel is clean, offers free breakfast and parking, and has incredible views of the ocean!! I look forward to going back and spending more than one night there.
Manager Response: Dear angelar5086,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor for your recent stay at our Hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our services. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable experience.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Peaceful Visit to Capri Laguna on the Beach
Summary: Capri Laguna is not a big posh hotel, but a very clean and friendly boutique hotel reminiscent of the old style beach hotels of the past. It's clean, quiet, the staff is friendly, and there is a direct stairway route down to the beach with nearby tide pools bubbling with shoreline life. Assistant General Mgr. Bachir Atallah was most accommodating and knowledgeable about nearby dining and other attractions within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear BeachwoodDave,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: We found this boutique hotel to be quaint and cozy. We were in room 711 which was nestled down a narrow staircase, tucked out of the way with our own small balcony and a small deck outside our door that had an umbrella table and four chairs.  There were many plantings and sculptures around every corner, which added to the charm. This turned out to be a great spot to watch the sunsets while enjoying a cocktail.   They served breakfast in the lobby area each morning - cereal, yogurt, baked goods, etc and had a Starbucks coffee machine to serve yourself both coffee and hot chocolate.   The location was good with some great restaurants (Selanne Steak Tavern across the street $$$, but worth it, Driftwood Kitchen, oceanfront  with beautiful views......and cocktails and apps at The
Manager Response: Dear yayajojo2017,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is GREAT!! The view of the ocean is stunning especially in the evenings, when I could see the sunsets at the big deck drinking my wine!Very romantic and suitable for couples and for families too as  he beach is direct down of the hotel, providing a very safe environment with lifeguard, that letting your kids to enjoy their adventures in the ocean. I  loved the decoration of the hotel, so Mediterranean, brought me in another continent!!! The service was amazing, the people very friendly and willing to provide me with any comfort, especially the manager of the hotel Nick Politis and also the rest staff, Bachir and Konstantinos Politis were very polite and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Evi, Thank you so much for choosing the Capri! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you here again in the future.

Summary: Me and my family was so impressed with our stay at Capri. They treated us better than royalty the food was great, the accommodations and  don't have enough words to describe how good the service was. I can thank enough Bachir, Nikos Politis and Konstantinos Politis for making our vacation so memorable. This is a place that everyone should visit.
Manager Response: Dear Emly, Thank you so much for choosing the Capri! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you here again in the future.

Summary Heading: Relaxing Seaside Stay + Great Ohanafest Choice!
Summary: Fantastic choice for a long weekend and Ohanafest! Wonderful to hear the waves and walk down to the beach. Enjoyed their breakfast as a healthy start and then had gourmet food delivered by Gourmet Catering SoCal/Chocolate Fountain SoCal. Plenty of room for the event in the suite and on the balcony. Business and then romantic trip. Looking forward to this again in September!
Manager Response: Dear Gues, Thank you so much for choosing the Capri! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you here again in the future.

Summary: Great hotel, couldn’t better it’s position on the beach, spacious rooms well furnished with a kitchenette and daily maid service. Very friendly staff, helpful and efficient and the self service breakfast off reception had a tasty varied choice. It was our second visit and can’t wait to return. Sun beds on the beach are plentiful and the view from the beach side rooms is breathtaking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you so much for choosing the Capri! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you here again in the future.

Summary: It's my third visit to CA and I'm always staying in Capri Laguna on the Beach. The first time I went there was for my honeymoon and my first memorable stay there made me book it again for my next 2 visits for business purposes. The location is absolutely perfect (literally ON the beach), with an amazing view of the Pacific Ocean. The staff is very friendly and helpful! Bashir helped me a lot with a problematic delivery of my online purchases, which was highly appreciated. Nick, the manager, welcomes us always with a huge smile and his inherent politeness and willingness to be always at our service. I will definitely stay there in my next visits to LA and I totally recommend it to anybody who wants to stay at a convenient distance from both LA and San Diego.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind feedback! We are so happy to hear that your Laguna getaway at the Capri was special. We understand that deliveries and other factors can become complicated while you are traveling and strive to take the stress away from these factors. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Travel safely.

Summary Heading: DOESN’T GET BETTER THAN THIS PLACE!
Summary: I felt like I was in Greece. This hotel is beautiful!! There are many places to relax and have the most spectacular view of the ocean and Laguna’s beautiful coastline. The owner, Nick, was very very friendly and made sure our stay was everything and then some. I won’t stay anywhere else in Laguna Beach after this trip. Solo or with my family. Book it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your Capri Laguna experience! We are so happy that we were able to make your visit memorable. We look forward to seeing you the next time you come to Laguna Beach.

Summary: I spent the past weekend at Capri Laguna with my friends. We had a very enjoyable time. The service was exceptional. For breakfast there was a great variety to choose from. The location was great and the views breathtaking. The manager Nick, was excellent at suggesting near by places to dine in and find entertainment. The stuff  (Bashir, Cadence, Constantine) was really helpful at answering  my questions. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us at the Carpi Laguna! We enjoyed having you here and hope to see you again soon. Travel safely!

Summary: Quirky place, not very much like any newer chains. Nice room, great view, great people, great access to the beach and LB proper.  They will set up an umbrella and some chairs on the beach for you.  Easily walk to any restaurants or shops.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Capri Laguna. Please travel safely and come back to visit us soon.

Summary: We stayed at Capri Laguna for our anniversary for the weekend and it was an amazing stay. The hotel is right on the beach. Highly recommend this place for the prize. Cadence, Nick & Joz we’re we so great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Capri! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you here again in the future.

Summary: Lovely room, great location. Amazing ocean views. We would come again and invite others. Even breakfast was good. We came during cool weather, and this on-beach location must be ideal in the summer during hot weather.
Manager Response: Dear Connector467894,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing ocean and our beautiful city. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: I travel a lot for business. I was in Orange County for a conference when I discovered this hidden gem on the beach. The view is unbeatable. From the balcony you could hear the waves and see the mesmerizing sunset. Nick and his team (Bachir,Cadence,Constantine) went above and beyond to make my stay unforgettable. I will definitely come back !
Manager Response: Dear SamanthaGrvs,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: We enjoyed our 3rd stay at Capri Laguna and look forward to many more visits.  The office staff, Nick, jozy, cadence and Bachir were very friendly and helpful.  The rest of the staff was very helpful and friendly as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind feedback regarding your stay! We have enjoyed having you here and look forward to hosting you again in the future. Travel safely!

Summary: I liked the hotel since it did remind me of Italy. Negatives: The room was a little damp and in order to enjoy the view you had to share it with 2 other rooms. Kind of odd. The balconies are all connected with only a white vinyl fence separating them. Pros: Right on the water. Great complimentary coffee/continental breakfast and friendly staff. Definitely an older hotel. I will try someplace else when I go back just to see if this is the standard for the area and price we paid.
Manager Response: Dear Slickidd,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We took on consideration all of your remarks. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Great location with beautiful view right on the beach with the sound of the surf below us. The staff were really friendly to us. Gave us a great rate for a lovely room after calling ahead. Direct access to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear PaulY492,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri is a hidden gem. It’s right on the ocean with waves crashing underneath our balcony. We were steps from a sandy beach and had amazing sunset. Our room was large with a kitchenette that had everything. The bathroom was nicely remodeled. The owner or manager Nick was gracious and very friendly and welcoming. Mary has everything ready for us when we arrived (even my birthday flowers that were delivered were on our kitchen table). We will definitely be coming back to this little piece of heaven.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara A,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: We were very happy with our weekend stay at Capri Laguna. It was evident the staff at every level was focused on providing a great customer experience. I appreciated the free upgrade to a room with a beautiful ocean view on a Sunday night. The room had a stunning view of the ocean and we were able to enjoy the sound of the waves all night. The location is very convenient to downtown especially with the free public shuttle with a stop outside the hotel. Only downside is the stairs with no elevators. However the staff is very helpful and available to assist with luggage. I highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear lindadM1136KX,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed for a long weekend. Every staff member we encountered was incredibly helpful and nice. They upgraded our room to ocean view, it was amazing! Room had a comfortable bed, microwave, and fridge. We could hear the waves as we fell asleep and woke. Just steps from our room to the beach. The property had many patios to choose from in order to enjoy the sunset. Parking was free, which is rare in Laguna. Overflow parking was not a challenge. They had a heated pool and complementary breakfast, but we didn't partake in either. Mostly just sat around and took in the view! Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear kimberlybeee,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more sunsets and ocean views.   Kind regards,

Summary: I had a chance in January 2019 to visit Laguna Beach, CA for the first time, and to stay at the Capri Laguna On The Beach.  It did not disappoint.    When we arrived we were greeted personally by the General Manager, Nick Politis, and his front desk staff.  Mr. Politis is the consummate old school hotel manager, impeccable in his dress and personality. Check in was a breeze and he was able to upgrade our accommodations!    By the time we reached our room, there was a bouquet of roses and a personal note from Mr. Politis welcoming us to his hotel. Talk about feeling like a VIP!  As with many beachfront properties in the area, the topography of the shore dictates that the ground level entrance is actually an upper floor, with lower floors sloping down to the beach.  In other
Manager Response: Dear 697blainec  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star detailed review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you one again for choosing us and The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: The staff is great. Josy and Nick were super helpful. We got a room upgrade for free!!!   The breakfast is the basic continental breakfast.  Most of the hotels in the area don't give free parking and free breakfast. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear ESLTeacherCA,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Lovely location and great views.  a special thank you to Josk for all her attention to detail and suggestions within Laguna to do and see. The special wine and cheese during the sunset was an added bonus.  The breakfast in the morning was just enough to get us out walking on the lovely morning.
Manager Response: Dear Trip91169,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed here for one night in a room with an ocean view, fireplace, and king bed. The bed was very comfortable and the fireplace was a unique and nice feature. The view from the room was spectacular and we enjoyed our coffee looking out at the Pacific. The balconies are private which is nice. The hotel is clearly remodeled, so there is still evidence of the original older construction. This didn't bother me particularly. The complimentary breakfast was better than anticipated. The room was pretty clean and the bed was absolutely spotless.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen C,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one night exploring laguna beach and enjoying my time. The views and the atmosphere were amazing. The hotel does have a very calming effect and is centrally located in Laguna Beach (restaurants, cafes, etc.).   The problem is the cost vs service and state of the room. The rooms have not been renovated in a while. They do have the old feeling but the peeling paint and kitchen are still 1970. The breakfast feels like a cheap $50/night 2 star hotel. I ended up going out for breakfast and despite the hotel claiming the breakfast is included you will not get much. Lastly don't get tricked by the sandy beach. The sand is there supposedly only during the season. The rest of the year the beach is rocky.   Overall I did enjoy my stay, the sound of the ocean and
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Laguna Beach is a favorite getaway of ours, and we have stayed in several different hotels.  I must say that this is my favorite.  Bachir at the front desk was very welcoming and helpful.  We got a partial ocean view room, which was spacious and comfortable.  It had a big window with a view of the ocean, and a patio door to our own little balcony.  There is also a lovely shared deck where you can relax and watch the sunset.  The pool is nice and the whole pool area is very clean.  This is an older property, as most places in Laguna are, but it has been very nicely remodeled and well maintained. There is some road noise, which you should expect when you stay on PCH, so just bring earplugs if you're a light sleeper.
Manager Response: Dear DSSanDiego,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had an amazing stay at Capri Laguna! We stayed in an ocean view room and it was absolutely beautiful. We watched the sunset from the balcony and saw dolphins as the sun was setting. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. Nick is the man! The free breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Dear David R,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you truly enjoyed your stay with us. Summary: Capri Laguna is primely located in Laguna Beach, not far from the action, but far enough to where we get a good night's sleep with the family. It was pleasant to have Wine and Cheese, which is every Friday, with Nick. Mafry at the front desk answered any questions we had on what to do around the city. Great staff, and an unforgettable experience. Thank you!

Summary: Excellent mini vaca. Great all around service. Bed and bath clean and comfortable. Small cars only because big trucks are hard to get in the spaces. Great continental breakfast. Would recommend and will stay again!

Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Loved our stay at the Capri; actually on the beach in Laguna!  The Manager: Nick who we met several years ago before he became the manager, is awesome! He remembers every time we call, to come stay with them, all our favorite rooms. Check in is simple and the room is perfect! The service is always on point, with our request. Night or day the front desk is ready to help.  We want to thank Nick and the staff for always making our stay perfect!!!
Manager Response: Dear Vic T,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: This place was great for the price and for the value.  It's definitely not new but it gets the job done on location and proximity to the beach!  I'd return just because you can walk to the beach right off the hotel.  And that's all i needed.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Needs to be promoted & priced as bargain old hotel
Summary: I am sure that a long time ago this hotel was the cream of the crop.  Now it is a run-down, smelly hotel.  I would have given it 1 star but the staff are excellent. They went out of their way to help us find a room that suited us.  We have pet allergies and it was clear that animals (we are sensitive) were in most of the rooms.  They tried hard and eventually we chose a room by the ocean with fresh air, it just cost us another $150 on top of the $310 we already paid for a partial view (did not qualify for partial in my opinion).  This ended up being the most expensive hotel of our trip.  We stayed in a luxury type hotel in Vegas for 3 nights that cost us less than this place.  I was hesitant to write a review because the staff were so pleasant, however, I also spent $500 on a
Manager Response: Dear Lovethe beaches4,  Thank you for providing us with your detailed feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: We loved staying at the Capri in Laguna. The views and beach access were perfect! We loved being right at the beach with easy access to restaurants and shopping. The rooms were clean. The staff was wonderful! Everyone was very pleasant and helpful throughout our stay. We extended our stay because we didn’t want to leave. Our kids will miss Nick as he spoiled them with attention and sweets. We hope to return soon. Thank you for a lovely vacation.

The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I and our daughter and her husband spent 9 nights in 2 units here over Christmas.  The staff are amazing and Nick the manager was always around and giving tips on the area.  The rooms are large and many different layouts.  The hotel is unique with a Greek villa presence.  We chose beachfront and loved it.  The rooms could use updates but the units were very clean and our decks were amazing.  There is a laundry onsite and a pretty good breakfast.  There are a lot of stairs but staff will help with luggage and some units do not require stairs to access them.

Summary: I can’t say that I’ve written many reviews that have been less than 4 star rating.  I felt compelled to write a review due to the online photos of the nice rooms! We traveled here with our family - beautiful setting, excellent views - scary room!  The door would not close - felt like it had been kicked in and did not fit the door frame properly anymore.  My son slept in the pull out sofa - next to the door and could hear the traffic as if the door was left open.  The carpet was crusty and squeaked when you walked across the room.  The sliding doors led to a balcony area where all the second floor rooms opened up to.  No privacy!!  We enjoyed the music and conversations from the room next door into the wee hours!  When we arrived we asked the front desk person if there were any

Summary: Excellent place to stay in Laguna Beach. Nick was really amazing at helping us. It is literally on the beach with a breathtaking view!. We would definitely stay there again.   Best greetings from Greece

Summary: Really loved this hotel❤️ Great location about 8 blocks from Main Street and right over the water. We got the King bedroom which was much roomier than I expected with nice sitting area and mini kitchen. The bed was really comfortable, large TV, and all the basics covered. What I really appreciated was that 2 rows of hotel rooms were separated by a large deck that had amazing Catalina Island and ocean views just steps from our room. Our car has bike racks on top so we couldn’t park under the building but to our surprise the hotel owns a good size open air lot on the next block. Parking was not a problem. We didn’t eat their breakfast but it looked good. The staff was exceptional and took care of every need. They deserve a 5 star rating. Laundry room on the premises was cheap and
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: We had an oceanfront room with a balcony overlooking the ocean which was a lovely view. But the room was very basic, like a standard motel room. The price was $350/ night which when you add on all the taxes and resort fees, it came to $450/ night, so I thought it would be luxurious. It was not. The breakfast was the usual stale pastry offerings that you get at all motels. They do have a pancake machine that plopped out two tough pancakes. The Starbucks machine produced very good coffee. The hotel is on a steep cliff, so if you have a room on the 100 level, you have to walk down several flights of stone steps. They have staff to help you with the luggage . The beach that’s shown on their website has washed away, and at high tide the water is all the way up to the wall. That
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved Capri Laguna! The staff, Nick and Constantine and others, were very friendly and welcoming. We had a view of the pool and of the ocean from our balcony deck. It was December but that meant no crowds but great weather. Also we had free breakfast every morning. There was a beach in front of our hotel and also a short walk to shops and restaurants. Perfect weekend!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon at our hotel.

Summary: Execellent Views and walk to Town and amazing front desk staff and friendly maids! Oeanview is worth the extra expense and waking up hearing the ocean is incredible =} Sun set and snacks are sweet touch to a great experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Mafry, Concierge, made all the difference!
Summary: We were greeted and check in by Mafry, the concierge--extremely efficient, professional and hospitable. Amenities explained, porter services offered and even gave us a bottle of wine so we wouldn't have to wander around @ night. When we returned from dinner, she asked us how our evening was going. Beautiful view. Easy walk to the beach. Room was clean. Highly recommend. Would return & stay again. Very good value for groupon.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome Staff, Great hotel, great location!
Summary: This is the third time we've stayed at Capri Laguna Hotel, and it certainly won't be the last! The hotel staff is great (special shout out to Nick the General Manager), and the location can't be beat. The rooms are clean and tidy, and we love being right on the beach. Thank you again for a wonderful hotel stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I cant say enough about this hotel. I always choose to stay here when I am in town for work. First off, the staff is incredible. Nick, the General Manager ALWAYS goes out of his way to make sure you have the best experience. Very hospitable, genuine and always makes sure you feel welcome and are comfortable. He's the best. The entire staff is great and always provides the best service. The rooms are always very clean and comfortable and the BEST views. great location can walk to everything. Parking is easy. The ocean views are perfect and I love the upper and lower terraces. I cant wait to come back again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Welcome to Greece in Laguna Beach...
Summary: Beloved Nick, It was a sincere pleasure meeting you in person.  The room was fabulous but more than that your genuine & warm welcoming personality was priceless.  I’m definitely coming back again sooner than expected. Very truly yours, Turk
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a great stay! BEST LOCATION EVER! GREAT VIEWS! Great beds! Very Clean! The staff was very friendly. Especially I would like to THANK YOU to Mafry. I was so exciting they have all kinds of tea and 24hr Starbucks coffee at lobby. When I accidentally spilled a whole cup of coffee at lobby, I felt terrible cuz the lobby was really clean. But Mafry was very kind to said it happens all the time and she just took care of that right away. I'm sure it does not happed all the time. =) She was so sweet. Thank you Mafry! Sufficient breakfast! the room was very clean. I'll definitely stay here again and would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Laguna
Summary: Staying at Capri Laguna is like having a friend in Capri who invites you stay with them!  I stayed there on Thursday night 11/29 and had such a nice stay I invited two friends to join me on Saturday 12/1. I’ve never done that before! Everyone we came in contact with could not have been more accommodating. Nick Politis, General Manager, you sir are a true gentleman. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an amazing stay in June. General Manager, Nick Politis even went the extra mile to make sure our visit was a pleasant one. We had an ocean front room, which was clean and well kept. I was obsessed with the coconut shampoo and conditioner that are provided for use during our stay - a nice tropical touch.  The views from the balcony were amazing. We loved the fact that the hotel has patios above the beach that we could relax on with tables and chairs. The hotel is a nice walk - via the beach or via PCH to downtown Laguna. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just got married and decided to spend a couple of days in California before our official honey moon. Due to the fires going on at the moment we had no hotel or food reservations for one whole day. Luckily we ended up in the Capri Hotel in Laguna Beach. Josy and Mafry made sure the natural inconvenience did not ruin a day of our special vacation. They made sure we got our room before check in and gave us a room with a balcony! After the check in process was done Josy showed us where the best places to eat and drink walking distance were. Who ever comes to Laguna Beach make sure you stay at the Capri hotel. Very good customer service!

We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Get yourself to Capri!! The one in Laguna Beach, that is......
Summary: Didn't exactly know what to expect, but I was highly impressed with my weekend get-a-way at the Capri Laguna, a mid-20th Century (kept up in pristine condition!) beach front hotel built onto a cliff side overlooking a private Pacific cove. Having a uniquely different feel than the surrounding hotels, and making me feel like I was really on an Italian trip, the staff led by Nick, Constantine and Mafry were all very friendly and accommodating.   The lush hillside grounds were enchanting with narrow paths, and Greco-Roman statues leading you down to the beach. Umbrellas and chairs were provided on the beach, and there was also a small, but charming heated swimming pool (if your shark fears are as strong as mine! The few local surfer boys didn't seem to share that fear.)  A

Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more sunsets and ocean views.   Kind regards,

Summary: What a fantastic experience we had staying at the Capri. On the sand, ocean views, and step onto to one of the most gorgeous beaches. Walking distance to everything. Surprise fresh red roses with personalized letter in the room after checking in... very nice touch ! (Thank you again!) We stayed in a king suite and it was very well appointed, clean and bright with two sliding glass doors out to the large balcony to view the incredible sunsets on the ocean. Kitchenette with dining table. Breakfast was pretty standard; fruit, boiled eggs, oatmeal, waffles, assorted breads that were very good (chocolate croissant was fresh and delish). Starbucks machine is top notch. Nick, the manager, was very gracious and genuinely warm and friendly. Mafry, at the front desk, was very pleasant

Many thanks to General Manager Nick (the absolute best), Constantine, Bashir, Mafry, Sylvia and the whole crew, you spin magic!✨ Here it is November, we are enjoying beautiful sunny days and the ocean swimming is great too! Summary: The staff at this hotel are really very helpful and friendly. A very nice gesture is that offer refreshments in the front desk area. The size of the rooms are generous, and beds comfortable. Also the beachfront location is lovely... All the great restaurants are in walking distance. However, it should be stressed that this is a very animal friendly hotel... And you can really smell it. I love animals and dogs in particular, and I'm not a guest that ever likes to complain, but i had to move to 3 different rooms because the smell of wet dog was seeping out of the carpet. Like I said, the staff are very friendly and understanding. Keep in mind I stayed at the hotel in 2017 so this may been corrected.

Summary: Great choice if you want the PCH on one side and the Pacific Ocean on the other!  The staff here is super friendly (Bachir, I’m lookin’ at you!) and the rooms are nicely appointed. No, they’re not huge but, hello?, you’re at the beach. So head out of the room and go to the shark’s house! Oh, breakfast is included, and there are a lot of solid options.

Summary Heading: We loved our stay at Capri Laguna!
Summary: We had a fantastic time at Capri Laguna Beach!  The hotel is charming, the stucco architecture beautiful.  Our room had a beautiful view of the coastline.  We fell asleep to the waves crashing :)  Thank you to all of the staff, especially Bachir and Nick who were very helpful.  We can't wait to return!

Summary Heading: Cute boutique hotel on the beachfront!
Summary: This is a cute, retro boutique property right on the beachfront. Price is very reasonable considering the area and being ON the beach. The hotel needs a little maintenance, being a bit older, but it appeared as though they were currently doing a bit of work to update and repair it. Our room, as well as the rest of the hotel was very clean. Our only complaints about our specific room was 1) the front door was very loose in the jamb and didn't feel overly safe/secure, and 2) with the door facing PCH and a local bar, was VERY loud at night with music and karaoke from next door. Breakfast was typical continental, with pastries, cereal, etc. Ocean views from (some of) the rooms as well as the rooftop balcony was stunning! We ate breakfast out there every morning and would go watch

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at Capri Laguna. The staff, especially Bachir and Nick were so accommodating and helpful.  The view, beach access and different areas to sit and enjoy the view made it so relaxing. The breakfast was excellent, plenty of room to sit, lots of good choices and Starbucks fresh brewed coffee.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel with an Exceptional Staff
Summary: We only stayed for one night but the experience was wonderful.  Both GM Nick Politis and AGM Bachir Atallah went way above and beyond to make our stay a memorable one.  We had booked the room on Livingsocial.  Upon our arrival we were told that they would be giving us a free upgrade.  The room we got was outstanding, much more than I had expected.  It had a king size bed and a private balcony overlooking the beach.  The room was spacious with a small kitchen.  It was very clean and comfortable and everything we could have hoped for.  It even had a walk in shower large enough for two.  The staff was all very friendly and helpful.  I cannot think of anything that would have made this experience any better.  Thank you very much Nick and Bachir.

Summary Heading: A Gem on the Pacific Highway
Summary: Overall our experience here was first class. To our spacious room, to the ocean view patio everything was perfect.  Checking in we met Nick the GM from the east coast, Elena and Josy who handled our check-in / check-out and anything we needed, this place is perfect.  Easy access to a great beach, restaurants up and down the street, and the morning breakfast in the lobby is excellent. You must try the "push button" pancake maker that makes two absolutely delicious pancakes.... make your own waffles, juices, pastry, coffee and more.  Eat by the pool or on the ocean view deck..... simply perfect.

Summary: Laguna beach was a very pleasant experience and the Capri was a nice hotel. It's located right on the beach and our room had a nice balcony with ocean view. There is a small but nice pool that our kids loved an the ocean is just a few steps away.  Breakfast was included and that was much appreciated since we were jet lagged.  The only minor downside was that our room smelled a bit damp After opening up the windows this wasn't a big issue.

Summary: The Capri is a cute hotel directly on the beach.  The location is amazing. The hotel staff is great!   The room was large and the view was nice, but there is a club across the street and they were blasting loud, dance music until about 2am. This is probably only an issue on the weekend, and it would be less of an issue for rooms that were further from the street and closer to the ocean.  I would recommend the hotel better insulate the door to help stop the noise.  Other than that, our stay was great.  Thanks for the hospitality, the warm cookies at check in were a nice touch.

Summary: This is a lovely small hotel in a great lovatoon. The room was super clean, with fluffy towels and good sheets. The hotel is right on the ocean. A great small hotel with very friendly staff. It is also reasonably priced.

Summary Heading: Amazing couples trip for family wedding experience and beach time.
Summary: We had a great stay and were really impressed with both the small intimate feel of this wonderful beach hotel and the large scale and attention to detail. The room was very large, comfortable bed, great cleaning crew, great amenities in the room (TV, Iron, Products, Couch, Air Conditioner, Towels, Robes and Slippers, and the best was the complimentary breakfast buffet as well as the outdoor pool with the seating area and enclosed lounge chairs. Breakfast could be eaten in the lounge w/ couches, chairs and tables facing the pool and further out the ocean.  They had a really nice selection of breakfast items on the go and made it easy for you to be independent.   Newspapers, magazines, games, you name it were available and the location was wonderful; so close to everything,

Summary: We had a ocean view which was amazing to sleep to the sound of the waves .The staff were friendly and very helpful and made it a very relaxing stay. Will definitely go back  If you want 5 star and all modern cons this is not for you as the rooms are comfortable but basic but the view and the friendly staff make up for this .The pool is small but adequate as you have the ocean right on your doorstep ,.There are quite a few stairs so not suitable if you have mobility issues .

Summary: This hotel is in a great location right on the beach and walking distance to restaurants. However, the room we got was average at best. First the bolt lock wasn't working. Someone tried to come in to our room, I believe it was a staff person who used a card key. But still, you'd want to feel safe. The AC was broken and thankfully they replaced it right away with a new unit. Our room didn't have an ocean view - we had small windows and the largest one faced the parking lot, Thankfully we didn't hear too much noise from the road or cars.  The room was ok, but dated and the location of the room made it feel like we were in a basement. Paying over $300 a night for the room, I didn't think it was worth it.   The breakfast was fine - fruit, cereal, waffles and pancakes.   The pool was
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a deck room with a view and it was amazing! Sleeping with the sound of the waves was heavenly. The deck was quiet and so nice. My husband and I stayed here for our anniversary and we were able to sit on the deck with some drinks and watch the sunset. The location is great, walkable to so many things. The room was clean and I really liked having a fridge and a microwave for leftovers. It was a great experience. I already want to go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Just a perfect time at Capri Laguna
Summary: Since the check in until the check out our experience was  Amazing. The view of my bedroom was so perfect! The staff is very friendly, always smiling and worried about our happiness. I wish I can come back soon with my family again.

Summary: As my title states, our family of 4 enjoyed a quiet relaxing stay at the Capri for 3 nights in August.  We were pleased with our upgrade to an upper beachfront room.  It was clean and spacious, with a very (very!) comfortable bed, large shower, nice bathroom amenities, pretty decor and a killer view.  The room was carpeted, despite the trend toward more sanitary laminate flooring, but very clean nonetheless.   Pros:  quiet location, onsite parking, breakfast available, small hotel = friendly, personal service Cons:  far from central Laguna, wifi spotty in room, very noisy portable air conditioning, $35/day resort fee  Although we enjoyed our stay here, it's doubtful that we'd stay again, based on the location and the extra fees.  It really is a long walk to central Laguna and

Summary: I visited the Capri with my husband and 3 year old daughter last week. We enjoyed our time at this hotel. The room and grounds were lovely, a rustic ambiance. We will definitely visit the Capri again on our next trip to Laguna.

Summary: This boutique hotel was the perfect location for our family getaway.  Perfect beach access and views.  The service was great.  This would be a great romantic getaway.  Close to downtown, but far enough away that the beach in front is quiet and not crowded.

Summary Heading: Truly my favorite beach-front get away!!!
Summary: We have stayed at Capri Laguna on multiple times over the past few years.  It is truly our favorite beach-front hotel!!!  We have spent more on 5-star hotels in the Laguna Niguel and Dana Point area.  However, my husband and I always compare those experiences to the personal touches, welcoming staff, and beautiful location that Capri Laguna offers.  Hands down, Capri Laguna is our choice for a warm, friendly, relaxing and romantic destination.

Summary Heading: Good- Get a Discount Rate and Confirm Room Type
Summary: The location of Capri is great.  It is right on the beach, which on this trip had some nice waves coming to shore.   Plus, it is near some restaurants and bars. There is a cool photo, in the lobby, of the Capri Laguna taken in the 50s.  It had a fun mid-century feel, with a little hollywood vibe.  It would have be great if the owner of Capri had maintained or revived this look and feel to make the hotel unique and special.  Let me get to the my experience... The parking is rough.  I had to park on the street (with a meter)  to check-in because there were no spaces near the lobby. I was given a parking pass for a lot a block away.     Although I purchased a beachfront room, my room ended up being an odd shaped  one in the north area of the hotel (it looks like two hotels were

Summary Heading: Eh... on the hotel but great view and beach.
Summary: If you are thinking high level rooms with a view you are half right... loved the view but rooms need a complete overhaul for this type of rate. Convenient spot and staff was solid. I loved the intimate balconies with views but breakfast was a low end holiday inn express type and expect a lineup for the coffee.. looks like they are cutting costs here. I personally would try other places though it has potential to be a really cool spot just needs about 200k of investment to justify the rates.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Management is amazing. Oceanfront views are breathtaking. I love the patios
Summary: This hotel is really a gem. We wanted oceanfront views and both rooms we stayed in felt like we were on a cruise ship. So wonderful to wake up and open the patio door to experience the tranquility of the waves rolling up on shore. The manager left a bouquet of roses recognizing it was a special occasion and that we had to go through some struggles to get a room on the busy holiday weekend. Parking was tough as the hotel was booked completely but they jumped to accommodate us. We were even late for breakfast and the manager made a special plate for us. Wow 100% service and 100% for location. We will be back to our secret gem on the pacific.

We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: This was my first time visiting Laguna Beach and I could not have picked a better hotel!  Nick and the staff provided me with excellent customer service throughout my stay and placed me in an amazing ocean-view room.  This is a true beach hotel in every sense.  The recently renovated bathroom was beautiful and the Hawaiian Tropic amenities were awesome.  The housekeeping staff keeps everything in perfect shape! Waking up and seeing the Ocean and then walking a few steps down to the beach was heaven!  The breakfast in the lobby was an extra added perk that I did not expect (loved the waffles). The hotel is located close to all the shops and restaurants of Laguna and is a must stay for anyone coming to Laguna.  I am planning another trip to Laguna, and Capri is the hotel for me!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is an older property, but the rooms are clean, beds are great, and plenty of water pressure for a refreshing shower after the beach. Most rooms have a view, but not all of them so reserve accordingly. The rooms without views are actually fine because there are balcony's with seating to view sunsets, surf, and have a glass of wine. If you have a walking disability this is not for you as there is no elevator. They have a continental breakfast; pancakes, waffles, hard boiled eggs, oatmeal, coffee, juice, as well as yogurt and cereal. Laguna is known for their excellent cuisine. Walking distance to Sapphire, Sellane's Steak house, 230 Forrest, Waterman,  and a short drive is the amazing Studio at the Montage, if you have to have the finest (jacket required). The best thing is
Manager Response: Dear Robin,   Thank you for your review, we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you back soon here!

Summary: Friendly, helpful staff. Great location right on the beach. Clean, comfortable room overlooking the ocean. Free wifi.  The restaurants nearby (1. K'ya Bistro (tapas) and 2. Avila's El Ranchito (Mexican)) recommended by the friendly desk clerk (Mafry) were both excellent.  Small maintenance issue with the window covering in the kitchen area of the room was taken care of quickly.   Other small problems: shower temperature control did not work well and the shower drain backed up a bit.
Manager Response: Dear Sagehen2021,   Thank you for your review!  We appreciate you coming to stay with us here at the Capri.  We have addressed the issues mentioned, and always look forward to seeing you here again at the hotel!

Summary: Bashir, Nick and Constantin were fantastic hosts, and the hotel is furnished well, and not to mention a fantastic location on the beach! Could not have asked for a better stay, especially after we had a problem with our previous hotel.
Manager Response: Dear JGJG1004,   Thank you for your review!  We are so pleased to have made your stay much more comfortable; we hope that we can accommodate you again in the future!

Summary: Capri Laguna is in a great location. Free Laguna Shuttle access right out front. Great stretch of beachfront that is a bit less crowded during peak season. Constantine is a great help on the beach to make sure you have all you need with chairs, umbrellas, towels. Dog friendly! Staff always has a smile to great you. Thank you Nick and Bachir. We look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear jenanderson7,   Thank you so much for continuing to come and spend your time with us here at the Capri!  We are pleased to make your relaxing getaway on the beach just a little more special.

Summary Heading: It’s right on the sand of the beach!
Summary: This is a very nice little hotel to stay in Laguna.  You litter walk out to the beach from your room on one side and the sidewalk to browse the local eateries, boutiques and bookstore on the other side!  The staff are friendly and the rooms are clean and comfortable if a little portable AC doesn’t bother you.   I would recommend K’ya Bistro for tapas, a light meal style to share.    There are many little clothing boutiques that offer quality clothing for a good price.  The bookstore is a great place to stop and find a good book for the beach.  Koffee Klatch is a must stop fir something refreshing or something hot and caffeinated.
Manager Response: Dear emlazo,  We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay, the sound of the ocean and our city. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Cute place overall - clean beds , pillows were sub par  Locations cannot be beat  Parking was really tight  Need more beach chairs set out  Breakfast was nice   Our room was fine - the place was barely occupied the nights we were there - why no upgrade me?
Manager Response: Dear mandaleese,  We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: I recently spent one night at Capri Laguna on my way down the Pacific Coast highway. This is a charming boutique hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much. The rooms were clean, and the service was excellent. Nick, the general manager was very nice and friendly. He upgraded us to a room with an ocean view and even sent flowers with a sweet note.  The hotel is directly on the beach and within walking distance to many restaurants, bars, and shops. I look forward to staying here next time I am in Laguna. Thank you again Tony and the entire staff!
Manager Response: Dear Alicia P,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect Staff & Location, but outdated and not the cleanest.
Summary: We stayed one night while we were in between Anaheim and San Diego, on August 16, 2018. The owner was PHENOMENAL. He upgraded our room for free and was very genuine. I'd love to give this hotel 5 stars, but it's just not. Our room was very musty and the carpets (they should just do all tile since there is sand everywhere) were very dirty. My husband's feet were black on the second day, and it was not from the beach. The cleanliness was so-so. There were 2 swamp coolers, which probably contributed to the musty smell. Outlets were hard to find. Overall, it was okay, but I'm not sure we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Dana S,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. Thank you once more for staying with us and we hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Our room was the worst hotel room we have ever stayed in. If it was located anywhere besides Laguna Beach I would be afraid to spend a night in this room. The entrance to the room was straight off the parking lot and the door fit very loosely in the frame with light pouring in around 3 sides. The entry way to the room was down a few steps with chipped tile flooring. The window treatments don't align well with the windows and the windows on the back side of the room where the bathroom and sink are were frosted, but didn't have any cover at all.  The bed felt exactly like a cheap fold out couch, it creaked and squeaked every time we moved and offered no support at all. The sandpaper sheets paired perfectly with the uncomfortable cardboard and spring mattress.  They have very
Manager Response: Dear skimamf,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. Thank you once more for staying with us and we hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: My family has been going to the Capri Laguna for years. Just spent a wonderful weekend there with my mom and sister. The beach front room was spectacular and we fell asleep to the sound of the waves every night. Friday night was a lovely complementary wine and cheese happy hour on the rooftop. The general manager Nick was fantastic and made sure we were taken care of the entire weekend. Can't recommend this place enough!
Manager Response: Dear laurendorax,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had an excellent time at this hotel. the room was spacious and clean, the location was great and the meals were delicious. The room I got was very modern with the basic amenities and they actually worked (the microwave and mini fridge, they really helped us save a few buck)s. The staff awesome!!! These guys were great and very helpful. It was nice to actually interact with them. All in all it was a great experience and an excellent getaway.  I look forward in returning here one day.
Manager Response: Dear Deonne H,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great location, with a beautiful room w a view
Summary: My two boys and I decided to take a last minute overnight trip to Laguna Beach. I called a few places and Capri Laguna seemed to have the best last minute rates with excellent accommodations in a great location. We loved our stay. Location was amazing right on the beach. The room was clean and the staff was very friendly and accommodating. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Anna T,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Had a wonderful stay. Came  to enjoy the Laguna Arts festival and just relax  oceanfront.  We had a beach front king room with pull out...amazing to sleep with the ocean crashing outside and eat on our balcony while watching the sunset. It is a nice stretch of beach that isn't crowded with plenty of umbrellas and chairs. There are a few places on patios with tables and umbrellas to enjoy the view.  What a memorable time for my sister, Mom and me. We will definitely return. Loved having the microwave and refrigerator. The management was terrific, helpful and friendly. Nice complimentary breakfast in the morning. All in all great value for the experience.
Manager Response: Dear mflynn63,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Overpriced ancient hotel on the bluffs with Wifi. Only in Laguna in August.
Summary: Beware the trip advisor or priceline $299 specials as those are rooms on the road. If you want a room with a view of the ocean...and closer to the ocean... it will cost you $500 per night. The pool is not much bigger than a puddle and adjoins the lobby. There are four levels to the rooms to maximise the number of them "with a view of the ocean". If you accept room 101 there are four flights of stairs ro navigate, no elevator. Parking? Unless you one of the first ten or so to check in that day you will find yourself unloading the baggage and parking a block away. And walking back. Once back you learn the difficulty in dragging luggage down and then back up later forty-four steps. At a very steep angle. Tall steps. The rooms themselves are right out of the thirties with a few

Summary: Very friendly staff - helpful and welcoming!  Very well priced in an expensive area---  the viewsand the beach and pool were beautiful, and the location was perfect- walk to downtown and everything   The only downside for us was the AC was not great - and it was a very hot summer weekend we were there.   but we would definitley stay there again!   thanks for a great trip!

Summary: Book early. In the summer you will be lucky to get a hotel room, let alone in a 5 star location. I had this issue but ended up being quite surprised. It is a motel on the water billed as boutique and is definately a level up from the average motel. Your paying for the view. You are located on the beach. Parking on the hotel site is about 8 spots on the hotel grounds and a block away another 20 spots in a private open lot. Didn't have trouble finding parking in either location.   Clean rooms, views of the ocean so its perfect but you must request an ocean view. Either way you have private access with beach towels, complimentary water, umbrellas and chairs to relax on. Friendly staff, free small breakfast, nothing fancy (coffee, make your own waffles, cereal). For $400 a night,

Summary: Capri Laguna is a hotel that really deserves 5 stars with beautiful views on the beach, hard workers who are very warm with every guest especially Nick, Bashir, and Constantine. Perfect relaxing hotel and hope to come back soon!

Summary: We had so much fun at Capri Laguna!! Definitely a perfect place to come back...we came two times on our summer vacation! Professional group offering the best service possible! Thank you Nick, Bashir, and Constantine!!

Summary: The views from our beachfront room in this hotel were absolutely incredible. Waking up to the sounds and sight of the crashing waves right off our patio was an experience we wish we never had to leave! Breathtaking sunsets...Laguna Beach is simply a gorgeous place. Bashir and Nick were wonderful hosts and they, along with the rest of the staff took great care of us during our visit. The starbucks coffee, and free breakfast in the lobby was so much appreciated. We would love to go back someday!
Manager Response: Dear Staceyalisa,  It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us.
