Summary: Stayed as family of 4, with 2 kids under 10. This hotel really lives up to its great reviews. Location good. Perfect for the beach and 20 mins walk to main centre (or free buses in the summer). Rooms well sized and clean. The pool is small but ideal for beach location. Free breakfast is wonderful and al you need(and more!) Staff, are superb. Friendly, helpful and 'go the extra mile!' I would recommend this hotel and would visit again.  Ps. Free car parking is extra bonus!
Manager Response: Dear OrchardBarnFamily,  It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback on TripAdvisor. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Our stay at the Capri Laguna was exquisite!  The staff is very accommodating in the hotel and on the beach.  The ocean view was stunning.  The trolley will take you to Cliff Drive [Las Brisas] down to the Ritz Carlton.
Manager Response: Dear Joani,  It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,,

Summary Heading: The Ultimate Paradise in Laguna Beach
Summary: Our stay at The Capri Laguna Hotel was nothing short of perfect! My friends and I wanted to get a peaceful, relaxing friend trip and that’s exactly what we got. Our beach front room had the most amazing view of the ocean, and the sunset was incredible and unlike anything I’ve seen before. Our room itself was very nice and the front desk staff were more than kind and accommodating to every question or request. Nick the manager is amazing! Walking through the hotel seems like you are in Italy or Greece. Also, the complimentary continental breakfast in the morning is insane!! They have pancakes, waffles, pastries, even a Starbucks machine!! We are definitely coming back to the Capri Laguna Hotel next summer! Everyone: if you want a great view of the ocean, to fall asleep to the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing hotel,very clean, located right on the beautiful beach. Front desk staff were very friendly  and even offered recommendations for restaurants in the area. Can't wait go back here next chance I get!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had an amazing experience at this hotel!! The view in the ocean was breathtaking, nothing better than seeing sunset from my balcony! My room was super clean and organized. I was impressed from the service, the manager (Nick) and the manager on duty (Bachir) were the most welcoming managers, they were truly friendly and professional, always available to give instruction or to help with any way.  My room was very comfortable and I have easy access in both beach and pool of the hotel. The whole staff was trying to respond in anything that I wanted! I surely give a 10 to this hotel and recommend it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The most amazing hotel I have ever been too by far.  Amazing service.  Manager Niko is extremely helpful in every way ready to assist in every way.  Constantine was also very helpful in that he would give amazing service right on the beach.  Hotel is right on the sand with amazing view and amazing very clean rooms.  Also in awesome location with many family friendly restaurants walking distance.  This hotel is luxury with everything you could hope for.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You can't get closer to the beach !
Summary: We had an amazing family vacation at the Capri this Summer.  The location is perfect, you wake up to the sound of ocean waves.  The hotel offers amazing beach service, with lounges and umbrellas.  There is fresh Starbucks coffee in the lobby all day long.  Nick, the GM is always around and eager to please !  We definitely plan to come back next summer, or maybe sooner ! BTW, they have a charging station on their parking lot, and I was able to charge my Tesla overnight !
Manager Response: none

Summary: The whole experience exceeded my expectations! It all started from the moment we arrived. The manager on duty (Bachir) was probably the most welcoming and professional manager I’ve ever met. Extremely friendly and helpful, he made us feel like we were at home during our stay. The rooms were impeccably clean and the view from our room was awe-inspiring. The bed was EXTREMELY comfortable and the access to the beach made our stay even more incredible. If I could give this hotel more than a 10, I would!  Definitely worth every penny!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a wonderful experience with this hotel and the grounds. The pool was perfect for taking a dip after getting thrown around in the ocean body surfing!! Our room could not have been better. #102 with ocean/sand view was ideal. GREAT view of the ocean and able to see our teens from our patio.  Wonderful to have breakfast available for a quick bite to start the day. Loved the coffee!! Easy walk to the shops and restaurants in Laguna Beach. Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cute Hotel But Overpriced Summer Rates
Summary: I have been booking one night at Hotel Laguna during the summer for years but due to it's recent closure I had to seek an alternate plan.  I found a room at this hotel on TripAdvisor for a relatively cheaper price (still above $400) but still a lot of money for my budget.  What the heck, it was my indulgent splurge and was a full ocean view.  The hotel is old but I think has been refurbished with some amenities.  The room was quite small and somewhat quirky and the ocean view was partially blocked by a protruding roof line.  The woman at the check in desk was very nice and allowed me to check in a couple of hours early which I really appreciated.  There is a pool which is very small and was quite warm, almost bathwater temperature.  There also is a continental breakfast which
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked two nights here but because of availability we booked one night in a Beachfront King with Fireplace, and the next night in an Oceanfront King. The first room was nice, roomy, and charming but had a weird smell (moisture) and we could hear everything our neighbors were chatting up. The next night in the Oceanfront king, the room was more basic. One thing about this hotel is that there are a lot of stairs, and parking was a block away! Not very convenient, but the location was nice and you can't beat the view. However, we normally stay at other beachfront hotels in the area, and after trying this place, I have to say I'm glad we tried it, but it's not our favorite.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful getaway during the week ... from the planned one night; it turned into 3.
Summary: Originally we planned on staying only one night. Then, the right sun, beach, weather and friendly staff changed that into 3 nights for our family.   the staff made that extra little effrot to make us feel at home and were able to accomodate our additonal two nights.   To top it all off, I met a company colleague from the other side of the world ... so it is one big happy family.  thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: We found this hotel to be very clean with a great location . The ocean views were spectacular and the beach is beautiful and not crowded even on a weekend in July.  The front desk service was great . We will be back .
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Restful easy going place with views to tomorrow
Summary: On arrival the desk folks are welcoming and respectful with a willingness to do a little extra. Our mini-suite room at first was right down at the beach level, but a bit dark and musty toward the back. The desk clerk immediately moved us up to a much better view, apologizing and helping us to relocate. We were very grateful for the change to the bright and airy upper floors. Much easier access from the street, pool, and lobby as well. All-in-all a very comfortable stay at reasonable rates for the location. Beautiful beach right at the foot of their stairs. Constantine, the beach manager, took excellent care of us on the sand and warmly set up our chairs and umbrella, even gave us an ice cream bar and waters. Nice!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cheap hotel! terrible for the price.  Units are so dated.You can’t help to feel  like you stepped back in time and not in a good way. Carpet looked and smelled  like it was from the1970s. Front desk could care less there are three of us that said we were just in a car accident on way there and would need help with our bags going down the massive stairs you HAVE TO GO DOWN to each room. No one came to help.  They weren’t even busy with any other guest. They said someone would help us on way out too and no one answered the phone despite saying we be calling at 530 am. There was no spaces to park our ford exhibition nor did they say they would help.  They said we could park a block down. That’s where we ended up. The room was so dated and smelled like  mold and mildew.  No screens
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just spent four relaxing days at this beautiful hotel. We felt like we were at an Italian Villa. Everywhere you look there is a view of the ocean with tables, chairs and sitting areas situated throughout the property. I grew up in  Laguna Beach, so I know the town and hotels pretty well but had never stayed here before. This is a great part of town to stay. You aren't in the thick of the downtown crowds and congestion but close enough to everything. There are many places to eat and explore close by, but if you want to go downtown it's about a 20 minute walk along the beach or you can take the free trolley that picks you up right outside the hotel and be downtown in five minutes. The hotel was very quiet and relaxing. Our room was above the pool, but had a deck with a peek-a-boo
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was in Laguna Beach for a friend’s birthday party the hotel is in a very nice location with a beautiful beach view! Upon my arrival everyone was friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and cute my only problem with the room is that they have a floor unit for air conditioner and it quit in the middle of the night and it got hot ! Other than that I enjoyed the Capri on the beach!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel has wonderful views and is very comfortable.  But the best part of the hotel are the staff.  They are friendly, helpful and so courteous.  Even though there is no elevator, the staff provided luggage service for us.  It is a great, restful place to stay. You can open the doors and let the ocean breezes blow thru. And, Laguna Beach has a great trolley service to take you all over the town.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ok hotel, more of a motel, the beach side of the property and access to the beach was good. however i was given a rather musty smelling motel style room close to the main road which seemed expensive at $350+ USD per night
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location on the beach in Laguna.  Well located along the PCH, walkable to bars & restaurants in the area.  Rate includes parking & breakfast which is nice.  We had the room with two kings and a pull out couch.  Also had dining table, closet and an additional sink outside of the bathroom.  Could easily accommodate a family or group of friends.  Room was very clean, well-serviced, not super fancy but the rate here is due to location, not luxury in your room, you're supposed to be at the beach, not inside.  The staff on site are very friendly and helpful.  Note:  no bar or restaurant at this property but plenty of surrounding options.  And what you are here for is the beach!  Also note: properties here are built into the hill so be prepared to do steps to get to/from the

Summary: Outstanding service and staff, wonderful evening beachfront accommodations, remodeled rooms, and direct private beach access. We kept the balcony door open and fell asleep to the sound of the ocean after watching both sunset and moon set. Highly recommended!!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel on the Beach at Laguna
Summary: This was an unexpected gem on the beach.  I wanted a room that was on the beach where we could open the doors or windows and hear the ocean.  My wife loves the ocean.  It was the second night of our honeymoon and this room did not disappoint.  We could open the sliding glass doors and the ocean was right there.  From our balcony we had a full view of the beach with no obstructions.  The staff was very friendly, especially Bashir.  The beach staff were very attentive providing what we needed to sit and enjoy the beach.  All the staff made us feel special and wanted to make sure we had a great experience.  We became immediate friends.

Summary: I don't quite understand the hype about this hotel.  We booked based on all the positive reviews, but regretted doing so once we were there.    Parking is extremely limited on the actual property.  They do have a parking lot on the next block over, maybe a 2 minutes walk from the hotel. There are no lifts at this hotel, it's all stairs so be prepared to lug your suitcases up and down stairs to and from your room during check-in and check-out.  Once we got to our room, we turned on the AC and noticed a very strong foul odor coming from the AC unit.  It smelt like mold and a sewer at the same time.  Someone came to switch it out (supposedly. possibly brought back the same one) and stuck some plug-ins into the wall to mask the smell, but eventually the smell came back once the AC

Summary: Great and affordable with extremely comfortable bed and great view. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Parking us a bit limited. Recommend a compact car when you come here. Beautiful beach. Walk to center of town for great restaurants, galleries and shopping.

Summary: This is our second summer spending time in Laguna. We loved our experience at Capri last year, and decided to stay there again. We appreciate the small town feel and attention to detail that Capri offers. As usual, Nick Paige and Bachir Atallah made us feel extremely welcomed back. They had our room ready for us - a beautiful suite that sleeps 5 and has a view of the ocean. We love that the Capri has staff on hand for chairs, towels and umbrellas on the beach!  We had perfect beach days and felt extremely comfortable.  Every morning we enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and coffee which we enjoyed on their deck overlooking the ocean. We also enjoyed their complimentary cheese and wine for happy hour!  We enjoyed ourselves so much that we asked to extend our stay another night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is really awesome. The staff were so nice. Laguna Beach has a free bus that runs through the town and hotels. There is a bus stop literally in front of the hotel. And it's free! It's not too far from all the restaurants and shops. We walked there & back. It's not a far walk at all.  The hotel is located right on the beach. You can't get any closer. Our room was spotless. We slept with our window open so we could hear the waves crashing on the shore. It was perfect.   I feel like this hotel is a hidden gem. I would highly recommend it and my partner & I will definitely be coming back!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had stayed at Capri Laguna so many times! Great location, excellent customer service and lovely staff. I would like to mention about General Manager- Nick and Bashir at customer service. They really went out of their way to make us feel welcome and assured that every guest receives adequate attention and service! Thank you Nick and Bashir. Hopefully, to see you soon ;)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great value for on the water
Summary: We have stayed at the Capri several time. We formerly stayed at some of the swankiest places in town, but even then we were usually much farther from the beach. The Capri Laguna isn’t swanky. It doesn’t compete in that market, but it provides a family friendly environment where you can open your balcony door and soak in an amazing view. The kitchenette is nice for warming those leftovers from Gina’s pizza or the Mexican joint (both walkable). Maggie helped us get comfortable on the beach and even remembered our daughter’s name the following day. Nick, the GM, stopped in to check on us each morning at breakfast (complimentary).
Manager Response: none

Summary: I made reservations for a weekend getaway with my husband.  I reserved directly on the hotel site and for a BEACH FRONT room.  The morning of the day we were scheduled to check in I noticed I had a beach front queen and I typically reserve a king so I called directly to the hotel to see if there was an opportunity to change it to a beach front king.  The young man on the phone was very pleasant and after placing me on a brief hold Said he was able to change the room and to my surprise there would be no additional charge.... I was skeptical so I confirmed with him 3 times... this will still be a beach front room? He assured me yes it would be.  We arrived at the hotel that afternoon and checked in to find out we got a very small room with a king bed on an upper floor with a

Summary Heading: Great location to hear and see the ocean
Summary: The ocean views a excellent, and the sounds will lull you to sleep. We had a top floor corner room with great ocean views from two directions. At night we chose to keep the screen doors shut and the sliding doors open about a foot. It lets us fall asleep to the sound of the waves and a nice cool ocean breeze.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our go to spot when we visit beautiful Laguna beach. We've already reserved 4 night for Thanksgiving of 2018. The staff is very helpful, friendly and accommodating.I would recommend this hotel to anyone who plans of visiting Laguna Beach! Just steps from the beach!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We wanted a couple chill days on the beach ...you'll get that at Capri Laguna.
Summary: A wonderful family owned and operated hotel. Nick, was very personable, hands on and help make our stay very comfortable. Helped us set up with chairs and umbrella on the beach when we needed it. It's locations is a short walk to all the great shops, restaurants and bars of Laguna Beach. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Keith G,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for more great memories!   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect location with very helpful manager and staff
Summary: This is my third time staying at this hotel. While this hotel is pricey (but comparable to the others on the beach) it is worth it. It is close to restaurants, shops and on a beautiful stretch of beach. The breakfast is free and great for the family and the rooms have everything you need. I would highly recommend this hotel. The manager and staff went out of there way to help us with a room change, parking etc and were extremely kind.  My kids and I can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Dear lisa l,  Thank you for your loyalty and sharing your 5 star feedback regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We are more than happy to know that your stay with us was a great success. Knowing that you had an enjoyable time and received friendly service certainly makes us happy as we are dedicated to ensure a personalized and warm service to all our guests. Thank you again for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: I stayed there on a recent work trip. My Queen sized room had faulty shower. Manager on duty offered to upgrade me to a suite which came with the works - Kitchenette, dining area and a fireplace. Compared to my tiny room, Suite was quite spacious. This hotel offers great view of the ocean. The staff is wonderful. They also offer limited breakfast options - Pancakes, waffles and coffee etc. The lay out of the hotel is quite interesting with rooms on multiple levels and most of them come with a little ocean facing balcony. The equipment and fixtures in the rooms however is another story.  1. There was a cooler/AC type equipment in my room which was super noisy, it couldnt be moved to be closer to my bed and didnt make any difference to the temperature.  2. Bedside lamps in my
Manager Response: Dear rsatnam,  Thank you for your honest feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had a great experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we really took on consideration all of your remarks. Once again thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Did not want to leave. I stayed for only one night but I loved the pool and the view from the balcony. Definitely a place to recommend for quite and relaxing. Location is great. Staff were friendly and nice. Thank you Paige! Will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Csongor E, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel in perfect location
Summary: This is a wonderful beachfront hotel. Our room had a beautiful ocean view. We could hear the ocean. it was a very relaxing visit. I would suggest to stay here to anybody who enjoys a real beach atmosphere. The hotel is also conveniently located and close to restaurants and bars.
Manager Response: Dear Susanna C,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing ocean and our beautiful city. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. The ladies and gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back and offering an unforgettable experience.

Summary: Our room had a great view. We enjoyed the location being right on the beach and walking distance to restaurants and shops. The breakfast food was good provided by the hotel. Our room was the perfect size for us.
Manager Response: Dear Eva M D,  It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your warm 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: I cannot say enough about this wonderful beachfront hotel. The staff  headed by Nick, Bashir and John are always warmly welcoming and helpful. The rooms I've had were always spotless and comfortable, and featured fantastic ocean and sunset panoramas. While you are only a few steps to the beach you are also only a short walk to world class restaurants. I've been returning to Capri Laguna something like 8 years now. That's probably the best recommendation I can give.
Manager Response: Dear EddieRings,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Road noise deafening in ocean view room
Summary: We got a partial ocean view and regretted it. Hotel is on Pacific Coast Highway and massive noise cuts through entire main level of hotel. Walls are paper thin and hotel is very old and musty.  Overpriced and not nearly as nice as pictures. It is in the beach which is nice but there are about 50 or more steps to get there from main level. If you get full ovean view rooms on lower level then road noise won’t be a problem. Even full ocean view on main level has a Lot of road noise. Overall an old motel on a busy street.

Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. Summary: That’s what we said when we first saw our incredibly small and partially remodeled room. But it was only for one short night and we dealt with it. One other room we saw was larger.   This appears to be a family run inn and the staff is very inclusive. We were so happy to be able to check in early as we had to dress for a wedding. There is no valet parking (parking is limited and cramped) or laundry service (or even laundry bags).  There is a small heated pool but there is a $35 resort fee!! And this was the crux of the problem.  We spend almost $500 for one night as a semi-refreshed motel room.   You can clearly see where rooms have been updated and where they have not and it’s a mixed bag. Our updated bathroom included a toilet I could not sit on correctly due to the angle of
Manager Response: Dear dwalker43,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Capri laguna. The manager and staff are wonderful - so friendly and helpful in anyway. The breakfast area is very small but has everything you would want for a simple breakfast. Eggs, waffles, pancakes, fruit , yogurt , orange juice, tea and cereal. The best is the Starbucks coffee machine available throughout the day. Our room was very nice, comfortable beds modern bathroom and very clean. The hotel is built on the cliff so you must walk down three or four  flights before hitting the beach. Along the way there are various patios with tables or lounge chairs available. We spent lunch here on the patio sitting in the sunshine looking out onto the shoreline and ocean. Beautiful relaxing spot. The pool area is off the lobby and the pool is very small. The
Manager Response: Dear Linda B,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the sound of the ocean and our city. Thank you for choosing us and for your detailed feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Everything was perfect from check in to check out. Everyone was friendly, helpful, professional and courteous. Someone was always willing to help me with directions or ideas for things to do in the area. The room was clean with an absolutely breathtaking view of the beach. Free parking breakfast and two bottles of water were provided daily. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear elliehines,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. Summary Heading: Great View; Average Room; somewhat pricey; poor breakfast
Summary: Our experience was something of a mixed bag.  We arrived about 9:15 pm, and missed the sunset- which is probably the main reason to book this Hotel.   We had trouble finding a parking spot we could get into with a mid-sized sedan , because of tight angles and a bunch of columns.  They have another lot (easier to access) on the next block North of the Hotel, but we didn't learn about that until the next day.   After securing a parking space, our keys didn't work and it took about 15 minutes to get some keys that did work.  While waiting for the keys, I tripped on their wood sundeck near my room, and did a nice face plant.  Some lighting would have helped.  After the shaky start, the rest of the experience was pretty good.  The waves sounded great at night.  We didn't hear any
Manager Response: Dear John B,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. Thank you once more for staying with us and  we hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: We recently stayed here for my birthday with our 2 children. The location was perfect!  It was right on the main strip and a walk to many, many restaurants and stores. There is a grocery store (Ralph's) a 10 minute walk down the street. We walked to Main Beach with the kids and checked out the playground and the tidal pools.  We parked our car when we arrived and we did not need to drive anywhere. The staff were very friendly. The free breakfast was nice and the 24 coffee/hot chocolate machine was enjoyed by many. The pool was warm and there were plenty of towels. We had one issue during our stay and that was a persistent odour in our room. We noticed right away when we checked in the first night but after being stuck in a 3 hour traffic jam before our arrival we were all just
Manager Response: Dear Amy E.  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. Summary: Our sons gave us a gift certificate for one night here.  It's a beautiful getaway spot.  Our room had an ocean view, a king bed, and a small kitchenette.  Ask for Room 601!  There's a heated pool, or you can walk down to the hotel's beach below.  Free breakfast in the morning.  Loved the sound of the waves at night, but S. Coast Hwy is pretty busy and you may also hear some traffic noise.  Unfortunately an ambulance/fire truck woke us up in the night.
Manager Response: Dear Vacationers62,  We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay . Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I celebrated our 30th Anniversary in Laguna Beach and wanted a room with an ocean view.  We decided to splurge for one night and book a king room ocean front.  We certainly got our ocean view.  The ocean couldn't get much closer.  The room was certainly nothing special, quite awkward as you first enter the room as you have angled stairs to get up.  The bathroom is right by the door too so you had to go down these few steps from the living area to get to the bathroom.

Summary: I used to love this hotel.  The staff is usually courteous and the rooms, while dated and a bit rough, are still lovely with (if you opt for them) amazing views.  it's right on the beach.  If you DON'T have an electric car, you can stop reading now.  My biggest beef is that I drive in from out of state several times a year and have always enjoyed free charging at their remote lot.  This time (4/6/18) I was charged without any prior notification an obscene amount of $57 for one night just to top off my car.  I was even charged $5 an hour for having it plugged in during the middle of the night when it was not charging.  I guess they expected me to run out in the middle of the night in my pajamas a block away to unplug my car When I asked the manager about it, I was told that it

Summary Heading: Charming, relaxed hotel in gorgeous location.
Summary: Family trip to California for April vacation.  My husband, two kids and I shared a large oceanfront room with 2 comfortable King beds.  Absolutely beautiful view from good-sized balcony with two loungers and small table and chairs. Full kitchen and renovated but small bath. We loved the beachfront/walk to town location as well as the breakfast that was included with the room rate. Hotel building and grounds are beautiful though not new.  If you are looking for a sanitized chain hotel experience this is not the place for you.  But if you want, beauty, charm and friendliness come here.  Felt like we were on the Mediterranean coast. Convenient parking. Lots of shops and restaurants nearby including a really cute Mexican restaurant only 2 blocks away. Nick, the manager, and Paige at

Summary Heading: Can’t compare to the Surf and Sand!
Summary: Although the property is on the sand, the hotel itself is very dated, not enough parking, no restaurant, etc, but they charge the same as the surf and sand which is right next to it. So if you can, book in advance and stay at the Surf and Sand!
Manager Response: Dear mckh98,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. Summary: The front desk service couldn't have been better, the view from the balcony of the room was great, and they had both lounges and tables with umbrellas right above the beach and access to it. I will return in the future. Try the "Kaffee" across the road. It has a European/Berkley atmosphere plus big comfy couches and good food and drinks.
Manager Response: Dear 3avas,  Thank you for your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Once again thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: My family stayed here Feb 22-26. We loved it! My 7-year old son still periodically asks me when we are going back. The room was clean, cozy, and comfortable. There is access to the beach on the hotel property. We so enjoyed taking daily walks on the beach. There are several good restaurants either within walking distance or a short drive away. The hotel is located just over a mile from the town center, so you can definitely get around without a car. The staff (including Nick and Paige) were friendly and warm. We look forward to returning there in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Serena C,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Nice boutique hotel.   Very friendly and helpful front desk; and lovely lobby.    Rooms are just okay, carpet should be taken out.   But cute hotel and perfect location for beach and town.    Would definitely come back!!!
Manager Response: Dear ROOMChicago,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor for your recent stay at our Hotel. We are always pleased to hear that you enjoyed our services and we do take on consideration all of your remarks. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.   Kind regards,

Summary: This was our third trip to Capri Laguna and it's great as always.  Our oceanfront view was spectacular and our room was beautiful (with a large, private balcony).  The service is terrific--we'd like to thank Nick, Paige, Mafry and John for going above and beyond.  Highly recommended.

Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more sunsets and ocean views.    Kind regards,

Summary: This place is great for relaxing , beach views and awesome town to stroll through. Very laidback,upscale atmosphere.  Thefoodtheshopsansdthe views of the entire town make it a very nice destination.  This hotel was awesome, and the service was nice and a b&b feel.  Not crowded, relaxing and quaint.
Manager Response: Dear theresa146,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: We were able to check in early. The staff was extremely friendly. It is right next to the beach and close to restaurants and stores. This is my second time booking this hotel and it does not disappoint.
Manager Response: Dear Julie X,  We would like to thank you for your loyalty and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: AMAZING, NICK IS THE BEST! Will be back!
Summary: This quaint hotel is amazing. We came for the views of the ocean and it did not disappoint, we never shut our window or doors and listened to the waves crashing all night and all day. We were greeted by Bashur and it was amazing till the end of our stay when I checked out and wanted to buy a coffee mug and he gave it to me. We came back from the beach one day with beautiful flowers and a special note from Nick the manager, the next day I also spoke with Nick on the deck we talked about the flowers and the hotel, such a charming man with such hospitality.  When we arrived we were sharing pictures of our kids and I introduced my daughter and he remembered her name and put it on the note with the flowers.The room was perfect with one king bed and a sofa pullout bed.  We were in
Manager Response: Dear Melody S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star detailed review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for more ocean sounds and great memories!   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel for a beach escape
Summary: Great room with great ocean views from inside and from deck. 2 King beds for family of 4, kitchenette and large fridge, table with 4 chairs and  outdoor deck with table and pool beds. Breakfast included, fruit, eggs, pancakes waffles, pastries, starbucks coffee. Central location, with easy walk to restaurants.  We had agreat stay, sleep in while tide is in and spend middle of day at the beach. Hotel staff will help you with any of your needs, we asked for badmington set and they found one for us to use at the beach. late check out - no problems. Highly recommend this botique hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Natalee S,  Thank you for sharing your 5 star feedback regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We are more than happy to know that your stay with us was a great success. Knowing that you had an enjoyable time and received friendly service certainly makes us happy as we are dedicated to ensure a personalized and warm service to all our guests. Thank you again for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A Lovely Gem right on the Beach
Summary: We flew in late, but were greeted warmly and wonderfully by Bachir.  He was our first encounter with an amazing staff (more like a family) lead by Nick. We were treated so well, which is rare now-a-days.   This boutique hotel is directly on the beach. We didn't have an oceanfront room, but it didn't matter...they have an AMAZING deck to enjoy the view and beautiful sunsets.  The room (608) was very comfortable with 2 queens, a small fridge, microwave, and large bathroom with walk in glass door shower. We did have some road noise in the morning, but it didn't interrupt our sleep. They do not have an elevator, but will be glad to carry bags to your room. There was a small patio, over the pool, to enjoy a morning cup of coffee. Like others we enjoyed the 24 hour Starbucks coffee

Once again thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star review. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful Place. Wonderful Location. Wonderful People.
Summary: Decided to stay at Capri Laguna for a last minute end of Spring Break get-a-way. Did not disappoint. Cannot say more about Nick and his management team. The staff from all aspects of this property could not have been more friendly. From the maintenance people and grounds keeper to the office staff, they all are wonderful people.  The only negative... I wish we could have stayed longer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This intimate property is a treasure and a real surprise. Beautiful setting on the beach with private access to the beach and close to many restaurants and shops. The staff made us feel like we were staying with friends. We highly recommend the Capri and we will go back.
Manager Response: Dear Bill C,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights for a business trip and couldn't have been nicer. Staff was superb - warm, friendly, extra accommodating. The manager Nick is wonderful! Breakfast was great - with traditional and healthy options. Room was clean with a nice view. Couldn't help but fall asleep to the Pacific waves. Hope to stay here again soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of this hotel is excellent and the staff is even better- especially the manager Nick. He is super friendly and personable. While I was laying out on the beach someone came down and brought me water and cookies and asked if I would like any more towels, an umbrella or lounge chair. Everyone was great and the room set up was perfect with 2 kids.
Manager Response: none

Summary: While the view is spectacular, the room is small and the balcony even smaller comparatively speaking.  The front desk staff had been very helpful but the free breakfast is quite limited and in an again small space.  At $300 + per nite? Even with a free parking, fireplace and balcony overlooking the Pacific and hearing the surf crashing the dated room and property is not the best value, in my option, on the ocean in Laguna Beach especially with 38 steps down to our room and NO elevator.  Our fault for note exploring  more.   Paul K. Summerland Key Fl
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have to say our experience and stay at the Capri Laguna was stellar. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and extremely happy. We will definitely stay there again! Nick, Bachir and the rest of the staff treated us like we were royalty and the most important guests there...I'm sure they make everyone feel like that!
Manager Response: Dear elidemoraes,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for more ocean sounds and great memories!   Kind regards,

Summary: Lovely boutique oceanfront hotel. The staff from the front desk (Nick and Bashir) to housekeeping were outstanding and go above and beyond to make every moment for each guest perfect. A great continental breakfast with 24 hr coffee is just one plus. But the true star is the Capri Laguna a charming white washed structure that reminds one of the Greek islands and has more character than all the other boxy cold concrete hotels on the beach (and Capri Laguna has the best prices). Before I arrived Bashir patiently spent time helping me pick out a room that would fit my personal needs (thank you) It is truly paradise & I even extended my stay because it was so hard to leave....magical!
Manager Response: Dear foodforthought66,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed our Hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and the Ladies and Gentlemen at the Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an magical service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: Looking for a place on the water in Laguna is difficult.  you want the location, but not the expected price.  Capri was a welcome compromise for an affordable hotel on the water and in town.  Very reasonable in price, the staff was outstanding, Nick, Paige and Mafry.  The room was clean and quiet, as I hoped for, and I even waled to breakfast and dinner.  Most of the visitors, spend a few minutes at the end of a long day, meeting in the breakfast area, for a complementary cocktail and horderves.  Thanks

Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Ocean view and friendly service second to none!
Summary: We originally only planned to stay for a night but it was so lovely we came back and stayed for two more! Upgrading the second time round to a large room with a panoramic ocean view was definitely the way to go - the view, watching the sun dip into the Pacific at sunset from your own totally private balcony - is really what you are paying for. You can sleep with the doors open and listen to the surf crash all night. The hotel has a really relaxed feel, an unstuffy place to unwind and watch the pelicans glide overhead with a nice bottle or two set to chill. Good beach access, nice little pool, great nearby restaurants and shops to mooch in, and super-friendly staff - special mentions to manager Nick and John on the front desk who made everything an absolute pleasure, going above
Manager Response: Dear supershineon,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your 5 star feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay and our city. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We look forward to have you back for more views and beautiful sunsets!  Kind regards,

Summary: Although we stayed only one night, it was a great experience (it so happened to be our 50th Anniversary). Location was the top of the list. Slept with the sound of the surf and there was that wonderful  view of the Pacific! Lot's of excellent interior  detail in the room. Breakfast was a tad better than usual "continental" fare. Well maintained and lives up to the "boutique hotel" claim.

Summary Heading: Beautiful beach, lots of nice decks, Mediterranean feel
Summary: first room had no privacy, windows to public decks on both sides and only small ocean view. upgraded to ocean view and that is the way to enjoy this hotel!  private balcony where we could watch the sunset over Catalina Island, roomy, airy, very comfortable and beautiful. Staff is very friendly, hotel is well maintained and clean while preserving classic feel, architecture is more beautiful than neighboring hotels. walking distance to art galleries and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Maggie M,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed our Hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for staying with us. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: The staff is helpful and the ocean is lovely. So, that's good.
Summary: First, I will say that the hotel staff is friendly and are willing to help. Second, the ocean view room was amazing. Not because of the room but because of the ocean.   I read the Yelp reviews of this hotel, but made the mistake of not reading the "not recommended" reviews. Those would've changed my decision to stay here.  When I checked in, I was told that my room was quite unique because it had a balcony. What the hotel staff failed to mention is that it's also small, cold (the heater was clearly on vacation), and the bed will put your back out. I heard the ocean at night, though, so that was a win.   They moved me to second room without fuss or hesitation which I appreciated. This second room had a bigger balcony, a better view, and was just a bit roomier. Win. The bed was
Manager Response: Dear Priya L,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Loved our stay at this beach side boutique hotel!! We had a room with a partial view of the ocean  room 610 but we were very pleased with our view!!  Checking in was easy, breakfast is complimentary and free Starbucks coffee!! What more could you ask for! If you are looking for the Hilton don’t insult them by staying here! This is a beachy, surf side wonderful full,of charm groovy place! The bed was super comfy the shower was amazing! Very centralized to all the great restaurants! We will be back! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear 42heaven,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the sound of the ocean and our city. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Loved this place!  From check-in to check-out everyone was so welcoming and nice!  This is an older property so there are a few little quirks (hot water takes a bit to warm up, but then is ample and plenty of water pressure).  But the property is well maintained and sits right on the water.  I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear lichenthebeach,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Nick and the staff were great, they are all about giving great customer service. Newly renovated rooms, very clean and spacious. Also just a few stairs down to beach,  just a very nice quiet boutique hotel. Comes Highly Recommended.  Keith and Sherry / Canada.
Manager Response: Dear 866keithg,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for sharing your 5 star feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, great views, good location
Summary: This place is awesome, built on many levels right by the beach, so that many of the rooms have excellent views to the sea and sunset - now it definitely worth it to spend few bucks more for a seaview room/suite. You can get to the beach, and there is also small swimming pool.  Rooms have all you need, and during this quite chilly period the heating was working properly and without excess noise. There is parking space at the hotel, and at last this time there was always free space.  There is no own restaurant in the hotel, but there is plenty within walking distance. For example Selanne Steak Tavern offers maybe best steaks of the coast and is located just across the street. Few minutes walk to El Camino hotel, which has great rooftop bar with great views and drinks. The Laguna
Manager Response: Dear  juhahi,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star detailed review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: This is a great little boutique hotel.  Wonderful views of the ocean. Recommend an Ocean View room.  Rooms were very clean and updated.  Loved having the mini kitchen.  The staff was amazing.  From Bachir and Nick at the front desk to the housekeeping and maintenance staff, everyone was friendly and engaging.  The only minor down side was the continental breakfast did not offer choices for those on a low carb or keto diet.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jeani D,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is located in a perfect little spot in Laguna Beach. It is right on the beach with tons of walkable spots close by. I had a lovely little porch off my room that looked out at the ocean. The bathroom was nicely updated and the room was clean and had all the necessities.
Manager Response: Dear andrealyns,  Thank you very much for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: After 4 terrible days in Anaheim, we drove out to gorgeous Laguna Beach. We stayed at this boutique hotel and found it to be super quaint. We just loved it! 3’ladies in our 40s. We booked a double pool view room. We do wish we had upgraded to ocean view because the ocean is absolutely stunning. There is a huge deck, however, with lots of great seating to view the sunset each evening. The staff was excellent. Super clean room. Comfortable beds. Loved the microwave, extra sink and safe. LOVED the views. I would 100% stay here again. Close to many, many shops and  restaurants. All walking distance. I will miss it a ton.
Manager Response: Dear chou204,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your room and the view from your balcony. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we hope to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: We were treated with a kind reception, wine on the patio, wonderful breakfast and darling accommodations.  We stayed in a beachfront room with a wonderful patio looking out over the water.  Lovely pool and easy parking right on the property!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Lori H,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: I loved absolutely everything about this hotel! The staff was the friendliest I have ever encountered. (Which is hard to come by these days!) The many patios and views of the beach and the sunset were priceless. The breakfast had a lot of options, with delicious Starbucks coffee options all day! And the wine and cheese in the late afternoons was the icing on the cake. They were so accommodating to our needs from taking our family photo, to providing beach chairs and an umbrella, to even offering us late check out so we could enjoy more of the beautiful day at the beach. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear sassysammie90254,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Expensive but it appears to be the resort level
Summary: Very comfortable. We had a room with beach view. Originally booked one with ocean view but it turned out we were looking at the roof at a room downstairs. We upgraded for a steep price increase (apparently we got it at a discount). Professional service. Breakfast not that great. Expensive but this seems to be a normal price at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear mandutianu,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Bashir at the front was amazing! He helped change what would have been a disaster weekend accommodations-wise (cancelled by the host on the day air bnb)into a super great experience. His kindness and care went a very long way and were the number one reason why we chose to stay at the Capri Laguna.  I can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear amy r,  It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your warm 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Incredible Beachfront Hotel on Laguna Beach with Such Personal Attention!
Summary: From the moment of check-in to the final goodbye, the warm & personable Greek staff at this property made us sincerely feel welcomed and comfortable!  They knew and recalled our names, spent time getting to know us, were wonderfully helpful with information and many details, from small (i.e. needing parking coins,) to larger ones.  The location of this facility is what beach-lovers dream of, but often cannot afford.  The location is on the main downtown street, allowing lovely strolls to the nearby shops and restaurants.    Beach umbrellas and Adirondack chairs are available for your Pacific therapy time.  If you don't like the sound of crashing waves on the sand, you may not want to stay here. Oh, such a delight to the senses!  What a wonderfully relaxing and calming stay!
Manager Response: Dear rcjbl7,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our city. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Fantastic Location - Amazing View - Friendly, helpful staff - Great value for the money
Summary: Just had a great stay with 2 friends.  Rooms immaculate. View from hotel deck amazing.  Friendly helpful staff--Mike, Constantino, and John at front desk all were very friendly, helpful and accommodating.  Manager Nick was also very helpful and responsive to our questions and with any issue.  Nice continental breakfast included, as well as Starbucks coffee available 24-7 in the lobby.  Wine & cheese happy hour around 4 to 5 pm.  Location can't be beat, and hotel is walkable to main beach and many dining venues.  Parking great--always an issue in Laguna! We never moved the car, walked everywhere. Great value for the money. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear lcgcalifornia,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: The hotel and accommodations are very clean and the staff is very welcoming. The view from the room is breath taking. Nick the hotel manager goes out of his way to make sure your stay is enjoyable.  I highly recommend this boutique hotel !
Manager Response: Dear snowywaters2017,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: We had a wonderful night at Capri Laguna on the Beach a couple of weeks ago!  What a gem of a place, with prime location and intimate boutique feel.  Our stay was made even more special by the staff and especially by the manager, who welcomed us like family (shout out to Constantine, John, and Nick!).  Cookies in the afternoon, 24-hr hot cocoa and coffee, heated pool, deck overlooking the ocean, and convenient beach chairs and umbrellas made it tempting to just stay on site and enjoy the real estate.  Our room was simple but comfortable (we couldn't afford one of the beachfront rooms and went with a pool-side room).  An enjoyable stay for the whole family!
Manager Response: Dear tec93401,  We are pleased to hear that you have enjoyed your stay and our services. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback at the TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you  back soon.  Best Regards,

Summary: My boyfriend and I were in laguna around 10 AM and needed a place to stay for the night, but wanted to check into a room somewhere early. I walked into Capri and met John, the concierge. He was amazing and said we could get into a room right then for the night, but that if we wanted to wait for an hour we could have a room with a private balcony and Ocean view. We waited an hour and got an amazing room with a kitchenette, private balcony and gorgeous view of the sunset and Ocean. We will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Dear creelehrman,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri Laguna is located in a perfect location and it's sunset views are spectacular. Nick and his staff ensured that our every needs was cared for. The breakfast was quite filling and we loved the 24 hour Starbucks machine! We will definitely return to Capri Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Shelley P,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Capri Laguna Hotel is a relaxing little place just up the road from the centre of town. Most rooms offer ocean views and I would recommend getting one of these to avoid the traffic noise from the road. This hotel is really good value for the location, the prices of some of the other places around are silly.  Rooms are nice and clean, some are slightly dated but still retain their charm. Having your own deck with an ocean view is really nice. Breakfast is continental style and is sufficient, you might want to explore the town for more upmarket options though.  The staff there are brilliant and attentive. I have to mention both Nick and John - thanks for going the extra mile to make our stay really nice.
Manager Response: Dear Matt W,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is truly a boutique experience. The service and hospitality were second to none. We thoroughly enjoyed the sunsets, beautiful beach and wine on the deck on day Friday evening. Our room was not modern but it was clean and comportable and no detail is missed.
Manager Response: Dear AnGeLica010373,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The property was positioned perfectly to enjoy the beach, view and shopping. There were balconies everywhere to enjoy. We had a great time and will visit Capri again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Capri has the nicest staff in Southern California. Kuddos to Nick and Constantine! Nick remembers everyone's name and is always there to help. Excellent oceanfront location close to all shops and restaurants, free parking, free breakfast and free Starbucks all day long! On Fridays free happy hour as well!
Manager Response: Dear Adriana E,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Incredible beach front hotel in the heart of laguna!
Summary: What a FANTASTIC hotel! I can not say anymore good things about this lovely place. From the moment we checked in to every aspect was very memorable and picture perfect! I big thank you to the staff starting with the manager Nick P and Constance (sorry for the misspelling)! The views from the place are incredible, I highly recommend to visit this place!
Manager Response: Dear Andres,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: The facility is excellent.....  Nick Politis and his staff were so accommodating and friendly. Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable....  Not sure why some complain because we  very much enjoyed the proximity to the beach, and surrounding area.
Manager Response: Dear westcoasttraveler_9,  Thank you for your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Once again thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star review. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: The room was billed as ocean view and that was my only complaint. I think the description  should have been more realistic and said distant ocean view. or something like that. Some of the rooms were close to the beach and had great views. Ours, room 605, was at the street side of the hotel and overlooked the pool with a  very distant obstructed view of the ocean.  Other than that, the room was very large, a suite really. Staff were helpful when our door had to be recoded to get the keys to work. And there was a fridge, microwave and robes. All made it a great room to stay in.
Manager Response: Dear sanpanchocasa,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: The location is great, but the hotel is directly out of the 1970's. Pool is in a weird spot next to the lobby, rooms are very old (stains, rickety deck furniture and balcony), and walls are paper thin (we could literally hear the person next to us snoring). If you get a room on the top floor, make sure you draw your curtains because the patio is right next to the room and people can see into your room and balcony. It's not a terrible hotel - the view is beautiful (but not unique to Capri) but I can't understand the glowing reviews for the life of me. My suggestion is to stay next door at the Surf and Sand, it's not worth saving a hundred bucks at the Capri.
Manager Response: Dear Matt F,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Best kept secret in Laguna Beach
Summary: My family and I come to Laguna Beach 2 or 3 times a year. We have gone to other hotels but always come back to Capri Laguna. Very friendly staff, beautiful rooms and the best oceanfront views and access. We love the free breakfast every morning. Great coffee , waffles etc. We will continue to visit Capri Laguna. It his our home away from home!
Manager Response: Dear lisaninow,  We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed our Hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for your loyalty and the Ladies and Gentlemen at the Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.  Kind regards,

Summary: I have been to the Capri several times and always love it! Nick and the staff are so helpful and welcoming and always take such good care of us! The view is amazing no matter what time of year you are there! This hotel is a must see and definitely my favorite!
Manager Response: Dear Vicky L,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor for your recent stay at our Hotel. We are always pleased to hear that our guests enjoyed our property and our services. Thank you once more for your loyalty and we will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.    Kind regards,

Summary: Service personnel were very nice and accommodating.  Breakfast was good. There was some remodeling/construction going on around the property but it wasn't a bother other than getting out of the parking area. The view deck was beautiful for the sunsets and views of the coastline.
Manager Response: Dear Tom K,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more sunsets and ocean views. Happy Holidays!  Kind regards,

Summary: Best sunsets and sunrises on the upper deck! This hotel is located lon the beach and close to dining and shopping. Very friendly staff, lovely room, complimentary breakfast! Nick, Bashar and John are very accomodating. I will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amazing sunset and the view. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback. will look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,

Summary: What a lovely, cozy boutique hotel. The customer service was outstanding with very friendly staff, including the grounds crew, maintenance, etc  Our room was very clean, bright and cheerful with a beautiful deck overlooking the magnificent view of the sea. We enjoyed stocking our small fridge with cold beers and champagne to enjoy throughout the day. We loved walking up and down the beautiful beach located a good amount of steps below. Make sure to take advantage of the sun bathing deck just steps above the beach with comfortable lounge beds. There's plenty of tables set up with umbrellas and even a spot with a gas grill to use. You've got to make the trip to the topdeck to watch the beautiful sunset, and keep your eyes open for dolphins, we saw a small pod of them just after
Manager Response: Dear SallylovesScott,  Thank you for taking the time to share your Detailed review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for more ocean sounds and great memories!   Kind regards,

Summary: Went ahead and did it big at Capri with the  "Beachfront" king and was hoping it would be worth it... It didn't disappoint! The view from the room and porch was absolutely beautiful and is the single reason you want this room. Going to sleep hearing the crashing waves was awesome. Just a short walk down the stairs leads you to the beach. Clean and Spacious room, with updated bathroom shower. Couch with flat screen TV and kitchen with dinning table. Fantastic staff, especially Nick the manager and John at the desk!! Self serve complimentary breakfast with things like waffles, cereal, pastries, and Starbucks machine! If I had to choose a fault, the narrow stairways which could be troublesome for some (elderly, lots of luggage). Complimentary parking, which is rare for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Wayofthefuture,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: We are college professors and after the semester ended we wanted to have a "change of venue" and spend a few days on the beach - so we chose Laguna. The hotel is a 1 mi walk to the downtown shopping area, which allowed us to get in our exercise a number of our 10,000 steps. The hotel is showing its age, but they are working to remodel and the breakfast was more than cold cereal (make your own waffles & pancakes). However the best thing was Bachir Atallah, the Asst. Gen Mgr. Bachir is very friendly and extremely helpful. He made our change of venue a delight! Oh, and if you get at chance to see any of the "Sister's Midnight Catechism" plays at the Laguna Playhouse, don't miss them. It's actually the reason we chose Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear ROBERT R,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We are more than happy to know that your stay with us was a great success. Knowing that you had an enjoyable time and received friendly service certainly makes us happy as we are dedicated to ensure a personalized and warm service to all our guests. Thank you again for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Capri was the perfect get away!  Right above the Pacific shore a few steps away from a walk along the ocean.  Nick, General Mgr., was a master host!  He, along with his staff (John, Gustavo and room service personnel) was warm, down to earth and eager to make our stay as comfortable as possible.  It is an older hotel so it has a California vintage feel which made our stay curious, different and fun.  Close to a number of excellent places to eat and the Laguna Arts Museum.  My husband and I would definitely stay there again!  It was a memory maker for us.
Manager Response: Dear Gary C,  We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us! We strive to provide a genuine and friendly service and reading comments like yours, encourage us to always provide the best. Thank you for choosing us and we can't wait to welcome you back at the "memory maker" Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel!  Kind regards,

Summary: Our trip was AMAZING!!!!! Nick the owner of the Hotel is such a sweet heart. 💖 Me and my mother enjoyed our stay so much , the views, the helpful staff, and the fire place in our room just made everything so perfect.😊 We will #DEFINITELY be coming back, this was my second time at Capri Laguna and it will not be my last. 😁
Manager Response: Dear Lillianna B,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: What a location! We sat at the balcony with a glass of champagne and watched the surfers and seals during the most beautiful sunset. Very nice beach right in front. Good restaurants around. Very friendly staff, especially Emy, we thank you so much for an unforgettable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Santiago M,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your 5 star feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay and our city. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We look forward to have you back.  Kind regards,
