Summary: I loved listening to the sound of waves crashing from my beachfront room. The hotel itself is small and charming and the complimentary Starbucks coffee machine in the lobby was so nice. Perfect location and insane views, this place is a laguna gem.
Manager Response: Dear Leyland M,  It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed at this hotel couple weeks ago. My room was perfect, it got full view of the ocean. There free breakfast every morning, along with Starbucks coffee machine.  John at the front desk always there when I have questions. All the staffs here are friendly. We are planning to be back next year.
Manager Response: Dear L F,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the view from your room. Our staff strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My husband, son and I stayed at Capri Laguna for 3 nights while on vacation.  The location cannot be beat!  We got a room with two queen beds, and it was wonderful that each bed was in a separate room, and each room had its own T.V. and balcony.  We spent a lot of time out on the balcony watching the huge waves come right up to the hotel at high tide.  Just a short walk down the stairs to get right onto the beach. The people at the front desk were very friendly and helpful, and made us feel very welcome!  I recommend you stay at this hotel while in Laguna Beach!  The only reason I didn't give it an excellent score is that the door separating the two sections of our hotel room was broken so it was very difficult to shut, and there was a bit of an old musty smell in the room.
Manager Response: Dear  familytraveller141,  Thank you very much for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. we took under serious consideration the remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay! We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Very Nice place, very good location and à very nice staff. My wife and I arrived without any reservation and they did their best to find us the best room. We had a room with ocean view and it was perfect. The hotel has a direct access to the beach and a free parking which is quite rare in laguna.... the breakfast corner in the lobby is good and very clean despite of the numbers of clients in the hotel. No worry you’ll be fine at the Capri. Thanks to Nikolas and the staff !
Manager Response: Dear Julien F,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean and the hotel's location. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: We love this hotel.  The view, location and staff are great.  The rooms are very clean, with modern amenities.   One you are here you can walk anywhere to eat and shop.  The front desk is very helpful and make you feel welcomed.
Manager Response: Dear Tara S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: When In Laguna, Do Not Stay Anywhere Else!
Summary: What makes this beachfront hotel so wonderful is that it feels like a boutique hotel in Italy or France or The Greek Islands. We had the most amazing ocean view. Not only of the water, but down the beach as well. And at night we could really hear the waves lull us to sleep. We explored Laguna during the day, but at night we got take-out and hung out in our room watching movies because we were so happy there! The managers Nick and Emmy totally took care of us. Nick even put a dozen roses in our room! Plus I fell in love with the Capri Laguna coffee mugs in our room, so I asked Nick if I could buy them, and he gave us 2 mugs as a parting gift! All of the staff were kind and friendly, like a little family. Nick is very good to them as well...once a month he throws a pizza party for
Manager Response: Dear Steven, We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you back  offering  an unforgettable service experience. Best Regards,

Summary Heading: TREMENDOUS Property with Equally Tremendous View!
Summary: My wife and I visited Laguna Beach for two days and chose the Capri for availability and MONSTER view of the Pacific Ocean. We had an excellent time and highly recommend the Capri for YOUR next stay. Words of advice - if you have mobility issues, request help with luggage to your room as there are no elevators. Our was down five flights of stairs and I'm still recovering from hoisting all of our belongings (NOT the motel's fault in any way). On the plus side, the Capri is in an excellent location and has all one would need for an unforgettable vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Curtis F,  Thank you very much for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Our Beachfront King with fireplace was lovely with seating area adjacent to bed. The oversized bathroom looked recently renovated with gray/white marble flooring and rainforest showerhead, as well as modern sink. The private balcony provided us with almost an 180 degree breathtaking view of Laguna and spectacular breaking surf.
Manager Response: Dear gagnonjane,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your room and the view from your balcony. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.   Kind regards,

Summary: Emy and Nick went above & beyond the call of duty.  I don't think Nick takes a day off.   He and Emy are so nice and the staff follows their lead.  They were very pleasant and helpful.  The location is Great!  Everything is within walking distance and Emy has great dining suggestions.  I reserved the Ocean view which was lovely but I upgraded to the Beach front view and I couldn't have made a better choice.  It was worth EVERY penny.  Nick even had ROSES delivered to our room.  I wouldn't say that it is a luxury hotel but the staff and Amazing views more than make up for any flaw that you may find at the hotel.  My husband and I are already planning a return trip.  I can hardly wait!
Manager Response: Dear SHARON G,  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Your feedback is important to us and your words of praise will be shared with our team as well. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had a private room with an absolutely amazing view of the ocean.  Watched the sun set on our patio and had sun there most of the day.  Loved our walks on the beach mornings and evenings.  I have never slept so well until falling asleep to the sound of the waves coming through our patio door...amazing. We will come back and stay in the future!!!
Manager Response: Dear Liza F,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon for more "sound of the waves".   Kind regards,

Summary: Kept the sliding doors open every night and enjoyed the tranquility of the waves crashing to shore. Clean, friendly staff, centrally located, we will be back. Rooms are very clean, well equipped, and the beds are very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear scotangelo,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Had a memorable time! We enjoyed the hotel! Great oceanfront view! Walking distance to the water! Received great service! A variety of restaurants and shops near by. Fireplace in room was awesome and enjoyable with the cool breeze.
Manager Response: Dear Jude M,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The reviews we read before booking, hyped this place up a little when in fact its pretty average and expensive. Maybe its just Laguna is a very expensive area...  We had a standard room - it had a huge air conditioner in there which was on when we got in, and also a fireplace that was also on... guessing this was for effect but a bit silly given its summer and the air conditioner is on full!? The pool is tiny and no room really to sit out but on the beach you can get a chair and an umbrella - there are only a few lay down loungers which was a shame. I had to walk back up to main reception for get the receptionist to radio the beach guy to go get us some chairs...  Breakfast was ok as it was included, the pancakes were rank but the waffles were ok and it was a bit of a novelty
Manager Response: Dear eveie_b,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Thank you to Emy and Nick for a very welcoming stay at Capri laguna. Our room w as great with an amazing view. Our room was spotless. Highly recommended for a nice relaxing, peaceful trip. Perfect for couples.
Manager Response: Dear Daisy G,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our city. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is incredibly close to the water’s edge, the bathrooms are nicely remodeled, it’s within walking distance to Main Beach and many restaurants, and the management is excellent. Yes, the building has some quirks - the ceilings are low in places and you’ll see some rust spots in some areas due to the salt air. As others have said, it’s not the Ritz - but as long as you adjust your expectations and know this is a classic PCH beach hotel, it’s fantastic. We’d go back in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear goingapril,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: The management will do anything for you,  This is not the ritz it is cali beach style with simple clean rooms and oceanfront. loved it. Left windows open and listened to wave all pm. The pool is small but who needs a pool at the beach.
Manager Response: Dear 213kevin,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: We stayed here for a Babylon and were so impressed. It is beautiful and located right on the beach. Fall asleep to the sound of waves, so nice. The staff went above and beyond. When our tv wasn't working in our room they upgraded and moved us right away. We enjoyed a wonderful breakfast on the patio overlooking the water and it was unforgettable. Close to everything. My only complaint is that the walls are thin and we had neighbors who were talking so loud the entire night which kinda ruined the whole " falling asleep to the sound of waves" experience. I loved that you could walk right onto the beach and they set up our chairs and everything. I really recommend this hotel,for a relaxing beach getaway.
Manager Response: Dear Mary R,  Thank you for sharing you 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: Staying at Capri Laguna make you feel like a real VACATION! Rooms are so beautiful with  gorgeous view. Great hospitality, very friendly crew.  Beautiful receptionist EMY always has a beautiful smile to welcome you, NICK, the manager is such a nice and friendly guy that you'll never forget him and has a great sense of humor.  JOHN is another receptionist so adorable  and friendly, and the hard worker SELINA she always brighten your day with her big smile and kindness.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had great stay my suggestion only sea view room Mr's emy was the best service very kind women with a smile all the time I liked the sound of the sea will sleeping parking is free many shops and restaurants in the area
Manager Response: Dear Hussain A,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the sound of the ocean and our city. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great location, just steps off the beach
Summary: We chose this hotel because I remembered staying here back when I was in high school.  You do need to remember that this an old hotel that is constrained from making any external changes due to it's location. You could not ever get approval to build a hotel down the front of that cliff and right onto the beach! That makes it a sort of time capsule and really pretty cool.  We booked an ocean front room and the view from our patio was amazing.  The ocean is so loud that the sound filled our room all night. The room itself was pretty basic-like many hotels built in this era the ceiling was low and the only real light comes from the sliding glass door that looked over the ocean.  It was comfortable, but a little dark for my taste.  Next trip we will probably spend a little more to
Manager Response: Dear Cindy R,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your detailed review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience and rest assured that we take under consideration all remarks. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: We have stayed in this hotel 3 times already and every time we've received excellent services.  Nick, Bachir and Emy went out of their way to provide excellent accommodation. Great location, steps from the beach. Clean, comfortable bed. Nice remodeled shower. Place is under contraction, however it caused only a minimal impact to our stay. We will definitely visit this hotel next summer again.
Manager Response: Dear annaamloian,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. Our staff strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: Excellent customer service, Nick (general manager) went out of his way to ensure our stay was amazing.  Fantastic location too :) Just a few steps from the beach. I️ would highly recommend this hotel! 🏝⛱😀
Manager Response: Dear Johan, We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views, the relaxing vibe of the Ocean and our beautiful City. Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback too. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming   you and Jasmin back  offering  an unforgettable upscaled service experience. Best Regards,

Summary: Good location and pleasant staff, and my bed seemed clean.  I want to give credit where credit is due.  Everything else was SCARY.  My room smelled heavily of disinfectant/industrial-strength chemicals not unlike a urinal puck.  There was mysterious 'stuff' spilled on the trim and walls throughout the room and bathroom.  Half of the hooks of the curtains - on both windows - had fallen off (or were pulled off) and nobody has ever thought to put them back on.  Evidence of water damage is prevalent in the bathroom which has caused a lot of gross corners and areas.  I wore sandals the entire time because there was NO WAY I would let any part of my body touch the carpet or floor.  There is a makeshift 'kitchenette' with a small bar fridge, coffee maker and microwave.  It was sitting
Manager Response: Please allow us this opportunity to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback which although not necessarily pleasant for us is absolutely valuable as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns.   Thank you for acknowledging the staff’s effort. The hotel’s team tries the best to make sure that we meet all of our guest’s demands with respect to each individual.  We would like to reassure you that we have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay and we also understand the importance of feeling  comfortable in the room.  We have already communicated with the appropriate departments so as to improve the quality of our service and facilities and avoid similar incidents in the future. Let us know which day would you like to come to Laguna Beach and I will take of your reservation personally. We will be looking forward to welcome you back in our property and have the chance to regain your trust. Best regards,

Summary: So for our 10 year wedding anniversary my wife and I stayed at this hotel. We decided to book this hotel based on the reviews, pictures, and ratings. Well..... The reviews were wrong. We drove up to the hotel and parked in the parking lot to notice the front facade of the hotel roof was missing. The hotel didn't appear to under construction. We checked into the hotel and immediately noticed there was a portable A/C unit in our room. I mean really portable AC not even window mounted. The AC was not quiet and kept us up most of the night. The towel bar in the bath room fell off the wall. The lights which illuminated the beach were awesome for walking on the beach at night. These lights also shinned in the room and kept you awake at night. When we left for dinner that night we
Manager Response: Allow us this opportunity to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback which although not necessarily pleasant for us is absolutely valuable as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns.   We would like to reassure you that we have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay and we also understand the importance of feeling  comfortable in the room.  We have already communicated with the appropriate departments so as to improve the quality of our service and facilities and avoid similar incidents in the future. Let us know which day would you like to come to Laguna Beach and I will take of your reservation personally. We will be looking forward to welcome you back in our property and have the chance to regain your trust. Best regards,

Summary Heading: nice sunsets, lots of steps, wonderful pool,Friday's wine and cheese...
Summary: our room was an ocean view, not a beach view. It was fine. We had a small but lovely porch with chairs and a table and a lounge chair. Fresh bottles of water everyday. Because of the king tides there wasn't much beach. There were lounge chairs just above where the beach would have been. They do have chairs for the beach and towels.   There are also pool towels for the pool. Our room was small and I opted for  a queen bed( it was cheaper than the king room),tv, nice clean bathroom. There is fresh coffee in the lobby. Also a nice little breakfast there too. The walk to and from Laguna Beach center was fine. Just about a mile each way.I would go back and stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy, We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us, especially for pointing out our location, facilities, and service. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgettable service experience.

Summary: Our room was very comfortable and had easy access to the beach.  The Staff-Nick, Emy, and Mafry- were very friendly and accommodating.  The person on the beach was also friendly.  We enjoyed our stay and will be back.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the relaxing ocean and our beautiful city. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The Ladies and Gentlemen of our Capri Laguna team will look forward to welcoming you back offering an unforgetabble service experience.

Summary: Hats off to the staff (Emy, Mafry and Nick ) at Capri laguna for saving our anniversary ! We Had a  reservation with another small hotel on the beach in laguna - even  though I had printed documents - they were not able to fulfill the reservation . I was so distressed . I found a room at the Capri and called and talked to Nick the general manager . He was such a kind man ! He told me to come down and he would get me a room ! He is an angel ! The rest of the staff were just as incredible !!!!  We ended up in a beautiful beach front room ! I can not say enough about this cute boutique hotel on  the beach in Laguna ! Amazing !
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience during your recent stay at Capri Laguna. We are always pleased to hear that our guests enjoy our property and the city of Laguna Beach. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.

Summary: Our stay was very nice, the person at the reception was named John and he was very helpful! We upgraded to a room with a pool view and it was worth it, we could see the ocean from the balcony and it was more spacious. The one thing I didn't care for much was the smell in the room, it felt stuffy as it hadn't been aired in a while.
Manager Response: Dear AnaGomesPortugal,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: While not a 5 Star Hotel. The  service and views were 5 Star. Having a room right on the beach can be a little noisy hearing the waves crashing during the night. But you get use to it after the first night. Friday between 5 and 6 pm is wine and cheese night on the  upper deck while watching the sunset. Would definitely stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Augie C,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will definitely be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: Our stay started off a bit rocky. The website tripadvisor promised us an "ocean front view" but we were given a room with a horrible view. Although I had to pay a little extra they set us up in a wonderful room with a great view. The general manager Nick Politis took every step to make sure my girl and I had a wonderful stay. He felt horrible we had to pay a bit extra so he bought us a bottle of wine and gave us one of the nicest rooms they had to offer.
Manager Response: Dear Jason W,  Thank you for your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Once again thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star review. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri is a decent old beach motel that would like to be a boutique hotel, most likely so they can charge $400+/night that they do.  It’s an old building with a funky layout, no elevators. The rooms are basic with some attempts to boutique, but the towels, service,  breakfast, furnishings are very basic.    On the positive side, the location is great - can’t get closer to the beach.  Leaving the door open at night, the waves can almost be too loud if that’s possible.   Our stay was just adequate -the value isn’t there.
Manager Response: Dear RalphandMark,  Thank you for sharing your feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience. It is our continuous effort to provide a relaxing and comfortable experience for all of our guests. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. Thank you once more for choosing us and we hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to better serve you.  Kind regards,

Summary: Warm , welcoming and friendly staff. Clean and inviting rooms with spectacular ocean views. Steps from the beach. Excellent, complimentary breakfasts 8-10 and complimentary Starbucks coffee all day. Within easy walking distance of numerous restaurants and shops. I have stayed twice and will do so again.
Manager Response: Dear Joe C,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for your loyalty and for sharing your 5 star feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The hotel was the highlight of our stay in Laguna Beach. It was right on the beach, and and had several verandas for guests to sit out and look out at the water even if you didn't have an oceanfront balcony.  We loved relaxing out there with a cocktail after a hard afternoon of shopping. The room was excellent and had recently been renovated. Do recommend you get a room with at least an ocean view. Worth it.   Many restaurants and bars within walking distance. Don't be put off about the stairs. It is no big deal and they have someone to carry your suitcases if you want.
Manager Response: Dear Jackie C,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Very old hotel.  Make sure you wear your walking shoes.  There is no elevator and the steps are very steep.  There is a nice open balcony for the guests to sit at and enjoy the view but it's not from your room.  For the price, over $300, I was very disappointed.  Does include a decent buffet breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear rhonda c,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Felt like we were in a Villa in Italy. Staff were very friendly and accomdiating. Loved location, walking distance to shops and restaurants.  Enjoyed our morning coffee on our oceanfront balcony. Loved both pool and beach. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear theoaks1954,  We are Delighted to hear that you had a great stay and you enjoyed our city, the wonderful location and the services of our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for sharing your 5 star feedback and for choosing us. We will definitely look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: How could the third highest ranking hotel in Laguna secretly be a dump?   Well, we discovered they have an amazing marketing firm. The photos online show all the best attributes like newly renovated bathrooms and none of the pitfalls. The reviews all mention the customer service is great. We found that when we did ask, our requests were met and with friendly smiles to boot. But please realize that when we were asking the employees for something, it was because what was offered was unacceptable.   Our first room reeked of mildew. They happily moved us next door. That room while larger, was very stuffy even with the freestanding air conditioner running. Said air conditioner soaked the carpet. Hmmm I wonder where the mildew is coming from....  A dirty and used coffee mug was left
Manager Response: Dear BigEasyMadeMeFoodie,  Thank you for sharing your feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience. It is our continuous effort to provide a relaxing and comfortable experience for all of our guests. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. Thank you once more for choosing us and we hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to better serve you.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: I wanted a spectacular beachfront hotel for our wedding anniversary
Summary: The staff at Capri Laguna Inn went over and above to make sure our stay was perfect.  We arrived early because we could only stay on Friday night, the front desk quickly prepared our room while we went out for lunch.  When we checked in to our room there was a beautiful bouquet of roses from Nick Politis, hotel General Manager.  The room was clean and the ocean view was amazing. Friday nights the hotel offers a complimentary wine and cheese reception.  The personal touch the staff provided throughout our entire stay truly made our anniversary a special occasion.  We will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear di32haas,  We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief! Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor and The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to see you soon. Our best wishes for your anniversary.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had a beach-front room.  Beautiful, beautiful view.  On a clear day, one can see Catalina Island.  Very relaxing stay.  You'll enjoy it.  Laguna Beach is wonderful for just walking around.  Lots of good restaurants, etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for 1 night in a row with the ocean view. Everything was amazing! The view, the room, the bed, the bathroom, the breakfast & the staff were all awesome. I did not use the pool but it looked nice. I would definitely return if I have the chance!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good service, rooms, and great beach location.  We came in unannounced and the counter staff was great. Worked with us and showed us rooms to find us the right one for us. It is definitely and older building and they have done a pretty good job maintaining with some recent updates. The room was clean and the bed and pillows were comfortable. For some reason though the bed frame is bigger than the bed so it hangs out so I smacked my toe. You will see in my pic.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked my trip directly with the manager/owner Nikolaos Politis (Nick) who was able to secure me a great deal on a beautiful oceanfront room. We were able to check in early and the room was beautiful and very clean with the best ocean view and balcony. All I can say is the service was excellent and I am looking forward to spending my next birthday here!
Manager Response: Dear Ashley M,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: great to fall asleep with the sound of the surf, outstanding service.
Summary: The reviews decided me on booking at Capri as many were raving about the service. They were right. They are very attentive to make sure you get a great experience. Beach at the bottom, though narrow at high tide, is great; you can walk all the way to downtown by the beach without going on the road, and it is an easy and enjoyable 1 mile. We had a queen room, not very big but just enough as we spent most of the time outside. View from the room was good, but the best was to listen to the surf morning and evening in bed. Very smoothing. Would happily return to this boutique hotel. Only aspect they could improve: American breakfast is ok, not great. but at least you can bring it to the rooftop and have breakfast while watching the Ocean. Thank you to the Greek manager and staff.
Manager Response: Dear Philippe_DC,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for sharing your 5 star feedback and we are looking forward to seeing you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: I want to start by saying many, many thank you's to the general manager Nick Politis, his assistant manager Bachir Atallah and the entire staff at Capri Laguna.   The beach hotel was the perfect place for us to celebrate our honeymoon. The breathtaking views of the ocean, the fabulous sunsets topped by an outstanding, friendly, accommodating staff made this vacation filled with greatest memories of a lifetime.  We will never forget the kindness and hospitality of Nick and his staff from the first call I made to find the right room and book our stay to the moment we checked out. It was everything we had hoped it would be and much more.   Starting the day of with a nice breakfast in the lobby including Starbucks coffee then to the beach chairs with umbrella and towels, swimming in
Manager Response: Dear John G,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and we will be looking forward to welcoming you back to our city.  Kind regards,

Summary: I loved the location of the boutique hotel.  My room was small but exceptionally clean.  If you stay at this hotel accept that you will hear outside activity in your room.    My only real "issue" was the room air conditioner was pretty loud - I had to shut it off to be able to sleep
Manager Response: Dear carolyn l,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed the weekend at the Capri.  It was a short getaway for us but we came home so relaxed!  The hotel is adorable and reminded us of our many stays in European islands in Greece and Italy.  The minute you walk into the lobby the staff is very friendly and welcoming.  The manager, Nick is very conscientious and goes out of his way to ensure that all of his guests are happy.  Our room was clean, spacious and had the most amazing ocean view.  We went to the beach and a young man Constantine (the beach assistant)  was so attentive and helpful to ensure we had chairs, towels and umbrella placed exactly where we wanted.    The hotel also offers a great breakfast to start your day.  It also has free Starbucks coffee all day and we were offered warm cookies during the
Manager Response: Dear vangiedupas,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had three nights in this lovely hotel. We booked a king room with fireplace overlooking the ocean. The room was large and comfortable and the balcony area was a great place to visit with some friends.  There is also a rooftop area for the guests to enjoy the sunset from. It is amazingly close to the water… Hear the sound of the surf all night long. The room came with a microwave, coffeemaker and refrigerator but there are no utensils provided so if you go and want to make food  you do you need to bring your own.  There is no restaurant on the site but it is conveniently located to many restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Dear desertgirle,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our services and the hotel location. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to have you again in the future.   Kind regards,

Summary: The first time I stayed at Capri Laguna was with my fiance for my birthday.  He found it, and surprised me with a birthday weekend.  We both fell in love with it immediately.  This past week I planned a Mom/Daughter weekend for one of my sister turning 50.  It was the most amazing time!  The location of this hotel is beautiful.  It is boutique, interesting, stairs everywhere, and one of the most beautiful views from any of the ocean front rooms.   There is a small area for a continental breakfast each morning and several decks to settle in and have coffee and danish while waiting for the sun to come up.   The staff is friendly and extremely accommodating.  They want to ensure you have a pleasant stay.   I will come again, and again, and again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Gorgeous view, warm and friendly boutique hotel!
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Capri the last three nights while I was in town on business.  Each time we were in the lobby during our stay the gentlemen introduced themselves by name.   It was small touches like that which made the stay such a pleasure. The view from our room was unbelievable and we loved the balcony with two chairs, a table and a lounge chair.  The location was perfect for walking down the beach or dining on the main street.  The free breakfast was a welcome surprise.  They had fresh pastries each morning that were delicious along with Starbucks coffee, assortment of teas, cereal and fruit.  We had a very early flight out of town and the team at Capri was thoughtful enough to have the pastries out early (5:15AM!!) for our departure.  It was a pleasure staying
Manager Response: Dear FAMFUNSEEKERS,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: The inn is located in a great location and sits right on the beach. The property was built in 1954 and has a mid-century look and feel. Our room was wonderful, it had two balconies, one overlooking the ocean and the other looking down over the garden. We had two queen size beds. The best part was this room (room 733) was like a suite with two rooms and a kitchenette in the middle. The bathrooms have all been remodeled with glass showers and marble floors. They serve a bountiful free breakfast and free Starbucks coffee all day. Nick Politis, the GM was very nice as was the rest of the staff. If you want to get away for a romantic interlude this is the place or if you are just in the area for business or are passing though, you'll be delighted, it's like taking a trip to Italy or
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Low quality hotel at high end price
Summary: We stayed at Capri Laguna on 9/9/17 during a trip from Los Angeles to San Diego.  Upon arrival the hotel is very small so there was no place to park so we were directed to a sketchy lot beside and abandoned liquor store.  Before I go any further this place is a skip for older people or people with disabilities some on the rooms like ours are down three flights of steps will others are up steps (No elevators).  I saw a couple of deferent elderly people being helped by their loved ones who were out of breath and struggling. Upon arrival to out room it had an overwhelming smell of must and staleness, imagine when you have not visited you grandparents in a while and you first walk into their house. The accommodations were ok, on par with a quality or red roof inn.  One thing that
Manager Response: Dear jmoney931,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks about the rooms and its’ features. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful beach front paradise on the sand!
Summary: This hotel was basic and simple, but a bargain compared to other similar hotels in the area. My hotel room included a huge, comfortable shower, a fireplace, and - best of all- a spacious private balcony that overlooked the ocean. The patio outside my room had a short staircase that led directly onto the sand. All of the staff were extremely helpful and friendly. The hotel was also located directly next to Surf & Sand Resort, which includes an on-site restaurant, spa, bar, etc. There was also a complimentary wine and cheese night at Capri Laguna one night while I was there! Will definitely return. It's a perfect location for a mellow, restorative trip.
Manager Response: Dear sfazli89,  Thank you for taking the time and sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm their belief! The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel looks forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Peaceful and Serene Stay at the Capri
Summary: Very unique hotel designed to feel like you are in Capri Italy.  As you walk around the hotel and zig and zag down to the beach you'll feel like you are in the mediterrean.  Very different and super charming.  This was an anniversary trip and the perfect way to kick it off!  Didn't feel like you were stay at a loud and cliche resort similar to what you'll find next door.  The staff was amazing and so welcoming.  A 10/10.  Our room was directly overlooking the beach and with windows wide open the entire time it was incredibly relaxing.  The room was clean and up to date, but don't expect any major thrills.  It will have a more European feel where it's less about the amenities and more about the environment.  If you are looking for a super relaxing, quiet and romantic stay, this
Manager Response: Dear kevinlindsayp,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: I own Massage shop at Laguna Beach  Near Capri hotel (Spa Eiko Massage)  Since my best friend came to Laguna Beach, I also took a One day vacation and stayed at this Hotel.The staff was very friendly. The breakfast was absolutely beautiful and an experience personally thanks to Manager Nick !!! He is the best .Amazing property...very well maintained and very good and friendly staff I should plan for another visit.
Manager Response: Dear Keiko T,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star detailed review on Tripadvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us and the entire city. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more memories and great experience.   Kind regards,

Summary: Dog friendly, breathtaking views from multiple room layouts, comfortable beds and free breakfast!  The shared beachfront patio areas ensure that you can enjoy the gorgeous beach views no matter which room you select.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Hidden Gem in Laguna Beach
Summary: My husband & I stayed here for my 61st birthday. We typically stay at the Surf & Sand, but wanted to explore something different. This boutique hotel significantly EXCEEDED our expectations!!!  The beachfront room was beautifully decorated and had a kitchenette with a refrigerator & microwave. Each morning a generous breakfast of pancakes, waffles, hard boiled eggs, bagels, toast, pastries, cold & hot cereal, fresh fruit and Starbucks coffee was available as a part of your room charge. On Friday evening the hotel hosted a beautiful reception with wine, cheese, veggies & fresh fruit. Every night ended with freshly baked chocolate chip cookies. Two bottles of water were also provided each day at no extra cost. The hotel is centrally located within walking distance of many
Manager Response: Dear ClipboardofFun,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Execptional Holiday Weekend Get a Way
Summary: Our weekend get a way at the Capri Laguna on the Beach was everything we wanted or needed and more. Upon checking in we were warmly greeted by Bachir and Nick.  Our room was clean, decent sized and neatly appointed with a gorgeous view. We enjoyed the beach without having to bring a thing.  The large deck with Chaise lounges and tables was perfect for morning coffee or evening sunsets.   The staff was beyond friendly and accomodating.  This Boutique hotel is a refreshing change from the huge corporate style resorts!  Service  was outstanding and we had a wonderful weekend.  Location is excellent. Walking to art galleries, restaurants, shops was an  added to the convenience.   We will no doubt be returning to the Capri for another exceptional  get a way as soon as possible.
Manager Response: Dear luv2travel642017,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Kind regards,

Summary: I spent 2 night at this hotel.  It was wonderful, the room was amazing.  It is such a charming property and the rooms are so comfortable.  The hotel staff were fantastic and so accommodating.  The made our stay even better than what we imagined.  The property is beautiful and oceanfront.  I feel this was the best hotel stay I have had in a long time.  We will be going back in December and we are so excited to stay there again..  Thank you so much Capri Laguna on the Beach.  Can't wait to come back in December.  If you choose to stay there you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear debsbanni,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your 5 star feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We look forward to have you back in December.  Kind regards,

Summary: My girlfriend and I wanted a girls' getaway trip close to Carlsbad but far enough away so it was a different city.  Wow--did we discover the cutest boutique hotel in Laguna Beach-The Capri Inn!  It is right on the beach so after a yummy breakfast in town you go down to the beach and an attendant gives you chairs, umbrellas and towels.  You feel like you're at a resort in Europe!  Nick Politis, the general manager, is so warm and welcoming--he makes you feel like you're the VIP guest at the hotel! And he has the best team-John at the front desk, Constantine down at the beach--every staff member makes sure you feel welcomed and looked after.  Nick has created a really warm, sophisticated oasis in the midst of Laguna!  And, to top if off, there's a delicious continental breakfast
Manager Response: Dear kathglass2,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Charming, Quirky, Lovable Laguna Beach Hideaway
Summary: My husband and I adore this place. If you are looking for a corporate-run, cookie-cutter resort experience, look elsewhere, this is NOT the hotel for you. If you want a small, intimate, charming, one-off resort hotel that is unique and fun, make your reservation at Capri Laguna on the Beach. Our ocean-view room was scrupulously clean, with a nicely renovated bathroom and a comfortable bed and a balcony where we could have our morning coffee and watch the waves crash on the beach below. The location was great-- just south of downtown but a block or two from a bunch of good restaurants and across the street from Main Street Bar. Check-in staff went the extra mile to ensure our birthday visit was extra-special (thanks, Bachir!). We will be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Russ_W_and_Kevin_E,  We are pleased to read that you had a great time at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and thank you for sharing this 5 star feedback with us. We are glad to read that you have received friendly and courteous service throughout your stay. Thank you again and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,

Summary: Bashir was friendly, helpful and professional!!! The room and view were wonderful. Not impressed with the loud portable air conditioner. For the price of a beachfront room, I would appreciate better air conditioning. The beach chairs and unbrellas were wonderful!! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear beachlady2014,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.   Kind regards,

Summary: We had such a relaxing stay here! It is an older hotel but we had no issues at all with our stay. Our room was very clean and we slept to the waves crashing every night. John at the front desk was so helpful and friendly! Parking is free and we never had an issue finding a spot. Beach chairs are provided and we had a wonderful time relaxing and watching the sunsets. My partner was slightly obsessed with making his own waffles every morning at the free breakfast and the Starbucks machine was great! We will definitely return!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 3 nights. A family of 4 with kids 8 and 11 yrs. We booked a dbl Queen room with ocean view. We had assumed that the room would be 2 queens in one room, but we were rapt to find the rooms were separate and we had a small kitchen area with sink mini fridge and microwave. We loved hearing the waves crash all night. It was great to swim out front of hotel, walk to tide pools, and swim in the pool. And we could walk to restaurants too. A great relaxing trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family & I stayed at the Capri a couple weeks ago. Hotel was charming & clean. We all had a fantastic time & the staff was very friendly. Nick P. at the front desk was very helpful & the beach attendants were on top of everything. Our kids had a great time at the beach & the pool. We had a beautiful view of the water right from our room. We hope to visit again next time we're in California!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Charming Hotel Right on the Ocean
Summary: Me and my boyfriend just got back from a wonderful stay at the Capri over the weekend. We drove down from LA to attend Pageant of the Masters, and spent Saturday night in Laguna Beach.  We arrived around Noon, and we were able to immediately check in. John greeted us with a big smile, and gave us some tips about where to eat lunch and dinner in Laguna. He suggested Dizz's As Is (which was incredible!) for dinner, and K'ya, which has a rooftop bar where you can also have lunch. All of the employees at this charming little hotel are warm and friendly.  The hotel is older and it has been refurbished. White Grecian statues are everywhere, which adds to the fun, beachy décor. Our room (#722) was very clean and nice, and right on the ocean!!! The patio overlooks the ocean, and it has
Manager Response: Dear Lynda T,  Such beautiful reviews are always a pleasure to read. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: The rooms were small but clean and the bathrooms seemed newly remodeled. Pool was in middle of courtyard. They offer wine and cheese for one hour during weekdays. It's a lot of steps down to beach level from main level. Parking is limited but they offer free parking at their private lot nearby - one car per hotel room only. You need to find parking on the street otherwise. Lots of great bars and restaurants within walking distance. They offer free coffee, pastries, cereal and juice in the morning. Overall, great stay! The hotel staff were friendly, especially Nick and John.
Manager Response: Dear Joanne F,  Thank you for your kind words and compliments. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Once again thank you for your recent stay and sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Cool beach side property.  5 star staff team.  What a find.
Summary: Excellent property with stylish rooms, amazing public spaces for all customers, wonderful atmosphere.  You don't need the beach front rooms to love this place.  All rooms hear the waves and you see beach from everywhere on the property.  There are many wonderful patios with quality tables and chairs to sit by the sea.  A beach chair and umbrella is yours for the asking!  A carry out dinner with a bottle of wine on the patio is the best table in Laguna!  People playing on the beach, surfers and waves, beautiful sunset.  There is nothing missing here!  The staff team is top notch.  Everyone friendly and helpful and make you feel welcome.  They even found some camomile tea for me at bedtime!  I'll be back with all of my family!
Manager Response: Dear MM031508,  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Nice and clean hotel on the beach
Summary: We stayed for one night. The hotel is located on the beach, but beach is small and not enough space for many people. You can walk to the main beach (long walk) or use the free shuttles (Laguna beach city has free buses and trolleys in the summer for tourists and they are very clean and convenient. You can even get to Dana point by transferring to Dana point shuttle near the Ritz). Free breakfast and drinks during the day. We enjoyed watching sunset on the hotel lanai while sipping hot cocoa. The guy checking us in was grumpy but he did accommodate an early check in and probably also upgraded us a bit to a room with obstructed ocean views, so I don't know what to feel about him. Overall a nice hotel!
Manager Response: Dear EileenF,  Thank you for taking time to review the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel as well for your detail feedback about our city. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you once more  for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A great on the beach choice in Laguna. .
Summary: An unique and interesting, very pleasant Laguna Beach hotel. The staff were all most friendly, professional, and helpful. For us, it's all about the beach. This is a great beach location where you can watch the surfers, or partake yourself. They have an attendant to assist with chairs, umbrellas and lounges for hotel guests. Next door is a very upscale hotel with a wonderful bar and restaurant right on the beach. A beautiful walk on the beach to the heart of Laguna Beach or you can take a free trolley up and down PCH north to Laguna or south to Dana Point, and more. Our room was higher up and had an ocean view, but also a large portion of the roof below to look at. A little patio outside the room. Room was adequately comfortable and clean if a bit small. There are some nice
Manager Response: Dear RRGainey1,  Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed review on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a very beautiful time with us. Your feedback is important to us and your words of praise will be shared with our team as well. We definitely look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: It was a beautiful day and we enjoyed our lunch on the patio of the greeters corner café in Laguna BeachThe chowder was not as hot as I like it but it was tasty. Don't bother eating the bread. The salads and chicken we're good as well.
Manager Response: Dear Tzipster,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Cute, small hotel on the beach
Summary: Vacationed in Laguna end of July and, though we travel to Laguna a lot, have never stayed at this hotel before. It is on the beach. Wonderful view, helpful staff. Chairs, umbrellas and towels provided for no additional charge. Free breakfast had a lot of options. Hard boiled eggs, pancakes, waffles, yogurt, cereal, etc. Nice location.
Manager Response: Dear Christy N,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My sisters and I chose this hotel for our one night stay in Laguna Beach due to it's location in town and proximity to the ocean. We had a comfortable night sleep, two of us on the king bed and one on the pull out couch. We really enjoyed the outside common area in front of our room, where we sipped on ice cold wine while listening to the waves crash below us.  What really impressed me, though, was the extra-personal service of the manager, Nick.  I really liked the accent color of a wall in our room and asked if he could possibly find the name of that color for me.  Within a day, he e-mailed me the color.   I would definitely come back and stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Karin B,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests . Thank you once more for choosing us and for your comments. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great location, lovely hotel, friendly and helpful staff.
Summary: Best priced hotel on the ocean in Laguna Beach. Some of the best sleep I ever had. Sleeping with open windows and doors when the ocean is about 120 ft away from your bedroom is an awesome experience. I recommend this hotel whole heartedly.
Manager Response: Dear Allon A,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor.  We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: We recently enjoyed a stay at Capri and would recommend it.  The location is awesome; right on the beach and the folks working there were extremely nice and accommodating.  We enjoyed the pool, beach, our balcony and the unit itself was very comfortable.  We had a slight issue that came up, but it was addressed very quickly and professionally.  Great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Brian K,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel. Our staff strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us and for your nice comments. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Bachir, Assistant GM, made this experience move from poor to amazing, but the accommodations were still, unfortunately, disappointing. I paid top dollar for a room with a loud and portable air conditioning unit and average linens which was first located above the lobby by the street. Bachir made arrangements to update our accommodations which were great. The linens are average and the hotel tacky with narrow stairs everywhere. Also there's no restaurant onsite.
Manager Response: Dear mom2asweetp,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks about the rooms and its’ features. Thank you for praising our staff, We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: First and foremost I want to thank Nick the manager of Capri for making my stay feel like home.  I lost my four legged daughter on Thursday and wanted to spend time on the beach listening to the waves and feeling the sand on my feet.  I left feeling at peace and cared for by Nick and John.  The view and balcony were just what I needed to help me heal.  My room had everything I needed.   Thank you so much for everything 😎Nancy from Redlands Ca
Manager Response: Dear Nancy G,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our city. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Capri Laguna in July 2017,  We had a room on the ground floor facing the ocean.  It was heaven!  We listened to the crashing waves all night.  We had such a wonderful stay.  The staff was so nice.  Constantine was wonderful setting up our chairs on the beach and answering any questions we had.  We also had a luggage mix up and picked up the wrong luggage (nothing to do with Capri).  We finally got it resolved and the general manager Nick had a dozen red roses delivered to our room.  Breakfast was nice and the coffee good.  We will definitely return.  One of our favorite trips!  We highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The only place to stay when you come to Laguna Beach
Summary: This is a true gem in Laguna that is right on the beach. Bachir and Nick were extremely inviting, courteous and genuinely wanted to ensure your stay exceed your expectations. Outside of the beachfront access, and fantastic customer service...parking, breakfast and beach lounge chairs were included and you will find this isn't the norm in Laguna . We have officially found our "goto" spot in Laguna...look no further as this is the perfect boutique stay right on the beach. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My friend and I arrived at Capri, Laguna for the first time and were greeted by Nick and John who were extremely welcoming and friendly. We came to this hotel for a relaxing experience and thats exactly what we had. I would for sure come back!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff.  The location is fabulous.  Breakfast is sparse, but the coffee is great.  Get it from the pot by the door if the machine is busy.  Lots of stairs, so be prepared for that.  The AC units in the room do a great job of keeping the rooms cool.  The beach staff was very helpful also.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Professional, friendly staff in Prime Location
Summary: We highly recommend. Our room was very comfortable, newly renovated and clean. The location on the beach is perfect. Best of all, the staff is very friendly and professional. Nick knows how to manage his boutique hotel. A special thank you to John at the front desk who was very accommodating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great place for a couple's retreat.  The location is outstanding (right on the beach) and the size of the property is perfect (cozy and quaint).  The hotel rooms are clean and have a/c.  The grounds are kept tidy.  More important, the staff and front desk (Nick and Bachir) are fabulous.  My wife found this gem earlier this year and we were just back for a quick getaway.  No doubt that we will be back again sooner than later.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful view and great service! Unique hotel with lots of private balconies and sitting areas.  Beach chairs and towels provided and set up by Capri . Newly renovated bathrooms  Great location with many restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nick, manager,  helped us with directions to Irvine Spectrum and gave us hints about how to get there.  Bachir, assistant manager, helped me with my luggage and always has a cheerful smile and great attitude.  Finally,  a young man (sorry I don't remember his name) who worked on Friday night helped my friend whose car had a dead battery.  The young man called a tow service that came and provided a jump start.  Everyone is so helpful and cheerful.  Of course the view is incredible and the room is very comfortable.  My stay was very relaxing.  Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I found the front desk people very helpful and polite. I requested another room and they immediately sent someone to show me one more to my liking. The people that do not know Laguna Beach should be aware that every hotel has a lot of stairs to the beach. It is how Laguna is situated. Being up high gives you wonderful ocean vistas they should appreciate. The hotel is older but well maintained. The rooms are nicely furnished and attractive.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location and great boutique Hotel.
Summary: This is our third stay at the Capri.  Lovely Oceanview rooms. Nick and John are very helpful at the Front desk.  Easy access and great beach. Salanne's Steak house is directly across the street and is Excellent. We will be back next yr.!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing stay, beautiful room and view, and the service was outstanding. We were brought roses on our anniversary, who does that? Great place, great staff. Beach front access, they will even set up chairs and umbrella. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. We shall return.
Manager Response: Dear David M,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for sharing your feedback and we are looking forward to seeing you soon. Our best wishes for your anniversary.   Kind regards,

Summary: Perfect location, clean and comfortable room, wonderful staff. Starbucks coffee, continental breakfast, happy hour, beach chairs. I couldn't ask for more. Well worth the price!!!! We will definitely be back. Just a charming unpretentious place!
Manager Response: Dear Susan H,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.    Kind regards,

Summary Heading: We LOVED our stay at The Capri! Ocean Front, Fantastic beach access!
Summary: You can NOT beat the location. Ocean Front beach access from the hotel. Beach chairs and umbrellas provided. The staff is fantastic. Professional yet warm. This is an older hotel that has been updated a bit, it's has a funky "Capri" vibe that keeps the feeling casual and relaxed. The location is walking distance to shops, restaurants and bars. We stayed in an oceanfront room #302 and loved it! Free parking too!
Manager Response: Dear hlindemenn,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and we will be looking forward to welcoming you back to our city.  Kind regards,

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights with my family of 5. Large enough room to accommodate us without feeling crowded. Room was clean and beds were comfortable. Hotel is right on the beach which was wonderful. location of the hotel was perfect with the free trolley right outside. We would definitely recommend for a wonderful stay in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Brooklyndreams,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Lovely boutique hotel steps from the beach
Summary: My husband and I stayed here to celebrate our 10 year wedding anniversary. For a lower price than many of the other hotels nearby, this hotel was perfect. We had a small, ocean-view room which was just 10 steps from the beach. The room was clean, modern, and the bed was comfortable. When you get down to the beach area, there is an attendant who brings you chairs, an umbrella, and water. Compared to the public beach area, the beach around this hotel is not as busy and the rocks and coves are beautiful. All of the people at the front desk were very friendly, especially the manager, Alex. I highly recommend this hotel! I wish we could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: Dear Sara C,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Our best wishes for your anniversary.  Kind regards,

Summary: Great place, a bit high for a good ocean front room $400.  I would recommend it. Coffee machine, simple breakfast included... clean place. The bbq was dirty and not working properly. The service was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Riversideteacher,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future.  Kind regards,

Summary: I come to Laguna every year to unwind and being close to the ocean. I choose a different hotel on the beach every time. Capri was amazing. They have huge patio overlooking a beach where you can sit down and read your book. They do wine tasting daily where you will have a chance to meet one of the hotel executives. Their complimentary breakfast with fireplace is pretty good. They provide fresh newspapers as well. The hotel stuff is very friendly and location is great. Big shoutout to bathroom, the rain shower was amazing. I will be back. Make sure you book oceanfront room.
Manager Response: Dear ILoveOrangeCounty,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Absolutely loved almost everything about it
Summary: I've stayed at this place twice, once for a solo vacay and once as a couple. I love it. There's free parking, free breakfast and free wifi. It's right on the beach so you can just walk down the steps and be right on the sand. It's not crowded, and the decor is nice. The staff is helpful too. And some of the rooms that aren't supposed to have an ocean view actually do have a peek of the ocean which is a bonus. The beds are comfortable, and the price is good for the area. The ONLY thing I don't like is the musty "old hotel" smell. But all the hotels I've been in in the area smell like that. They're older and the air is humid. I don't know that there's much you can do about that. Definitely will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Mommyslice,  Thank you for your loyalty and your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Once again thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star review. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Friendly staff, great location with beautiful views.  Walking distance to shops, dining and park.  Room overlooking beach was great both during the day and nighttime moon glow and sounds of crashing waves.
