Manager Response: Dear Dominick S,  Thank you for your time and sharing your 5 star feedback on Tripadvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay and the sounds of crashing waves. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: We stayed three nights at the Capri Laguna Beach hotel this June. We were greeted immediately by the front desk - our room was not yet available (we had driven in and arrived very early), but we were told that they would call us as soon as it was complete. It worked out perfectly to walk down to the taco shop and have a wonderful early lunch over looking the ocean. After a walk on the beach back to the Capri, I received a call that we could check in!  We had requested an ocean view with 2 king beds and a pull-out couch to accommodate three adults and two children. The room was exactly what we had seen on the website and worked out perfectly!  We also met the assistant general manager, Nick Politis, who had yogurt treats for the kids and made sure we felt very welcomed. The hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, free parking and panoramic ocean view from most (all?) rooms.  Very fun private pool area.  Rooms are modern and clean.  On of the best parts of staying at Capri Laguna is being within walking distance from so many wonderful places.  Of course the blue Pacific Ocean is steps away. Downtown Laguna has been known as an artist colony, so there is a seemingly endless amount of art galleries and restaurants in either direction.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff, nice place, good location, So great that they set up chairs and umbrellas on the beach for you and give you towels. Complimentary breakfast was good and they have starbucks coffee!!  I know it was a busy weekend but they could have done a bit better job of cleaning room, However i would stay again. Had a nice time and had an ocean view room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I can't say I'd come back to this hotel.  But as I booked this trip to Laguna Beach at the very last minute - decided to look at accommodations/airfare on a Thursday, flew out on Sunday - I suppose I can't complain.  As a Marriott Timeshare owner, I'm used to the Newport Coast Villas up in Newport Coast.  But this time, due to the spontaneous nature of my visit, I couldn't do that, and decided to stay in Laguna Beach itself.  This hotel was one of the very few that had an ocean view room left.  And it is definitely an ocean view!  Right on the beach, only footsteps away, and yes, I see the ocean outside my window and (tiny) balcony.  The waves crashing lull me to sleep.  When the fog rolls out, I have a terrific view of Catalina and the amazing sunset.  That's all good.    But
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was our first trip to Laguna Beach. We had no idea which hotel to pick. We looked through Trip Advisor and found Capri Laguna! The first thing we did was check the reviews.   There were no negative reviews and there were great things said about the staff. The price was the best on the area so we booked it.   We arrived 3 hrs early so I called the front desk and was told to come on in. We were greeted by Bachir Atallah who smiled and said your room is ready let's get u checked in!   We were immediately impressed! We got to our room and there was a personalized letter greeting us. The room was clean, updated and the view was breathtaking!  After we walked the beach and City we retired to the room. Discovered our TV had sound but no picture. We called the front desk and Nick
Manager Response: Dear Sharita H,    Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased you felt well taken care of by our staff and enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We hope to welcome you back for in the future.    Kind regards,

Summary: Cut our Yosemite vacation short due to stifling heat and found ourselves driving down the coast a few days early on our way to a reunion in San Diego area. On a whim we decided to spend a day in Laguna Beach area. Before noon we called the Capri Laguna based on reviews and Bashir told us to come right over. What a treat! We got a great room and were able to enjoy a gorgeous day on the beach. The room was spacious and well kept and the location can't be beat. We will definitely be back for a longer stay!
Manager Response: Dear Patti K,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor.   We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests . Once more we am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope we get the opportunity to look after you again in the future.   Kind regards,

Summary: This is the second time we stayed at Capri Laguna & we can't say enough about this place.  The staff is outstanding, especially The General Manager Nick who actually remembered us from our visit last year.  It is a boutique hotel which makes the experience so much more personal.  You can't beat the location either.  If you can, book a room with an ocean view.  The rooms are comfortable and the hotel is very well maintained. There is also a very generous daily breakfast buffet included.  We will definitely stay here again and will probably make it an annual visit.  Thank you Nick & Bachir for making this a wonderful experience for us!
Manager Response: Dear cynthias13632,  Thank you for sharing your 5 star feedback regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We are more than happy to know that your stay with us was a great success. Knowing that you had an enjoyable time and received friendly service certainly makes us happy as we are dedicated to ensure a personalized and warm service to all our guests. Thank you again for your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I spent two nights at the Capri Laguna in Feb. On the day we were to check-in, the weather was beautiful and since we lived locally we wanted to head to Laguna early in the day.  I called the hotel to reconfirm our arrival and before I had the chance to ask about early check-in, the Front desk Manager, Bachir invited us to come down early to enjoy the great day.  We headed straight to the hotel. We were given an excellent room with fantastic ocean views.   The service was excellent throughout our stay. We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast each day. The local is great, we walked to most of our destinations. It was a fun vacation and a great value.
Manager Response: Dear guest Cheryl S,   We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us! We strive to provide a genuine and friendly service and reading comments like yours, encourage us to always provide the best. Thank you  for choosing us and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Kind regards,

Summary: I've stayed at high end hotels all over Southern California, but I've never experienced such hospitality from any of the other hotels. Nick, who is the manager of the hotel, pays attention to details and makes you feel like you are right at home. He is professional yet extremely kind. He catered to all of our needs. Our view was breath taking. We upgraded to an ocean view room and he gave us a great deal. Constantine was also a great help. He is a young man who sets up your umbrella and beach chairs during the day. This is a family owned business. They are genuine people and hard workers. I highly recommend this hotel. The staff is exceptional and ready to meet all of your needs. 🙂Good people and great service.
Manager Response: Dear omatei29,  We are pleased to read that you had a great time at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and thank you for sharing this 5 star feedback with us. We are glad to read that you have received friendly and courteous service throughout your stay. Thank you again and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,

Summary: Haven't been to Laguna in years but what a treat to go and stay at the Capri. A nice charming place at the beach. Our room faced the ocean and we had a balcony to sit and take in the view.  I love the way this hotel has all the stairways and levels. Made it a little bit of adventure to walk down to the beach.   We were able to walk on this very secluded beach and relax.  We sat on one of the decks and relaxed and had a glass of wine and watched the waves.  Once we headed back to our room it was cool enough to light the fireplace and enjoy relaxing and hearing the waves while we were cozy in front of the fireplace.   They have in room coffee, fresh backed cookies at check in and breakfast in the morning.  What a wonderful weekend!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love Capri Laguna - I think it's a treasure I don't want to share with many, but they deserve everyone to know.  Located right in the beach it's a great place for someone looking for more of a boutique hotel experience, but without the pretenses of many modern boutique hotels.  The staff, and in particular the GM Nick, is so welcoming and gracious.  Starting with our arrival and giving cookies to our daughter to the wine reception hosted by the GM.  Once we gave our names once they were never forgotten.  Access to all Laguna has to offer, and then chairs and umbrellas on the beach - out stay was amazing.  We will definitely be back, and even booked a return trip on the spot.  Great place for families!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a small hotel directly on the ocean. The rooms are terraced downward so some of the rooms have stairs inside them. We were a bit disappointed with our initial room but Nick at the front desk made everything right! The rooms have balconies with the sound of the waves always present. The coffee maker and small fridge and micro wave with continental breakfast provided are a treat. This is not a modern high end hotel but it was very clean with comfortable beds and a very accommodating staff. Bachir at the front desk was always smiling and helpful. As I said Nick provided valuable support and his dinner recommendations are excellent-always take his advice. I would definitely stay here again!  There is a small pool but the beach is only steps away. There is also a roof top
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beachfront is not the same as Oceanfront or Ocean View...
Summary: After reading all the reviews we booked two nights here and crossed our fingers.  And I have this to say to the people with complaints: it's a mid-century building people!  For a 50 year old + building that's been battered by the coastal environment it's in darn good shape.  Yes, it's not impeccably manicured like the places that charge you $750 (and up) for a comparable room on the beach with a view, but it is well kept, clean and pleasantly charming in it's own unique way.    Do your due diligence and pay close attention to the room descriptions to make sure you get what you want.  Beachfront is not the same as Oceanfront or Ocean View. Also, look at the diagram of the room locations to see how they are oriented.  Call the hotel and let them explain what you're getting if
Manager Response: Dear Janet E,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your detailed review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.   Kind regards,

Summary: I'm a single mom of 4 kids plus my dad had been in the hospital so I was quite frazzled and needed to "run away" and have a "time out". When I got to the hotel Nick (the asst manager) and I figured out that I had booked and paid for the wrong dates (through a 3rd party site). I almost cried. Nick kept reassuring me that it was okay. He got me all checked in and "okay" meant an upgraded room with no additional charges (and a warm chocolate chip cookie that they have at check in) The rest of my stay was just as easy and delightful. My room was cute and quiet except for the crashing of the waves. They have a nice continental breakfast in the morning with really good star bucks coffee.  Everyone was super friendly and helpful. Sitting out on the various decks overlooking the ocean
Manager Response: Dear mom2my4,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: Enjoyed this little boutique directly on the beach and 15 mins walk to town. Good restaurants all around, rooms are tasteful with the sound of waves to put you to sleep. Talk to Bachir at the front desk (front office manager), excellent manager, supa welcoming plus a room upgrade! 👍🏼
Manager Response: Dear Nick W,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: Made last minute reservations and the staff was very helpful. They recommended Beachfront, which was great advice. This hotel is older and modest. The rooms are clean and the location can't be beat. I gave it a 4 only because it lacks a couple of conveniences and amenities we would use, like a restaurant onsite and a spa by the pool area. However for the location it's well worth it. The bathroom is bigger and more up to date than the neighboring Surf and Sand Resort (at 100's less in price of stay) I also like that they have A/C, although it's portable it works well and allows you to close the slider if the ocean is too loud when sleeping. Something the neighbor does not offer. A fact I thought was absurd when I read other reviews about the ocean noise level, but it's true.
Manager Response: Dear beachy59,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a relaxed stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had the best view and perfect location for a nice romantic time on the beach. The rooms were very nice and clean. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear kreigfamily,  Thank you so much for sharing with us this beautiful review on TripAdvisor! Love to hear that you enjoyed the hotel location and facilities, and we are delighted to know you had such a great stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward for your next visit to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: One of Better Old Style Properties I have stayed at recently
Summary: April 2017.  We had the privilege of staying at Capri Laguna, located South of downtown Laguna Beach.  Taking a break from our business trip in LGB.  Check in was smooth and fast.  This is an older property like the majority of properties in Laguna.  But they keep everything up to order and well maintained.  The main reason for staying at this property is the location and view.  Since it is a bit South of downtown it is also quieter.  One of the guests at this property told me her husband was attending a conference at the Ritz Carlton further down the coast in Dana Points.  She told me her kids preferred to stay with her at this property than at the Ritz.  Even though this property is a bit South of downtown i found it to be a reasonable walk to downtown in my flip flops.  This
Manager Response: Dear SeminarTrekker,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel location and our city. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us and for your nice comments. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: First of there is this person I would like to thank the most it's Nick...he was so welcoming with a 24 hours smiley face :)...he answered all my questions with patience,, he offered early check in and a beautiful bottle of wine,parking was really good and their 24 hours Starbucks and hot drinks u can't ask for more than that...also bachir and John in the reception they were really really nice....2nd the hotel location is amazingly beautiful the room was super and clean, fridge size was really good...the balcony was beachfront u can hear the waves 24 hours while sleeping and awake...3rd the bed and the pillows were soooooo comfy I didn't want to wake up. ...overall experience was excellent ...highly recommended to everyone visiting laguna
Manager Response: Dear Christine M,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor and for highlighting the major assets of our hotel. We all work daily to offer a truly personal experience to each of our guests. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel facilities and our services. Thank you once more for your kind comments and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Loved the extra spacious room right on top of the beach with my own little balcony.  We spent the weekend here after our plein air convention in San Diego.  This was a great place for us to get out our paint brushes and paint the skyline.  The hotel has its own entry to the beach down a few flights of stairs or you can hang out on one of the several patios overlooking the beach.  Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara H,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our services and we are delighted that we made a great getaway for you. Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and we most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon for more spectacular views.  Kind regards,

Summary: Nick and his staff went out of their way to ensure I had a room with a view.  Another online booking company claimed I would have an "ocean view room". That wasn't the case.  They were very accommodating and set me up with an ocean view!   Thank You Nick!!
Manager Response: Dear Diane H,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you for your feedback and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Low key, peaceful with A+++ guest service!
Summary: We stayed at Capri Laguna on the Beach for a week mid-end of May 2017 and had an incredible time! The hotel is beautiful and the location is amazing, right on the beach! It was perfect for my husband and I with our toddler, as we were able to go to the beach in the morning and afternoon very easily. The hotel sets up chairs and umbrellas on demand so you don't have to lug all of your beach equipment down which makes a huge difference with a little one. The hotel has a few lovely decks/patios to lounge on and we took full advantage during naptime and after we put our daughter down to bed and watched the sunset. The hotel is situated with a few others in a beautiful beach inlet which makes it feel very private. We could walk to all restaurants within a few minutes and downtown
Manager Response: Dear R B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star detailed feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our services and the hotel location. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to have you again in the future.   Kind regards,

Summary: Expensive but we wanted beach access and ability to walk to dining options.  Nick was really friendly and made our stay more enjoyable. The pool view room we had was not anything special but the staff and location made up for that.
Manager Response: Dear melaniefricke,  Thank you for taking the time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It is great pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you once more for praising our team members. We will be looking forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Staff Wonderfull! Some minor improvements needed in the room. We always stay at an ocean view room, always same room.  The staff, from manager to maintenance workers are absolutely wonderful.  About 1 mile from center of town.  Great bakery across the street in an alley (Andree).  Stay here twice a year.
Manager Response: Dear srm33,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor. We pride ourselves on the level of service we deliver and we are so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you once more for your loyalty and for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We look forward to welcome you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I were there to celebrate our 39th wedding anniversary. We have stayed here before and knew it was the place to come back to for such a special occasion. Bashir at the front desk was just great he told excellent care of us during the check in and whenever he saw us he wanted to know if everything was fine. Nick is also a great person at the Capri. We had a great conversation with him during the wine and cheese get together. We saw while we were walking down PCH he stopped and talked to us and asked if we were having a good time and to let him know if we need anything. Our ocean front room was great. The sounds of the waves crashing put us to sleep the three nights we were there. The young man that works the beach area was very attentive to our needs. We are coming
Manager Response: Dear richardson847,  Thank you for your time and sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once more for your loyalty and for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Fall Asleep To The Sound of the Sea
Summary: This is now the second time i have stayed here and it just gets better and better. I have fallen more and more in love with this hotel, its staff, the fact that its pet friendly and the breakfast was sensational! Thank you again Nick P for your help and how accommodating you were and check out was extremely easy. You need to get me a stamp card because I am coming back... again and again and AGAIN!
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth A,  Thank you for your loyalty and for the lovely review! We pride ourselves on the level of service we deliver and we are so pleased to hear how much you relaxed and enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you once again for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor and we will definitely looking forward to see you again and again!   Kind regards,

Summary: I highly recommend Capri Laguna Inn On the Beach in an oceanfront room!! The staff is amazing, accommodating, and friendly. The rooms and grounds are clean, comfortable, and peaceful (if you are on the ocean side of the Inn). It's right on the beach, and close to excellent shopping and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear notlocnine,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary: Bashir and Nick were incredibly efficient and welcoming.  It is a unique and special place, perfectly located near the energy of Laguna Beach, but away from the noise and traffic, beautifully situated on a hillside overlooking the ocean. We needed a room for our whole family of 5 and the Ocean View with 2 kings and a sofa bed was massive with every amenity we could want.  Breakfast was filled with treats and was a perfect start to the day. We will definitely come back again!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear EastBayMom2,  We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief! Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor and The "Capri Laguna a Hidden Gem" will look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Great location & awesome ocean view from private balcony. Front desk is super hospitable & John is the perfect example! So kind, professional & welcoming. We definitely recommend Capri Laguna. Thanks John for your hospitality!
Manager Response: Dear MissVina,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and we will be looking forward to welcoming you back to our city.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: The view is the best part
Summary: after the view, not much to offer.  everything is tired in this hotel.  very old and out dated even the lobby.  breakfast is run of the mill and nothing special at all. best part is they have starbucks coffe.  would not stay here again especially for the price.  we had an ocean view room.
Manager Response: Dear nicole J,  Thank you for sharing your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience and rest assured that we take under consideration all remarks. We hope that you will consider returning to us in the future so that we may have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.   Kind regards,

Summary: A very warm welcome from the owner,he gave us an upgrade and the room had a nice ocean view plus a big balcony. The bathroom was wonderful with a nice big shower. Breakfast was great,making your own waffles,pancakes,there were bagels muffins etc.and great coffee! It's a little bit out off the center off laguna beach but it's a nice walk with lots off shops and galleries to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Marleen H,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our services, the hotel location and the entire city. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to have you again in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay at Capri Laguna. The hotel room had a gorgeous ocean view and direct beach access to a secluded and lovely beach. The rooms were spacious with a nice walk-in shower, fireplace and comfortable bed and a nice sized ocean view patio. The staff was extremely nice and welcoming. We loved the proximity to shops and markets as well as the Sand and Sea next door. We would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Ciarasd09,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean and our city. Thank you for choosing us and for your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Capri Laguna is a nice hotel, it's very quiet and relaxing. At night time I could hear the waves each night it was so peaceful and hypnotising. The indoor swimming pool is very chilled and looks good. There isn't a spa which is a downfall. This hotel is perfect for relaxing and perfect for beach access :) I miss Laguna Beach so much!
Manager Response: Dear AmberSiennax,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed the sound of the ocean. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We absolutely enjoyed our stay at Capri Laguna. The staff was extremely hospitable and accommodating, especially Nick! The room was very charming and the walk to the room gave the feel we were in a quaint Greek town. The view from the room was wonderful. We slept with the windows open and could hear the crash of the waves on the beach below. The beach was steps from our room! We would highly recommend Capri to anyone!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service was good and the office manager Bachir and Nick were amazing! They took great care of us and upgraded our room for early check in so we wouldn't have to wait. We will definitely be going back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wow! What a great hotel.  I loved every moment of my stay.  Nick, the Assistant General Manager, is charming.  He makes you feel really special and nothing is too much trouble.  He goes over and about to make sure you have an enjoyable stay. I can't wait to return!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Capri Laguna...perfect spot in lovely Laguna
Summary: We spent a couple of days at the Capri Laguna. It was the perfect spot for us. Gorgeous ocean and sunset views. Nick Politis at the front desk was so kind and helpful in every way. We highly recommend this little gem to all who want proximity to shopping, restaurants etc and that wonderful view👍😀
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved our stay at Capri Laguna.  Best beachfront / ocean view location.  Friendly and helpful hotel staff. Easy walk to great restaurants and shops.  It was exactly what we were looking for and the perfect place to stay in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a lovely hotel in Laguna Beach, with beach access and a pool. The assistant general manager,Nick Politis, is a charming and friendly gentlemen, who goes out of his way to welcome everyone. In addition to upgrading our room, he made us feel at home, and was most helpful. I wore stay here has been really relaxing and special.
Manager Response: Dear JS3553,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel . Our staff strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us and for your nice comments. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed here with my husband for our 10 year anniversary! beautiful hotel- ocean view, walk to restaurants and bars. The people at the front desk were wonderful! Thank you Nick Politis and Bachir Atallah, you both went above and beyond to make us feel welcome! I would definitely come back and recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear aseyler1,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you for praising our staff and for the 5 star review. Warmest wishes to the wonderful two of you on your 10th anniversary. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna.   Kind regards,

Summary: My college friends of 42 years and I spent 4 nights of our week vacation together staying at the Capri Laguna. We found this renovated boutique hotel to be well maintained and extremely clean. We stayed in rooms 608 and 609, which overlooked the pool. The rooms each had 2 queen beds and an updated bathroom with a wonderful shower. Each room had a small kitchenette area with a coffee pot, microwave, and small refrigerator, a sink and counter area, and a small table with 2 chairs.  Each room also had a small balcony overlooking the pool.  In addition to the rooms being immaculate and maybe the cleanest I have stayed in a long time, the Front Office staff were among the best I have encountered In many years. A special shout out to John and Bachir, the Front Office Managers, who
Manager Response: Dear Peridot56,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect photo op and rooms were clean and roomy.
Summary: Stayed here for a weekend with my wife.  Spent the whole weekend painting on the patio.  Views are stellar and it's quieter than further in.  Nick the manager treated us very well and deserves much thanks and respect.  Staff are all gracious and patient which is a testament to Nicks skill as a manager.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew H,  Thank you for your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your comments about our exceptional staff and we strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Has taken some time to write this but I promised I would! We found this gem on a road trip along the coast before going to a wedding in Mission Viejo. Of all the hotels we stayed in over a 10 day trip, this was the most professional, courteous & welcoming. The team are attentive, the beach access is stunning & the location is the best. Honestly - it's what we Brits call quaint but has just what you need for a Californian beach holiday. Super chilled & a good breakfast selection. Close to a Ralphs & gas station, opposite Selanne Steak Tavern (take out a loan before you go mind!)  Thank you from our family to the Capri Laguna family.
Manager Response: Dear Virtualbahia15,  Such beautiful reviews are always a pleasure to read. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We loved this hotel and the beautiful staff so much.. it's on the best beach in Laguna And close to everything .. we loved it here and can't wait to return and didn't want to leave . The people running the place treated us like family members.. the rooms were also nice and we walk right down to the beach .. lovely here
Manager Response: Dear Anastasha77,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We pride ourselves on the level of service we deliver and we are so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and our city. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team. We will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Great place to stay. Staff was friendly and the breakfast was adequate for the family. Location is perfect with the beach being so close. The downtown is an easy mile walk, We will definitely stay again if we head back. The family had a great time - Thanks Capri!
Manager Response: Dear PastaPri,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests . Thank you once more for choosing us and for your comments. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My two girls (10 and 12) and wife stayed here over Easter weekend for the first time.  We stayed in Room 503 which is a deluxe family suite overlooking the ocean.  Our room had a king bed with a pull out couch for the girls, a small kitchen area, European style bathroom and our own private deck.  The room was located directly off a large viewing deck that had complimentary wine and cheese Friday night when we arrived. There is a small heated pool that the girls enjoyed along with easy access to the beach.  The hotel also has free parking and WiFi.   They also have a free breakfast each morning that offered the following: make your own pancakes and waffles, fruit, muffins, danishes, toast, cereal, an assortment of juices, Starbucks coffee, hard boiled eggs, and much more.  The
Manager Response: Dear bentonite3,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our city. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The staff was AMAZING!  A big THANK YOU to Bashir!  Thanks for making our first year anniversary perfect!  The view from room 104 was awesome!  The location of the room was quiet, clean & sooo peaceful. I can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear mranderson2017,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon. Our best wishes for your Anniversary!  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful view and even better service
Summary: We booked a total of 3 rooms for 10 people. We had the BEST experience. The hotel is clean and quaint but the staff is what made a world of difference. You really get the feeling that the front desk staff are the owners - that is how helpful and nice they are. They truly care that you have a great experience. We will definitely be returning to Capri!
Manager Response: Dear JessMartinez720,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for the 5 star review and we are looking forward to seeing you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: We decided to take a road trip for our family vacation this year. We booked the Capri Laguna on the beach and loved it !!! If your looking for a quiet ocean front Inn than this is for you. We felt like we were in Greece with the Mediterranean feel  this Inn offers. Nick was very helpful and super friendly !!!
Manager Response: Dear sasala1221,  Thank you for your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel . We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay and our services. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My boyfriend and I checked into the hotel for a quick 2 day, 1 night getaway. We were immediately greeted by Nick, the General Manager, who was kind, friendly and joked around with us during our stay. Because I am Greek, he was excited to share the same heritage. After explaining the purpose of our celebration trip, Nick kindly upgraded us to an ocean deck room. It was so amazing! I cannot thank you and the Capri hotel for being so clean and accommodating. Thank you for a wonderful trip! We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Tahnie B,  Thank you for taking the time and sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm their belief! The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary: This was a "girl's get away weekend". We will return. We have travelled a lot and this was one of the best experiencences in all of our travels. It was so relaxing and we felt right at home. The entire staff (especially Nick Politis) were exceptionly nice, friendly and accommodating, The whole hotel was very clean. The breakfast set-up was perfect. We really felt like the staff took great pride in their work. The beach is gorgeous as was the sunset. Great outdoor seating. Absolutely no complaint about anything. It was a perfect three days in Laguna Beach and at Capri Laguna.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect Boutique Hotel on the Beach
Summary: My family and I spent a night at the Capri Laguna for the start of our spring break trip. We decided to book an oceanfront room and we were so happy that we did. The views are stunning and the sounds of the waves crashing filled our room!  The hotel is about a mile from the main town but has plenty of places to eat close by. We easily walked into town. It is also located right in front of a  free shuttle stop. Our room was clean and spacious. The pool is heated and when you arrive there are warm cookies offered to you. The free breakfast was a step beyond continental-- cereals, pastries, make your own waffles, pancakes, fruit, hard boiled eggs and a brew your own Starbucks coffee. Best of all the manager and staff were so friendly and nice.  We would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, but very dated rooms
Summary: The staff was wonderful - helpful, friendly, responsive.  The property however is a bit dated. You are paying for the location for sure.   I had an oceanfront room and while I had a great view, there was barely room on the balcony for a chair and small table (not a place you could really sit and read or anything). The patio door didn't lock and there wasn't a screen door. The window has a screen though so you can sleep with the window open and enjoy the waves. There are pretty bright lights at night all over the property so you really have to have shades down to have a dark room for sleeping. The space was fine though - I was there for the beach and the area, not to sit around in a room. The bathroom was redone and looked as expected, but for over $300 I expected more than a
Manager Response: Dear MLP555,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks about the rooms and its’ features. Thank you for praising our staff, We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: My daughter and I could only get away for one night, but it was just what we needed.  The view and sounds of the ocean were incomparable!  We arrived without reservations because another hotel, that we had reserved, was not satisfactory.  So, we decided to give "The Capri" a try.  Bachir Atallah was our check-in and check-out agent.  He was so welcoming and helpful!  Thank you, Bachir!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff are very friendly and helpful. Dog friendly which is wonderful! Older but quaint- we had a beautiful view and great bed- shower was lovely as well. Wine and cheese on the patio in the evening- breakfast in am, and close enough to town to walk there - either on the beach or street (beach is better!). Just had a lovely stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent two fantastic days at this hotel in March. Nick made us feel immediately like family friends. Our room was spacious, clean with an amazing view. There may be a spot of rust here or there and the closet door could be smoother, but the character of this hotel makes it the closest you get to the French or Italian Riviera without being there.
Manager Response: Dear Jean-Guy M,  Thank you for your time and sharing your 5 star feedback on Tripadvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Mother daughter trip on the beach
Summary: My mom and I were thrilled with our stay at Capri Laguna. From the moment we checked in Nick was so helpful. Seeing my mom had a head cold he upgraded our room to a suite. It had a beautiful view and the whole property was impeccably clean. We later asked another staff member about help opening a bottle of wine and she took care of it for us with a smile. The location is excellent in nice walking distance to many restaurants and shops. I highly recommend staying here. Thanks again Nick and everyone at Capri!
Manager Response: Dear Jessval,  We would like to thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We are delighted that you enjoyed our hotel and services. Thank you once more for praising our team. We strive to provide the best standard service to our guest. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: My husband & I stayed here 2 nights in early March for our babymoon. We had an "oceanfront" king room. The place is fantastic. Beautiful ocean views, you can listen to the waves all night. Friendly staff & lots of cool places right within walking distance. The first day we just lounged on the beach with our towels but the second day we asked for them to set up an umbrella & chairs on the beach for us (like in the pictures). It happened within 5 minutes!! There are LOTS of stairways (think Greece, Santorini) so if you're not good at stairs then stay somewhere else. There is even a climb down/up some rocks to get from the *stairs* to the hotel to/from the beach. The beach is great for walking with lots of cool tide pools. Also of note, the hotel says it is pet friendly but never
Manager Response: Dear akuritzky,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: I took 2 of my kids here for a mini vacation. Great property! It was very clean, and very pretty. Loved the location, plenty of beach on both sides to walk, waves  weren't too harsh for the kids! Lovely decks for meals outside and they set up chairs and an umbrella for us on the beach. Very nice staff, even made fresh baked cookies for us one evening by the pool. Kids and I  loved it with the hot chocolate and coffee machine, by the fireplace in the lobby. Plenty to walk around and see on PCH, loved Avila El Ranchito had great guac and chips only a couple doors away. We will definitely be going back in the summer!
Manager Response: Dear Roxanne C,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star detailed review on Tripadvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us and the entire city. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests.  The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more memories and great experience.   Kind regards,

Summary: If you were to get an oceanfront room (ours was nr 202) then you can't ask for a better view and the room is big too. Special thanks to Nick and Bashir at front desk for being so welcoming. The location is great for walking to shops and restaurants. We ended up not using our car.
Manager Response: Dear Allegrastravels,  Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief! The Capri Laguna on the Beach and the entire staff look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary: This little Hidden Gem is amazing. It may not be a big time hotel chain but what it lacks in amenities makes up on location, views and the very friendly Staff. The Assistant General Manager Nick Politis was amazing. Very knowledgeable and outgoing. Anything we needed he made it happen. My wife and I live this place.
Manager Response: Dear Craig M,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon at the hidden gem for more fantastic views.  Kind regards,

Summary: This was our second stay at this gem of a hotel.  It's beautiful (right on the beach), has great views and the staff just could not be friendlier or more helpful.  We hope to visit again next year.  I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear MarkEvan18,  Thank you very much for your loyalty and for the kind words about our hotel. We really appreciate your review, and we are so delighted to know that our friendly staff, rooms, and views, were all great aspects on your stay with us. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great Spring Break Hotel for the Family
Summary: This was a great place to stay for me and my family.  The facility is great and the people were super-friendly.  The managers Nick and Bachir were particularly helpful.  The free breakfast is a nice touch.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: 4 nites here.  Great location and helpful staff.  Difficult parking and not well maintained.
Summary: Appreciated the help and courtesy of John and the property manager.  Overall good experience, but it is an expensive place if you want beach view.  Lots of stairs and no elevator; and too few parking spaces; were our challenges.  We had one of the three rooms with a fireplace, which is really nice.
Manager Response: Dear vertgallant,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us. We definitely look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Capri Laguna was the best part of our trip to Laguna Beach. We had one of those travel days from hell. We were so delayed that we had to fly into LA at 2AM and then drive. Nick and Bashir were amazingly helpful. They moved our Fri/Sat reservation to Saturday/Sunday at no charge. I've never had a hotel be understanding of travel woes before. We stayed in an Oceanfront King (room 501) and could not have better views. Our balcony had 180 degree views of the Pacific. We spent almost the entire weekend sitting outside drinking Rose and just watching the waves. The bathroom in our room was beautifully upgraded. And while the room itself shows some wear, we loved the hotel and room immensely. The service of the people who run this hotel truly sets this place apart. Which is why I
Manager Response: Dear deede032,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We look forward to welcome you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: We visited Capri Laguna in Laguna Beach, CA, years ago and have been dying to return!  February 2017 we returned to "Capri Laguna on the Beach" & our stay exceeded our expectations! Upon arrival Bashir & John greeted us and provided exceptional customer service! This charming hotel is perfect for watching gorgeous sunsets, listening to the ocean's surf from your balcony, and walking the lovely beach.  We also enjoyed dining at the gourmet restaurants, exploring shops, & galleries....just steps from Capri Laguna. We plan to return next year to recharge our love of being by the ocean at THIS lovely oceanside hotel!  Marty
Manager Response: Dear Marty G,  Thank you for your return and your loyalty! We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you again.   Kind regards,

Summary: My first hotel right on the beach. Great location with a great staff. My room had a balcony with a full view of the ocean, loved to see the sunrise and the sunset with a cup of coffee in my hands. At night you can hear the waves crushing against the rocks. It was gorgeous, and Nick Politis ( Assistant Manager) made sure our stay was pleasant with plenty of rest. He is very attentive and took care all of our needs to make sure we were comfortable, you can see that he is very passionate about his job, great person. Would recommend the hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for our 50th Anniversary, and we stayed here 50 years ago for our Honeymoon.  Perfect setting  We sat on our private balcony watching and listening to the ocean.  The hotel has stood the passage of time well.  The personnel are very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great 3-star Hotel in a Great Location
Summary: We stayed here for three nights this last week with our two children (ages 11 and 9). Upon our arrival, I asked if it was possible to be upgraded from our standard two queen bed room and the kind gentleman obliged and hugely rewarded us with a king suite and a gorgeous ocean view. It is as it is described -- a 3 star hotel -- with average furnishings, but very clean, a continental breakfast of packaged pastries, cereals, yogurt, hard boiled eggs, coffee, a small, well maintained and heated pool. What is far above average is the view it holds of the ocean and the easy access to the beach. Additionally, it is in a perfect location, with walking distance to downtown shops and restaurants. Reasonably priced and would consider another stay if we return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a perfect location and the management was very friendly. There are lots of places to eat and things to do within walking distance. Parking is free but it is tight. They also have beach access which was fun.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Beach hotel with excellent staff
Summary: We stayed in one of the best rooms (#103) right on the ocean.  Great view and fun to hear the surf every night.  Although it is a hotel that has been there for a long time, the room we had was updated very nicely.  In addition to being spectacularly well situated on the ocean, it is right in the middle of a bunch of fine shops and good restaurants all within walking distance.  The front desk was really helpful, especially Nick who helped arrange for us to get #103, and who was always attentive to our needs...including calling us to remind us of the wine and cheese on Friday afternoon.  The only caution about #103 and some of the lower rooms is that they require going down two or three flights of stairs...fine for us, but may be of concern to someone with mobility issues (in
Manager Response: Dear jimmymac43,  We are Delighted to hear that you had a great stay and you enjoyed our city, the wonderful location and the services of our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you for sharing your 5 star feedback and for choosing us. We look forward to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: Hotel is very inviting and staff is very friendly, the location cannot be better. Nick made our stay extra special as he upgraded our room to a nicer and roomier room and he was also a great, friendly host, we will be coming back and recommending the hotel to our friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Carlos R,  Thank you for your kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay and our city. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and for recommending our hotel. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed here for first time in August 2016. Just getting around to writing review. I've stayed at all the places up and down PCH [the main road through the town] in Laguna Beach and Dana Point over many years. Not the fanciest or recently re-decorated, but probably best value and location. Very clean, tidy, well maintained.There are less expensive, and there are fancier nearby, but this is best overall. Directly on the beach without having to walk down from the top of a cliff, close enough to everything in LB that you can walk or take the free trolley. Free parking and WiFi add to the value. The staff do make the difference. Yes, Bachir and Nick are high profile, always available, always accommodating. Can't say enough good things about them. That said, everyone at this place
Manager Response: Dear B G,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star detailed review on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us.  It really means a lot to our team members to get mentioned by name and we are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Ocean waves lull you to sleep
Summary: My wife and I spent the weekend at the Capri Laguna and enjoyed our stay.  Our room was Ocean View #722 and offered a diagonal view of the ocean on a balcony that shared with 3 other rooms (with glass partitions) .  Hotel Highlights: Free WiFi, Breakfast, parking Friday Wine and Cheese reception 24 hour coffee station Oceanfront decks with nice outdoor furniture Mediterranean feel of hotel layout Front desk friendliness    Room highlights: Ocean waves as a lullaby Microwave/mini fridge complimentary bottled waters   Not so great: Our bathroom was dated, unlike the modernized rooms that I've seen in the photos.  The tile and vanity seemed to be decades old with missing grout, old vanity, leaky showerhead, unfinished baseboards, water stains on ceiling and toliet paper mounted on
Manager Response: Dear pickuptoy,  Thank you for sharing your feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience. It is our continuous effort to provide a relaxing and comfortable experience for all of our guests. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks. Thank you once more for choosing us and we hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again soon at our newly renovated rooms, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you.  Kind regards,

Summary: Nick and Baseer put us in a great room right over the Ocean, it was great. They were very helpful with everything we needed, from directions to recommendations, etc. and they treated us like friends, not clients. Thanks Nick, Baseer and staff, keep up the great work !!!  Bob and Laurie
Manager Response: Dear Bob F,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beachfront rooms have a lovely patio and view of the ocean!
Summary: Very friendly staff, nice rooms.  It was our first stay and we were really looking for an "ocean front" not "ocean view room" and we were very happy.  Room 103 was closest to the ocean, with a large balcony and beautiful view.
Manager Response: Dear Krysta S,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had truly enjoyed your stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward for your return for more stunning views and beautiful sunsets.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Fabulous! Great hotel,which is right on the beach. The rooms are big and we received a complimentary upgrade. The hotel is well located, so it's easy to walk to all the bars and restaurants. Nick is the nicest manger you could hope for. Really looks after you, is polite, helpful and has a good sense of humour!
Manager Response: Dear kevin y,  We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief! Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor and The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Capri for 2 nights in rainy January in an oceanfront room and I didn't want to leave! This property is lovely, there are decks to take advantage of the views even if you aren't lucky enough to be in an oceanfront. The rooms are well appointed and the beds comfortable, there is a fridge and a microwave and good wifi. The best rooms have lots of wet stairs to get to, so pack light! Parking was easy, the free breakfast was good and the swimming pool was the perfect temp for a rainy swim, not even a little chill when getting in! The hotel is walking distance to restaurants a bar, a grocery store. The town is cute! One of the most memorable parts of our stay was the kindness and warm friendliness of Bachir at the front desk who went way above and beyond to make sure
Manager Response: Dear Sara916,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to welcoming you back to our city.  Kind regards,

Summary: Lovely 2 day vacation due to a great ocean view and a wonderful and helpful staff.  Nick, at the front desk, was especially helpful and aimed to please.  It was so refreshing to be treated with that level of respect, thanks Nick! Elizabeth Gunnufson
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth G,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The man at the front desk and reservations was so nice, the rest of the staff was also helpful, the location can't be beat, and the room was very quaint and clean. It was located right on the ocean, near restaurants, and about a mile or under from the main beach.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth W,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our services and the hotel location. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to have you again in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Absolutely AMAZING is all I can say.  Front desk people were the friendliest I've ever come across. Made us feel so welcomed. Nick Politis, thank you for your hospitality. Room we had was incredible! Gorgeous view. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Angelina V,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: Courteous and helpful staff, quaint facilities with great beach area. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Had a wonderful relaxing visit with several romantic walks on the beach. Enjoyed the provided breakfast with multiple choices and Starbucks coffee 24/7.
Manager Response: Dear sjgconstruction,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star feedback on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a relaxed stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: In September my husband and finished a long trip visiting family in several locations by getting away for a few days by ourselves. We chose Capri Laguna at random but after our experience there it will be our go to hotel whenever we are in the area. Bachir, the Manager, went above and beyond to accommodate us and made us feel so welcome.  The rooms were charming  and even included a kitchenette. Everything was spotless and comfortable. We were very tired after our trip and staying at this hotel really helped to rejuvenate us.  Having our coffee while watching the ocean in the morning and enjoying a glass of wine at sunset on the large deck at the hotel was just what we needed.  I would not hesitate to recommend the Capri to anyone looking to relax by the beach. We plan to return
Manager Response: Dear Christen M,  Thank you so much for sharing with us this beautiful detailed review on TripAdvisor! Love to hear that you enjoyed the hotel location and facilities, and we are delighted to know you had such a great stay with us. We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary: Perfect location on the less busy Arch Cove side of the beach.  Several bars and restaurants within walking distance.  Queen room was adequate as we didn't spend a ton of time at hotel although a little dated and small but did have a very nice updated bathroom.  Balcony had table with 2 chairs and a sun lounger.  I had room 403 which has a great view of the ocean but a couple tiers up from the beach.  Hotel has several sun decks and has steps leading down to beach.   Grab a free hot chocolate from office and go walk on beach for sunset.
Manager Response: Dear bmase58,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel location and our city. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us and for your nice comments. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The room and amenities were wonderful.  Perfect balcony and sitting area to watch the sun set.  Great tables to enjoy breakfast with the ocean steps away.  Within walking distance to get restaurants.  The breakfast that is included was delicious and a surprise.  The staff are super friendly.  We could have stayed a week, a  month, or a lifetime.  It was simply beautiful!
Manager Response: Dear anissim9,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feddback on TripAdvisor and for highlighting the major assets of our hotel. We all work daily to offer a truly personal experience to each of our guests. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel facilities and our services. Thank you once more for your kind comments and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: We chose the Capri Hotel based on reviews that were spot on!  The property is charming.  Our beachfront room with a fireplace was very comfortable and the view was breathtaking!  The continental breakfast had a good selection of items & beverages. Bachir and Louis were very welcoming and attentive during our stay. Some small hotel details could be updated but really are not missed.  We look forward to our next stay at Capri Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear AOzawa,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you again in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: My first trip to the ocean!
Summary: I am absolutely smitten by this place. It's old and a bit creaky but the staff is delightful and the view was to die for! We are already planning a return trip in August 2017 and will more than likely stay here again. Love the access to a more private beach and the serenity that came.
Manager Response: Dear Megan F,  We would like to thank you for your time and your 5 star review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking forward to see you again August.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Clear your head with a Brilliant View
Summary: When you're traveling solo it's important that things go well and they absolutely did at my recent visit to SoCal because of the Capri Laguna Hotel. The staff were so accommodating, the property was clean and well maintained...the complimentary breakfast was greatly appreciated (and provided lots of choices) and the view was just stunning. I can't wait to visit again.   Marilyn Russell Philadelphia, PA
Manager Response: Dear Marilyn R,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for the 5 star review and we are looking forward to seeing you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Although Nic was very friendly on the phone and accommodating, when we arrived our stay was not very pleasant. The guy who checked us in was also nice and gave us a bottle of wine but things just went downhill from there.   We had a lot of things with us, including our pets and brought all our stuff all the way to the room only to find a dead cockroach in the room. We were moved to a nicer room, which was great but the next day the shower stopped working and we had to change rooms again. The showers were brand new, we were told, but the drain clogged after 2 showers. It was Christmas Eve and it was really annoying to have to change rooms again.   The next room we moved to didn't seem to be done, no shower door on the shower and water splashed everywhere. There also wasn't a top
Manager Response: Dear Nicole M,  Please allow us to apologize to you for the inconvenience you experienced during your  stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay and we do understand the importance of providing a memorable experience. We hope that you will give us the chance to stay with us again, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Love Joy and a Peaceful Stay...
Summary: My husband and I love Capri Laguna.... We so needed to be still, fun and romantic... Our experience began when I booked the reservation with Bachir, to check-in with John and rolled over the next morning with Mafry. They are all so hospitable, friendly and kind. We needed a recommendation for a place to eat dinner and John was on it getting us a table at Selanne Steak  Tavern across the street.  Our room was fabulous. I felt like I was taken away to another country on the coast... Which could be Capri, Italy?  Our room was cozy with on demand hot water, ocean view, the sound of the waves and the most comfortable bed, pillows, and comfortable peaceful needed sleep. Oh yeah, they provide a lovely wine evening wine reception too.  The decks all have incredible ocean views and the
Manager Response: Dear  Bianca and Christopher,  Thank you for taking the time and sharing your 5 star detailed review on TripAdvisor.   We are delighted to know you enjoyed your stay, the convenience of our location and the  service from our staff. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and it is our pleasure to hear that our services exceeded your expectations. Once again thank you for your kind compliments and recommendations and look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Wishing you a very happy New Year et à la prochaine!  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great stay for location and price
Summary: Location,location,location! Right on the water,great beach. Friendly staff. Free wifi. Parking is limited and super tight. However, there is a lot half a block over reserved for hotel guests. It is spacious. Rare find to have FREE parking. We stayed two nights. The first night we stayed in room 142. This was the room we booked through trip advisor. It was pretty awful. Dark,freezing and super run down. We didn't complain bc it was 1:00 am and we were exhausted from driving. The next night we asked to switch rooms. Our 2nd room, although still pretty dated, was much nicer. There is no central AC or heat in any of the rooms. There is a small portable AC/heater. It is pretty loud when running. The hotel just seems to be in need of a full renovation. For the price however, it was
Manager Response: Dear Joferrell,  Thank you for sharing your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience and rest assured that we take under consideration all issues that arise. We hope that you will consider returning to us in the future so that we may have the opportunity to exceed your expectations. Wishing you a very happy New Year!  Kind regards,

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay at Capri & was very impressed by the customer service provided by John. Upon checking into our room, we noticed our bed was all wet from some type of leak. We went to the front desk & John immediately got us a new, upgraded room with a balcony, fireplace, & amazing views of the ocean. I'd definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear travelingtiff,  We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the amazing views of the ocean. Thank you for your feedback and definitely the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel will look forward to welcoming you back soon. Wishing you a happy new year!  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Best Value in Laguna Beach.  Hot Tip.
Summary: The hotel was clean.  The service was amazing.  The hotel's location right not he beach was amazing.  Nick Politis the assistant General Manager took amazing care of us, and made sure that all of our needs were met.  The morning breakfast was perfect, and the Starbucks Coffee in the morning was a nice touch.  We took our coffee down to the beach, and enjoyed a morning walk on the sand.  The hotel is right smack on the sandy beach of Laguna.  Doesn't get any better.
Manager Response: Dear TravelbugfromChicago,  Thank you for taking the time and for sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. It is great pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you once more for praising our service and our team members. We will be looking forward to see you again.  Wish you a bright and happy new year.  Kind regards,

Summary: We booked this hotel because we wanted direct beach access.  Our room was massive and had 2 king beds and a sofa bed too.  Fireplace, dining table, bar area. Sea view. Great access to PCH  and easy walk down to the beach. Breakfast was included and there was a lovely deck area to sit and enjoy the view whilst eating.  The hotel has many nooks with table and chairs so it never seemed crowded.  Also Friday night we were served wine and cheese which was a lovely gesture.  There was a heated pool which we didn't end up using as we hung out by the beach all day.  The environment was relaxed the front desk Bachir was helpful and always willing to offer water etc.  there was ample parking and our car is a large SUV.  The location was great as it is on the quieter side of laguna beach
Manager Response: Dear Claudia K,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor. We pride ourselves on the level of service we deliver and we are so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to. We look forward to welcome you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Surprised by the room comfort and ocean view.
Summary: The rooms are unique and nicely appointed.  We had a fabulous ocean view and even a fireplace.  Free limited breakfast.  They do offer a Starbucks coffee machine in the lobby available 24/7 that makes regular and decaf or a blend of the two.
Manager Response: Dear Michael B,  Thank you for your time and sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Capri Laguna on the beach resort is a very calm and therapeutic place to stay while recovering from the every day chaos. The sounds of the ocean calm the souls and spirits. The room is very clean, tidy, and quiet. I would definitely stay longer. Very pleased with the front desk employee's assistant in checking us in. The lobby is beautifully decorated giving a warm peaceful vibrations. Very happy with this resort. 😀
Manager Response: Dear Lukygem7,  Thank you for your lovely review! We pride ourselves on the level of service we deliver and we are so pleased to hear how much you relaxed and enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you once again for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor and we will definitely looking forward to see you again.   Kind regards,
