Summary: Impeccably kept property, plus nice size room with kitchenette and large deck right on the beach AND includes complimentary breakfast.  Very helpful/friendly staff (shout out to Nick!).  Wonderful sunset views and soooooo relaxing - we'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Margot C,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on Tripadvisor. It is our pleasure that you’ve had a great time with us. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and we will be looking forward to see you soon on your next visit to Laguna beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: Great beach access and views with all the amenities you need with friendly service. It's a lovely family beach getaway. The Capri Laguna On The Beach is located in a quiet area of Laguna Beach with good restaurants and shops nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Peter_K_LA,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our services and we are delighted that we made a great getaway for you. Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and we most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon for more spectacular views.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Boutique at it's best with rooms just feet from the ocean
Summary: True to it's name, Capri Laguna Beach reminded us of a few places we've stayed on the Amalfi Coast.  Capri Laguna gives nature the starring role and our room (104) was practically hanging out over the Pacific Ocean.  We so enjoyed lying in bed listening to waves that I think we found it really, really difficult to get out of it all weekend.  You'll find all of the character and the friendly service of a boutique experience.  Enjoy free wine and hors d'oeuvres from 5-6pm on Fridays with Nicholas while you watch an incredible sunset and he'll have his son take extra good care of you on the beach the next day.  Not super-glossy, new and BUSY like the place next door.  Understated, but comfortable with incredible hospitality, views and waves, waves, waves.  Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear SharT14,  Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach Hotel. We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your room and our services were meeting your expectations. Your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. We definitely look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: The property was perfect for our short stay! Beach and downtown access are both super EASY from the hotel - the location is perfect for walking or hopping on the village trolley. They offer morning breakfast, all day coffee, a lending library, welcome wine on Fridays, and lots of beach view tables and umbrellas. Our room was bright, airy, expansive and comfortable with two King size beds, an optional pull out sofa, sitting area with fireplace, kitchenette, and even a walk-in closet.  Our room also had a little street noise from the busy PCH, but it was easily drowned out by the in-room provided air conditioner. Most importantly, everyone was gracious and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear alinaca,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you for praising our services and for the 5 star detailed review. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: right on the beach at a good price for the area
Summary: We stayed in an ocean view room for two nights. Room has a separate kitchenette room with sink, microwave and fridge. Two sinks in the bathroom aids in getting ready if you're in a rush. Comfy beds with lots of good pillows. Bathroom is fine if a little dated--plenty of hot water and good water pressure. It is only an ocean VIEW---you can see the beach from the balcony through an opening in the building. If you want a front and center view get an ocean FRONT room----we didn't feel it necessary to upgrade as there is a communal area with tables right down the stairs from our room. But if you don't mind the extra $$$, go for it. Breakfast was limited, but perfect for us. Also a 24 hour starbucks coffee machine for you caffeine needs. The stretch of beach is shared with some other
Manager Response: Dear pozdowny,  We would like to thank for taking the time and sharing your detailed review on the Tripadvisor. We are delighted to read your kind words and it is a great pleasure to us that you enjoyed our services . We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Worse place I have EVER stayed!
Summary: I left this same review on hotels.com however it was deleted!  Firstly we had booked this hotel as it had been recommended to us. We were told even though it is only 2.5 stars, it should be more like a 4 star. This was completely wrong!! The hotel should be more like a 1 star and that would only be for the views from SOME of the rooms!   The car parking spaces are tiny, so if you have a large car you will not be able to park in the hotel. Our check in was a very pleasant experience and I can't fault the member of staff who was on the front desk. He was very friendly and welcoming and the reception area is actually quite pretty.   We were on our honeymoon and I had booked a 1 Queen bed, ocean view room. On arrival we were upgraded to another room. As we opened the door to our
Manager Response: Dear Stacy K,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks about the rooms and its’ features. we hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: Let the photos speak for themselves. No elevators, plenty of stairs. Design similar to the Tjampuhan Hotel in Ubud, Bali, Indonesia (although, between the two, Tjampuhan is superior and cheaper even  including the cost of a flight if one stays seven days). Could use a restaurant, but a minor quibble considering the volume available within just yards of the property. The photo of Jackie Onasis in Capri, Italy on the wall is off-puting. All-in-all, a wonderful place for those who prefer style over posh. Nature is the best amenity.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel for three nights, choosing the oceanfront room with a fireplace.  We had done a lot of research on many hotels in the area, and discovered some did not have a/c. I purposely called to ask about this and was assured the rooms were air conditioned. When we arrived, I was surprised to find a very loud portable unit in our room with no air circulated from outside.  This meant the air in the room was recirculated over and over.  Under normal circumstances you could open the doors and let fresh air in, but it rained nonstop, thunder and lightening included. When I called the front desk about this I reminded them I had called prior to our arrival and they told me I didn't ask if it was a portable unit.    I would love to say that was the extent of our issues, but
Manager Response: Dear JulesnSC,  Thank you for your review following your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and please allow us to apologize for not meeting your expectations during your recent stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks about the room and its’ features. This unique room type you had booked will soon be fully renovated and we hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back whenever your travels bring your back to Laguna Beach!  Kind regards,

Summary: Great Value! For the money, it's hard to be a stay at the Capri Laguna. You're right on the beach, in walking distance to great shops and restaurants, and right next to resorts that are way more expensive. It's a great value for those looking for the Laguna Beach experience without breaking the bank!
Manager Response: Dear Sobremski,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review on Tripadvisor. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the location and the entire city. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once again for choosing us and we would love to have you again in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful Laguna Beach at Capri Laguna
Summary: Warm and inviting atmosphere with wine and cheese on the deck at sunset to a great walkable location on the Coast Road. Complimentary breakfast and an attentive super friendly staff made the weekend special! I would definitely stay there again. We had great happy hour sushi a 5 minute walk away!
Manager Response: Dear Linda W,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on Tripadvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and our services were meeting your expectations. We hope to see you soon for more waves and beautiful views.  Kind regards,

Summary: Older hotel but decently clean with beautiful views right on the beach. Sheets and bedspread had some obvious wear and tear but again, clean. Would stay here again! Staff was extremely nice. Parking situation is not great- very limited, tight spaces.
Manager Response: Dear Carl H,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We will be looking into all the points you have raised as we do continuously work to improve our product and service. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect little hidden gem in Laguna
Summary: Perfect little hidden gem in Laguna. Affordable and conveniently located to downtown shopping and many restaurants. Take the neat little free shuttle along coast highway for a great local experience. Clean room, beautiful sunset and an overall excellent staycation.   Would always recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Mike B,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna.  Kind regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Capri Laguna for 4 nights in July in room 101.  The room was great and the location is perfect.  The hotel is right on the beach.  Nick and the rest of the staff are very friendly.  One night we came back late and there was no parking in the main lot.  Nick moved his car into the street so we can park in his spot.  This is how friendly they are.  We will definitely be going back again.
Manager Response: Dear 852pete,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on Tripadvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Little known hotel but AMAZING stay
Summary: We stumbled on Capri by accident with google maps and boy am I glad we did. They hotel is beautiful, the view are breathtaking and the staff is wonderful! They let us check in early and check out late. The room (we had the king beach front with fireplace) was so wonderful. We enjoyed watching the sunset from our balcony our first night and the hotel is in an great location. This family owned hotel felt like home and we cannot wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear cmole1221,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests . Thank you once more for choosing us, and for your comments. We look forward to see you soon for more beautiful sunsets.     Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri Laguna is a beautiful hotel located on the beach in Laguna. Great accomodations, tasty breakfast, and access to a wonderful beach.  Downtown Laguna Beach is just steps away. It is well worth it...book your stay now.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra C,  Thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on Tripadvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My family spent the most wonderful 5 nights at this lovely little hotel in August. From the moment we checked in we felt nothing was too much trouble for any of the staff, from the professional service at reception from Nick and Bachir to the polite and friendly young man who helped us with our beach chairs, In fact, the service was fantastic even before check in as we had had a few questions that we emailed about accommodation and amenities and these were answered promptly and informatively.  We had booked an ocean view suite(301) with a separate bedroom and a sofa bed which provided ample room for a family of 4 and we also appreciated the small kitchen area, Although the room was not ocean front we thought the view was spectacular and we were just literally a few steps from
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are looking for a really nice hotel prices are fare for the view and the service is excellent. The staff at the front desk very friendly. One of the best continental breakfasts I've had. The view is beautiful early morning on the beach cup f coffee in hand and my beautiful woman under my arm watching the surfers and the waves is great. This is a place I would diffidently recommend.     If you don't love it or even like it I'd like to hear from you usually I don't put this in my reviews but ever ones taste is different. I would come back here again and I'm sure I will.
Manager Response: Dear Rockinray1153,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor, it was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We would happily welcome you back soon for more amazing views.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: An Italian Experience in Laguna Beach
Summary: The Capri Laguna on the Beach is reminiscient of an Italian hotel.  It is conveniently located in Laguna Beach on the ocean.  From your room, you can hear the surf and see the waves, and the beach offered chairs and towels for guests.  The small pool is also a plus for kids, and the continental breakfast offerings were varied and interesting.  The hotel was a lovely place to stay to have a beach get away, but the rooms are definitely on the smaller side and the decor is a bit dated.  The service at the hotel was friendly and helpful and we felt welcome from the moment we arrived.  As a less expensive option than the other Laguna Beach beachfront hotels, this place is well worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Audra D,  We would like to thank you for sharing your detailed review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful Italian experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team.Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.    Kind regards,

Summary: Great location, friendly staff and quite! We spent 4 days and nights at Capri Laguna, everything was perfect from the rooms to the ease of check in/check out, to the great beach location! The resort was full, but never crowded or noisy. Free breakfast was simple but complete, with a great starbucks coffee machine. Kids loved making belgium waffles! We had two rooms 731 and 501. 731 is the best room in the place, best privacy and views of the beach in both directions. 501 was quite with great ocean views. Rooms are clean and nice decor. Everything you need! Walking distance to everything!  thanks for a great family vacation!
Manager Response: Dear otreehouse,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that your family enjoyed  the location and our services. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We had a lovely stay at the Capri. Bashir at reception was very welcoming and friendly. Would definitely recommend this hotel.Amazing views and complementary cheese and wine on the deck! Access to the beach was amazing.
Manager Response: Dear aidaburke,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. It was truly a pleasure to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you again.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Nice little place with lots of stairs
Summary: Staff is very friendly.  Our stay was very quiet  and a wonderful view of the ocean with sound of crashing waves.  Remodeled bathroom was very nice in room 102.  Just let the hot water run.  It takes awhile to reach your location.  When booking your stay, be aware "Beachfront is not on the beach!  It just means that you can see the beach from your room.  If you should have a problem with stairs, this hotel has a lot of them and it may not be for you.  Parking at the hotel is also limited.  They have an overflow lot 1/2 block away.  If you are like me and want your car near by.  Check in early and use a cab or walk because if you go out for dinner, you may not have a parking spot when you return.  The breakfast provided in the morning was above average but located in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear PHANTOM56,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed the view from your room. For your next visit please do not hesitate contacting us and we will be more than happy to assist you and assign a room closer to the lobby with a great view. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Clean room, pleasant beach view, good value
Summary: Clean room, pleasant view, affordable good value made this hotel my choice when I wanted a room with direct access right to the beach in the morning. Free continental breakfast was good. Rooms a little quirky but ok. Not the ritz, but a budget value for under $200.
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan B,  It is our pleasure that you enjoyed you stay. Our team strives to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you for choosing us and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: Excellent location, enjoyed having our chairs and umbrella set up for us on the beach. Staff was very helpful when searching for a restaurant and places to visit. Breakfast was also a nice plus to have as part of our stay.
Manager Response: Dear camper142016,  Thank you very much for your time and for the 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beware the "oceanfront" label on certain rooms.
Summary: The location of this hotel is pretty spectacular. It is right on the ocean, with staircases right to the sand. Parking is easy, and you are walking distance to everything Laguna you could want.  I booked an "oceanfront" room. The room we were given (room 723, in case you stay here) had a slight ocean view, but was not oceanfront. The sliding glass door faced the staircase to the go to the beach, which was pretty well-traveled (meaning you didn't want to leave it open for noise and privacy issues), and across the narrow staircase was a wall. So basically the main window faced a wall. The other window overlooked our small balcony, which did have an ocean view - across the other two immediately adjacent balcony. And when I say "immediately adjacent", I mean there was a glass
Manager Response: Dear Megan H,  We are sorry to hear that you were not happy with your room. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns.  We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and we do understand the importance of providing a memorable experience to all of our guests. We would like to inform you that the room 723 is not an ocean front room and the reservation was not for an ocean front either.  We do have different room types available and would like to recommend to call us directly next time your travels bring you to Laguna Beach so we go over our other options with you. Thank you for providing us with feedback about your stay so we can better our service. We hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Arrived late evening at this lovely boutique hotel with no reservation. My room had a nice poolside view with balcony seating. Only steps away from the well maintained deck that overlooks the sights & sounds of the ocean! The room was comfortable & clean. Can't say enough nice things about the staff & Nick, the Assistant Mgr. so helpful & restaurant suggestions were amazing! Great continental breakfast with fresh pastries & Starbucks coffee. Thanks for the wonderful hospitality! Jeanne P. OHIO
Manager Response: Dear  jaftp,  We would like to thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. we are delighted that you enjoyed our city and our services. Thank you once more for praising our team. We strive to provide the best standard service to our guest.  We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: My wife and I had the greatest experience visiting. All the Staff were THE BEST and we can say without any doubt. We will be returning!! Beautiful - Peaceful - Serene with wonderful friendly people. Went for Festival of The Arts Pagent of the Masters and this was the perfect location with shuttle service.
Manager Response: Dear forrkay,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Truly Gleaming Beach Gem on Laguna Beach
Summary: Small, fantastic hotel on the sand at Laguna Beach. Locale is unbeatable. Do yourself a favor and GET the beachfront room- I have never stayed so close to the surf!! You could hear the surf with door opened or closed. The service was exceptional! Nick was phenomenal and treated me like a king! Bashir was also outstanding! Take their restaurant recommendations-all good! I really look forward to visiting again and would do so in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear duffinj,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: The staff was so welcoming and accommodating at the front desk.  We had room 101 right on the water.  It was a beautiful location for the room, hearing the waves all night was pure heaven.  Unfortunately the patio was kind of dirty as well as the carpet inside.  The bathroom was lovely, although no bathtub.  The bed was comfortable!  The pool, although small and not a lot of chaises, was so lovely.  We did travel with our little dog and it was very pet-friendly.  They even had a nice little green area, fenced for the dog.  For the price I would have liked the patio glass and railing to have been cleaned, as well as the sliding door track...it was full of hair and yucky stuff - and unfortunately you can't help but look at it as you step down into the room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cannot beat the location--literally steps from the ocean. We did not have ocean-front views, but could see the ocean from the side of our balcony (we were in room 602).  The room was nice enough. I would give the room and hotel itself a 3.5/5 stars, but the location really makes it 5 stars. If you are looking for a reasonably-priced stay on a stunning beach, this place is perfect. If you're looking for fancy, luxurious accommodations, this is probably not the place. It was perfect for what we wanted; the only time we were in the room was to sleep. Would definitely recommend and would stay here again.  Pros:  --Location, location, location. Right on the beach and super close to tons of great restaurants and shops in the area.  --Free wifi and free on-site parking --Impressive
Manager Response: Dear Whitney P,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your detailed review. We are delighted to hear you had a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team.Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind ragards,

Summary: Went up to Laguna for a quick getaway with the girlfriends. Found Capri Laguna online. Didn't really know what to expect and must say, very pleasantly surprised! The location is amazing! You can't walk on the beach to have expensive but fabulous drinks and food at the Surf and Sand. Walk the other way on the beach and have roof top cocktails at the La Casa del Camino. Or just get up in the morning and go for a beautiful beach walk like we did! It's an older hotel and funky for sure. Many different levels so if you don't do stairs probably not a good fit. We had two rooms on the 6th floor. Both were very nicely remodeled. The smaller of the room as on the street side of the hotel and the girls that stayed in that room did have some issues with music pumping from the club across
Manager Response: Dear Zels,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star detailed review on Tripadvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyed your stay with us and the entire city. The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return for more stunning views and beautiful sunsets.  Kind regards,

Summary: The location of Capri Laguna is fantastic & the staff was very friendly and accommodating. That said, I had a hard time sleeping because my bed was super uncomfortable & there is a very large A/C machine in the room that is LOUD. Rooms really need updating and the hotel needs to invest in some nice beds. I went down for the breakfast offered every morning but it's just sugary cereals, breads & fruit. I went to grab a banana & fruit flies were everywhere all over the bananas. I told the staff, hopefully they removed them. It was alarming. Overall, I was disappointed I paid such a high rate for a less than mediocre experience and for very little comfort in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda J,  Please allow us to apologize to you for the inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay and we do understand the importance of providing a memorable experience. We hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Absolutely charming, lovely beach hotel. We stayed three nights, July 26 through the 29th 2016.  I had stayed here years earlier and my brother  stayed here for 15 years in a row. It is a perfect location. Right on the beach, walking distance at low tide to the center of town although there is no real need to go there.  There are many restaurants nearby. I believe the hotel will pick you up from John Wayne airport so there is no real need for a car.  And there is a free trolley which runs frequently and drops you off right in front of the hotel.   The place has been spruced up since our last visit but still has the sound of the ocean to lull you to sleep, the incredibly friendly, helpful, patient staff including housekeeping and the beach staff, clean rooms with refrigerators
Manager Response: Dear mamahawlz,  Thank you so much for sharing with us this beautiful detailed review! Love to hear that you and your friend enjoyed the hotel, and we are delighted to know you had such a great stay with us. It is always a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to continuing being your preference when staying in Laguna Beach. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: First impression is the smell.  The mildew is overpowering.   The Toliet is not anchored to bathroom floor flange.  The shower doesn't have pressure or heat.   It has a good 1970s porn theme.  The parking is Terrible.  The view is 5 stars the property is 2.   Cigarette butts are everywhere.   Yuck
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cute older hotel on great beach.  Room was musty and dated  but fairly clean. Well staffed and friendly.  Good breakfast.  A little pricey but okay considering the location.  Our room had no view so it was not terribly romantic but would be good for a family vacation.
Manager Response: Dear SueLBP59,  Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience. It is our continuous effort to provide a relaxing and comfortable experience for all of our guests. Thank you once more for choosing us. We look forward to welcome you again.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, great location and even better staff
Summary: From the moment we arrived we fell in love with the quaintness of the property. Bachir and Nik at the front desk were very accommodating and kind, ensuring we got the best room possible and had everything we needed. The beach access is perfect, just having to walk down the steps from our room and the kid setting up the umbrella and chairs on the beach for the guests was extremely helpful. The breakfast offered in the mornings was perfect and had plenty of options to chose from. I can't wait to return again!
Manager Response: Dear Jenny B,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. Thank you for the 5 star review and we are looking forward to seeing you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: This is a lovely beach front location!!!  Front Desk was amazing, they even sent us flowers!!!!  Beach Chairs and umbrellas provided promptly by hotel staff once walking down to the beach!!!  Room 203 (beachfront) was perfect!!!
Manager Response: Dear N1sdlamesa,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the beach! It was truly a pleasure to have you with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.   Kind regards,

Summary: Had a room for 3 nights right on the beach (RM 101). What an amazing location and view from the room. Listening to the waves crash all day and night is very relaxing and therapeutic. Breakfast is included and includes a nice selection of pastries, cereal, waffles, pancakes, and coffee. There is a free "trolly" that runs through Laguna Beach all day which is great for going into town for drinks and stuff. The waves near the hotel are quite big, so if you're travelling with little kids please keep a close eye on them. If you're a runner like me, I recommend wearing running shoes when running the beach because the sand is a little coarse and gave me blisters. The staff of the hotel were very friendly and assisted us in all matters. There is a laundry on site which is great because
Manager Response: Dear ChooChoo34,  Thank you for your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel . We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed your stay and our city. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and for recommending our hotel and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We have stayed here well over 30 yrs. So that should say a lot. Each year we find some new amenities or renovation which tells me that they strive to make your stay better and better and so far, not adding it to the cost of the guests. Bravo for that!  A big thank you to Nick for making our stay  enjoyable and very memorable. He was very good to us as well as the rest of the staff. Also I must mention the wonderful job that Francisco does each year. He is such a hard working man and quite an asset to Capri Laguna. We love the ocean front room we get every year. Nice to have the little kitchen area, the awesome breakfast, the air conditioner works great and the rooms are spacious. The grounds are beautiful with lush tropical plants and succulents. I hope they keep the prices
Manager Response: Dear Kim,  Thank you very much for your loyalty and for the kind words about our hotel. It really means a lot to our team members to get mentioned by name. We really appreciate your review, and we are so delighted to know that our friendly staff, rooms, and views, were all great aspects on your stay with us. Thank you one again for staying with us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: End of July getaway for four friends
Summary: Had a perfect room with 2 kings/kitchen overlooking the beach ( room 731 ). Felt very taken care of by Nick and Bachir from the moment we arrived. The room was clean, the bathroom a bit small and outdated. There is on-site parking for only one car, however Nick told us there was unlimited parking about 2 blocks away which worked out fine. Great Great location about 3/4 mile walk into town.  They serve a nice breakfast, waffles, pancakes, cereal, fresh fruit and coffee every morning. The beach is lovely and there is a very nice young man to assist with setting up your chaise, towels and umbrellas.  Perfect getaway
Manager Response: none

Summary: I got to tell you, the place far exceeded my expectations. Is it older? Yes, but well maintained and works perfect.. Don't let that steer you away.. Staff is "VERY" helpful, knowledgeable. Great beach location. Plenty of sand for long walks. Restaurants, Ralph's, Serf lessons, Shopping, Art all with in walking distance..  Midweek is the way to go!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect location and couldn't have been treated better!
Summary: From the very moment we walked into Capri Laguna we were greeted with the friendliest of faces.  Bachir Atallah was outstanding on customer service.  He went above and beyond to accommodate our every need.  We had an issue with our shower and without us asking he had his staff help us move our belongings to another (better) room as soon as possible.  Breakfast was great every morning that included a juice machine with 4 different juices, Starbucks coffee and hot chocolate (24/7), many danishes and lemon muffins, a waffle maker, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt, a pancake maker, toast and milk.  Our rooms were very clean and the beds very comfortable with great pillows and included maid service daily.  We had no trouble falling asleep and sleeping well every night.  The A/C and free wifi
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Capri Laguna for three nights (7/20-22) in a beachfront room(103).  The room had a king bed which was very comfortable and a sleeper sofa (which my daughter used) a small kitchenette and a great balcony with table chairs and a lounger. The bathroom had just been remodeled and the marble walk in shower and general appearance added to the appeal of the room.    We were literally steps from the beach and the Capri provided umbrellas and chairs (included in the room price) and a staff person was available to set them up.  The free trolley is just outside their door and great little shops and restaurants are close by.  The pool area was small but very nice and it was a great way to refresh after being on the beach.  There was a rooftop lounge area that we did not
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Charming hotel right on the beach, friendly and helpful staff
Summary: This hotel has a classy, intimate, European vibe. It is just south of the main hub of town and so the street is slightly quieter and the beach slightly less crowded than other LB hotels I've stayed in.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Wonderful to hear the surf at night and walk right out of the hotel to the beach in the morning.  Stayed in an ocean-front room on the third floor which was nicely decorated but the bathroom could use some updating. Fair warning: there were a lot of stairs to navigate, both outside and inside the room, which seemed odd--three very steep marble stairs leading from the bedroom to the bathroom so I ended up leaving the light on all night to ensure I didn't tumble down them in the wee hours! I somehow overlooked the fact that there was a resort fee
Manager Response: none

Summary: Arrived to Paradise on July 23rd, 2016.  Took a weekend off to celebrate my husband's birthday.  From the start I fell in love with the pictures of this place. Then I called the front desk and Bachir Attallah answered and was professional and respectful to my accommodations. He is the front desk manager and he truly made my weekend with my husband amazing.  Great and beautiful location, rooms, staff and overall accommodations.  Highly recommend it to everyone.
Manager Response: Dear Chrisbelen L,  Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief! The Capri Laguna on the Beach and the entire staff wish all the best for your husband's birthday and look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Stay at Capri Laguna on the beach
Summary: We stayed here as our final part of our honeymoon trip and we was thrilled that we chose this as our final stop before heading home. The hotel is perfectly located on the beach and you get the perfect view of the ocean (we stayed in room 102) and Laguna. The staff on arrival were extremely helpful and were able to give us advise on local attractions, restaurants etc. We visited Disneyland whilst we was staying and was only around a 35 mins drive which was great. The breakfast which is included had a great variety and was the perfect way to set us up before heading to the beach. Its a great extra that you are greeted on the beach with chairs, umbrellas and beach towels. I would recommend the Capri Laguna for the perfect beach stay(in fact I already have since being home !)
Manager Response: Dear Emily B,  We are Delighted to hear that you had a great stay and you enjoyed our city, the wonderful location and the services of our hotel . We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you one again for choosing us and being part of your honeymoon trip. We would love to see you soon.   Kind regards,

Summary: This was just heaven. The rooms are fantastic. I had a king with sofa sleeper partial ocean view. There was an actual kitchen and little patios. The beach right out back. Super service. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the cheesy portable air conditioner in the room that did absolutely nothing. I also hated the little puck coffee maker. But on a good note 24 hour coffee in the lounge. Take a walk on the beach. Really neat.
Manager Response: Dear Cristy E,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon for more fantastic views.  Kind regards,

Summary: Stayed at the Capri for 2 nights. The rooms were spacious and clean. Views are  awesome. Wonderful deck great for relaxing and enjoying the view. Staff was friendly and helpful. Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Tamara C,  We would like to thank you for your time and your kind comments. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect. Both the hotel and Nick
Summary: So charming. You just can't beat being right off the water. And Nick at the front desk was equally fantastic. Two extra stars just because of him. There's a free trolley that will take you closer to the action. Highly recommend Pageant of the masters
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a few things already planned to do when we arrived at the hotel. However, when we met Bachir, he was so helpful!! He suggested things for us to do or see. Things that only someone local would have knowledge of . He was never too busy to answer questions or ask about our day. We appreciated his courtesy, energy and smile! Thank you Bachir for helping us have a vacation to remember!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, friendly staff, rooms recently remodeled.  The beach front rooms are with a stones throw away from the water.  There are walkout patios with tables and lounges to enjoy the ocean, the sun and the sunset from the patio.  The free breakfast includes several nice choices: waffles, pancakes, pastries, cereal, bagels, yogurt, juices, milk and coffee.  Overall a recommend for any family or couples vacation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Inn is very cozy.  Convenient to all locations without being in heavy traffic areas.  Great beach area with wonderful staff to get you chairs and towels.  The guest room had an updated bath with good shower area.  Our room was on the beach side with great views and a nice balcony.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice location. Rooms need some renovations
Summary: Stayed the night here and it's a great location right on the beach in south Laguna. King room with ocean view. Rooms are a bit dated but roomy. Large balcony with table chairs and a lounge chair. Stairs down to the beach where an attendant gets you beach chairs and towels for the sand. Breakfast included. Make your own waffles, a cake machine, cereal, yogurt, fruit, coffee etc. During certain times of the year there is a free shuttle that takes you up and down the coast so you can go into main beach.   Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear shanna661,  Thank you for your time and for sharing this beautiful review on tripadvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us and for your nice comments. We definitely look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Best place for rest and relaxation!
Summary: We spent two glorious nights and three days here at Capri Laguna on the beach. The room had a beautiful view of the beachfront as promised when booking online. Nick and the other staff were very polite and helpful. The continental breakfast was scrumptious. It was the best place for a break away from the rest of the busyness in life. Highly recommend Capri Laguna on the beach to anyone who wants to be right on the beach with great hospitality.
Manager Response: Dear jilliano99,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are a passionate team and we are always happy to assist our guests to make their stay special. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our staff. Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful Views at the Capri Laguna
Summary: This is an older hotel that is in good condition.  Please do not expect a big chain hotel atmospher, this is an older hotel.  The rooms are basic but extremlly clean.  There was an eating area with sink, microwave and refrig all of which were well kept.  The beds, 2 queens, were very comfortable and since we had an ocean view room and could sleep with the window open, an extra blanket was supplied. The breakfast was quite nice with waffles or pancakes along with the other staples of hotel breakfast.  They do have a great coffee maker with Starbucks Coffee available 24/7. One of the things we appreciated was the free shuttle that runs from June 24 to August 31.  The pickup and drop off stop is just a few steps from the hotel.  The grounds need some attention but it appears they
Manager Response: Dear M N,  Thank you very much for choosing us while visiting the beautiful Laguna Beach city and for taking the time to provide us your detailed feedback on Tripadvisor. We are pleased to read that everybody had a great time. Thank you one again for highlighting the quality of services provided by our staff. We look forward to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: Went to Capri on 6/24/16 and had an amazing weekend too bad it was spoiled by the front desk. Man named Saul I think. So Sunday I try calling the front desk to ask for a late check out the phone in the room didn't work as I look at my cell the hotel is calling me. He asked if I was staying in room 403 I said yes. He replied " bro you never told us u had a dog I said I don't my neighbors have one and it's been waking us up all morning. He says no you have a dog housekeeping already seen u. I said you're wrong come to my room and look he says I don't have to. At the point he is insulting my intelligence so we ask for a late check out it was scheduled at 11 he gave us until 11:30 so we go to check out and he's still accusing me of the dog my girl calls him rude. My gf tells him
Manager Response: Dear Andy m,  Thank you for your review following your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and please allow us to apologize to you for the inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns. We would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay! We hope that you will consider returning to us in the future so that we may have the opportunity to better serve you. Our warm and best wishes for your birthday!  Kind regards,

Summary: We loved this 1950's vintage hotel with beautiful modern updates! We had a lovely ocean view room. Nick took very good care of us. We felt so welcome here and had a lovely time. We enjoyed the unique layout of the property with it's many terraces. Highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear Dee R,  Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to .We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We look forward to welcome you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: amazing service!! european flair with old school laguna beach feel.
Summary: thank you Capri Laguna! my friends and I have left my two favorite coffee mugs in the room mini-fridge, your staff cleaned them (!), and held them at the front desk for me to pick up a week later. The manager offered me a coffee, and I got to run down to the beach for a quick swim on a hot day before heading back home. What gracious, friendly service. and what a beautiful room and place on the beach! it was ALL delicious, thank you!
Manager Response: Dear tripitxandy,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our services and we are delighted that we made a great getaway for you. Thank you for taking the time to write your 5 star review on TripAdvisor and we most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon for more amazing views.   Warm regards,

Summary: Great place in Laguna! Very attentive staff, easy beach access and with the oceanfront room a spectacular view. Superb breakfast on the upper viewing deck.  Room was a bit dated but it kinda goes with the Old world Laguna Beach charm.  Took the free fast shuttle just a few blocks to downtown for all the wonderful shops and restaurants. Lived here all my life and was not disappointed! A vacation must without spending $800 or more at the surf and sand for one night on the same beach. Excellent view,staff and amenities, can't wait to go back👍🏼
Manager Response: Dear Mike B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor and for highlighting the major assets of our hotel. We all work daily to offer a truly personal experience to each of our guests. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our facilities and the entire city. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: The view and the staff are top notch!
Summary: We were happy to be able to get a beach front king room with a balcony sort of last minute.  Nick, the assistant manager, was very accommodating and helpful.We ended up staying an extra night because we were enjoying ourselves so much in Laguna Beach. This inn is quaint, friendly and charming.  Nothing fancy, but very comfortable, clean and bright.  All the staff we encountered were happy and helpful.   We will come back to this little gem of a place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great boutique style hotel quaint, clean spacious room, excellent proximity to beach, restaurants and shops. The staff was super nice and accommodating. Loved that they set up beach chairs for us. I look forward to staying again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your time and for this 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our city and amaze you again.   Kind regards,

Summary: The view from our room was awesome.  We also had a small balcony that we enjoyed.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We enjoyed the wine and cheese on the rooftop.  Nick Politis and Bachir Atallah at the front desk were very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear jeffmireya,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you again.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Nice Location but a little run down
Summary: I booked a week long trip here for rest and relaxation.   The location is wonderful, staff was always helpful, but the overall condition of the hotel can use some TLC.  Each day, something broke in our room (which I admit was always fixed within 30 minutes)  Very small pool with only two lounge chairs, no restaurant, no bar and continental breakfast was hit or miss.  I ended up moving to another hotel after a few days for a better pool and more services!
Manager Response: Dear DebiG99,  Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience. It is our continuous effort to provide a relaxing and comfortable experience away from home and rest assured that we take under consideration all issues that arise. We hope that you will consider returning to us in the future so that we may have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Kind regards,

Summary: Love this place , very " rustic " in some respects , tiny pool , but staff are for the most part friendly and helpful ,emphasis on " for the most part " , there are some that should be replaced . At any rate , our room was very nice , spacious , and clean , and the outdoor patios and ocean view common areas are delightful . The Staff need to FULLY EXPLAIN the parking options , their negligence  in Not doing this simple thing in a crowded , construction - laden , Calif beach destination caused us a great deal  of stress that was unnecessary !!! ,
Manager Response: Dear octavia0263,  It is our pleasure that you’ve had a great time with us. We appreciate your kind compliments and your review.  We will certainly take all your comments into consideration and thank you for bringing this up to our attention so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the future. Our team strives to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: The folks at the front desk were very polite and helpful.  I accidentally booked my room for the wrong night, and they were able to find a room on short notice and just charged me for the one night even though it was beyond the time period to cancel my reservation for the wrong night.  Due to a late flight into LAX, I arrived around 1:00 a.m. In the morning and they were very accommodating even with my late arrival.  Beautiful views of the beach, too...wonderful to hear the waves outside as you fall asleep.
Manager Response: Dear Jim H,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and feedback online. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the incredible view and the ocean sound from your room. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to have you again in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We always stay here, room by the ocean, we come twice a year.  Very friendly staff. The rooms are attractive and comfortable and they are being remodeled. Keep door open all the time to listen to ocean, wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear silvia1933,  Thank you for your loyalty and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us . We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is located directly on the beach. The rooms are clean and well-equipped and the staff friendly. While it certainly isn't inexpensive, treat yourself to a beach/ocean view unit. The sound of the surf and the views are great. My only complaint is very minor - while it's great they have wifi in the rooms, the bright blue light on the Cisco routers located on the ceilings are annoying at night (though you can solve it by putting tape over the light). Nice place in a great location.
Manager Response: Dear Veritas57,  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback.  Kind regards,

Summary: This was our first stay at the Capri Laguna and will certainly not be our last. We have stayed at other locations in Laguna but find this is definitely the best deal for the money. From the moment we walked in until checking out, everyone we encountered was professional, friendly and helpful, especially the Assistant General Manager, Nick Politis. We were given great advice on places to eat and other attractions in Laguna. The location can't be beat -- our room was literally steps above the sand and we went to sleep to the sound of waves crashing below -- perfect!
Manager Response: Dear Molly N,  Thank you for your kinds words and the time you took to share this 5 star review with us! We strive to make every guest stay memorable. We are so delighted to know that our friendly staff, rooms and views were all great aspects on your stay with us. We will be looking forward to see you soon on your next visit to Laguna beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Everything you need, right on the ocean, at a better price
Summary: From the minute I walked in to the lobby to check in, this place felt like it had its act together.  Nick Politis (couldn’t make up a more appropriate name) was very personable, and he and the rest of the staff treated my family and me as though we were regulars.  We stayed for one night on Mothers’ Day and gave my mom her own oceanfront room, while my wife, daughter and I took a pool view.  Both rooms were clean and modern, with minimal kitsch, white walls and ocean foam accents.  Perfect for our needs: crashing and relaxing between trips down to the sand.    There are several really good restaurants within walking distance, too, and a Koffee Klatch directly across the street (though the Capri has a Starbucks machine “open 24 hours” in the lobby).  Had a fantastic breakfast at
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed one night, visiting a friend that lived near by. First had a room that was on the side of building that had no view so changed it to ocean view for an extra cost that was well worth it, nothing like sleeping with the heater on and door open while hearing the sound of the waves crashing.
Manager Response: Dear  CaboAl1966,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach hotel. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us and our services were meeting your expectations. We hope to see you soon for more waves and beautiful views.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A little salty, but A for effort
Summary: Late flight, so didn't get to check in until around 10:30pm, John at the front desk was waiting for us and was very pleasant. He upgraded us to an ocean front room which was a nice treat!  The hotel layout is pretty cool, handing on the cliffs of Laguna.  The room was really nothing to right home about, but was fine for the short time we were there. Definitely needs some refreshing, and felt a little eh, but at least the bathroom was nice and clean.  They did some upgrades in the bathroom which was nice, but oddly enough the glass shower you had to actually get in and turn on and bolt out the back before geting sprayed with water..not the brighest idea but it did look nice.   The stay included a continental breakfast, which was set up in the lobby..nice but we opted to go out
Manager Response: Dear jessicaw08,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We will be looking into all the points you have raised as we do continuously work to improve our product and service. Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Capri Laguna is a real pleasure!
Summary: My husband and I just left the Capri Laguna today and we wished we had booked more time. The Capri is a charming older hotel — more like those you find in Europe — which we really prefer. Our room was an ocean front queen with a small balcony and it had amazing views up and down the coastline. The room was on the small side but had a kitchenette. It was totally comfortable, simply furnished and clean with all the amenities that we wanted. Besides our private balcony there were terraces to relax on by the beach. We fell asleep to the roar of the ocean waves. We can't wait to come back .
Manager Response: Dear Flubba,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.  We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for the 5 star review and for choosing us. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: I stayed here one night and spent hours online searching for something right on the water.  Once I arrived, I was told that they were "upgrading" my room.  I thought that was strange since I had already reserved and paid for the oceanfront room.  I asked, "How could it get better?"  I could tell that my question made him uncomfortable.  So I said, please let me look at the room you are offering and the one I booked and I will decide.  He reluctantly gave me both keys.    I first walked to the "upgraded room"  It was a long walk, the front door was filthy, the wood was warped and the lock was covered in rust.  But it was right on the water.  I entered hoping for the best.  It was super dark even with the lights on, overall creepy feeling with low ceilings, old carpet, walls that
Manager Response: Dear DonnaMee,  We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your time with us. We would like to apologize for any inconveniences you may have experienced during your stay with us. Thank you for your recent stay and sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent location, exceptional service and best value in Laguna!
Summary: Capri was wonderful! We live in Orange County and have enjoyed many weekend "staycations" and Capri is one of the best! Not only are you right on the beach, the rooms are well appointed with micro/fridge/bistro setting inside and on the deck. We saw 3 separate groups of grey whales migrating - 2 right from our balcony! The management service was very gracious and breakfast was ample (waffles, pancakes, eggs, coffee, yogurt, cereal, muffins, oranges, etc). My only comment would be to add a few more tables on the roof-top deck but we just walked down the stairs to the beach anyway! The pool is small and tepid but the ocean is right there albeit freezing so with kids this may be the only drawback. We are an older couple so not a problem for us. For us, the only complaint would be
Manager Response: Dear jillidina,  We are delighted to hear that we were your best place to stay in Laguna Beach. Thank you for praising our services and for taking the time to write this detailed 5 star review! We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next visit to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A little bit of the Mediterranean in SoCal
Summary: Location, location, location, these are the words that come to mind when staying here. I read many, many reviews of the property and looked at many, many photos before booking. And I was glad I stayed here. And yet, had to admit some of the gripes I'd read in some reviews were somewhat true. To make a long story short: the place is long on gorgeous beach sights and sounds and European style charm and it's a little shaggy around the edges in a European way.   I'd bet money the owner or manager is a European, frugal DIY'er, or hire of DIY'ers, who shrugs and says meh at a little paint drip here a little tile grout there. The place was updated with good intentions I'd guess about 5 years ago, with granite counter tops, new carpet, new tile, but the job was a slap dash one. The 70s
Manager Response: Dear focogirl,  We would like to thank for taking the time and sharing your detailed review on the tripadvisor. We are delighted to read your kind words and it is a great pleasure to us that you enjoyed our services and specially the location. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful getaway at a wonderful hotel.
Summary: Capri Laguna is a treasure.  Great location, wonderful atmosphere.  We have been steady customers for over 12 years and will continue to go back year after year.  Special thanks to Bachir & Nick for the great front office experience.
Manager Response: Dear dianewhitmer,  Thank you for your loyalty and for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We greatly appreciate your kind word for the team member and it is our pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you once more for your time and sharing your 5 star review on TripAdvisor. We look forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Wife and I stayed for just a night in February and loved the room and the beachfront location.  There were storms in the pacific and watching the huge waves crash against the rocks at night as the tide rolled in while enjoying a bottle or two of wine was amazing.  Its not a 5 star place with valet parking but it is an awesome oceanfront gem.  Stop in for a night or two and relax while enjoying the location.
Manager Response: Dear TopekaMike,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5 star review on Tripadvisor. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay with us even with the storm. The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return during the summer for more stunning view and beautiful sunsets.  Kind regards,

Summary: Location, location, location - this hotel has it.  The beach there is remarkable.  There is some old world charm in this place and for its age, the remodeling has been pretty good.  Our room was small but clean with an overlook of a roof but a fairly wide view of the ocean.  The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet.  There are lots of twisty narrow stairs up and down to both the beach and the rooms. They are tastefully lined with plants and a few greek looking statues.  The lobby is attractive and welcoming.  Breakfast was not bad, with a number of healthier choices of fruit and hard boiled eggs.  Bachir, the manager was fantastic.  He went out of his way to help us out several times.
Manager Response: Dear Susan M,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our services and we are delighted that we made a memorable stay for you. Thank you for the review and your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,

Summary: Our room 303 was perfect.  Bashir gave us a choice of 3 rooms & this one was perfect.  A suite with separate bedroom with a huge veranda.  We were put to sleep by the waves crashing on the shore every night.  This is an older establishment--"old Laguna" but very very comfortable. The staff, Bashir and Nick were so accommodating and saw to our every comfort.  Our housekeeper was outstanding.  I wish I remembered  her name.  All in all a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear Hollygirl44,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. We all work daily to offer a truly personal and wonderful experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: We just finished  another  stay at the Capri and I have to say they have made some very good  upgrade s since out last trip.The lobby breakfast  area  now includes a pancake  maker and a waffle maker  as well .They have also added cereal option too for those watching  their carbohydrate intake.Our Room was big had a couch ,fridge  microwave   and a coffee  maker.My recommendation would be to go to the lobby and use the Starbucks coffee maker they have. It makes your coffee fast and it tastes awesome. It rained a lot during our trip this time so we spent most of our time in the room and walking up and down downtown Laguna the Capri has a nice beachfront location and has direct access to the beach just walking down the steps it's an older quieter Hotel in the staff is very
Manager Response: Dear JAS595,  It is our pleasure that you’ve had a great time with us. We appreciate your kind compliments and your detailed review. Our team strives to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you for your loyalty and we will be looking forward for "The Capri 3" !  Kind regards,

Summary: We spend two nights at Capri Laguna and loved everything about it. It is right on the beach and you can hear the waves crashing  at night.  The oceanfront rooms are the best. The breakfast was more than we expected. The location is perfect and there is a free shuttle on the weekends that takes you around Laguna Beach. Special thanks to Bachir, for his friendly personality and helpfulness added to a memorable experience. We will defiinitely recommend it to anymore and we plan on revisiting in the future.  The only negative was the small parking spaces which were limited and hard to get into.
Manager Response: Dear Toykar,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We greatly appreciate your kind word for the team member and it’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel and our services. Thank you once more for your time and sharing your feedback on the TripAdvisor. We would love to see you again for more ocean views and beautiful sunsets.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel - right on the beach!!!
Summary: This was our first trip to Laguna, we stayed at the Capri for 2 nights, and we absolutely loved it!  I would love to go back for a week!!  I was looking for a hotel right on the beach, and the Capri did not disappoint.  Very friendly, attentive service, free wifi, parking and continental breakfast.  And most importantly, a perfect location with gorgeous views of the beach.  Breathtaking views of the sunset too!  This is a small, quaint boutique hotel, that was just perfect for us (my husband and I travelled with our 2 teenagers).  For our second night we were upgraded to a suite, and it was beautiful, we could hear the waves all night.  Can't wait to go back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Effyk2016,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your detailed review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. Thank you once more for choosing us, and for your comments. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Favorite spot to stay in Laguna Beach!
Summary: The staff greets you with hospitality every time, something that is seemingly becoming a lost art with other hotel proprietors! The rooms are spacious and just a stone's throw away from the water. I have never had a bad experience here, and have stayed here many times!
Manager Response: Dear supertiff129,  Thank you for your loyalty and it’s a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna Hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once more for your time and your 5* valuable review and we will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at Capri. Our room was facing the ocean, but you share patios with the rooms next door, so we didn't feel comfortable leaving our sliding door open at night to hear the oceans rhythmic and calming sounds. That being said, we had to turn on the cooler in the room, and the fan was loud. I kept the settings to low and it still seemed noisy. It didn't bother me as much as my husband.  In the evening we were able to sit outside on the tables they have on the decks Oceanside. It was romantic and quiet.  Nice place to stay for a fun Laguna weekend. Good central location that allowed us to walk to our dinner reservation at Mare. Parking was a little challenging at first but they will show you the additional parking once you register.
Manager Response: Dear Haley R,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to know that your stay was romantic and quiet. We are sorry for the inconvenience and thank you once more for bringing this up to our attention. We hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you and assign a room with privet balcony for more privacy and beautiful sunsets.  Kind regards,

Summary: Me and my family come every year to this hotel and we love it here ! Everyone is always so nice ! Beach views in room 101 are perfect ! Jet tubs in bathroom are a plus after a long day at the beach !!! And free Starbucks coffee 24/7 is awesome ! We will return
Manager Response: Dear Nicgreg23,  Thank you very much for your time and for this kind review. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We thank you once more for your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great stay in a fantastic location!
Summary: The Capri Laguna was a great stay for a quick get away during the winter.  Not crowded, quiet and peaceful.  Check-in was friendly and efficient and I had requested a room on a high floor with a view...and we got one.  We stayed in a cute little room with a small deck out front and a large window overlooking the ocean. We enjoyed the breeze on the deck with a bottle of wine.  The room was a bit older, but the bed was comfortable and it had a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker and waters.  The hotel location was great and we walked to dinner a few blocks down the street.  Parking was onsite (a bit tight if you have a large car) and FREE!!  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and being right next door to the Surf and Sand Hotel (in which I have stayed before....for more than
Manager Response: Dear 2busy2work,  We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your 5 star kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great Location Ask for rooms 201-204 Best Ocean views!
Summary: Free Continental breakfast, Free Overnight Parking - those are Rare Perks you hear in Laguna! Spectacular Views, Amazing Staff! It's not 4 star but with minor touch ups it feels like 4.5 stars! The location was key easy access in and out, plenty of on property and off property parking - Great Cardio Walk to main Beach!
Manager Response: Dear ProfessorM3,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our services and we are delighted that we made a great getaway for you. Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and we most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon for more spectacular views. Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Small boutique hotel on the sand
Summary: We stayed here for a few days over spring break.  Last year we stayed at the Pacific Edge down the street but Capri Laguna beat that one in our opinion.  Older boutique hotel but the rooms are recently renovated with new paint, shower etc so overall it's very clean inside.  Portable A/C system, but being right on the sand I like the cool air with the patio doors and windows open.  The room is small but we had a great ocean view so who needs the space when you you are only a few steps from the beach.  The location is unbeatable, just step down the stair at the back of the hotel and you feel like your own private beach.  It seems like most of the room get a glimpse of the ocean.  For the size of the hotel, they have a few great sun decks with a great view of the ocean.  Parking
Manager Response: Dear Kim N,  Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach Hotel. We are delighted to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay and our services were meeting your expectations. Your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. We definitely look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: This is our first time to visit Laguna beach and we reserved at this place because they had the most reasonable prices among those in the same area. We came here for our anniversary and it we had a wonderful time. As soon as we entered, we were greeted by the friendly and professional staff. We got the ocean view room and it was clean and spacious. They had lovely decks where we just enjoyed the view while sipping coffee. We also loved that you just walk down the stairs to the beach where they had umbrellas and chairs for the guests. There were also shops, restaurants and cafes within walking distance. All in all, it was an awesome experience.
Manager Response: Dear alchop1,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. Thank you for the 5star detailed review, it was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and your feedback at the tripadvisor and we would love to welcome you back soon. The entire team wishes you a happy anniversary.  Warm regards,  Kind regards

Summary Heading: A great place to stay in Laguna. The best.
Summary: I have just returned from 2 days at this Hotel. It was wonderful. I drove down from Las Vegas.  I have not been to Laguna in 25 years. I’m retired now. I was in the Hotel/Casino business for many, many years. I was at the famous Sands during the Rat Pack years with Sinatra, Sammy, Dean and all the guys. This Capri Laguna is so well run.
