Nick and his staff are very good at what they do. They all do what is needed and do it well.  I had a room looking out over the ocean and it was great. Beautiful sight and at night I opened the windows and could hear the sounds of the ocean. What a wonderful way to go to sleep. Capri is on PCH, in the 1400 block. So it’s 14 blocks to downtown. Out the door and to the left. A very nice walk. So many new shops and restaurants and placed to see.
Manager Response: Dear WaltersLV,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5star detailed review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary: Room was $600 a nite. Bathroom to small to get in and out. No hot water or pressure for ten to twenty minutes. Patio furniture was broke. Lite shinned in all nite. Musty smell. AC was a floor unit very loud. No steps to beach. Patio umbrellas and furniture old dirty. This hotel is very run down and over priced. Mgr never called me when I checked out a day early. Instead he charged me for both nites. Never would recommend this place!
Manager Response: Dear Maryjoneri,  Please allow us to apologize to you for the inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback as it ensures that we not only become aware but are being proactive in addressing our guests concerns.   I would like to reassure you that we truly appreciate your business and have taken under serious consideration all of your remarks and the shortfall that happened during your stay and we do understand the importance of providing a memorable experience. We would like to inform you that the management called and assured you that your credit credit card was charged only for one night ant not for second night. Please do not hesitate to contact the hotel and we will be more than happy to assist and clarify any questions you may have. We hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: We were checked in by the AGM (Mr. Nick P.).  Got to know him during our stay, extremely helpful, friendly and pleasant to converse with.  Everyone at Capri was exceptionally nice, polite and helpful.  Loved our room, the decor and location.  The sound of crashing waves at night was peaceful.  Lobby was warm and clean, complimentary breakfast was better than the rest.  Parking was tight only because Spring Break with a packed house but staff went out of their way to help.  Thanks again Mr. Nick P. for being a great Host.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear by CVUSC,  Thank you for choosing us and for your wonderful comments. We were truly delighted that we exceeded your expectations and most importantly the professional service extended by our staff. We are a passionate team and we are always happy to assist our guests to make their stay special. You are special and unique to us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach can’t wait for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: This is a hidden gem right on the coast.  Extremely helpful and friendly management; I especially commend Bashir (Front Desk Manager), who couldn't have been more accommodating.  The hotel is centrally located in the heart of beautiful Laguna Beach, minutes away from both Heisler Park and Aliso Beach Park.  I'd recommend getting either a beachfront or oceanview room.  Rooms without ocean view don't appear to have much of a view at all (unless you get a pool view room).
Manager Response: Dear MarkEvan18,  We would like to thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach! we are delighted that you enjoyed our city and our services. Thank you once more for praising our team. We strive to provide the best standard service to our guest. The "hidden gem"  will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: Everyone was very friendly and the location is amazing! There are restaurants and shops and art galleries all within walking distance. There is also a free trolley to downtown and main beach. The beach front at the hotel is nice for walks at low tide and the ocean crashing sounds wonderful at night.
Manager Response: Dear Jeannette B,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us your feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you enjoyed our beautiful city and our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future.  Kind regards,

Summary: The location is beautiful, the place looks really nice and its comfortable. They have diffrent grades of rooms that are a little diffrent in the way they are priced so you have to pay attention. Ocean view is back farther, ocean front , is still not right there beach front is right in the front of the hotel on the ocean. Most of the rooms are incredibly small. The ocean view above the front desk is huge, but for me it was too far from the water. The closer to the water the more you pay. And, for me its all about being close to the water. Otherwise take the less expensive view rooms and have a lot more space to relax in
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer S,  We would like to thank for taking the time and sharing your review on the tripadvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: We stayed at the Capri Laguna On the Beach in Feb, and really enjoyed our stay! The location really can't be beat... it is quite literally " on the beach." Just have to walk down some stairs to reach it. Obviously, it also provides wonderful views of the ocean, and it's always wonderful hearing the waves crash at night. The staff was great, very hospitable and courteous, and the continental breakfast was better than most, especially the coffee machine. We'd stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Willisk1009,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your detailed review. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team.Thank you once more for choosing us and we will be looking forward to see you soon for more waves and ocean views.  Kind regards,

Summary: When Capri Laguna says we're "on the Beach" they're not kidding! From the moment you are welcomed by incomparable Nick Politis & his Front Desk team, this boutique hotel welcomes you like a sincere hug. Walking distance from numerous galleries and eateries, this place rivals few hotels on the same stretch of highway. The influence of seawater and its aerosols on the property adds a oxidized patina to everything it touches yet the rooms, clean, comfortable and there is no bad view from the sundecks.  Stellar location. Exceptional customer service.  Super time.  Will return!
Manager Response: Dear OMGYoga,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Thank you for praising our services and it is a pleasure that you highlighted our team members too. We really work hard to make sure all our guests feel comfortable at the hotel and  we are glad to see those efforts pay off on your stay with us. The "An absolute gem!" will be looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: Beautiful room, people and staff were extremely courteous and hospitable. Sundeck over ocean was gorgeous.  Quiet at night Very pleasant trip. Came with my daughter and a two year old and he was well accommodated with a crib at night.  Very nice wine and cheese party on Friday night and decent breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Vivian D,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel for your stay in Laguna Beach. We are Delighted to hear that you had a great stay and you enjoyed the wonderful location and the services of our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to see you again.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A restful trip with all the extras
Summary: Stayed Friday thru Tuesday room 103. Perfect. walking distance to Splashes next door and Cliffs down the street. Laguna Art Museum,main beach ,galleries etc. The best part was the time on my balcony with had a better view and beach frontage than the $30,000,000 houses nearby. Enjoyed every minute. Nick,John,The Old Man and everyone were a fitting personal staff. You have to see the automated pancake machine for breakfast. Thank you all, Same time next year. Henri ,Detroit
Manager Response: Dear Henri C,  It’s always a pleasure to read such beautiful reviews! We appreciate your kind words and we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and the entire city. Thank you for praising our services and our team. We strive to provide the best standard service to our guest. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect in the most important ways
Summary: Location, location, location:  5-star location.  Service: 5-star awesome customer service attitude from the front desk area.  Because of those two aspects of my stay, I will actually remember this place with more affection and longing than other, fancier, places I have stayed at.  The room I stayed in had some drawbacks.  The latch on the sliding door that led out onto the balcony about 30 feet above the waves crashing on the beach, it looked like the latch had rusted into a frozen state long ago and the sliding door could not be locked,  There was some kind of mini-fridge sized air conditioner set up in the kitchenette section of the room, presumably because there was no good built-in air conditioning.  The bathroom architecture was old-school, with a small toilet and no
Manager Response: Dear Guity,  Thank for taking the time and sharing your review on trip advisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief. Please accept our sincere apologies for the shortfalls you experienced. We will be looking into all the points you have raised as we do continuously work to improve our product and service. We look forward to your return visit in the near future  Kind regards,

Summary: I booked my room at Capri mostly because I was looking for a beachfront location that was reasonably priced. Upon arrival it was apparent that the hotel was an older building and when I arrived in my room I was impressed with the crisply well designed rooms that seemed freshly re-decorated. While I did not venture down to the waterfront rooms, it appears there are some interesting views on the right side of the property. The breakfast is continental with freshly stocked bagels, a waffle maker, Starbucks coffee , etc....all good. And the best is the positive and accomodating attitude of the management...Mr. Atallah and Politis were really accomodating as I had to check out and check back in as my business plans changed. The only negative is the parking is "tight" but located on
Manager Response: Dear TravelBuckeye,  Thank you so much for your detailed feedback regarding your experience at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel’s services. Thank you once more for your kind words regarding our staff and we look forward to your return visit in the near future.  Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Magnificent scenery at this Beachfront Hotel
Summary: Beautiful beachfront hotel.  Lovely views. Service was outstanding here.  Note that the beach along this stretch has eroded. We noticed this all along the beach, not just at this hotel.  The beach is beautiful and walkable but the bottom of the stairway is no longer there and we had to climb down the rocks to get to the beach. Not a problem, we were able to navigate without problem.    We asked for suggestions for dinner within walking distance and were given several which we tried and enjoyed.  Good location, not too far from town if you like to walk.   Definitely worth a visit.
Manager Response: Dear Slim1985,  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our city. We appreciate for taking the time to share your experience with us and We look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: My second wonderful stay at this hotel.
Summary: We stayed for 8 days at this hotel, and it was perfect. The staff is very friendly, and the facilities are fine. The rooms are in need of an overhaul, but it doesn’t matter, as everything else is top quality. We were there last year for 6 days, the pricing has apparently changed, we payed 50% more per day this year,  this is my only complaint.
Manager Response: Dear O_Skov,  Thank you for your loyalty and We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our staff.  We are a passionate team and we are always happy to assist our guests to make their stay special. Thank you once more for choosing us. The Capri Laguna on the Beach and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary: Very well cared for older property, lots of character. Beautiful ocean view. Very attentive staff. Easy walk to restaurants, shops and located literally on the beach. Parking available for the bold. Great holiday.
Manager Response: Dear JEB66,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and for providing us with your feedback!  We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We hope to see you soon for more waves and beautiful views.  Kind regards,

Summary: From arrival to check out, this hotel was A-MAZING!  Nick in the front was more than helpful, and when I needed anything the staff was knocking on my door within 5 minutes!  The rooms were just the right size, the bathroom was a good size, and the location was great!  Just a short 1.5 mile walk to the heart of Laguna on Main Street & PCH.  Would definitely stay here again and can't wait to!  The price for this "boutique hotel" is well worth the penny spent!
Manager Response: Dear Devyn S,  We greatly appreciate your kind word and it’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel, our services and the entire city. It is our pleasure to hear about the attentive manner in which our team care for our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you again.  Kind regards,

Summary: Everything was perfect and the manager Luis made our stay so comfortable and relaxing! We will definitely be coming back!!!! My husband's birthday celebration was very memorable and will recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear veronica g,  We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay and memorable birthday with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you very much for taking the time to write such positive compliments. Our warm and best wishes for your husband’s birthday and  we would love to have you again in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is a hidden gem. From the street it looks very unassuming but the minute you enter the lobby you can see that there's much more to it. The ocean front patios are open to all guests and have a spectacular view of the Laguna coastline. The front desk manager, Bachir and the asst general manager, Nikolaos are incredibly friendly and accommodating. They made my Birthday so special by upgrading me and surprising me with a bottle of wine in my room. I highly recommend staying here on your next visit to Laguna for the most reasonable rates, spectacular view and exceptional service.
Manager Response: Dear Leena2727,  Thank you very much for your time and for this 5 star review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your birthday weekend at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Your comment will be shared with our team and they will be so touched by your recognition. Our warm and best wishes for your birthday and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our city and amaze you again.   Kind regards,

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Capri Laguna for two nights. The place was nothing but amazing. The staff was great and they made the hotel seem like home. The staff was able to met all requests and always did so with a smile. The room was great and the views from the rooms/balconies even better. The sunset view from the room was great and to hear waves crashing throughout the night from bed was great! Great complementary breakfast in the morning. Niko at the front desk was amazing. I guess I am just rambling on now, but you need to go see for yourself. Nothing but AMAZING! !
Manager Response: Dear Francis G,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor, it was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to.We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We would happily welcome you back soon for more amazing sunsets.   Kind regards,

Summary: Recently had a wonderful stay. Almost feels like you are walking in a hotel on the Amalfi coast. Nikolaos was very helpful during the process going out of his way to be sure we got the type of room we wanted. When on the second day had a minor problem with the room, Bachir could not have been nicer or more helpful. He took my wife to several other rooms and offered her a choice. We enjoyed our stay there very much.
Manager Response: Dear jmbrkeno,  Thank you very much for choosing us while visiting the beautiful Laguna Beach city and for taking the time to provide us your feedback on tripadvisor. We are pleased to read that everybody had a great time and that our team exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcome you back in the near future for more memories.  Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri Laguna Hotel just keeps getting better and better!    Stayed for one night this past weekend, in "my" regular oceanfront room that I've stayed in about 10 times before with my husband and our teenage kids, and it couldn't have been nicer.  This time, we found lovely new carpeting, fresh paint, and gorgeous new linens, AND it appeared that the bathroom had recently been renovated.  Absolutely lovely!  The small, well-equipped, and clean kitchenette made it so easy to relax in the morning, without having to rush out for coffee and breakfast. (Though if we had needed to, we could simply have gone to the lobby for the excellent free breakfast that is available right there.)  Instead, we enjoyed the view of the beautiful ocean waves crashing on the rocks and beach below,
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It’s a great pleasure to know that you had such beautiful experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach. Thank you very much for highlighting the quality of services provided by our staff. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief. Thank you once more for your loyalty and we really look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Nikolaos and Bachir - OUR FAVORITE DYNAMIC DUO!!
Summary: We've stayed here about 3 times so far - our most recent, being on New Years Weekend.   Nikolaos and Bachir had actually remembered us from our PREVIOUS 2 stays, which was already a breath of fresh air, as most hotels I've experienced don't really make the effort to remember their guests.   Anyway, breathtaking ocean views, complimentary wine and cheese happy hour on Fridays, complimentary breakfast (waffles, coffee, tea, and other items), and an AMAZING friendly staff.   Nikolaos and Bachir, if you're reading this - we love and miss you guys! So grateful for your hospitality and assuring that we had an amazing New Years weekend while we were there. Of course, we will be recommending Capri Laguna Inn to all our family and friends :)  Love, Michael and Raquel from Las Vegas
Manager Response: Dear Raquel S,  Thank you very much for your loyalty and we appreciate your kind compliments. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and for providing us this beautiful review. We all send you our best wishes for 2016 and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Our warm regards,

Summary Heading: Love this place! Highly recommend it!
Summary: Adorable boutique hotel with amazing customer service. From the moment you walk in, this hotel has an inviting and cozy feel. From the fireplace, to the colors, to the heated pool and the sound of the waves on the beach. The entire staff walks around with huge smiles, friendly faces and a willingness to help make the stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. John was the first person who helped us and was incredibly gracious. Gustavo carried our suitcases up to our room and even had one on his head- the entire time smiling and laughing. Louis actually found us a full length mirror so we could get ready for the wedding we're here for. And Nikolaos is currently helping us check out and is as kind as ever. They offer breakfast every morning, and happy hour on Fridays. I will
Manager Response: Dear Journeyh,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and the entire city. We are a passionate team and we are always happy to assist our guests to make their stay special. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our staff. Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the beach and for sharing your detailed feedback on tripadvisor. We hope that the stunning view and beach sound will bring you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Thank you for the wonderful experience
Summary: We stayed at the Capri Laguna over Christmas. It was a wonderful experience! Our room was ocean front, the views spectacular, the sound of the waves fantastic. The personnel, Bachir at the front desk and particularly and foremost the manager, Nick, were extremely helpful and polite. They really went out of their way to help us and make our stay unforgettable. The breakfast was good, the rooms clean, the service fast. We hope to stay at Capri Laguna  again
Manager Response: Dear Pennia M,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing us and for providing us your feedback. We will definitely looking forward to see you again. Our best wishes for a bright and happy 2016!  Kind regards,

Summary: The Capri is a charming little gem! Exactly what we wanted: Amazing room with deck over the ocean, crashing waves and the prettiest sunset we've ever seen! Walking distance to the best parts of town, but you'll never want to leave your room! The staff was so friendly and even sent us roses (gratis) for our Anniversary. Plus complimentary wine/cheese in the afternoon and a nice breakfast in the morning.  We'll be back often and will recommend the Capri to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear DRZ1111,  Thank you for your time and for sharing this beautiful review on tripadvisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. Thank you once more for staying with us and for your nice comments. All the team wishes you a Happy Anniversary and the little gem looks forward to welcoming you back soon. Our best wishes for a bright and happy 2016!  Kind regards,

Summary: The room was wonderful - we had been upgraded to an ocean view and the room was well-appointed. Location is excellent, right on the beach; the access steps are steep but adjacent street leads onto the beach and that also provides easy access to the beach. The staff were extremely helpful - we left some belongings behind in our room at checkout and they mailed them back to us with no hassle.
Manager Response: Dear Terry L,  Thank you for choosing us and for your feedback. We were truly delighted that we exceeded your expectations and most importantly the professional service extended by our staff. We are a passionate team and we are always happy to assist our guests to make their stay special.  The Capri Laguna on the Beach can’t wait for your return. Our best wishes for a bright and happy 2016!  Warm regards,

Summary: We love this place! We have stayed here many times because the staff is so great and friendly.  We love Nick and Bashar.  They make my family feel so welcome!!! We have referred this hotel to many friends. Definitely my favorite hotel in Laguna!
Manager Response: Dear Jayme W,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your 5star review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our staff. Thank you once more for your loyalty. The hotel and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit. Our best wishes for a bright and happy 2016!  Kind regards,

Summary: We love this hotel, and we recently stayed for my husbands birthday. Nick is wonderful, and he even had a dozen roses sent to our room to surprise my husband. The hotel is within walking distance to several restaurants and shops. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kari A,  We are very glad that you’ve had a great time with us and we are even more happy that you are considering a return to us . We appreciate your kind compliments and for praising our staff and services. We all send you our best wishes for your husband  Birthday and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Our warm regards

Summary: Went here on a trip to CA to pick up a car for my wife's B-day. Looked at quite a few locations and have stayed in Southern Cal quite a few times from PHX. Guys up front are awesome. You could walk right down the stairs to a picture perfect beach/sunset right in the middle of the resort.  Location is fantastic and not in the middle of the crowds. We have kids and we did not have them with us, so this was the perfect place for that as there isn't a ton of areas for kids to romp around in.A bit dated inside but not bad at all as it is right on the water. Great for couples.
Manager Response: Dear Geo B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and your feedback on tripadvisor. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the hotel's location and the beautiful sunset of Laguna Beach. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our property. We will be looking forward to welcome you back soon and the entire team wishes your wife a happy Birthday.  Kind regards,

Summary: My husband and I live in the area and were looking for a quick one night, casual get away for our anniversary.  Bashir at Capri was wonderful!  He was over the top thoughtful.. (Rose petal turndown, fireplace and balcony beach front) and our room had a phenomenal view that almost made us feel like we were on a boat. The front desk staff and the GM were all super friendly and made our stay!  Close to all the fun in Laguna too, had a wonderful night in downtown. Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear mehl888,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our services and we are delighted that we made a great  getaway and memorable Anniversary for you. Thank you for praising our team member and your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. The Capri Laguna on the Beach and the entire team wish you happy Anniversary and we hope to welcome you back soon in our property to create more special memories.  Warm regards,

Summary: My daughter and I were celebrating our birthdays driving the California Coast from Newport to San Diego. Decided to stay in Laguna and ran across Capri Laguna On the Beach. What a find! We wanted to be right on the water and watch the sunset. The Capri Laguna was perfect. After we had checked into our room, we were walking toward the steps to the beach and the desk manager came running out with a plate of freshly made chocolate cookies. He said "I heard it was your birthday".  We took our cookies and sat on the great deck overlooking the ocean. The sunset was spectacular and we just couldn't stop smiling. Everyone on staff was very friendly and accommodating.   Our room was nice, with a small deck overlooking the pool and a partial view of the ocean.  Our only wish was if we
Manager Response: Dear linc968,  It’s a great pleasure to know that you had such beautiful experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach. Thank you very much for taking the time to write such positive compliments and we would also like to thank you for highlighting the quality of services provided by our staff. Our best wishes for your Birthday and we really look forward to welcoming you back soon for more spectacular sunsets.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Super Relaxing Vacation on the beach
Summary: My husband and I stayed here over the weekend for a quick getaway. The room was average (nothing over the top...) but it was very roomy. We had a King Size room with fireplace and ocean view. We had our own private balcony which allowed us to open the door and listen to the waves roll it. Everyone at the hotel was super friendly and helpful too! We would absolutely stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel C,  We are delighted you had a super relaxing stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests. Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to share your 5 star review on tripadvisor . We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon to our hotel and our city.    Kind regards,

Summary: We (family of 4) stayed 6 days on Capri Laguna - the final stretch on our California round trip. The hotel is pricey, but we had decided to go all in and book a large, beachfront room. And what a great choice. We were welcomed by the hotel manager and we had the best room with the most amazing view of the pacific ocean. The room was large en clean with a kitchenette so we could have our own cold drinks and tea and coffee. The beds were comfortable and room air-conditioning worked well. Most nights we had the balcony door open and listened to the waves. The breakfast is very basic and could be better, with more fruits and nicer bread and selections. The whole architecture and Italian beach-style atmosphere, it makes this hotel by far the nicest on the Laguna stretch.
Manager Response: Dear SaGr_10,  It is our pleasure that you’ve had a great time with us. We appreciate your kind compliments and your detailed review. Our team strives to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great location, Best view, Very nice Staffs
Summary: They upgraded our room to the ocean view. Very nice and friendly staffs. hotel has a very nice rooftop. Clean rooms. Free parking and high speed wifi. Good Continental Breakfast, very good coffee. The rooms and bathrooms are old but clean and need to be updated. We were either out or sitting on the rooftop most of the time. We enjoyed our stay overall. You pay for the location and view. Don't expect fancy room.
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor and for highlighting the major assets of our hotel. We all work daily to offer a truly personal experience to each of our guests. We look forward welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.   Kind regards,

Summary: Love the hotel! Nikolaos at the front desk was very friendly and courteous!  Amazing view and very comfortable room. This is my second time staying here and just definitely will be back! Recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing getaway. 24 hour complimentary coffee is a plus.  I feel like I'm in a small resort, everyone is so nice!
Manager Response: Dear Marian S,  Thank you for your loyalty and for making the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel your first choice. We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests. Thank you once more for being with us and your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. We look forward welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: My daughter got married in Laguna Beach.  We looked at this hotel and thought it was perfect.  Nick, the manager, showed us various rooms and we booked 4 ocean front rooms.  When you go out on your balcony, you are right over the ocean with a private beach below.  We took fantastic wedding photos on the deck above the pool and the background was ocean and sun.  The photos from her room had the sun and surf in the background.  We found Nick and the whole staff to be super helpful and accommodating.  It is a very beachy hotel and we will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Sarah T,  We would like to thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay with us and for highlighting the quality of our services. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. Thank you once more for choosing us and for letting us be a part of your special day. We wish you and your family a lifetime of love and happiness.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Great 2 night stay at laguna on the beach
Summary: Excellent friendly service.  Large immaculate  rooms with comfy beds.Air con was great.   Great shower with plenty of spare  towels.  Free parking . Upstairs seating  area looking over the pacific. Medium sized pool to cool off. Breakfast  in the morning  with make your own waffles and pancakes and Starbucks  coffee  machine.  Thanks to Nicolas who couldn't  have done  more to accomodate us. We travelled from England  but if we do ever return  to southern  california we'd certainly  return again .
Manager Response: Dear George,  Thank you very much for your time and for this 5 star detailed review. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our city and amaze you again.  Warm regards,

Summary: We have made decision on the last moment and were not sure if it was the right decision. To our surprise it was very good decision. We have been warmly welcomed and immediately got top attention - all explained well, help with luggage, and even welcome in our native Czech language :-) ! Having the balcony view we could enjoy the views and sound of waves all the time. We were lucky for weather and our kids loved to play in the ocean and on the beach. The place is nicely located and we could reach many restaurants in just walking distance. 10 mins from here is nice outside playground for kids just if some change is needed as well as Disney is about 40 mins away. The hotel looks older but it does not have negative effect on the quality of services offered here.  We did not use
Manager Response: Dear Vaclav,  We would like to thank you for your time and for this valuable review for your recent stay with us.  The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief. Thank you once more for your kind words and we hope to welcome you back soon in our property to create more memories for all the family.  Kind regards,

Summary: The second hotel in which we stayed during our Pacific coastal highway tour. Greeted very warmly upon arrival with an efficient and informative check-in. We had an ocean front room which was ideal for our needs. The sunset was beautifully observed from our balcony and the lapping waves could be heard as we slept/woke.  Everywhere was clean and pleasant, all in all a really nice overnight experience. This hotel comes highly recommended!  Hannah & Steve.
Manager Response: Dear Hamwich982,  It’s a great pleasure to know that you had such beautiful experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach. Thank you very much for taking the time to write such positive compliments and we would also like to thank you for  your recommendation and for highlighting the quality of services provided by our staff and we really look forward to welcoming you back soon for more sunsets and ocean views.  Kind regards,

Summary: We came down to the beach for a short getaway and discovered the Capri Laguna Hotel.  We just loved this unassuming adorable place.  The staff was extremely friendly.  Bachir and Nick were super and very personable.  We will make this our new getaway place for relaxing.  The location is excellent too.  I cant wait to come back to stay longer.
Manager Response: Dear Jan B,  We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the location and our cervices and we are delighted that we made a great  getaway and memorable stay for you. Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and we most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,

Summary: Bashir and Nicholas were the warmest, most friendly, most accomodating hotel staff that I've encountered in a long time. What a rarity. They advised us on rooms and views and different options and never seemed like we were a bother. They knew us by name and made us feel very welcome. It was lovely.
Manager Response: Dear lauriepartridge,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach hotel. We are delighted to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay and our services were meeting your expectations. Your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind regrads,

Summary: We had with my wife realy pleasent time to stay ther over the weekend.The staff,Espessaly a Nick ,were very helpphulRecomend to everybody.Beach is clean,room comfortable,view is great.Next time we will deffenetly keep this plase in mine.
Manager Response: Dear DMITRY G,  Thank for taking the time and sharing your review on trip advisor. We are pleased to learn that you had a pleasant time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. Thank you once more for praising our team member. The Capri Laguna on the Beach looking forward to see you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: A perfect place for a getaway
Summary: The hotel is very cosy and located right on the beach. Rooms are very spacious and clean. John and Alexis, two receptionists, were very friendly and helpful. The room they gave us was just what we wanted, ocean view and very private with our own patio. Overall experience was wonderful. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Dear Vital C,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We greatly appreciate your kind word for the team member and it’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel and our services. Thank you once more for your time and sharing your feedback on the TripAdvisor. We would love to see you again for more ocean views.   Warm regards,

Summary: Bushir was wonderful. When I booked the room and told him it was for our 18th wedding anniversary he suggested another room from the one I was originally going for because it had a better view and did not disappoint. What I think I enjoyed most is the hotel has just enough beach funk to it to remind you you're at the beach. Not like some of the surrounding hotels that have a sterile feel. They also have service on the beach for chairs umbrellas etc. there is a small pool but with the beach right at your bare feet why would anyone bother but it is there for those who choose. And lastly the trolley stop is right in front of the hotel if you want to wonder south or across the street if you want to stroll the main beach and shops. In fact it was so nice of a day when we checked out
Manager Response: Dear PAB47,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Thank you for the 5star detailed review, it was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and your feedback at the trip advisor and we would love to welcome you back soon. The entire team wishes you a happy anniversary.  Warm regards,

Summary: I stayed here to attend the Pageant of the Masters and had a great weekend stay. The staff is super helpful and extremely friendly. They helped me to navigate the trolley to get down to the event and gave great recommendations on locations to eat. Each one was spot on.  My room was clean and the sunset view was superb. I plan to be back to Laguna Beach and will certainly stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Poutababy,  It is a pleasure to know that Capri Laguna on the Beach will be your first choice on your next visit to Laguna Beach and we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and the entire city. Thank you for your time and sharing the lovely comments online. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We will be looking forward for your return.  Kind regards,

Summary: I thought that the rooms were very cute I like the stretch of beach and its access. Breakfast was wonderful I would definitely stay there again. Close by is down town Laguna. They has many art shops and stores. Also lots of choices for food. I had a wonderful time.
Manager Response: Dear Sara H,  We would like to thank for taking the time and sharing your review on the tripadvisor. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guest. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary: Loved the location of this hotel. Down a few flights of stairs and you are on the beach. Loved the available chairs and umbrellas (need shade for the little one). The service was amazing (extra towels in 3mins). Pack and play was already set up when we checked in which was great! The room was smaller than expected but we didn't spend much time there. Overall a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear Mindy F,  We are delighted to read your kind words and it is a great pleasure to us that the whole family enjoyed our services and the beautiful Laguna Beach. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments at the tripadvisor. We will be looking forward to seeing you soon.   Our warmest regards,

Summary Heading: I had such a great time there and wonderful staff
Summary: The staff were super friendly and very helpful. Specially Nicolaos (assistant general manager) and Bachir (front desk manager) that help me so much in a very friendly and welcoming way.  John helped me a lot with printing and faxing stuff for my business while I was there too. I will definitely go back there and suggest this lovely/friendly place to all visitors of California.  Sia (stayed there from Sep 9 to Sep 18, I was going to stay for one or two nights but happened to be there for 9 nights). Thanks to all the staff
Manager Response: Dear Sia N,  We are delighted to hear that we were your best place to stay in Laguna Beach. Thank you for praising our services and It is a pleasure that you highlighted our team members too. Thank you once more for your recommendation and for the 5 star review. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: It doesn't get better than Capri Laguna
Summary: Capri Laguna is my favorite boutique hotel in Southern California.  The suites have everything you need for a comfortable stay - a little kitchenette with refrigerator, table/chairs and microwave.  The location is unbeatable - just steps from your own private beach.  But the real charm is the ambiance that only a smaller establishment can provide.  There are just enough rooms at Capri Laguna to make you feel that you are sharing an extraordinary experience with others, but not so many that you are overcrowded or rushed.  The management is top-notch, and treats you like a valuable client - the Assistant Manager, Nikolaos Politis is what makes this place #1 in my book.  He remembered my past stay and helped make a girls 16th birthday a dream come true.  Love, love, love the Capri
Manager Response: Dear Sdechris,  We appreciate your kind words and your amazing detailed review. Your loyalty means a lot to us and it is our pleasure to have you with us each time you visit Laguna Beach. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. The hotel and the entire staff send you the best wishes for your daughter’s birthday. We will be looking forward for your next visit.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Perfect Beach Hotel, as long as you understand you are paying for the location and as long as you don't hurt yourself
Summary: To sum it up: If you have 2 healthy feet & legs, are able to stay here on a weekday or during the off season while Laguna Beach hotels are not not insanely expensive, you can get the perfect quiet beach getaway at the Capri Laguna!  I stayed at the Capri a little over 2 weeks ago. This was going to be my one vacation for 2015 and since I only had a few days off, I decided to drive down to Laguna for 2 nights. I book travel for tv shows so I am extremely picky when it comes to my own hotel bookings. I read a lot of reviews, compared the different boutique beach hotel options in Laguna and finally decided that the Capri would get me everything I wanted for the best price.  I read some very angry reviews but sorry, if you are naive enough to pay over $400 / night for a 2 star hotel
Manager Response: Dear Jannedog,  We would like to thank you for your time and for sharing your detailed review on Tripadvisor. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding the warmth and level of service from our team. We truly hope you are doing better by now. Thank you once more for choosing us, and for your comments. The Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great service & location just a little pricey
Summary: As I stated, great service from everyone from the front desk, Lizette, Alexis & Bashir to Ben out on the beach taking care of the umbrellas, chairs, etc.  The location is fabulous, we had room 201 with a gorgeous view of the beach and you get to hear that while you are sleeping which I LOVE.  Good size patio with table & chairs & a lounge chair.  Even had a little kitchen area.  It is a little older, but I knew that so we did not mind.  My mom & I were there do relax and we did plenty of that and enjoyed the stay.  I just thought the price was a little high when comparing to newer hotels right next door.  There are a lot of stairs so keep that in mind
Manager Response: Dear Coleen Q,  Thank you for this beautiful review, and for raising our team too. We really work hard to make sure all our guests feel comfortable at the hotel. We are glad to see those efforts pay off on your stay with us. Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we hope that the gorgeous view and beach sound will bring you back soon.  Warm regards,

Summary: My husband and I along with our two boys stayed at the Capri Laguna for 5 nights.  Our ocean front room was wonderful and the view was stunning.  It was amazing to hear and see the ocean waves breaking on the sand. The staff were eager to assist with any request and go above and beyond and we were treated like family from the start.  The Assistant General Manager, Nikolaos Politis was an absolute pleasure to deal with and always made himself available to answer any questions.  We all can't wait to go back to Capri Laguna On The Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Aoletsgo2015,  Thank you for choosing us and for your wonderful comments. We were truly delighted that we exceeded your expectations and most importantly the professional service extended by our staff. We are a passionate team and we are always happy to assist our guests to make their stay special. You are special and unique to us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach can’t wait for your return.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: not what it looks like online
Summary: We booked this room on Hotel Tonight for 175.00.we got 608, patio with pool view. upon driving in you sort of get the Motel feel. lobby is nice. we asked what it would be to upgrade to a ocean view room. we were told an extra 200.00. so that would have been 345 total for an ocean view, last minute on a Wednesday in September. I am so glad that we did not pay that. the view, of course,is beautiful.However,this hotel is not work the175 that we paid. pool is small with no ocean view. California is currently going through a heat wave. there is NO AC! they have what they call floor AC's. horrible it has been on for 4 hours, and it is still over 80 degrees in the room. I'm sure on a normal nice day this would not be a problem.  it lacks any kind of character. the room could stand an
Manager Response: Dear David L,  Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention and we do apologize if we didn’t reach your expectations. Not all our rooms are the same this is the reason why we encourage our guests to write to us when they have a special request regarding their room preferences. We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you again.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel with Ocean Front rooms
Summary: The staff at Capri Laguna are awesome! Luis the manager has made great improvements to the property and customer service. Bashir, Nick, Michelle, Gustavo and the rest make my stay enjoyable. The rooms are clean and the views are stunning. I always get an ocean front room and have stayed here many times. When I choose to stay in Laguna Beach - this is the hotel I always stay at. It's a pet friendly hotel so I always bring my cat Sammy and he loves it!!!
Manager Response: Dear Regina r,  Thank you for your loyalty. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations and being their home away from home. Thank you once more for your nice comments and for being your best hotel in Laguna. All the team looks forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,

Summary: My boyfriend and I decided on the Capri after I stayed in January with my cousin for her birthday. The hotel is charming and retro. The beds are very comfortable and the linens are soft. The hotel staff is accommodating and kind. The ocean front suite is my topic choice and well worth the money for the sounds of the waves crashing 24/7. Room came with a mini fridge and kitchenette, room was very clean and updated.
Manager Response: Dear Erinhaase,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach hotel. It’s our pleasure to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay on your cousin birthday and our services were meeting your expectations. We hope to see you soon for more waves and beautiful views.

Summary: Quaint little hotel with a simply stunning view in a great location... Staff were great, even helping us when a storm nearly flooded us out! Location is convenient, but view is just amazing...  :)  Great as base to explore or just a quiet getaway...
Manager Response: Dear los7boy,  We greatly appreciate your kind word and it’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel and our services even with the storm. Thank you once more for your time and sharing your feedback on the TripAdvisor. The Capri Laguna on the Beach will be looking for your return during the summer for more stunning view.  Kind regards,

Summary: Just spent one of the loveliest weekends ever at Capri Laguna. The room was lovely, overlooking the Ocean, clean, quiet, and nicely decorated. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. Lots of nice activity all around with chaise lounges and umbrellas on the beach, as well as at many little alcoves in the hotel. Skim boarders came in the late afternoon and put on a show for us right below our balcony as they practiced going from sand to sea to catch the waves not 3 yards from shore; flying up in the air, doing flips and crashes, and right back out to catch the next wave. The free Laguna Beach Trolley stopped RIGHT IN FRONT, both sides of the road, and went all over town so you could jump on and off wherever you saw something you wanted to explore. It could not have been
Manager Response: Dear 550JustaTraveler,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your weekend with us and the entire city. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team and our services, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna Hotel and for providing us this beautiful detailed review. We will definitely looking forward to see you again.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: The staff and the gorgeous ocean outlook make this hotel a winner!
Summary: I had an amazing stay at this hotel. The staff were so helpful and friendly. The location is wonderful in every way. Room was comfortable and clean, but we spent most of the time on the beach on loungers ( provided by the hotel) or on a terrace overlooking the ocean. Will return for sure! Big plus was parking was free!
Manager Response: Dear Uclamum,  Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel for your stay in Laguna. We are Delighted to hear that you had a great stay and you enjoyed the wonderful location of our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to see you again.  Kind regards,

Summary: Location, location, location! Capri Laguna is just steps from a gorgeous stretch of beach on the Orange County coast. My husband and I enjoyed a weekend getaway in a beautiful ocean view room and it was worth every penny! Even though the property is older, the staff does a good job of keeping it spotless and updated with contemporary room decor. The front desk was extremely accommodating and pleasant. We spent the morning strolling the golden sands and sea mist with coffee in hand from the complementary breakfast. Our room was just a staircase away from the lapping ocean waves! We were also just blocks from dozens of darling ocean view restaurants and shops. Perfect weekend away from it all!
Manager Response: Dear AnnieMinSF,  It’s always a pleasure to read such beautiful reviews! We appreciate your kind words and we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for praising our services and our team. We strive to provide the best standard service to our guest. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.  Warm regards,

Summary: The beach/ocean front rooms are wonderful and to hear the ocean breaking on the sand will bring peace to anyone.  When walking along the beach in the morning saw a seal 20 feet out and then a dolphin.  The staff is the friendliest ever, eager to assist with any request, will go above and beyond, and treat you like family.  Just walking distance to many different restaurants and shops.  Sunsets are the most beautiful.   Rooms have refrigerator, microwave, hairdryer,  iron and board, robes (complimentary use).  Complimentary upscale continental breakfast with waffles, pancakes, hard boiled eggs, cereal, yogurt, oats and more.  Fresh Starbucks coffee available 24 hours a day!  Beach chairs, towels, umbrellas complimentary.      Have been coming here over the years and will
Manager Response: Thank you Judy for taking time and posting such a glowing review. We are truly honored that we are your hotel of choice. Hope fully you can make that short drive down the 405 soon. Thank you again.

Summary: We were driving through the area and wanted somewhere to stop for the night.  Oh my, we chose good!! The staff at the front desk were so lovely and helpful.  Let me look at the room before committing. It was beautiful! Plenty of room for my husband, me and our three teenage daughters.   Hotel has its own beach with towels chairs umbrellas and bodyboards. And a lovely member of staff to get anything you want.  I am feeling very spoilt and thankful that I stopped off here!!
Manager Response: Dear, Ann We would like to thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach and for highlighting the quality of our services. We are very happy that we make your stay enjoyable. Thank you once more for your loyalty and we truly hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for more sunsets and many more

Summary: We stayed in Ocean View King Suite #301.  It had a room with King Bed, additional room with mini fridge and microwave and pull-out sofa, two televisions and balcony that ran along the both rooms. Very nice, Ocean waves crashing and beautiful views.   On Check-in, front staff very friendly and process pain-free, parking is a little tight but expected in Laguna. I had to park on the offsite one time and not a big deal-short walk.  The hotel is clean, well maintained and a Laguna Beach "throwback" old school style. Rooms have been updated and overall nice enough. Hall noise at night was a little loud but we just turned on the air for some white noise in addition to the waves. Hotel is pet friendly and we brought our dog with us, she could go on the beach in the morning and at
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing us while visiting the beautiful Laguna Beach city and for taking the time to provide us with your detailed feedback. We are pleased to read that everybody had a great time, and that our personnel exceeded your expectations. The hotel’s team is our most valuable asset and your praise of their willingness to please only serves to confirm that belief.  We look forward to welcome you back in the near future for more memories.

Summary Heading: got a last minute room here
Summary: We booked this property last minute.  The rooms in the hotel are a bit dated, but the views are great, and it's supremely quiet.   Bachir at the front desk took great care of us to be sure our stay was enjoyable.   We also loved the quiet section of beach with chairs and umbrellas set up.   We got the best service from Bachir and others we saw at this hotel that we've had in awhile. What a nice surprise the Capri turned out to be!
Manager Response: Dear DB, It’s a great pleasure to know that you had such beautiful experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach. Thank you very much for taking the time to write such positive compliments and we would also like to thank you for highlighting the quality of services provided by our staff and we really look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary: we heard waves all night long, had a full view of the beach in #731.  and a great balcony where we were on top of the ocean at high tide.  Bachir at front desk was great, helpful and friendly.  The housekeeping department came late, like after 3.  there were 4 women, we only got towels for 2 or 3.  same with water.  We had to call for things like toilet paper and towels.  The kitchenette has no silverware or plates, only 2 coffee mugs.  For the amount we paid, there should be some basic kitchen items.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback online. We are happy that you enjoyed the view from your balcony.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the shortfalls you experienced. We will be looking into all the points you have raised as we do continuously work to improve our product and service. We would love another chance to have on board of our ship.

Summary: It was great to open up the sliding doors with the beach and ocean just steps away. It's not a huge hotel so you are not surrounded by a huge crowd like the other beach front hotels. We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: It pleases us to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. We would like to thank you for praising our hotel and for sharing this  review on the tripadvisor. Your beachfront views await you. Thank you once more for choosing us.

Summary Heading: Unfair reviews from other travellers - I love this place
Summary: I read horrible reviews about this property, but then after checking out their website, decided to give it a try on a busy holiday weekend.  It is a fabulous location, smack on  on the beach. It had old world charm and fabulous friendly service.    If you are looking for a brand new hotel, with the same decor as any new hotel, this is not for you. If you appreciate charm and personality and location this is a great place.  We stayed in  Suite 401, and we could hear the waves at night, sat on the patio viewing the ocean,  it was so peaceful.    There are hotels across the main road that are priced similarly to this hotel with brand new rooms, but not the same location. If you want to be 3 min from the beach in  your backyard, this is it. Very centrally located to Mozambique
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments regarding our amenities and cervices. Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a beautiful review about your stay and for recommending our Hotel to other travelers. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future

Summary Heading: Many reasons to recommend the Capri
Summary: From the friendly folks at the front desk to Michael, the  fellow at the beach who sets up your beach chair and umbrella and then brings you split frozen grapes for an afternoon snack, the surprises keep coming. There is great wi-fi and free self-serve continental breakfast in the morning with make your own waffles and pancakes, juice, coffee, fruit, croissants, etc. And on Friday night there is wine and cheese. The location is convenient to restaurants and the trolley and the beach is literally just down the stairs. Come in the summer when you can go to the Sawdust Art Festival and Pageant of the Masters.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed feedback regarding your experience at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel’s services. Thank you once more for your kind words regarding our staff and we look forward to your return visit in the near future. Best Regards

Summary: By far the biggest plus for this establishment is that it looks directly over the beach and there is no road between you and the crashing pacific ocean waves. In our opinion then, there is no reason to stay here unless you pay the extra for an ocean view room. OK, you can access the beach directly and they provide chairs, towels and brollies, but the beach is publically accessible. There are plenty of tables and chairs on ocean-facing patios with beach views for the use of all guests; ideal if you don’t have a balcony.  Our room was large, bright, clean and very comfortable. The bathroom however was rather small. The ‘air conditioning’ was a semi-portable unit in one corner of the room. It struggled to get the inside temperature more than 5 degrees below the outside air temp. We
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We will be looking into all the points you have raised as we do continuously work to improve our product and service. Should your travel takes you back to Laguna Beach, we would appreciate the opportunity to welcome you again soon...

Summary Heading: A Hidden Paradise in Laguna Beach
Summary: My wife and I enjoyed our extraordinary Saturday night stay and the wonderful experience we had at Capri Laguna.  The Capri Laguna is one of the few hotels in Laguna Beach that allow single night bookings during the summer season. The room we had was beautiful, very clean with a kitchenette even including wine glasses and an unobstructed view of the Pacific Ocean, not to mention the magnificent sunset.  An enormous thank you to Nicklaus at the front desk and to his friendly and courteous hotel staff.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We loved the way you've described the Hotel as " A Hidden Paradise in Laguna Beach " Thank you very much for your kind feedback regarding your stay at our Hotel. We are more than happy to hear that we met all your expectations and especially that you enjoyed the magnificent sunset and that our team made your stay most memorable one. We Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed in Room 402 - family suite, which has an ocean view.  We loved our ocean view, patio, and our room.  The waves crashing on the beach was a wonderful sound.  The patio was very large with two sliding doors, a lounge chair and a small table with two chairs (I estimated 20 feet x 8 feet). I have seen other reviews regarding the patio light- I called the front desk on the first night and asked that maintenance remove the light bulb during our stay.  They removed the light and we sat outside every night.  The queen-sized bed was very comfortable.  My 13 year old son said the pull out couch was comfortable.  My only complaint is the bathroom is very small with very little shelf space for hair dryer, makeup, etc.  The housekeeping crew was helpful every night, and brought us
Manager Response: We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for being your family’s favorite when staying in Laguna Beach and your loyalty means a lot to us. The Capri Laguna and the entire team will look forward for your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is an older hotel, but placed perfectly on the beach!!!  It is kept very clean, and the staff are very accommodating and cordial.  We have stayed here several times, and for the price and prime spot on the beach it is well worth it!! There is a free trolly stop right by the hotel, and really no need to ever use your car once there.   It has become a family favorite, and we will return for sure!!
Manager Response: We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for being your family’s favorite when staying in Laguna Beach and your loyalty means a lot to us. The Capri Laguna and the entire team will look forward for your next visit.

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed our stay at this lovely beachfront hotel. Our room was a beachfront one and hearing the waves at night were so wonderful and it reminded us of our trips to the Hawaiian Islands. Beautiful weather and friendly staff. Didn't have a problem with our room even though, some minor things but that is what happens when you are facing the ocean. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Tripadvisor for your recent stay. We are pleased to learn that you had a very beautiful time with us. We are pleased that we reminded you of your vacation to the Hawaiian Islands (minus the long flight).  Thank you once more for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: A touch of Santorini in Laguna Beach
Summary: The Capri Laguna was a pleasant surprise. You would think that you are in Santorini, as the hotel is all white and built into the cliff on various levels above the beach. The only negative is that there is no elevator, but that is understandable because of the way different parts of the hotel do not connect to each other than by stairs at different locations. It is truly a boutique hotel with a European feel. The fellows who run it, Nick and Bachir, are Greek, and their happy, helpful, and caring attituide make the place very warm and friendly. We can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your comments about our exceptional staff and we strive to achieve an exceptional Greek Hospitality environment for all our guests. We can’t wait to have you again with us.

Summary: Had a fantastic Saturday night stay at this quaint, paradise boutique on the water in Laguna Beach!  Hotel has charm and character that make it very special.  European like.  We were upgraded to an amazing room right on the water! Incredible views and staff made us feel right at home.  Thank you to Nicklaus at the front desk!  Sand and ocean just a few steps away!
Manager Response: It’s a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna hotel. We are delighted to receive your great feedback too. Thank you very much for your time and your 5* valuable review and we will be looking forward to see you soon.

Summary: We have a 2 year old and it can be hard to travel with her. Not this time!!! The Capri had large clean rooms for all her things, comfortable beds and best of all beach access! Nap time was no problem just took her up to the room, leaving our beach gear on the sand out of the waters way, I could watch our stuff from our room. It's just a bunch of towels anyway. Then after nap, back to the beach! Very relaxing. The Capri is also close to Main Laguna, shops, food, fun!!! All walking distance! The front desk was very helpful with directions and information! We will be back! View from our room! <3
Manager Response: It’s a pleasure to read that all the family enjoyed the stay at the Capri Laguna at the beach. We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We thank you once more you for choosing The Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and we look forward to your return visit in the near future and see your little 2 year old grow.  Warm regards,

Summary: On June 22, 2015 I booked a queen size Ocean Front room.  I was a little confused about the room, so I called the front desk and asked the difference between the Ocean Front, and the Beach Front room.  I was told that the Ocean Front was an unobstructed view of the ocean and the Beach Front was a room that opened directly onto the beach.  I choose the Ocean Front as I wanted to be able to open the slider or windows at night and feel safe.  The price for the room was $419 per night, and with service charges and taxes, it was $503.78 per night for a total of $1,007.56.  Very expensive, but it was my girlfriends birthday, so I figured we would splurge. Also, a friend stayed at this hotel and said it was really great, nice staff and a great large room.    We arrived at the Capril
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: As Bette Davis once said, "What a dump!!"
Summary: The only good thing going for this place is the location, the parking for guests, the free wi-fi, and the sound of the waves breaking on the beach throughout the day and night. All other amenities and services are deplorable. The hotel is old and in very shabby condition. Our room was over $400/night and oh so tired with ratty carpeting, moldy bathroom, and an ineffective portable air conditioner just to name a few. Would definitely not return to this hotel. As Bette Davis once said, "What a dump!!"
Manager Response: Dear ArtDecoLover2014,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are sorry for the inconvenience and thank you once more for bringing this up to our attention. We hope that you will give us the chance to have you with us again, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Kind regards,

Summary: My daughters and I celebrate my and Heidi's bday at the Capri every year.  We have been going there for about 5 years now.  We always get a balcony room so we have  our coffee on the balcony while watching the morning dog walkers and runners.  The beach is fabulous in the summer and the Capri provides chairs, umbrella, towels and water if you need it.  The shopping stores are within walking distance and we always love to finish the evening with a walk... It is a great place to stay and they are very accommodating!!
Manager Response: Dear Michele T,  Thank you very much for your loyalty and for highlighting the major assets of our hotel. We all work daily to offer a truly personal experience to each of your guests. We all send you our best wishes for Heidi’s Birthday and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for the many Birthdays to come.  Warm regards,

Summary: This hotel is located on a beautiful spot of Laguna Beach. The hotel has great views and sandy beach. The staff was very friendly and helpful on the phone and in person. There is a nice pool area, too.
Manager Response: Dear carolS6603IA,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with the tripadvisor. We hope the rest of your trip was great too and enjoyed our city. Thank you once more for choosing The Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and we hope to accommodate you soon.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Capri Laguna is a perfect get away Hotel !!!!
Summary: This was my second time staying at Capri Laguna and it was once again a wonderful experience. The hotel's location couldn't be better, walking distance to restaurants ,shops and if you want really explore the  Trolley stop is in front of the hotel. The room we had was beautiful very clean with a  kitchenette and  a Spectacular view of the ocean. Nicholas , Bashir and the entire staff took excellent care of us. The morning coffee and goodies ,yogurt, sweet rolls, orange juice , cereal, waffles, pancakes and fresh fruit are perfect. The beach is very intimate and the cabana person set up our "camp" on the beach , towels, chairs and umbrellas the minute we stepped foot on the beach. Friday "Wine and Cheese" on the patio is lovely. This is a reasonable priced Hotel on the beach with
Manager Response: Dear Georgiataz,  We would like to thank you for your time and for this valuable and detailed review for your recent stay with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We appreciate your feedback and for praising our staff and services. Thank you once more for your loyalty and we hope to welcome you back soon in our property.  Kind regards,

Summary: The location of the hotel is fantastic!  The hotel however is a bit 'tired'. Somehow I got the feeling I was in a seventies Miami beach hotel and was waiting for the Scarface shower scene with the Cuban drug guys to occur. If the management would/could invest in the hotel It could be an incredible hotel on an incredible location, where it is now an 'ok' hotel on a fantastic location. Hereby it must be said that prices are friendly compared to its local competitors, so price/value is good.
Manager Response: Dear Leon D,  Thank you very much for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach while visiting the beautiful Laguna Beach city and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed the hotel location. We would love to be your first choice on your next visit to Laguna Beach.  Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay! Amazing Service! Beautiful Oceanfront Room!
Summary: This perfectly located hotel with its charming Amalfi Coast feel, incredible oceanfront rooms and gracious service was perfect for my sister and her family! My sister, her fiancé and their two children were in town and I wanted to give them the total Laguna Beach experience. After reviewing all of the great comments on Trip Advisor I treated them to a three-day stay at the Capri Laguna. They loved it! I stopped by ahead of time and Nicholas at the front desk was wonderfully gracious and let me take a tour of the property. The hotel is very charming. The oceanfront side reminds me of something from Greece or the Amalfi Coast. Nicholas also let me check out the rooms during my property tour and I selected an amazing beachfront room for my sister and her family. The room (#203) had
Manager Response: Dear Kevin D,  We are glad to hear that your family had a great stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Thank you for the beautiful 5star detailed review, it was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you once more for taking the time to share your comments and your feedback at the trip advisor and we would happily welcome you back soon.  Kind regards,

Summary: This hotel is perfectly placed away from Main Beach and has incredible views. There are plenty of chairs and lounges to sit on whether from their two deck areas or on the beach. I could hear the ocean waves from inside my room. The room was not fancy so if you are looking for a new looking hotel, this is not for you. It was pretty clean and worth the value for its location and amenities compared to others in the area. The staff were very friendly and  accommodating and the breakfast options were perfect. This is a comfortable place that is perfectly located on the water and walkable to restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear KDubAZ,   It is our pleasure to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the beach. We appreciate your comments regarding our amenities and services. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. Thank you very much for taking the time to write your feedback on trip advisor and we hope to be your host again in the nearest future.  Kind regards,

Summary: I had been planning a 4 day getaway trip for my birthday and I came across Capri Laguna which promised ocean front views at a gorgeous beach. And it turned to to be exactly that. With the help of Brashir at front desk who did everything he could to ensure an amazing time including upgrading me to a king size room with sofa bed, a kitchenette, and private balcony directly facing the ocean for an additional $100 for the entire trip! All the staff here are extremely friendly! There are plenty of chairs + umbrellas the hotel puts out every day and the beach is literally just a walk down the stairs.  The beach is not too crowded (I came on Tuesday - Friday) so it makes sunbathing with a great book on the sand such a dream. I am definitely coming back for a future trip. If you're
Manager Response: Dear 0christine725,  Thank you very much for your time and for this kind comment. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.
