Thank you for praising our services and it is a pleasure that you highlighted our team members too. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach for more getaways, birthdays and ocean views.   Kind regards,

Summary: We were in Laguna Beach for 3 nights in mid-July.  Our other hotel accomodations fell through at the last minute and CalStay was able to find us an ocean view room at the Capri.  The front desk staff was great to deal with and gave us a small discount, despite paying peak rates.  The room had a king bed and sofa pull out bed along with a fridge, stove and microwave.  The hotel was refurbished and has a nice Mediterranean feel.  What really made it for my family was the views of the ocean and the beach.  The kids had a blast in the sand.  There is a small outdoor pool on-site along with included continental breakfast buffet. Wi-fi connection was adequate for our needs and the air-conditioning kept the room cool.  Only downside is limited parking at the hotel and a lot slightly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests in order to exceed their expectations.  We thank you once more for choosing us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary: We were in Laguna for one night and two days to visit friends.  I found this hotel on the Fetch Fido website and it said they accepted dogs 40pounds or less, so I booked it.  When I called to confirm the hotel, John told me that the policy had changed to dogs 25 pounds or less, but they would still honor what the other site had said.  I was so glad, or we would have never found such a cute little place.  The room was Oceanfront King.  It was a decent size.  Had an amazing oceanfront view with a nice little balcony too.  We had breakfast out there (included btw in the price, you just go get in in the lobby in the am).  The room had a fridge (perfect for our leftovers from dinner) and sink/efficiency area with breakfast nook.  Got to sleep with the roar of the ocean in our
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel and for taking the time to share your experience on the trip advisor. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We have passed on the correct information to Fetch Fido. We hope to have the opportunities to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This hotel was nice. The female staff were not overly friendly,  but the manager gave us an upgraded room for free as we had booked a balcony sea view and it was a shared balcony. Breakfast was average stuff (expected), the wifi worked great and it was nice to be on the  beach. The room was beautiful, very wooden and white and the balcony was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review following your recent stay on the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your time in bringing your feedback to our attention. We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: The front desk staff was very friendly and accommodating! We enjoyed our view and the room was comfy and clean! On a side note, the outside decor and the statuary of Greek goddesses around the hotel was lovely. It felt like an authentic old-style quality hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We look forward welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Came here for a romantic getaway, and it totally answered.  Our Ocean Front room had a sweet little balcony with 2 chairs and a sweeping view of the beach and ocean.   If you can't afford that, there are tables with chairs and lounge chairs scattered all around the hotel with beautiful views of the ocean, so you won't have far to go to sit and get an ocean view if you want it.  The room was very comfortable and had everything we needed, inc. power shower.  The beach was literally at the bottom of the stairs outside our rooms, and the guy manning the beach was jumping to offer us beach chairs/lounge chairs and towels.  The staff were totally friendly and helpful and not at all in your face.  There is a nice little coffee shop right across the street.  The location is one beach
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Trip Advisor .We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. On behalf of all our team, we would like to thank you for your nice comments. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon and create more great romantic gateway for you.

Summary: the service at Capri is second to none.  I really love the location of the hotel and they have such a great vibe.  I have been staying at Capri Laguna three years in a row for the 4th and I wont spend it any other place.  Thanks for making my holiday a great one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and for making the Capri Laguna on the Beach Hotel your destination and your first choice. We are very pleased to read your review and to know that we made a great holiday and memorable stay for you. Thank you once more for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. We most certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon and create many more beautiful memories for you.

Summary: Capri Laguna was a wonderful experience for us. The rooms were quaint and clean, and the views were spectacular! The staff was friendly, especially Nick Politis. He really went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and to ensure we were having a good time. His attention to details was top notch, and his genuine kindness was evident. We would definitely stay at Capri again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your experience at the Capri Laguna on the beach hotel. We are delighted to learn that you had a truly enjoyable stay and our services were meeting your expectations. Your valuable comments will be shared with all the relevant team and individuals. We look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary: we got everything we asked for in a room. balcony over looking the beach and water, first floor, small kitchen, fridge, microwave, sun sets are very nice, breakfast every morning, restaurants near by, chairs and loungers with umbrellas set up every morning. sit on balcony in morning, have coffee and watch people walk their dogs, jog, or just take a stroll. Very relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank for taking the time and sharing this beautiful and detailed review. We are pleased to learn that you had a very relaxing time and that you enjoyed the hotel services and location. The Capri Laguna on the Beach looking forward to see you soon. Kind regards

Summary: Everyone was very friendly and helpful. Top notch attention and excellent attitudes on all the staff from the top to the bottom.  Our room was clean, nicely decorated and more spacious than expected. We brought our small, well behaved pooch without any problem for a very reasonable fee.  All in all a terrific weekend getaway at the beach in a cute city.   .
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach. We greatly appreciate your kind word and it’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel and our services. Thank you once more for your time and sharing your feedback on the TripAdvisor. We would love to see you and your well behaved pooch again this summer

Summary: My family and I had a great time here! The manager Nick and the rest of the staff were very friendly and very accommodating to me and my two small children. The convenience of being right on the sand was worth every penny! I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback, your words of praise are appreciated and will be shared with all our team. We strive to make sure all of our guests are taken care of and create a memorable experience each and every time. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Family vacation at the Capri Laguna.  The staff were very friendly and the stay was comfortable.  The room was always clean and easy to get to anything from the hotel such as restaurants and the corner store.   We will definitely stay at this hotel again and would recommend it to others. James
Manager Response: Dear James, We are delighted to read that you had a wonderful experience at our hotel. Thank you for being with us and for sharing your feedback online. We will be looking forward to see you soon.

Summary: Spent 1 night here in middle of June. We arrived into Laguna at 9pm on a Saturday night with nowhere to stay, so were very happy to find a decent room (actually a suite) available at the Capri. Room was huge, with a balcony overlooking the ocean. This hotel is old, with a musty smell and old old furniture. But it's location is 10 +, price is right, staff were lovely, and room was clean and comfy. Parking was free - another plus. And wifi! No restaurant, but not needed as Laguna is full of brilliant restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We strive to improve our services and facilities so we can exceed our guest’s expectations. It’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel and the location. We hope to be your first choice in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: The staff (Nick, Louie, Bachir) were personable, warm and inviting as well as helpful. We spent time with them at the afternoon wine and cheese gathering. The room was clean and unique due to the 50's architecture. The waves made nap and sleep delightful.
Manager Response: We are delightful to hear that you had a beautiful time with us. We are very pleased that you highlighted your team members. The Capri laguna and the entire staff will be looking forward to see you soon for more wine and cheese, sunsets and delightful sleep.

Summary Heading: Lovely beach, lovely staff, lovely stay - can't wait to come back!
Summary: Lovely beach, lovely staff, lovely stay - can't wait to come back! Laguna beach is stunning - our favorite beach from here to LA.... Room is small and cute with a lovely balcony! Complementary wine and cheese on roof top was a winner too!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and sharing the beautiful and lovely comments. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach.

Summary: I've been coming here for years.  I love this little gem of a hotel !   The rooms are old but have charm.  They don't have the amenities  like a Hilton or Marriott but that's why we come to Laguna !  To get away from it all and relax. I will come again and again.    A few years back maybe in 95 or 96 there used to be a nasty front desk clerk but like I said I've been coming for years.  And haven't had any problems since the 90's. I would never stay anywhere else if I'm in Laguna !!!  If you like quirky hotels with great locations this won't disappoint.  If your a hotel snob stay next door at the surf and sand and pay triple for the same view !!!!! I'm going back next week to celebrate my friends birthday and I can't wait to sit on my balcony and watch the sun set !!!!!  Highly
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty, your kind word and the time you spent for sharing this beautiful review on TripAdvisor. We are thrilled to hear that you always enjoy your stay with us. Thank you once more for choosing us again and again and we will be looking forward to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel many times and every time we get a room better than the last one. Everyone is friendly and nice, the rooms are clean.the view is vow, you can not even describe, in one word this hotel is heaven on the earth. I stayed in many hotels, expensive ones, regular hotels, but this one is the BEST HOTEL EVER. I will come back soon again.
Manager Response: It’s our pleasure to know that we will be your first choice in your next visit to Laguna Beach. We appreciate your comments about our staff and our services. Thank you for your recent stay and we will be looking forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My boyfriend and I have been working for 2 months straight including weekends so we decided to take a trip down the coast for a weekend in Laguna. After searching for a hotel for a while I landed on Capri Laguna.  When we got there the valet basically told us we couldn't park at the hotel because there was an event going on. I feel as a paying guest I should be able to park in the parking lot.  We stopped by the desk to see if our room was ready. It wasn't but that is no big deal. We walked to get a quick bite to eat and something to drink. The reception staff said they would call as soon as the room was ready. By 4 ( an hour after check-in) they still hadn't called so we walked back. Our room was indeed ready but no one called. When we got to the room we loved the view.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and sharing your feedback online. We would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations Please accept our sincere apologies for the shortfalls you experienced. We will be looking into all the points you have raised as we do continuously work to improve our product and service. We would love another chance to serve you again in the future

Summary: When we got to the hotel we were early and asked if we could check in. It was no problem originally had a room on the third level and we really could not see the ocean. My husband went to the front desk and asked if there was a room closer to the ocean that we could have. Nikolaos helped us out, he gave us 3 room keys and said go check them out and lets know what one you want. We had a room on the ocean as close as you can get. It was so beautiful. If you wanted chairs to sit on the beach you just had to call the front desk and they would have chairs and an umbrella waiting for you. Service was awesome and the people were so nice. It's a little older but I came for the view and beach so the room being a little older didn't bother me. It's a great place to stay right on the beach.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It was truly a delight to read your kind words and positive praise of our team, we will pass your compliments along to. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and your feedback at the trip advisor and we would happily welcome you back for another stay in the future.

Summary: The wife and I recently visited Capri of Laguna Beach this past weekend for Mother's Day and it was by far the best hotel and accommodations that we have experienced while staying in Laguna Beach.  We were greeted by Mixhelle and Bashir at the front desk and not just was they very professional - but they were very accommodating and professional through out our check in and stay.   When I booked my reservation the day before, I mentioned to them that I would need a pack and play for my two month old and it was in our room when we opened the door ( I didn't have to remind them). The hotel and rooms are very clean, they offer free breakfast and beverages starting at 7am & they also offer free wifi and cable and they also have a heated pool which is also very clean.  They have a
Manager Response: Thank for your kind words and compliments. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. If there is ever any request that we can do to make your stay even more like home, please don't hesitate to let us know. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach,

Summary: My husband and I came here for one night to celebrate our 10 year wedding anniversary.  We were immediately greeted by Bashir who checked us in.  He was very friendly.  I researched on-line for over a month and found this hotel had all of what we wanted.  We could have stayed at a fancier hotel but we wanted the ocean view with the balcony.  We were not disappointed!!!  I booked a beachfront room and we had an amazing unimpeded view with a table, two chairs, and two lounge chairs.  My husband and I sat on the balcony drinking our champagne and eating the charcuterie we brought while watching the sunset.  This place has a refrigerator and wet bar area which is perfect.  Our bed faced the ocean and we enjoyed the continental breakfast which included make your own waffles,
Manager Response: We will definitely looking forward to see again! It’s a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We would like to thank you for praising our hotel and for sharing this detailed review on the tripadvisor. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach waiting you for more beachfront views.

Summary Heading: Good hotel with an INCREDIBLE view
Summary: My girlfriend and I had two main requirements when looking for accommodation in Laguna: we wanted a nice hotel (good, it didn't have to be great) and we wanted to be right on the sea, so that we could lie in bed and watch the waves crash, the whales go by, etc.  After an incredibly long amount of searching and research, we eventually settled on Capri Laguna. Like any hotel which is in Laguna and offers an Ocean View room, it wasn't cheap but it was comparatively well priced.  On arriving my first impression was that the hotel looked a bit old and like a B&B, with only one apparent member of staff sitting at a quiet reception desk. We checked into our room and complained immediately as our "Ocean View" room wasn't to our expectations. To be fair to the hotel, the room did have a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and feedback online. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the incredible view from your room. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We would love to have you again in the future.

Summary: Our stay for two nights at the Capri Laguna, Laguna Beach was really nice and relaxing. We didn't care for the original room since it was right next to the parking. We told the Front Desk and they were very accommodating and found another room.We enjoyed the wine and appetizers on Friday evening.  The room was clean and we have no complaints. Our stay was very pleasant and we would recommend this place and would stay there again. Front Desk people were very nice besides the Maintenance and Housekeeping employees. The Capri Laguna on the Beach is a great place to stay!
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words and it is a great pleasure to us that you enjoyed your stay.Thank you for your recommendation and taking the time to share your comments at the tripadvisor. We will be looking forward to seeing you soon. Our warmest regards

Summary Heading: best place to stay in Laguna
Summary: awesome staff, Nick was very helpful. affordable price with ocean view, pet friendly and easy access to the beach. staff was very accommodating with umbrella, chairs and towels on the beach. room was clean and neat. enjoyed the view from room #752. will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that we were your best place to stay in Laguna Beach. Thank you for praising our services. It is a pleasure that you highlighted our team members too. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach.

Summary: We had a amazing time at the Capri Laguna.  The front desk staff are so friendly and helpful.  The room was beautiful and recently redone.  We brought snacks and some wine because you have a refrigerator.  Also, parking is included so you don't have to valet or find a place on the busy streets.     My husband and I sat on the balcony looking at the gorgeous view of Laguna Beach! We will be back for sure.  Would recommend this hotel for a romantic getaway.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words and your amazing review. Thank you for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach and we are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and the view from your balcony. We will be looking forward to see you soon for more sunsets and romantic getaways.

Summary: I love coming here.  The rooms that are my favorite are the ones facing the ocean.  I mean that's why we come to a beach hotel right?  The breakfast in the AM is very yummy with lots to choose from.  This particular visit the the staff went above and beyond to help me.  Thank you so much!  The only thing I would really like is an earlier check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for being your preference when staying in Laguna Beach and your loyalty means a lot to us! The Capri Laguna on the Beach looks forward to creating a memorable stay and special experiences for you in your next visit.

Summary Heading: We felt great sadness when we check out
Summary: Spotted the hotel travelling down the 101 and planned to stop for 1 night but ended up staying for 3 as we liked it so much. Yes it's not your normal motel/hotel but that was the charm of it.  Whilst it is clearly well used, it is also well loved and everything was beautifully clean and in full working order.  The bed in our room was very comfortable and even had a view of the ocean! Inclusive breakfast was spot on and coffee was on tap all day. The staff were always friendly and helpful.   We really liked it there - so much more personal than a modern concrete and glass hotel! and staff were really friendly.
Manager Response: We are delighted that the 1 night become 3 and its great pleasure to know that you enjoyed the Capri Laguna on the Beach experience. We strive to provide the best standard service to our guest and being for them the home away from home. The hotel and the entire staff will look forward for your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great location and some good rooms!
Summary: This us a great spot for a hotel, fabulous beach side.  Yes expensive but that's Laguna Beach for you.  The only shortfall was the rooms that are not closer to the beach, facing out, are noisy.  We had 743 which was near reception and we had a noisy night of disrespectful people wandering past.  Tricky for hotel to manage but they could try. Other than that our stay was great, they need to sort out Expedia bookings (which seem to get lost)and pay more attention to the guests checking in and stood in front if them, rather than taking calls continually through the check in process.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for passing on your comments on TripAdvisor and choosing to stay at The Capri Laguna on the Beach. Please accept my sincere apologies for the shortfalls you experienced. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Laguna Beach and we would love to have another chance to serve you again in the future and assign for a room with beautiful view.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at Capri Laguna.  The desk staff were very friendly and helpful.  The hotel is well maintained, very pretty, and beachy.  Our room was great!  We chose a pool view room.  It was a big room with a kitchen with a stove, microwave, refrigerator, and everything.  A balcony with two chairs and a table overlooking the pool.  We left the balcony door open through the night and could hear the waves all night.  It's right on the beach.  Capri takes care for guests on the beach more than other hotels we saw in the area.  Capri rakes the sand in the morning and sets up chairs and umbrellas.  It was totally a perfect spot to relax.  It was easy to walk up and down the beach to different spots and views.  There are several deck areas with common seating and a
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and taking the time to share such kind words about your experience at The Capri Laguna on the Beach. Your feedback is much appreciated and the entire staff gets a chance to read your kind words. The Capri Laguna and the staff are looking forward to have soon with us.

Summary: Where do I begin?  The hotel is completely charming with so much character.  It's literally right on the beach and is steps away from popular restaurants and bars.  From the very beginning of trip, we had amazing service at the front desk (Bashir, Nick, & Michele).  They are incredibly welcoming and accommodating.  All the people I saw during check in were return customers which made me even more excited since it was our first time staying here.  I was taken away when I stepped into our room.  It was perfect.  The view in our oceanfront room was worth every penny.  We literally did not want to leave our rooms w/ the exception of hanging out at the beach.  We made plans for a fancy dinner but wanted to order in and just hang out in our room instead!  We slept with our patio door
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your kind review, and it is our pleasure to know that you enjoyed the hotel’s services and the position. Thank you for the positive praise of our staff, we will pass your compliments along to them. Thank you once more for choosing us and the Capri Laguna on the Beach wishes you a HAPPY ANNIVERSARY and No need to wait a full year to return... We would love to see you again this summer. Warm regards,

Summary: When we first arrived we were directed to park in a very squashy place. Straight away, my impression of the hotel plummeted. Then we were shown to a suite where there were no windows - "The rabbit hole", my husband called it. We made a complaint, citing that it was not as advertising showed online and that is how we booked.   So we were moved to another looking over the ocean. This one had windows, a balcony and wi-fi. But no drapes. This didn't look well. In fact, it was a nice place to stay.   Nevertheless, we enjoyed our time there. Why? Because it had a real touch of old Europe. We stepped out of the suite onto an outdoor landing, and then, down stairs to another landing, and then down more stairs to umbrellas and the beach. It was delightful. The bougainvillea growing down
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback from your recent stay with us at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced during the first day, and we are glad that finally you enjoyed your room and the hotel’s location. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. We would love another chance to serve you again in the future.

Summary: Location right on the beach is awesome!  That combined with lovely, helpful staff made this a 5-star experience. I came for a long weekend with an out-of-town friend, and plan to come back with my husband in the next month or two.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your 5star comments and feedback on TripAdvisor. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our services.  We will be looking forward to welcome you back and please let us know if there is anything we can do to facilitate your next stay. Warm regards

Summary: We visied the hotel on Saturday to stay just one night and we did not want to leave. The hotel has an old world charm but is nicely updated with all the modern convieniences of life. The staff were amazing there is nopthing they would not do if you just ask, the seem very friendly and are genuinely happy to help. The rapport between the staff is more like a family. The room we were in was just amazing, the views of the beach from the balcony are breathtaking.If you visit this beautiful hotel ask for the honeymoon suite you won;t regret it, and I can understand why people would stay indoors when they visit the Capri. The beach acess is unbelievable it is like walking through little alleways in Greece or France. This is a must visit.  My husband and I would love to thank Nic and
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place with a great staff!
Summary: My girlfriend and I came here for a weekend and had a great time! Our room had a balcony that overlooked the beach and there was a little stone path leading right down to the sand. Nick and Bashir went above and beyond to make sure we had a great room and early check-in. Great experience and we will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is old but the setting on the water is spectacular. The hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating. The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable. The free breakfast was fair. The fitness center was terrible so plan to run or walk outside for your exercise.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Relax to the Max at Capri Laguna
Summary: Rooms and decks with a wonderful view of the ocean. Whether on my balcony or sleeping with my door and window open I could experience the soothing, crashing waves. Capri Laguna is conveniently located near some great restaurants.  Bashir and Nick and the entire staff provide a touch of class.  Whether asking for assistance with planning my day or getting set up with seats and umbrellas on the beach, the service is superb.  My wife and I stayed 8 nights and we look forward to returning soon.  I was looking forward to running it down to empty with a stay of total relaxation.  Missiion successful - way to go Capri Laguna!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is an old hotel.  The paint chips off in rainbow colors its been repainted so many times.  If you don't expect too much, this ends up being wonderful spot.  The hotel is on the sand.  There are several levels of sitting areas (you have to look for them) that provide unobstructed views of Dana Point and Catalina Island.  But the highlight of the trip was the staff.  Bachir, a friendly Lebanese guy by way of Greece, is very cool and very helpful.  He move us to a room with a better view and provided assistance to make our stay with our two little girls very easy.  The weather on the day we were to checkout was incredible, and Bachir encouraged us to use the beach and the hotel pool as long as we wanted to make the most of the day.  If you appreciate the beach and want to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel on Tripadvisor for your recent stay. We are pleased to learn that you had a very beautiful time with us. Your feedback is important to us and your words of praise will be shared with our team as well. We look forward to welcoming you back soon at the Capri Laguna on the Beach

Summary Heading: Gorgeous ocean views at a boutique hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: My husband and I went to Laguna Beach for a little weekend getaway and came across the Capri Laguna. We absolutely loved it and did not want to leave! We stayed in an ocean front room with the most amazing views of the ocean and sunsets! The staff were so friendly and helpful and the room amenities had everything we needed. There are tons of restaurants and shops in walking distance of the Capri. When we checked out of the hotel, we booked our next stay! Thank you to Nick and Bachir for making our stay so memorable!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stunning and spectacular view of ocean!
Summary: I stayed at capri lagwere super awesome anf on 3/7/15. My stay was very wonderful. I got there before check in time. Nick was able to give me my room. I stayed at room 104.I love the room. It was beach front room. It was very clean.  The balcony over looking the ocean was breath taking. I enjoyed my stay. I will definitely recommend to my friends and family.   Both Bashir and Nick were super awesome and friendly!   I will definitely come back again when I need to getaway. :)  Thank you Capri laguna. Cheers! See you again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you Sarah for talking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your complimenting feedback following your stay with us. It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back and amaze you again and create more memorable memories.

Summary Heading: Charming and personal right on the ocean
Summary: The improvements made these past few years make the stay even more enjoyable. Rooms within feet of the ocean. Decks with seating on the ocean. Great restaurants down the street. CAPRI Laguna provides a comfortable, charming stay. The staff are always available to assist for any question or situation. Make sure to speak to Bashir or Nick, delightful, interesting and professional. Here, here to the soothing sounds of ocean waves as you sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Donna, Thank you for taking the time to write such kind words about our Capri and highlight our staff. We are continuously working to improve, Thank you for noticing our efforts.

Summary: We stayed here last Sunday night, February 28th. The outside is very unassuming, but the hotel was crisp and clean and carefree beachy!  We had an oceanview suite on the 3rd floor.  It was wonderful!  We had 2 patio doors and a very comfortable bed.  Breakfast was lovely and featured a Starbucks coffee brewing machine, make your own waffles and pancakes.  The hotel pool was heated and very serene.  The staff was very kind and professional.  WE LOVED OUR STAY AT THE CAPRI!
Manager Response: What a wonderful and detailed review of your stay at the Capri Laguna on the beach! Thank you so much for your kind words . We are delighted to read that you had a wonderful experience at our hotel and we hope welcome you back soon whenever you want to take a break from Green Bay

Summary: The view of the Pacific; the sound of the crashing waves.  Simply an awesome stay made impeccably special by the A-rated service of Bashir.  Thank you sir for your kind hospitality.  Welcoming smile & customer focused service.
Manager Response: We are delighted to learn that you had a wonderful time at our hotel and our products and services were up to your standards and meeting your expectations .Your kind and complimenting words will be shared with the team. Thank you once more for being with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: If you are looking to go and relax for a decent price, this is the place for you. The room I stayed in was in front of the beach and it was amazing! The staff are wonderful, both the manager Bashir and Nick were wonderful and helpful.
Manager Response: We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and being satisfied with the hotel's facilities as well as our team. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach and amaze you again.

Summary: Stayed here last weekend for a friend's birthday.  We absolutely loved it.  The views were completely amazing.  We were able to watch the sunset over the ocean from our balcony.  The property is in walking distance of many amazing restaurants and just a walk downstairs to the beach.  They have a deck with lounge chairs and tables and chairs for relaxing.  Some rooms have balconies.  Our room had queen beds, a small kitchenette and a balcony.    The absolute best part of the stay was NIC,  His customer service was impeccable.  There were four of us staying, and Nic made it a point to remember our names and address us and make us feel special every time he saw us.  He even had roses sent to our room for my friend on her birthday.  I would highly recommend the Capri and ask for
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Just the perfect place to get away
Summary: About 8 months back my wife decided to surprise me with a weekend away and on a whim she chose the Capri Laguna.  We were thrilled to have found this place.  It costs about half of what some of the large resorts do and their view is the exact same.  the ocean front rooms offer some of the best views in southern Ca.  We decided to go back recently and had the pleasure of meeting Nick and John at the front desk.  Both of these gentlemen are extremely friendly and professional.  They went out of their way to make sure our experience was a special one.  We will continue coming back here annually.  We consider the Capri Laguna our special place to getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are happy to hear that we have become your annual get away spot. Nick, John and the rest of the staff will look forward to welcome you back

Summary Heading: European charm - perfect for a romantic weekend!
Summary: We were blown away by Capri Laguna! I had researched tons of hotels in Laguna and Newport and this seemed to be a great value. Our oceanfront room (403) just absolutely wowed us. The decor was really beachy and cute (I particularly loved the vintage photographs), and that balcony over the water was truly breathtaking! We kept the sliding door open throughout our stay, and there is nothing more heavenly than falling asleep to the sound of the waves.  The grounds of the hotel reminded me SO much of the Greek islands (upon checkout we learned from Bashir that the owner is Greek, which explains it!) The stone pathways and steep staircases are very charming, as are the fresh flower boxes and striped umbrellas located on the various seating areas. The pool area is small but lovely,
Manager Response: Thank you for your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us. We appreciate your kind compliments and we would like to thank you once more for this valuable review. We can’t wait to have you stay again with us.

Summary: The hotel was nice it has great views...the staff were very nice. They did there best to make us happy. It was great staying there. I would recommend it to my friends and would be happy to stay there again
Manager Response: It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna hotel. We are delighted to receive your good feedback too. Thank you very much for your recommendation and your kind review. Will be looking forward to see you on your next mini vacation at Laguna Beach.

Summary: This is a decent hotel! Our key was broken so we were upgraded to a king suite. The room was just OK. The bathroom was outdated, and nothing special...it had a timer light!!!!! There was a big wet patch on the carpet that we had to keep stepping over! Otherwise, the decor was great, and the bed very comfy. Just needs new carpets and a bathroom update. The fridge and oven were great, the bed really comfy. But the best part was an amaaaaazing ocean view!!! The waves crash right under your window! The balcony was lovely too. And the location is awesome. There's a lovely coffeehouse over the road, a lovely cafe called heidlbergers on the way into town, and town is just a 10_15 min walk. And the hotel has beach access. I would definitely stay here again as long as I can get an
Manager Response: Thank you for talking the time and sharing your opinion with us. We are striving to improve our services and facilities so we can exceed your expectations and make comfortable and relaxing your stay with us. We will be looking forward to welcome you back at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. Kind regards,

Summary Heading: beach side boutique hotel not pet friendly
Summary: I booked this location only because it claimed to be a pet friendly boutique hotel. We have a dog that we love to join us on trips. Before i booked i called and confirmed that it was pet friendly with pet friendly beach and that there are no restrictions. I asked my husband to call a day before to confirm reservation and he is told that in fact there is a weight restriction of no more than 25lbs. My dog is 80lbs of love. I am upset to say the least. We had to scramble to get a dog sitter that cost us additional money we were not planning to spend. When we arrive at hotel I am told the total of our bill includes added charges. I know i should of read the fine print but i didn't and i paid the price for it. The hotel room looked nothing like the pictures on line and even on trip
Manager Response: none

Summary: The view from our balcony was spectacular.  During our visit whales were spouting, leaping and cavorting and dolphins were stitching through the waves right beyond our balcony railing.At night the surf was rolling and crashing in the moonlight.  The beach is private and littered with shells.  The room itself was outdated and had some mickey mouse additions/repairs, but it was clean, spacious and the beds were comfortable.  The desk staff was helpful.  The extra thirty dollars they tacked on for parking,breakfast and ??? was a surprise though.  Still, if you want ocean front... and I mean,OCEANFRONT, this is a terrific bargain.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words about the hotel and our rooms, convenience of our location and the service from our staff. Thank you also for bringing all the issues to our attention. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests. We appreciate your feedback, and we hope to welcome you back soon in our hotel

Summary: Fabulous location, felt like I was on the coast of Italy. Great views. We were there Valentines weekend, they were beyond booked. Not crazy about the room we got. Niko was able to change our room to a better one. We did have move the next night and that room was even better with a deck overlooking the wave break. Very courteous staff, really good continental breakfast. Friday night wine & cheese on the deck overlooking the coast was wonderful. Walking distance to town. Can't beat what you get for the price. Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you Maggie for your valuable comments and feedback. We are always happy to welcome you back. We are striving to improve our service and facilities so that you can enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay each time you choose our Hotel. We will be looking forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: great location right on the beach. Our room had a beautiful view of the ocean as we were literally 30-40 feet from the beach. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. The staff extremely helpful and friendly. Loved the Starbucks coffee in the lobby every morning. We stayed a week and will return again and again...
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind compliments and thank you so much for sharing with us this beautiful review! Love to hear that you enjoyed the great location. We are delighted to know you had such a great stay with us. It is always a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to continuing being your preference when staying in Laguna Beach. Warm regards

Summary: While we only had the opportunity to stay for a short while, the visit was pleasurable and peaceful.  The ocean view was tremendous and the room was very clean. We will definitely go back and use the amenities that were included:  beach chairs, umbrellas, pool, etc.. If you’re looking for a quaint and romantic weekend get away, this is your place!
Manager Response: Thank you Jerry for taking the time to post this kind review. We are glad that you appreciated our staff and service. Thank you once more for your feedback and the Capri Laguna on the beach will be looking forward for your next romantic weekend. Hopefully soon!

Summary: I've been a regular to this hotel for the past 3 years. We go every other month to have a getaway from reality and let our mind drift into the sunset. I have not reviewed this hotel yet because like I say, it's the best kept secret in Laguna.  On the beach,  right next door to the surf and sand hotel, practically half the price but the same gorgeous view. Of course the other hotel is a little more fancy but I love the originality & hospitality of this shabby chic beachy paradise.  Very European grounds with a lovely Mediterranean vibe, even vine and cheese at sunset on the top deck to top it off!!!  The management, Nick & all the staff including John & Michelle, take great care of their guests. Also the ground keepers/ housekeeping do a fabulous job of maintaining this lil piece
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for sharing with us this beautiful review. It is great to hear that you had a memorable stay with us and thank you for praising our services. It is a pleasure that you highlighted our team members. We will be looking forward to see you again on your next trip to Laguna Beach. Thank you again and look forward to seeing you in a couple of months

Summary Heading: The Capri Laguna on THE BEACH
Summary: Nestled right next to the $700.00 per night Surf and Sand Hotel sits this recently upgraded old Laguna small hotel on THE SAME BEACH. It has European charm so it isn't perfect but it is unique and it is located right on THE MOST  BEAUTIFUL BEACH. It has been newly renovated so the rooms are clean, charming and cozy. There is a deck perched center-stage where you can watch A BEAUTIFUL LAGUNA SUNSET. It is one mile from downtown Laguna so you can stroll leisurely and enjoy the shops and restaurants along the way.  There are many winding stair-steps leading to rooms from above street level all the way down to almost beach level so if you have any walking challenges make sure to let the desk know your preferences.    The manager is gracious and hands-on available and for all these
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and compliments. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed the beautiful Laguna Beach Sunset and your time with us. Once again thank you for your recent stay and sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Even thou is not the best hotel when it comes to service and facilities but this pace has a great vibe and I always stay here when travelling to southern cal. Sleeping with the windows open and hearing the spacing waves is more than you can ever ask for. Neat and cozy little piece of paradise!
Manager Response: Dear Emilce, We would like to warmly thank you for your loyalty and for taking time to review our hotel. We are glad to note that you enjoyed the little piece of paradise. Your kind feedback is truly appreciated and we look forward to see you soon. Thank you once more for choosing us.

Summary Heading: Great Feel, Excellent Service, Lots of Soul - Loved it!
Summary: I loved this place, Nick (at the front desk) was an excellent host.  There was also another guy named Bashir who was super friendly, professional and helpful.  They checked me in early and checked me out late upon my request, breakfast was good and the view from my room balcony was incredible.  I ate take out every meal whilst in the area, just so i could spend as much time in my room.   After 10 days in Hollywood and then Anaheim for business - staying in dark, sterile, fully air conditioned chain hotels (min 4 star, all of them ok) - this place was the first time in the USA that i felt i would love to bring my wife and kids for a family vacation.  If you're expecting a brand new 5 star "vegas" style room, you'll be disappointed as the place is older, has creaky floors and has
Manager Response: Dear Prince, it’s a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna hotel. We are delighted to receive your good feedback too. Thank you very much for your time and your 5* valuable review. We will be looking forward to choosing us in your next visit to Laguna Beach. With lots of soul Warm regards .

Summary: Although we live in paradise, Santa Fe NM, we were longing for warmth and the beach.  We combined a stay at Capri Laguna with a visit to our  daughter.   The accommodations were great, staff, warm and helpful, and the breakfast, delicious.  We were impressed that they served Starbucks coffee.  Loved the large deck overlooking the beach outside our room. We wanted to stay over Mother's Day but the prices rose considerably.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review the Capri Laguna hotel as well for your fantastic feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and being satisfied with the hotel's facilities as well as our friendly and professional team. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel, hopefully soon.  Best Regards,

Summary: On arrival, the manager greeted me, Bashir, who was polite & professional.  He was very helpful about the local area & interesting places to go & see.  The room was delightful & it felt like living like a local.  Breakfast included a fresh waffle maker which was a nice surprise, & the Starbucks coffee was a welcome thing to have.  During the stay, staff were pleasant which was a refreshing change from other places I have stayed.  Wi-fi was also included, which worked well.  The room was quiet & the private beach access for sunset views was great.  This really was a great experience, 5-stars in all categories.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kinds words and the time you took to share this 5 star review with us. We try to figure out what makes every guest happy. We will be looking forward to see you soon.

Summary Heading: A very pleasant stay at the Capri Laguna!
Summary: My partner and I wanted an overnight getaway and decided to drive down to Laguna Beach as our destination on 1/21.  I was searching for a hotel that was friendly to a diverse clientele and I ran across the Capri Laguna.  The website was great, and informative.  We stayed in one of the Ocean Front rooms, it was wonderful and our balcony was right above the beach!  Hearing the crashing of the waves was awesome to hear and enjoy sitting on the balcony.  The hotel is older, but the room was very very nice, a good size, clean and had some charm.  Overall we enjoyed our 1 night stay and will definitely stay at the Capri Laguna again on our next visit.  The staff that checked us in was super friendly.  The next morning Lisette handled our check-out and she too was super friendly.  We
Manager Response: Thank you for your kinds words and the time you took to share this 5 star review with us . We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Capri Laguna on the Beach. It is a pleasure to hear that you highlight our team members. We will be looking forward to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Best Value for Accomodations on Laguna Beach
Summary: We needed a break from the winter so we ventured to Laguna Beach from Philadelphia.  We had a magnificent stay at this beach front boutique hotel. The staff were very friendly and accommodating.  Kudos to Nick Politis for going the extra mile to make us feel comfortable.  Bachir and Louis were also very congenial and friendly.  Spectacular ocean front views from the rooms and the rooftop deck. We will definitely be back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and your feedback about your recent stay with us. We strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. We thank you once more you for choosing The Capri Laguna hotel and we hope to accommodate you soon.... Warm regards,

Summary: We stayed in a beachfront king (not a suite).  Our stay couldn't have been better.  Our room was 100 paces from the beach; It was 50 paces from our door around to the room next to us, then 50 paces down to the beach.  The ocean roar was nice and loud, sleeping with our private balcony door open all night long.  We went in January, the weather was perfect and hardly anyone was on the beach.  The hotel put out an umbrella and chairs on the beach for us and we felt like we were royalty among the few common folk milling about.  The staff was dressed in suits and magnificient.  On Friday they provided a large layout of free wine, cheese, crackers, and fruit on the rooftop deck; it was us and one other couple for one hour living the good life.  They provide a good but basic breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It’s good to know and we are glade that you enjoyed the location and hotel’s services. We do our best and every effort possible to ensure a pleasant stay for all of our guests. We hope to see you soon in your next visit to Laguna Beach.

Summary: We found this hotel on a Travelzoo promotion.  From previous reviews, I knew this hotel was an older property that has been renovated.  We were pleasantly surprised with our stay here.  The studio room had a beautiful view of the ocean both from the inside and of course on the balcony.  The room was clean and updated with modern furnishings.  Even with the patio door closed at night, you could hear the sound of the ocean, which we found very relaxing.  The property is nicely landscaped and well-maintained.  The breakfast area in the lobby was always well stocked, and they had a Starbucks coffee machine that was available at all hours.  Bachir took our reservation.  Michelle was there when we checked in and we met Nikolaos on our last day.  All were very pleasant and helpful with
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Capri Laguna on the Beach . Thank you once more for taking the time to share your impressions on this experience.

Summary: December 9th brought my wife and I to Capri for the 8th year in a row. Nikolaos and Bachir went out of their way to welcome us and make this stay the most enjoyable of them all.  We hated to leave and look forward to our 9th stay there.  A beautiful room with a fantastic view at a reasonable price. Thanks Nick and Bachir
Manager Response: Dear guest thank you for your loyalty and it is a pleasure to know that we will be your choice in your next visit to Laguna Beach. We appreciate your comments about our exceptional staff and we strive to achieve an exceptional environment for all our guests. The Capri Laguna will be looking forward to see you soon.   Warm regards,

Summary: We stayed in this beutiful hotel for 3 nights!!!Loved special attention to each customer,very friendly and so accommodating!The view from our room was incredible!Location is superb and would come back again.Would like to say special thanks to Nick who made our stay very special and memorable.Everyone at hotel is friendly and quick to help.We stayed in room 503 and can say that as we were told over the phone that is is going the best room it really was!!!You wake up and see ocean and hear waives and it is just unforgettable
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stay here for an night for a romantic getaway only to find no warm water and a clog toilet for the entire night. We were told by the front desk that the repair man had gone home for the night. We had higher expectations for such a beautiful hotel, but sadly were let down. They might have better services during peak seasons, but our January visit was a let down.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. The experience you described are not characteristic of the level of our service. We are sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for bringing this up to our attention. We hope that you will give us the opportunity for another romantic getaway, so we may have the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Summary Heading: The Ocean View Makes Up For Everything
Summary: I went here on a TravelZoo promotion and the Capri Laguna is a great value for the money I paid.  As others have said, it's in a great location, and it's been recently updated.  The issues that the Capri Laguna could do something about (hot water took a long time to come out), they took care of quickly. There's thoughtful touches everywhere – a robe in the closet, very nice toiletries, a wine bottle opener in the kitchen nook. There's also a microwave in the room, which means you can take leftovers home from the restaurants.  But there were some things that they couldn't do anything about.  I'm not a bed snob by any means, but this bed was rock hard, and apparently it's the same bed in all the rooms, so moving wasn't an option. I've never experienced anything like it, I really
Manager Response: Dear guest, We would like to thank for your time for sharing this detailed review and we truly appreciate your comments regarding our rooms, location, and our service. We will take under consideration all the issues that you mentioned to us. We thank you once more you for choosing The Capri Laguna hotel and we hope to accommodate you soon. Warm Regards

Summary Heading: A New Meaning for Oceanfront Hotels
Summary: This updated boutique hotel is a waterfront gem.  From the warm welcome by the international staff, to the consummate service in every other area, a stay at Capri Laguna is more than you would expect. An ideal location right on the beach, with rooms staggered so that every balcony has an unblocked view of the ocean waves, tropical breezes, and spectacular sunsets that only California can offer. A very nice continental breakfast is included. Just a short stroll to the center of Laguna. We can't wait to return to this charming and quaint hotel.
Manager Response: Such beautiful reviews are always a pleasure to read. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your experience with us. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our guests and we are delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. We would like to thank you for being with us and for your kind feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: This small hotel has a beautiful location, right on the beach. From the terrace, you can use the stairs to reach the beach, or just sit on the deckchairs and enjoy the view over the ocean. It's also close to the city center, 1 mile or a 20 minute walk. During our stay in December 2014, the fitness room was be refurbished. Our room, 711, had great views, as it was ocean front. Downside was that it was close to the stairs to the terrace, so noisy. The room itself was a bit run-down, hardly any water coming from the shower, and the balcony petite (150x50 cm) with 2 folding chairs. If you can get another ocean front room for the same price, go for it! We paid around $200 per night, based on pictures that were definitely not room 711!.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable review. It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for bringing it to our attention. We hope that you will give us an opportunity to host you in the near future.

Summary: I can't explain how much of an understatement calling my trip amazing is. From the attentive service to the gorgeous view from my property. Bacitir helped me upgrade my room so that my girlfriend and I could enjoy the beautiful view from the our room. Overall it was just perfect! I'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you Forrest for your kinds words and the time you took to share this 5 star review with us! We strive to make every guest stay memorable. We will be looking forward to see you soon

Summary Heading: Quaint hotel right on the beach
Summary: This hotel has been Laguna Beach a long time. It has been updated and the location is perfect. There is a large deck overlooking the beach and a courtyard pool. The rate includes a continental breakfast. Ask for the oceanfront rooms & you'll be very pleased. The sunsets are spectacular from the rooms. The staff is friendly and very helpful. Great value compared to other hotels next door. Will come back!
Manager Response: Thank you Patty for your kind words and compliments. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your time with us. Once again thank you for your recent stay and sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Warm regards.

Summary: Wonderful staff, specially Mr. Nicolas and Mr. Bachir were very helpful, professional and hospitable. Rooms were clean and linens snow white, We had an amazing experience and will definitely go back soon. Thanks to management for making our stay such memorable in all ways.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank  you for taking the time and for sharing  with us this beautiful review. It is great to hear that you had a memorable stay with us and thank you for praising our service. It is a pleasure to hear that you highlight our team members. We will be looking forward to see you again. All the best for 2015!!

Summary Heading: The staff is exceptional and the location is superb.
Summary: I would definently take my family of four and two dogs back! Nikolaos Politis, the assistant manager, was very accommodating and nice. The hotel is in walking distance to many shops. The ocean view decks were breathtaking. Also, the free parking made this hotel even more affordable!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for your review. It’s our pleasure to know that you enjoyed our hotel. We look forward to continuing being your preference when staying in Laguna Beach

Summary: We recently stayed for a weekend. The location truly is one in a million. Of course, ask for an ocean view. We walked a few flights of stairs down to level one.....the surf very close and was great listening to it all night....very relaxing....beautiful sunsets. Private....and steps down to the sand. Tide was too high to enjoy the beach area....but that was ok....private balcony was great.   This is a very beautiful place with plush and well maintained landscape. The rooms are clean and the decor was nice. Bathroom was adequate. If you are expecting a room or suite with marble, and all amenities of a big box hotel, this is not your place.  The Capri offers first, location, beauty, privacy, cozy and the allure of nature and being in one of the most beautiful cities on the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel for your recent stay with us . We are pleased to read that you have received an excellent service and you enjoyed the location. Thank you once more for recommending our hotel and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future.

Summary: From the moment I arrived, the staff were extremely kind and helpful. As a solo traveler, they really made me feel welcome. I got an oceanfront room for $219/night, and was given room 711. It was a little small, but the view made up for any room issues. I had some issues with the remote control for the TV, and they sent someone immediately to fix it with new batteries.   The room had a mini frig (that was off balance, but worked fine) a single cup coffee maker with the tandard creme andsweetner packet (I bring my own Via and Stevia sweetner), and a microwave. The balcony had 2 chairs (no lounge) but just below was a huge oatio with lounge chairs and views. Also to the right of the room was an outdoor table, perfect to share a bottle of wine at suncet with friends.    The bed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this detailed review and for bringing all the issues to our attention. We are also glad that you appreciated our staff and service because we believe these are very important to provide our Guests with a great experience. Thank you once more for your feedback and the Capri Laguna on the beach will look forward to welcoming you back soon

Summary: We had a fantastic stay at the Capri Laguna!  The staff was VERY accommodating, particularly Nick, whose kindness and patience was exemplary.  Our room had a great view of the ocean (which you can see in the photo), but what the photo can't show is the sound of the surf on the sand!  Very relaxing!  We highly recommend the Capri!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your warm and kind feedback for your recent stay at the Capri Laguna boutique hotel. It was a pleasure to know that you had such a wonderful experience with us .We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.  Our warmest regards and happy New Year

Summary: It is on the beach, the rooms are clean but a bit in need of an upgrade. I stayed in 101... Down various steps and stairs to the edge of the ocean. Nice deck and kitchenette with dining table. Bath a bit small and dated with a whirpool(spooky). It was priced well....but they definitely need better linens and the pillows were just awful. It kinda killed me to find a $30 daily resort fee on the bill. Jeez - what a ridiculous charge. It's not the Four Seasons!!! The free breakfast should be free...it's cost must be no more than $3.00.  So a few improvements needed, but an ok place with a nice staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and sharing this review with us. We appreciate your feedback and we will certainly take it into consideration as we always try to improve the attention on our Guests’ needs. We do hope your travels will bring you again to the Capri Laguna.

Summary: We visit the hotel every summer for the past decade. We've seen so much improvement throughout the years. It always feels like home. The staff are great. They remember us every time we return. The sunsets are amazing. We keep coming back. Love the Capri.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Mexigrk We would like to thank you for choosing Capri Laguna again and again. And thank you very much for the kind words about our hotel and our team. It’s a pleasure to know that we will be your first choice on your next visit to Laguna Beach. We love having you stay with us!

Summary: Capri Laguna Inn on the Beach is centrally located in Laguna Beach, CA with great service and beach front access.  The hotel offers unique room layouts with an extremely helpful staff and responsive management team.  Bachir and the Capri staff will go out of their way to make sure your stay is the best experience possible.  I keep returning to this hotel when I am staying in the area. - John Stuart
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing such wonderful feedback about your stay. It really means a lot to our team members to get mentioned by name.   We really appreciate your review, and we are so delighted to know that our friendly staff, rooms, and views, were all great aspects on your stay with us.   Thank you again for staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This hotel provides amazing sunset views and easy beach access...the staff are more than accommodating and provided a free room upgrade upon our arrival. Although the hotel is older the rooms have been updated. The location is close to restaurants and the parking is free!
Manager Response: Dear Mr/Mrs It is really a pleasure to know you found our hotel so comfortable and had a lovely time with us.  We are also glad that you appreciated our staff and service because we believe these are very important to provide our Guests with a great experience.  Thank you very much for your review and we will be happy to welcome you back.

Summary: What an amazing little gem. I actually loath commenting on this site about it for fear of it losing its appeal as a hidden gem. From the beach front balconies to its walking distance to all things Laguna Beach, Capri Laguna Inn has it all. Clearly not to be confused with a modern achatectual wonder Capri Laguna Inn should never be confused with the latest W or Manderin Oriental, HOWEVER, neither of those has the location in Laguna Beach the Capri Laguna has. The Price! Situated immediately adjacent to Sand and Surf and at half the cost Capri Laguna Inn will be a place to stay for weekend getaways for me and every human I come into verbal contact with for the foreseeable future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing with us this beautiful review! Love to hear that you and your family enjoyed the hotel, and we are delighted to know you had such a great stay with us. It is always a pleasure having you with us and we look forward to continuing being your preference when staying in Laguna Beach. Thank you once more and The “Hidden Little Gem” will look forward to see you soon.

Summary: We are repeat visitors to Capri Laguna and we love it there every time.  The views are spectacular and the access to the beach is perfect.  We love listening to the sound of the waves and just relaxing.  The staff is especially accommodating.  Nick - so friendly; Bashir - always supportive and goes out of his way to make sure everyone has had a wonderful time.  We have already scheduled our next trip!    Diane W.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Diane W , Thank you so much for repeatedly joining and for sharing your feedback. I am delighted to hear that we are a special place for you! We will be looking forward to welcoming you at the Capri Laguna! Sincerely

Summary: A Great location for a weekend getaway!  My Wife and I loved our room our view and access to the beach.  My Wife and I went to Italy for our Honeymoon and we visited the Island of Capri.  We felt as if we were back there when we stood on our personal Balcony.  Bashir was very Helpful and accommodating.   We will return soon.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Aaron H I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay and we were able to provide you with a memorable stay! We are committed to providing the best service that we can to our guests. We are looking forward to seeing you soon, perhaps for your wedding anniversary!

Summary Heading: This was an amazing little place for the price!
Summary: My husband and I decided to head to the beach for a little weekend getaway and started searching.  When there are fewer bad reviews than good, I usually take them with a grain of salt.  Thank goodness we DID!  This is a charming little place, right on the beach.  It is older, but that only adds to it's charm in this case.  All of the common areas are kept up beautifully.  I love the fact that it has narrow little walkways, up down and all around, to access the entrances to the various rooms. It is multi-leveled, with little entances to the rooms, tucked everywhere. It has steps down to the sand also nice adirondack chairs and an umbrella available at your request.   It has a very European feel and reminded us very much of a place we stayed in Greece a few years ago.  The rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at the Capri Laguna on the beach and for your 5 stars detailed feedback. We truly appreciate your comments regarding our rooms, location, and our service. We’re glad you enjoyed your stay and we will be looking forward to seeing you in the near future.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our overnight at the beachfront Capri Laguna Inn on the Beach. Rooms were clean and spacious with fridge and had great views of the ocean. Very nice continental breakfast served in the morning with many choices. If you like the sound of the waves, this is the place to be.The pool area was clean and attractive with bouginvilla on fence/gate. Attractive surroundings with statues. On the top area there is a large deck for many people to view the ocean and the sunsets. We will return!
Manager Response: Dear Bev G,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay at the Capri Laguna on the beach!  It was truly a pleasure to have you with us. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to accommodate you again in the near future. Warm Regards

Summary: As with many beach hotels, there is wear and tear on the facilities.  This property is ripe for rehabilitation.  But, still, it is pleasant and some of the rooms are comfortable.   The primary attribute is its location -- on the beach with splendid view of the Pacific. Our arrival was marred by inept staff that kept us waiting for hours rather than assigning us to another room -- some sore of repair was necessary.  Then, the room was not comfortable - deficient air conditioning (that should not even be necessary in October). We were able to move to a much nicer room with plenty of room, overlooking the ocean.  Air flow was sufficient -- no need for AC.  Good place for family on budget.
Manager Response: Dear Norman  Thank you for your comments. We continuously strive to provide superior accommodations and service.   We welcome you back to exceed your expectations. Sincerely

Summary Heading: Fun in the Sun and Surf
Summary: Great Beach Hotel and location. Staff was fantastic, especially Bachir - super friendly. Clean rooms, Very quiet ocean front room. Super comfy beds, nice baclony overlooking the beach. Breakfast was included in our room price - kids loved making the waffles - fruit would have been a great added touch. Pool was a  nice break from the beach and waves for the little ones too. Great sunsets and we loved sitting on the balcony after the kids went to bed each night, and we also loved falling asleep to the sound of waves crashing down on the beach. The location of the hotel was with in walking distance to several great restaurants and shops. We will definately be back - we loved this location!
Manager Response: Dear Lori, Thank you for your for kind review. It was our pleasure having you and your family with us. We are in the process of revamping our breakfast and we will be definitely be adding fruit to it. Thank you again and we look forward to having you back soon

Summary Heading: Malt liquor quality at Champagne prices
Summary: Or Hotel prices with motel quality. I can see what this hotel is trying to do; inject hotel luxury and quality into a motel space. Anything that was not bolted down was pretty new and nice. The bed was comfortable, the TV was a flat screen, the toiletries looked fancy. But the room was itself was run down. There were broken fixtures, the doors didn't close properly, the walls were thin so you could hear everything going on around you. The water pressure from the pipes was bad so the shower was weak.  For the prices we paid, the room should have been nicer.
Manager Response: Dear JacksonJacksonJackso, Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent stay at our hotel. Your comments allow us to maintain and improve the overall guest experience. It is our continuous effort to provide a relaxing and comfortable experience away from home and rest assured that we take under consideration all issues that arise. We hope that you will consider returning to us in the future so that we may have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Our warmest regards,

Summary: This place was probably an old apartment building converted into a "hotel". But they converted this placed without an architect or designer.  Everything is half broken. Even the toilet paper holder. They couldn't even fix that?! The bathroom door is not aligned so it's so hard to open and close. Our front door has a huge gap at the bottom so you can hear everything that's going on outside.  Walls are paper thin. I can hear my neighbors make their coffee. That's just half the stuff that is wrong with this place. What else? The parking.  It's so tight and small I dented my new car. For the price we pay, there should have been valet. I give it 1 star for the distance to the beach. Just steps away.  Only plus! Not coming back
Manager Response: Dear Waishan Y,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Capri Laguna on the Beach and taking the time to share your recent experience with us. Your comments are valuable and are taken under serious consideration. The maintenance issues have been  addressed. It has been always used as a beach front hotel ever since it was build and unfortunately city restrictions does not allow us to make the changes in order to acquire more parking space within the premises that is why we have a second larger parking lot just 2 minutes walking distance from our Hotel, reserved for our guests only. We would like to invite you to visit the beautiful Laguna Beach again in the future and hopefully you will give us the opportunity to welcome you and your family back to our hotel during one of your next visits so that we may have the opportunity to exceed your expectations. Our warmest regards,

Summary: We will definitely come back to the Capri Laguna when next in Laguna Beach. It has a lovely view especially at sunset,(room 102) really clean, modern and comfortable.  Helpful and friendly staff, and Bachir could not have been any more accommodating, professional and friendly.   Don't miss the wine and cheese reception on Friday at the upper deck!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback!  Thank you for your kind words about the cleanliness of our rooms, convenience of our location and service from our staff. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and I am delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations.  Once again, we appreciate your kind compliments and recommendations and look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Laguna Beach!

Summary: I have never written a review for any hotel I have every stayed. I've been to Europe/Asia and throughout the US. This experience was just that bad:  We were lucky enough to get room 714. This room looked nothing like the website. I actually called a few weeks back to see if I should pay for this room or the cheaper room and the lady assured me that this was the best one and that we would have our OWN balcony. Our room has to be the worst one on the property. We "shared" a balcony but yet there were only 2 chairs the the other room who actually had immediate access to the room were using them. My pregnant wife and I were celebrating our anniversary and were hoping to have a pleasant experience. Instead, the room was full of spiders, smelled like mold and the water temperature was
Manager Response: Dear Mattmuldown106, Thank you very much for choosing the Capri Laguna on the Beach for your recent stay and for taking the time to share your recent experience. We apologize for not being able to offer you a memorable stay while in our Hotel. We are always willing to go the extra mile for our guests’ to make sure they enjoy their stay from the minute they arrive to our Hotel. Had we known that you were celebrating a special occasion and that your wife was pregnant we would have chosen a room closer to the facilities with more privacy. Hopefully, you will give us the opportunity to welcome you and your family back in the future

Summary Heading: I Keep coming back and   don't I don't want to leave.
Summary: Capri Laguna has my heart!  Four or more times I have been fortunate to return to Capri Laguna on the beach. Each and every time i arrive,stay and leave happy...but i don't usually want to leave! Whether I'm with my daughter and friend's or a romantic get away ..Capri Laguna reaches and goes above, my expectations! When you wake up ,Can you beat a complimentary freshly ground cup of Starbucks coffee in the morning over looking the waves under a blue sky? Ive stayed in there mid to high end rooms and all were clean and remind me of Italian villas! Being an AZ native a 5 hour drive or hour plane ride to paradise is an Oasis and Capri Laguna is real! This year was no different! My daughter and close friend's stayed a week and enjoyed every minute! Great location ..close to
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is located right on the beach in the heart of Laguna Beach. For the money, this is a nice hotel. 2 doors down is the Surf and Sand hotel where rooms average over $500 per night. Granted they are nicer but if you are in Laguna, you shouldn't be staying on your hotel room! You should be on the beach or walking around town! There is a wine and cheese reception on the deck and a daily continental breakfast which adds to the value. Overall, I was very pleased, primarily due to the location and free parking. I would return again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Travelzoo offered a deal.....if you book for 2 nights the 3rd night was free. I booked on line and received a confirmation from Capri Laguna: each night was $126.00 with a $30.00 resort fee for each night. Thank goodness I put my stay on a credit card, because when I got the bill it was over $700.00 for the 3 days. They tried to say that I had upgraded my room. I sent the credit card company the e-mail with all the particulars, and thank goodness I only had to pay less than $400.00. That wasn't the only problem....They never cleaned our room. We made our own beds, emptied our own trash, and supplied our own coffee etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my sixth time at Capri Laguna.  I've stayed in the same room all six years and encountered many problems, but the front desk and maintenance guys really stepped up to help fix the issues.  Fred was great and refunded one night because of the issues.  He, also, gave me a great deal for when I come back next year.  This hotel was built in the 50's, so don't expect a 5 star hotel.  That's way it's less expensive.  Yes, there are a lot of stairs-it's built on a hill.  The beach is the best and Francisco and Gustavo worked super hard to keep everybody happy with plenty of umbrellas, chairs, and towels.  The housekeeping staff was great, too.  It's always worth the drive from Arizona!  Thanks again, Fred.
Manager Response: none
